i swear all the cool stuff comes out after i grow upmy daughters really into the monsters from godzilla right now and her favorite is king ghidorah there isnt exactly a lot of merchandise of the guy right nowat least not in a very affordable price range there are plenty of vinyl figures and model kits most of which are longsold out fortunately this little guy here is still around not only is it a cute take on the three headed king but its definitely something unique in the world of godzilla collectibles he just arrived in the mail this week and my daughters face lit up when she saw him i gotta admit i couldnt help but smile too who wouldve guessed that the same people who brought us beanie babies would go and make little plush godzilla characters tooghidorah stands at about  inches tall from foot to the tip of his wing hes stuffed like your typical stuffed animal and doesnt have any little pellets like beanie babies do i was very surprised by the work that went into it like how they gave his body a pattern to make it look like there are scales along with some fur on the tips of both tails and the spikes down the back of the middle neck both the wings and his claws have a cool texture to them adding a little bit more to the toys design instead of leaving them one plain color all three heads look great too and from the right angle even look like goats their horns can be shaped a little bit too since theyre not stuffed and just the fabric on its own the eyes are plastic and probably the only thing that could be a hazard to young kidsat this price theres nothing bad to say youre getting a fairly large stuffed ghidorah my daughter has already taken hers on trips and hes a regular snuggle buddy for bed time now if only theyd make a gamera

theres a lot to love about this figure its so unique in the star wars universe in fact it looks like something out of a s scifi flick the blade on top actually rotates like a helicopters the wires are very well done giving this figure a used droid look my only complaint is that because the legs are so thin the figure doesnt really stand well and might stoop one way to address this problem is to open its mouth wide enough so it acts as a third leg however i wish hasbro had used a harder plastic for those legs overall this is still an awesome piece for any star wars figure collection
the color  detail is firsttime it comes with a toy chair its arms  legs move pretty well a good reminder of his match against carlos colon at nwas first starrcade event in  i give this toy a  out of

the color and detail is firstrate a good reminder of his feud with jeff jarrett in early  it also comes a toy version of the wcw world heavyweight championship belt which he won  times a good gift for any wcw andor ddp fan i give this toy a  out of

sturdy little galsthe bracelet choker and earrings that she wears are sewn on very well shoes are permanent ty did not scrimp on the velcro on the clothes either its definitely doin its job rubys pants are rockin out with a cat motif at the bottom can be seen in above pic alas her clothes cannot fit onto a groovy girl and vice versa well you can get gg clothes on ruby but they are loose she has slight boobs yes i did and permanent undies hair gets mussed quickly when she is shoved in a bin with other rag dolls perfect for kids who love acdc

as with other non mattel disney toys this looks better in pictures than actually playing with it  im not sure what happened with disney quality but nearly every disney item we own breaks easily and is of poor qualitylike other reviewers we had the same issues with the clip that holds it together just falling off  there are a lot of little pices great for choking on stepping on or simply losing  the swing breaks easily and is a real pain to get back together  the princes cloak never stays on the pillar doesnt stay up and the pieces dont fold correctlyi could go on

the minute i started taking this out of the box pieces started falling off  they were clear plastic tags that hang on the carousel and were impossible to find in a carpet once they dropped  the thing looks assembled but is actually in quite a few pieces and needs to be assembled  i tried and tried but could not get this to work  all those loose pieces made it rickety and unstable  this ended up being a pointless effort in frustration and to add insult to injury id find those little plastic pieces days later by stepping on them painfullythis was never used once  i didnt even like the outfits it came with  certainly not for a child under the age of  since it is so rickety

elves have always been dualclass types both fighters and spellcasters  its a challenge to portray this dualclassing in a sculpt but werner klocke has the solution a sword in one hand and a staff in the other  never mind that gandalf did it first or that theres not particularly memorable elves wielding the symbols of fighter and wizard together  lysettes doing it because it looks coolheres what reaper has to say about lysetteit is said that all elves are ineffably touched by magic few however develop the mental fortitude to bend and shape the fleeting capricious energies of this plane to their will even at a young age it was readily apparent that lysette had an exceptional talent and an unquenchable thirst for all things arcane welltraveled and trained in the halls of venerated magi both elven and human she answered almirithils call to arms unhesitatingly quite possibly lysette is spurred by rumors of longforgotten libraries and sanctums buried in the elven ruins of craclaw and denelspireor to put it another way lysettes your bogstandard swordstaff wielding elflysette has a long runeengraved sword in one hand a crystaltipped staff in the other  her long flowing hair is impractical for combat so we can assume that the sword is more of a casting tool than a weapon  herr klocke manages to make lysette look elvish too  in the runes on her sword and scabbard her pointed ears and her fantastic fashion sense a suitable eldritch knight if you happen to be playing a female elf

there are so many nontraditional dwarves in the reaper bones line that its easy to assume that theres no regular dwarves to be found  but dain deepaxe would never let that happen because hes a dwarfs dwarfwith his wicked axe a wooden shield and a horned helmet hes one opera away from being in an opera hes got a backup shortsword and throwing hammer and of course theres his beautiful flowing beard  sculptor tim collier nails it dwarf they name is deepaxe

because wizards of the coast has copyrighted the term beholder reaper has to bend over backwards to come up with names for monsters that are clearly beholders but arent beholders  this is how you end up with julie guthries eyebeast who is basically a floating eye with a big mouth and tentacles on top and belowthe sculpt is straightforward a big ball with eyestalks and a huge maw  so the key is in how it presents the eyestalks  the eyebeasts eyestalks writhe like tentacles and dangle above and below  a necessity to give the eyebeast the appearance of flight  it has a huge maw suitably monstrous fangs and one massive eyeball glaring in rage  in addition to the tentacles above and below there are other smaller eyes dotted throughout its knobby formi painted the eyebeast a combination of blue shades and used pink and brown for its eyes  this isnt a hard sculpt to paint and its one of those creatures thats so physically compelling that you just paint it enough to accent its terrifying features and let the sculpt speak for itselfone of my favorites in the line and well worth the investment

pity the bard  if you happen to play one guilty finding a miniature to represent the bard is difficult  you can find a dozen different weaponwielding fighters to model your warriors unique fighting style on the tabletop but youll be hard pressed to find the perfect bard figure the right race holding the right musical instrument  in my experience almost all bards sing because really why risk carrying and losing an unwieldy musical instrument but if you happen to play a female elf bard who strums a guitar youre in luck because astrid fits the billastrid is another of werner klockes attractive creations posing like a model with a sword dangling from her hip and what looks like an electric guitar by her side shes a bard and an entertainer though excuse me chronicler so its reasonable to assume shes not really dressed for combat the potion bottles and everpresent belt pouches show that astrids always ready for a good time whatever form it may take

you might have heard a debate that raged a long time ago as to whether or not dwarf women had beards  you can blame this on jrr tolkien who in appendix a of the lord of the rings statedthey are in voice and appearance and in garb if they must go on a journey so like to the dwarfmen that the eyes and ears of other peoples cannot tell them apartthis leads one to understandably believe that dwarf women have beards because otherwise itd be pretty easy to tell them apart  in the war of the jewels tolkien explicitly statedno man nor elf has ever seen a beardless dwarf  unless he were shaven in mockery and would then be more like to die of shame for the naugrim have beards from the beginning of their lives male and female alikeor to put it another way yep dwarven women have beards  this debate raged in dragon magazine at length but it comes down to this  not all players find playing a bearded lady appealing  sculptor werner klocke feels the same way  this isnt a surprise as herr klocke has a  how shall we say fondness for the feminine formonce you get past the beard issue the question remains as to how to make a female dwarf feel both feminine and dwarvish freja manages to be just thatms fangbreaker is just straight up dwarvishly awesome she has a symbol of law an arrow or the futhark rune for the letter t on her axe and holds a wooden shield with the same t symbol she has a cool helmetstyle belt buckle and her hair is in braids  she looks regal and ferocious  and because this is a sculpt by klocke she has an ample exposed busomshe earns my vote for nonbearded dwarven women

its hard to blame sculptors like werner klocke for making so many twoweapon fighters  after all it makes the character that much interesting when the figure has another weapon in its hand  dualwielding rangers are particularly suitable and elladan is no exception with his sword and daggerhe has a cloak of course and herr klocke added his usual flourishes in this case a leaf theme that clearly designates elladan as a ranger not a rogue who happens to like pointy things  unlike some of the other dualwielders elladan looks like a ranger at first glance which is how it should be

i struggled with this sculpt by the inimitable werner klocke  on the one hand its of an assassin so i expect the cloak two swords and studded leather armor  on the other its hard to make her look particularly assassinlike  shes technically not much different from kellen the nobleman adventurerdeladrin wields a wickedlooking saber with hand guard and a curved knife her armor differentiates her a bit in that shes wearing skullshaped knee guards which add to her assassinymystique i opted for a green color for her cloak which unfortunately makes her look a bit more like a ranger and chose a red color for her armor to make her really stand out  the problem is that this makes her look like a bit of a christmas tree so i toned down the beret green color and went with a duller greenas assassins go with the exception of deladrins kneepads theres not much that screams assassin about her  as a twoweapon fighter shes a compelling figure but as an assassin theres just not much to recommend

i feel almost embarrassed stating that my human children love this toy after everybody else got it for their dogsbut what the heck they do ours has wild hair and i swear a wild look in his eyes as well battery life is just fine our baseboards are still white he can withstand an older toddler and my older daughter even incorporates him as a future predator in her everyday play with littlest pet shop re the british series primeval no weaselin ya this guy will not weasel out of your heart

i have been looking for a toy for sorting purposes for a longtime and settled on this because it seemed to be the most interesting and comnprehensive  it comes with lots of different shapes in different colors and  sizes  they are trains bears ducks trucks etc so i think these will capture kids attention more than other sets  i love one reviewers idea of keeping the strips they come in to use as puzzles so i will be doing that for sure  the idea is a huge hit with my kids already  one reviewer said something about the notches of the discs not being placed right so the lines on them dont match with the compartments of the tray but mine doesnt have this problem  the company must have made an improvement  over all this toy is wonderful and i would definitely recommend it

shes lovely to look at but has lots of little pieces that a preteen would lose or break  i believe these are marketed to older girls anyway  those just hitting their teens or so  its great that it comes with a stand and her arm positioning is very good for model poses recommended

this feels much more like a marketing opportunity than a useful add on  my daughter jsut ends up knocking off the decorations so it got no use even at the big discount i was never tempted to get the other options

its one thing to make a nonbearded female dwarf warrior but another to make a nonbearded female dwarf rogue baileys name is a strong hint that shes not a hackerstyle dwarf and the weapons she wields add an additional clue a crossbow in one hand and a short sword in the other  she wears a hooded cloak that conceals the crossbow  werner klocke is surprisingly daring here in resisting the twofisted fighter style of so many other miniaturesand oh yeah silverbell actually doesnt have her bosom exposed which makes her even more awesome it seems only rogues have enough sense to keep their entire bodies covered

eyela fits in perfectly with the bayala series of schleich fantasy figures she is well painted high quality vinyllike plastic she was purchased to use with the summergreen elf house and goes perfectly there my  year old loves her

whether you liked mirrormask or not you cant deny that the sphinx cats in that movie were messed up i loved them as soon as they appeared i knew i had to have something of them be it a poster or cardboard cutout luckily i found this bad boy and ordered him immediately heck i ordered a second one just so i could have both faces displayed im still confused as to who actually made this statue gentle giant or diamond select the box has gentle giants logo on it and yet when i contacted their customer service about getting a replacement they said that this statue wasnt made by them how bout that youd think theyd want to say that they made it considering that if it is its one of the products by them thats actually worth buyingthe sphinx is superbly sculpted and its body is as sleek as the standard apple product its shiny and features a combination of purple silver and grey colors you place him on the base via pegs in the feet and he stands up perfectly with no risk of falling over on his own the face plates were a great feature and you get one with a neutral expression and the other has more of a smilinghungry look both of these have pegs that easily go into little holes on the shinxs head though they are at risk of falling off because of how small the pegs are be careful that nothing bumps into it because the face plates are pretty thin and while mine never broke no matter how high they fell i could see it happening at some point the wings are gorgeous and as you see in the picture have tons of colors i can proudly say that what you see in the picture is most likely what youll get with the actual statue something thats rarely said with gentle giant products hey maybe it really isnt made by them then the bottom of the base has your standard x out of x made info and all thatsadly its the wings that also have the biggest problem over the course of a few months my first sphinxs wings began to droop theyre actually quite bendy unlike the rest of the statue so be careful with these too but mine didnt stop at the drooping the paint started to chip away too until the wings just plain snapped off i was heartbroken i dont know if it had to do with temperature or what but it still happened and you should consider it before buying as well something else is quality control with the paint on my first sphinx the paint on him was flawless and the face plates had a lot of different tones on the second sphinx his face was almost entirely grey with no shading like what you see in the picture its not a big deal but im picky when it comes to things like that and when youre paying for a high end collectible you expect things to be done righteven with that major problem i still think about buying another one of these because of how great it was whenever id look at the sphinx id smile right back at it the fact that this even got made is incredible since the movie pretty much bombed if only they wouldve made others for this line aside from just the dark queen so much potential but im still happy with what we got if you liked the sphinx at all and can get one of these for a good price go for it

we really wanted to love this  my daughter couldnt wait to get it  but right out of the box the tree did not go into the stand well barely at all since it doesnt fit in well it doesnt push down in order to turn on  so we dont get to use this with the sounds and timed tree flip  that takes a lot away from the gamethe stands are cheap and honestly difficult to use  out of   year olds at a birthday party only one was able to get a frog on a tree  the rest gave up annoyed and frustrated and just started to throw the frogs at each other  the stands are cheap and not well designed enough so that a child can hold the stand while flipping the frog  often fingers or hands just get in the way and the frog drops onto the flooralso frustrating is that the tree doesnt disassemble again afterwards so it no longer fits in the box  seriously  who wants a toy that doesnt store neatly in the boxin all id wait to buy this until version a redesign pops up
this toy rocks great punching action soso colors on the tights i would have gone with red  black but its their not mine it also comes with a folding chair i give this toy a  out of

while he didnt do anything but die in the movies plo koon looked rad him being released early in the sw line of figures got some collectors riled up but most people didnt have any complaints once he came out my main reason for getting him was the exclusive versions lightsaber gauntlet but he was cool enough to be good without itplos head sculpt looks just like how he did in the movies sideshow did excellent on the breath mask and googles too getting some tiny details in there that they couldve skipped on and not many wouldve noticed his hands are great too with veins showing through the skin and good texture on the nails his robe is also different from any other jedis it closes with little snaps i really like this design and wish wed get other figures with it the rest of his outfit is done well though not of high quality like the first couple of jedi especially kit fistos plo comes with the usual jedi accessories lightsaber hilt ignited lightsaber useless communicator and the hologram thing that no one ever uses if you get the exclusive version you get a great looking ignited and unignited lightsaber gauntlet now i said it was the main reason i got the figure that thing just looked cool but once you snap it on his wrist you realize that there arent many poses you can get out of him while wearing it because it just looks silly once on it looks like a wrist blaster shooting giant laser boltscons the usual buck body giving you limited articulation compared to whats out there today though i cant really complain for when this was released that and the quality of his outfit are about it i also dont like the frayed robe he has like i said with the obiwan figure if you pull on one strand or it gets caught on something it could destroy the whole robe be careful with itplos a good addition to any collection his design alone makes him stand out and even with how silly the lightsaber gauntlet is it adds some pop with it having green blades maybe you can give it to another figure that can get better poses

my sister had made us promise not to have a big shindig on her th preferring just a quiet little celebration with her hubby  kids  i completely understood having wanted the same but our mother did plan the traditional february birthdays breakfast for her  eldest daughters whom were all born that month  it was at an intimate upscale restaurant so needless to say my very stylish sister was a tiny bit embarrassed to find this very colorful inflatable walker propped in her chair  we couldnt find the right nozzle to our air compressor so i ended up blowing it up myself  didnt take as long as i thought but i wouldnt suggest leaving that task until the last minute  its got a place to personalize it with the giftees name and the panic button actually squeaks  we shared a room as kids and i felt this was mild payback for some of her childhood tattling on her big sis  what would a th be without at least one gag gift

each of these animals is fun on its own because of the sounds each makes and the tractor is fun for babies to roll along  the only thing that kept this from getting  stars is that the animals have a tendancy to fall off if they are all stacked on the tractor and it is rolled but babies still enjoy playing with this
my yearold loves to manipulate this pandas legs and head to hear the clicking sound  she also loves the different textures on the feat and one even has rattling beads that you can see
this is fun for babies  the animals make different rattling sounds and the truck rolls easily across the floor  there are bumps on the truck and animals that make stacking possible

i love the idea behind this its so seldom that we see anything regarding ralph mcquarries concept art for the original star wars these figures are a great representation of what might have been luke looks like hes ready to head into an area with no oxygen because he has a face mask the mask can come off to reveal somebody who looks a bit like mark hamil in fact this is the same luke from the famous concept art still of luke and vader fighting in a spaceship the figure itself is highly posable and has great detail

i really like these  no more messy paper wrappers and they stay fairly clean  they are also pen sized so they can make more intricate drawings and color a bit more precisionthey come in a plastic bag that doesnt close as well as id like  i wish there was a tray inside to keep the shape flat rather than getting bunched up easy  but thats my only quibble with these

for some reason i always wanted a movie version of the enterprise this is it its not perfect and i do wish the quality were a bit higher but if you can catch it for  dollars or less its worth it i had a few problems with mine but was able to fix them first the placement of one of the engines was a bit off i sandpapered the attachment point a bit and it fits better now but it was a bit of a pain second the deflector dish is black i heard this only affects some models so id recommend asking about it before buying i applied a light coat of blue paint and it looks ok now neither problem killed the ship for me if i had any indication that diamond select was going to reissue this ship id advise you to wait but i havent seen any indication of that i recommend it but hesitantly and only for much less than the advertised price

this is certainly not a bad version of boba fett but for the same price the newer vintage ones are a lot better looking for collectors also the jetpack on this one doesnt look quite like the one in the film

at the age of eleven my mother was on parole for the weekend and took me to seaworld to see the dolphins sharks and aquatic petting zoo having spent a wonderful day together we planned to make one last stop at the penguin encounter get my face painted like a marine animal and then go see one of her friends to get her a new tattooupon entering the exhibit we wandered apart looking at the various sights when i realized that she was nowhere to be found i started to worry where she might be further compounding the situation i needed to go to the bathroom with no bathroom in sight and the growing sense of urgency to pee further decreased my rational thoughtbeing in a darkened exhibit area i saw a door light up the immediate surrounding area as it opened and closed quickly from one of the seaworld employees exiting without delay i went towards the door opened it and entered the long corridor hustling down the path looking to and fro frantically searching for a restroom or at least an employee who could direct me to oneas my pace increased in the welllit steryl hallway i found a door partially open with apparent plumbing pipes visible thinking it would to lead to a bathroom i hurried through it and down that cool wet hallway to another door that was opened upon entering it i immediately felt a dramatic drop in the tempreture and realized i had actually entered the area the penguins lived inthe door behind me shut as i turned around to leave trying to open the locked door was a futile efforthearing a series of slow moving crunch noises i slowly turned around and saw something more disturbing than a sequel to happy feet was a a group of penguins standing upright in the snow towards methe crunching sound increased as they walked towards me it was at that point i lost control of my bladderto this day im not sure exactly what happened after that it seems like a blur having only bits here and there with a frenzy of penguins above me as i rolled about on the snow covered ground and frozen cement floori do recall coming slowly back to consciousness while being dragged out naked by a couple of guys in arctic gear and then pending a few hours in a medical facility at seaworldthe car ride from the park with my mom was a silent one neither of of said a word i remained in the car that evening while she was getting her tattooi felt confused angry and somewhat thrilled by what happened how was i to ever sort out what had happenedits been years since that took place ive had some therapy my mother went back to prison however i have found peace from that lifechanging event through my volunteer work at a local aviary cleaning bird cages it has given me time to reflect and sort out my feelings as a result the realization of my strong connection some say unhealthy attraction to birdsi picked up this tube of penguins to remind me that life changing moment
i loved the turkey so much i bought a second one this turkey stands out as one of the better turkey action figures on the market today

ive had a lot of fun collecting some of necas head knockers over the last couple of months and enjoy finding some surprisingly cool ones that were released a few years ago that arent in stores any more one of those that perked my interest immediately was jeannie here i love older tv shows like i love lucy the munsters i dream of jeannie that girl and more and in finding a bobblehead of one of tvs hottest ladies i had to get it while i didnt have the same great luck i did with stripe from gremlins and slimer from ghostbusters as far as the paint goes this is still a very cool head knocker that you should get immediately while theyre still available this one is listed as retired on necas sitejeannie comes in a great pink box with drawings of her as she appears in the animated opening sequence the head knocker looks exactly as it does in the stock picture with no changes made to the design theres not a whole lot of detail because this is a simple sculpt but it works and looks fantastic in bobbleheadform shes doing her classic wishgranting pose with her arms crossed her lamp is on the base with what looks like sand around her feet the lamp looks just like it should and probably has the most detail of anything here jeannies head bobbles when you move it making this a real head knocker unlike some of the others in the line which wobble at the waist or somewhere elsesadly mine came with below average paint and this is to be expected from neca whoever painted this never learned the stay within the lines thing and mine has some messy eyes lips and theres even an unpainted spot on the teeth i can take care of that myself but neca definitely needs to step up on quality control the sand lamp and her name on the base all look good so why get lazy on the most important part the face in the chance that you find a few of these at a store you might want to inspect them before buying in case you want a good onestill this is a great bobblehead and the colors make her stand out from all my others when i walk by my shelf and see her i cant help but hum the theme in my head
as a puzzle this is a sturdy wellmade one  the sound quality isnt great though  it sounds very indistinct and staticky

first of all dont be confused by amazons listing this isnt a toy its a work of art neca has really outdone itself this time with this gollum figure this figure is perhaps a perfect blend of articulation and aesthetics you can pose him in almost any way you want and he looks amazing in those poses neca spared no expense with the paint applications gollum looks incredibly realistic you can even see the faint blue veins running along his foreheadone thing thats worth mentioning is that in hand gollum actually looks better than the prototype photos amazon has posted here in those pictures it looks like the joints really stick out almost like an old wooden puppet im glad to say that in hand the joints blend much better into the rest of the figure so dont be put off by the photos herethe only problem with this figure is that gollum doesnt include the ring it would have been nice for neca to have at least given us a small ring to go with him fortunately it turns out that the lego gold ring from the lego hobbit playsets fits the  scale gollum perfectly and you can buy them on ebay for about a dollar so id definitely recommend getting one to make gollum completein short this would have been my favorite adultcollector toy from  but its such fine craftsmanship that calling it a toy seems like a disservice if youre a fan of peter jacksons take on gollum just get this

when it comes to  scale figures sideshow is far from the best they constantly put out figures with either heads too big arms too long silly looking face sculpts poor paint applications or not enough accessoriesand yet their prices continue to rise but just a few years ago old ben kenobi was released and he was so good that it almost made me give them a second chance obiwans head sculpt is on par with anything by hot toys and thats saying a lot the first time i saw this figure in person i was stunned it looks like sideshow somehow shrank down alec its that good why they cant put this much effort into their other figures i dont know but if youre a fan of obiwan and only want one  scale figure of him this is the one to get and get this the face looks even better than sideshows own and much more expensive premium format figureobiwan is almost  perfect in every category ive already raved about the head sculpt and the hands are just as good you get two closed one for a force gesture and another for a blaster or to use as if hes adjusting his beard he also comes with an ignited lightsaber and just the hilt the typical training droid he had luke use on the falcon and the standard sideshow stand his outfit is excellent especially the boots while it might seem weird to bring them up since theyre usually going to be covered by the robe sideshow made them stand out on their own as they do with most of the other jedi boots he also has quite a few layers of clothes what you see is not all of what you get theres more he has a nice turtle neck sweater under the tunic and robe and the pants as well his jedi robe is a bit of a mixed bag it looks good but because they went with the frayed look its one piece of cloth with no sewing on the edges so if you pull a string the whole thing could be a goner in no time so watch it with thathonestly the only other bad thing is that obiwan uses the old buck body luckily you can get a hot toys true type body put obiwans head hands and outfit on it and have a much better figure and hey itll still cost less than what most hot toys figures go for these days if you keep everything on the buck body though youll have limited articulation and wont be able to get a lot of dynamic poses though i guess ol bens not really suited for that any more at this point huh thats just my preference though and it may be different from yoursill also mention that youll want to be careful when switching hands the holes in the wrists of the hands are so small that i thought i was going to break the pegs on the arms whenever i switched them all the more reason to get a different bodyif you ever wanted an example of what a great  scale figure should look like obiwan here would be hard to beat he may be lacking in the accessories a bit and they couldve done his robe better but when looking at him on a shelf i have no complaints kinda regret selling mine now

if your kid likes the backyardigans get this if they like cars get this if they like both well get this you get pablo from the super secret super spy episode in his rad ride which has a trunk that opens and wings that pop out of the sides why dont human cars have this featurethis is a durable little car since its diecast that also means its going to hurt like a motha if you or someone else gets hit with it during an outburst but there arent any sharp parts and the windshied stays put without coming loose so theres no worries therethis is a great car my daughters had it for over a year now and still plays with it at almost  years old the super secret super spy episode might notve been the best but it sure put out a sweet toy

this game is fun  it is actually hard to trick the game  my friends and i try and usually cant  i like it because i can take it with me anywhere  it is small and easily fits in a purse or even a coat pocket

the color  detail is firstrate a good reminder of its many appearances on the pokemon anime show mainly the episode bulbasuars mysterious garden a great gift for any pokemon fan i give this toy a  out of

the g droids have always been among my favorites in the star tours preride room i recently went on the star tours  ride and was happy to see that there are still two g droids there this figure is a great commemoration of the g droids from the original ride its got a fair amount of articulation for such a small and thin figure with shoulder hip and neck joints the paint and sculpt are both pretty good best of all you can find these for a reasonable price my only complaint is that the legs are quite even meaning the figure actually stands on a leg and kicks its left leg forward still it actually makes for a cool pose make sure to get one because theyll go with either the original star tours or new star tours  figures

i love the idea behind this its so seldom that we see anything regarding ralph mcquarries concept art for the original star wars these figures are a great representation of what might have been the differences between the concepts and the finals are mindblowing leia was more like han solo with a smugglers outfit and blaster ben kenobi looked more like a traditional samurai boba fett was pure white han solo had a lightsaber the stormtroopers had lightsabers as figures theyre also fun they all have incredible detail i particularly like the snowtroopers dirty look definitely some of the most unique star wars figures around
this pilot version of han goes great with the big millennium falcon vehicle unfortunately he has swivel elbows which limit his range of movement still a nice version of han as a pilot

unfortunately the dooku figure included with this speeder bike is pretty dated i had hoped i could use it with the more recent superarticulated dooku figures but alas they dont fitthe speeder bike itself is ok but suffers from the gimmicky action features there is a large button on the back that pushes a part of the seat forward to trigger dookus action feature it sticks out quite a bit the paint job is fine but lacks any weathering or detailultimately i doubt well get an updated version of this anytime soon so if youre dying to have dookus speeder you cant beat the price but just be aware it wont fit modern figures and probably wont meet the standards of modern collectors

the long and short of it is that the version of anakin skywalker included in this set is horrible but the swoop bike is pretty cool the bike is a lot better than the shadows of the empire version produced during the s its much more detailed has weathering and has a more realistic seating arrangement id still like hasbro to make an even better swoop bike but for now this set is worth getting just for the bike especially at the current prices on amazon i resold the anakin figure and put dengar in the seat of the swoop bike and it looks great

i bought this ship and also i bought dash rendar as i enjoyed shadows of the empirei realized that this ship was poorly designedeven if the outline from top matches there is a big hole between the central turret and the cockpit that is not in this toy i can forgive that inaccuracyin the opposite side of the cockpit it has a huge gun that is not present in the outrider design  where did it come from i do not know i can forgive that inaccuracycockpit seems to be designed without taking proper care of making dash rendar action figure to fit  there is a left panel that keeps action figure leg in place but it would be useful if rendars legs were straight but thats not the case  so trying to fit rendar inside the cockpit is just like trying to fit a square inside a circle  in the end you end up having him inside after applying some brute force but he looks inclined in the chair i cannot forgive thatif you look at the real outrider from the front you may notice it has a prominence where the turrets are  this toy does not have that  this toy seems made for kids in which case  is about triple of the top acceptable pricethe real outrider was like a small millenium falcon  but instead of making it in a way you could open it and instead of making it to have  seats they decided to make a senseless design with a cockpit that has an arm with rotation  weird pretty weird  in the end this toy seems more a single seat fighter for kids but kids or even adults may have huge problems fitting dash action figuredid someone like this toy   stars no i wont give such a rating here it does not get one star but two just because i loved the story and ths is closest we can get today to the real outrider but it does not hide the fact that the design is pretty dumbbut if you are a picky collector you may be disappointed with the overall design not only because it is not movie accurate if you compare it to the videogame  it is evident for me that this outrider was  not designed by star wars fans  if you are a parent who is looking for some non mainstream toy for your kid beware of the action figure fitting issue and the greedy price the seller is asking for it

great affordable alternative bedding for the groovy girls and all their knockoffs as well well made and the zipper is not cheap little ones find the raccoon hard to resist and owning this sleeping bag encourages different avenues of play with dolls sleepovers camping of course travel just gettin cozy hidingi can go on and on but ill end this review by just tellin ya that this is a great buy

this power girl figure is based directly off of the artwork of adam hughes which was featured in the audio dramatization of the dc comics final crisison my drives across state lines in my  ford ranger pick up with trailer that i add from the bed of an eightysomething chevy s to stock up on potatoes and collected freshwater seashells that i use for crafts i would listen to the comic book shows on my constructed cd player i got the adapter from radio shack on sale power girl was my favorite character in the crisis story i was so glad they finally made a figure of her so i could hang her from the duct taped rear view mirror just above te hula jesus my sister brought back from tijuana mexico when she went looking for one of her babys fathermy only complaint about the figure when trying to hang it is that it is a little bit top heavy in the female chest area seems unnecessary to me
