the velcro doesnt stick very well and you can never wash it  it will be destroyed the first time you do

this is one of those toys that i wish id picked up when i saw it in stores not too long ago both because i couldve gotten it for the original price and because i really did want it now that my daughters really into super heroes partially thanks to the marvel vs capcom games sentinels one of her favorite characters and she couldnt wait to have her own baby sentinel now that we have him the figure looks great but theres one huge problem and one little problem thats really unfortunate too considering how highly sought after this guy is now and many people probably dont know the issuesentinel is the main selling point of this pack and comes bundled with a unique maskless wolverine wolverine looks pretty good though his face is on the chubby side his head and arms are articulated just like all the other super hero squad figures the claws arent too pointy so theres no worry about your kids getting hurt when playing with him unless they jab the claws into their eyes for some reason as for sentinelhe looks awesome in super hero squad form and i love that they even made him smile he looks like hes about to give you a big ol robot hug the paint looks good too and i prefer this version over the variant that comes with cyclopshowever the bolted one has a glaring problem that im going to email hasbro about the big guy cant stand up his left foot has the heel slightly raised so that theres no way he can stand up on his own as hell always fall forward and guess what the only thing articulated on sentinel is the arms no leg articulation whatsoever the head and waist not being articulated the little problem i mentioned above i can live with and my daughter doesnt care about that either but not being able to stand up come on i checked a few sites and many people are reporting the same problems about uneven feet some of them luck out but im not finding many pictures of sentinel stand up on his own anywhere you might want to get these figures openedused to see if theyre defective or notbut as it is these toys are meant to be played with and my daughter has play fights with them all the time it irritates her that sentinel wont be standing on the edge of the bathtub with her other toys or on the coffee table when she has the other heroes standing there great looking figure but dont spend more than double the original price on this if its new in the box since you could end up with a postpatch mvc sentinel

this was one of my favorite playmates tng figures the sculpt is detailed and includes lots of wires to give locutus a realistic borg effect one note though this is the tng borg not the more creepy first contact ones this version has shiny metallic armor which is a nice addition

we love the option of aqualina shunning her tail for pedestrian life as a prior reviewer noted kids five and under will have trouble getting her tail back on her feet have to be tugged down within the tail for the full effect all clothes and purse are removable you just have to cut some threads if you or your daughter chooses that option purse even has a small opening for a seashell shell not included i just think that would be cute doll has permanent undies navel and even little earrings small details make these dolls even more special made for abuse from grimy kids unique and enchanting mermaidia rules

i love the idea behind this its so seldom that we see anything regarding ralph mcquarries concept art for the original star wars these figures are a great representation of what might have been ben kenobis outfit is pretty different from his drab brown in the final movie moreover hes bald the yoda figure is cute but actually not that different from his final self both of them have a lot of detail and are well made
this toy is hot the color  deatil are firstrate the pose is soo forceful it also comes with a red cap that perfect  body firgure just yells buy me so do it i give this figure a  out of

we have the palace and now this playground set  both are great for building and imaginative play but i think the playground has better accessory pieces  there is a little house seesaw bike and traylor and a really cute spinning tree thing  it also comes with lots of blocks  people and a dog  my girls play with this every day and love it  my favorite thing is the storage bin because of the building surface on the lid

these can be used to create pictures patterns and designs and i have found many other uses for them as well  since they are transparent i use them to show my kids what color combinations look like  for example if you put a blue shape over a yellow shape it makes green  this is a very handson way to teach many different skills  the pieces are also pretty and look amazing on a light table or when used with a projectori do wish the pieces were thicker though  they are very thin plastic and remind me of cd cases  the corners are pretty sharp so you have to be careful when reaching into the container to get the piece you want  some of the pieces are also extremely small  that being said its not designed for toddlers so thats not a real problem

this is one of the best of the barbie dolls  highly detailed clothing exquisite make up and face and absolutely gorgeous on display  its one of the few gold label dolls that is so expensive because of the materials and design  rather than because it is linked to a fashion brand name or made for adult collectors  you really feel like you are buying an expensive doll and it is definitely something that stands out on a displayi waited quite a bit to buy this and i was very glad i did when it arrived  it exceeded my expectations and i really feel that the price asked for the doll from the manufacturer was reflected in the quality  it looks the business

grievous starfighter was barely seen in rots but its been shown a few times in the clone wars animated series the ships design is pretty cool its frontheavy almost like a luxury car with two large engines at the front grievous fits pretty well in the cockpit although you probably cant get his hands to stay above the control panel the only problem with the vehicle is that the two front guns are made of a soft rubber that might get bent if you play with it otherwise definitely a fun ship both for kids and collectors

when i first saw it it seemed like a collectible something like a fully articulated star wars version of mechwarrior  but it is just a toy for kids  it has only  moveable joints in the side legs and one moveable joing in the center leg  instead of a door in the side that opens you have the entire side openingit is definitely not a collectors object but it has a collectors price  if it has a price higher than the one of a small and cheap fisher price house it would be a real scam  it seems made for kids not collectors

this toy rocks the color and detail are firstrate a good reminder of the monday night raw episode in which sid won the world title from bret hart in  speaking of whichit also comes with a toy verison of the very world title belt the only thing missing are his kneepads its still great though i give this toy a  out of
not a horrible figure but hes somewhat stiff very few joints actually move this makes him difficult to pose id only get it if youre really into the darktroopers in the star wars dark forces games

this hutch is high quality and nicely detailed  its clearly an item that wont be broken easily by little ones of all ages  the door swings open or locks closed  and the fence comes apart into four pieces so you can pen in the area in front of the door or form a few different shapes with the four sideswe use it for all kinds of animals  at the size its for the smaller schleich figuresnote that it is quite small inside the hutch  several of the rabbits with pointed ears didnt fit into the hutch  only the floppy eared fit comfortably  ours ended upholding cats and chickens tooin all this is the only barnenclosure that has lasted in the house several years  you get what you pay for  in this case quality thick plastic with details rather than cheap injection molded styrene of so many other toys

the following is a review of the above product not the price ok guys this sucker does smell when first purchased i purchased this item junejuly of  i just did a sniff test on the van and it is now odor freehooray however i also smelled the gang and they are still slightly kickin am i worried about that smell yes does the worry about that smell keep me up at night noi am more worried about high power lines in my backyard traffic accidents pesticides and my kids social life right now and its not like she is constantly caressing the van and snuggling with it in bed at night one of the doors of the van did fall off for several days when first purchased and the door has a majority of the time stayed on since then i am not sure if my toddler is pulling it off on purpose she has a thing about the driverside door being off on vehiclesstrange just make sure it snaps when putting said doors back on no flowers well live ray gun i am not a stickler when it comes to scoobia details i am guessing that it just added more appeal to the male rugrats map dial inside of van is cool but hard for kids to turn ditto for the small plastic caution door which reveals circuitry  with little detail educational sure why not for tots stop go in out counting tiresdoors colors smelly nonsmelly older kids can dig the monster info learn about shaggys vegetarianism and that brains count not looks barbie and all that girly stuff can take a hike

the color  detail are firstrate it shows the hot ninja at the beach and holding her sword ready to stike if someone attacks her you see even on her day offshes still ready to fight just in case there are also some rocksseashells and a brunch behind her she looks smoking in that skintight swimsuit which best suits her perfect  body figure i give this statue a  out of

my baby loves crawling around after this crazy ball  it is so cute  the ball is very entertaining  i am glad i bought it because my kids have gotten a lot of enjoyment out of it  it is very unpredictable and you really cant guess where it will go next

i love how many pieces this toy has  it comes with plenty of letters numbers and shapes to use for making pictures or spelling out words  there are even some math symbols in there  my only complaint is that some of the pieces dont have a very big magnet on them so they dont stick as well as i would like  our pieces all fit in the tray just fine and the lid seems to stay on securely enough  all in all im pleased with the purchase and would recommend it

even though shes doing the same pose as she did in the ffoneshe is still hot this timewearing her tradeamrk skintight purple suit she also has skintight purple wristbands and her skintight white boots as the title goes same pose but still hot i give this statue a  out of

we got this years ago at target i am finally getting around to reviewing it its  bamboo and very sturdy its for ages   and for  players cheerfully designed very eyecatching even comes with a little pouch to keep the small pieces within this is how you playhighlightsset up is so easyall you do is place the rod with attached deck into the curved blue piece slap on the flag tweak the thin rope that supports the deck to your liking you can make this game more challenging for older kids and the fun is onyou get a bunch of included small bamboo pieces  natural colored cylinders red half circles and yellow rectangleseveryone takes turnsyou roll the die and whatever small bamboo pieces image rolls up is what you place on the deck the deck will list in whatever direction that piece is placed on and the degree of listing depends on the weight of the piece or pieces eghalf circle has less effect on the deck than a cylinder if anything goes kerplunk youre out winner is the last one standing game is about ten minutes on averageyou can roll one cylinder one half circle one rectangle one cylinder with half circle one cylinder with square one square with half circlelittle ones will learn shapes reading the die and the whole balancing act and faster than you can imagine both of my daughters have even used this game in imaginary playeasy cleanup a game you will want to keep for future generationsbob marley

this little set is a nice environment in which to display action fleet podracers it can fit about two podracers in the main area the set includes bits of junk to make it look more realistic there are also poles with wires that attach to the podracers somewhat like fueling stations its not the most exciting set on its own but great for display

this set is so elegant yet can take a hell of a whopping both of my girls  and  love this toy comes with doilies that a toddler will eventually discover and destroy box held up fairly well only the inside dividers have kicked the bucket and that was due to said toddler we love the haba food as well but my kids always have trouble getting the tin containers open this box is obviously easy to open we also love the variety of pastries included in this set bon appetit sorry do not have accent key deal

she has zero arms but does that stop me from loving it no this bust is still hot i also love the detail of it too she also has no legs but i still love it and it is still fun jean grey fans to have have i give this bust a  out of

this is a lovely doll  very detailed and feeling very much of the location from which she is styled  the dress is a rich and shiney teal that mimics silk very well  she also has very exotic looks and doesnt feel like a caucasion makeover  i do wish her headpiece was a bit more detailed in filigree relief it is a solid piece that doesnt have a lot of d depth and so feels a bit cheap  but the beauty of her face and dress really make this feel like a very original and interesting doll

ive always loved the concept series figures and this grievous figure is a nice addition the body is a shiny ivory and comes with a cape that has a metallic sheen the final take on grievous looks much like what we saw in episode iii but this one looks a bit more elegant less like a bruised droid and more like a majestic knightanother thing is that this grievous looks like grievous as we first saw him in the tartakovsky clone wars vol  so this is a great figure to get for fans of the microseries just add two lightsabers for him

this is probably the best rotj boba fett out there the colors on this guy are really vibrant hes got many points of articulation and his jetpack looks just like in the movie hes a bit fragile with that jetback sometimes becoming loose but if you just want to pose him he should be just fine highly recommended for collectors

since pokemon hit us shores in  weve had an ungodly amount of stuffed pikachus flood the stores i remember most of the first ones being a bit on the fat or round side but this little guy from the mini plush series stands out as being one of the best so farpikachu isnt overstuffed though his head might look a bit full in the stock picture here the stitching and colors are fantastic though you might not expect much effort given the basic design of pikachu hes got a happy little look on his face and his overall size is really good well worth the original price and maybe a few bucks more the only thing im concerned about is his tail since its one piece of thin felt with little reinforcement it could rip or fall off over time so just be careful with that otherwise this is a perfect pikachuwhile a lot of the mini plush pokemon have shrank in size over the years pikachu is one of the biggest that ive seen my daughter still plays with it since its just the right size and theres barely any chance of him getting lost get him if you see one

this toy is very cute and fun for my baby  she loves to hit the monkey and make it bobble around and it rolls really well even on my carpeted floors  we have apartment carpet so it isnt super fluffy  ive never tried it on other types so dont know if it would work well but it does for my baby

my baby loves this toy  she loves the rattling fish and the bowls music and lights  it is great for teaching cause and effect  the only reason it didnt get  stars is because the sticker on the front started coming off the first day i had it so i pealed it off the rest of the way  if you scrub hard with a baby wipe but it must be a brand with lots of moisture the residue from stickers comes off  the toy looks fine with the sticker gone and i am still incredibly happy with this toy  i actually like it better without the sticker believe it or not  fish bowls are supposed to be clear and now this one is  you can more easily see the fish inside it now and the lights
this plays very soothing music and water sounds and lights up  my kids all love it to be on while they fall asleep  i love that it plays for a long time

this doll has the best song out of all the dolls with the singing microphones  as with the others my  year old constantly misplaces microphones and then has a doll that doesnt work  i would have liked this better if you could press a button on the doll and it would also sing without the microphone being needed  that said if you get the set you can use any microphone with any doll to make a microphone work

i do get the concept of the doll  that it gives girls a chance to sing to the music or allow the doll to sing if they want to hear the lyrics  but anytime you have two pieces one is going to end up getting lost  the microphone never seems to end up in the same place as the doll so the doll doesnt see as much use as the dolls that sing without needing an accessorymy  year old has this and the other singing microphone dolls  the microphones are interchangeable and you dont have to match them up  i wish more of the song was sung and that the dolls were more interesting looking
these are both good figures the sculpts are detailed and include lots of wires to give them a realistic borg effect one note though this is the tng borg not the more creepy first contact ones

this is my second attempt to warn parents everywhere to not purchase this gal dont let her big browns fool ya she will release her wings within ten minutes of withdrawing from her cocoonbox she is the titanic of the doll world upbeat side note i purchased this doll at walmart in october  and it was then given to my kid at xmas time we then returned this doll at least  weeks after the new year january  i am a target chick at heart but walmart has great return policies they gave us our money back even after all that time had passed and yes you can return toys that are just plain suckyi used to think that you were not allowed to do that but the ordeal with this doll has proven that maxim wrong

this has a lot of fun accessories  but clearly it is the two dolphins that my daughter likes to use the most with the doll  the color change on this is quite dramatic  she goes from a one piece purple bathingsuit to a  piece bikini  the dolphins themselves also change color once they are in waterto color change them shell be in hot bathwater and then just run some cold water from the faucet  they color change quite easily and dramaticallyin all we really like this set  it makes bath time a bit more fun when barbie has some friends to swim with in the bathtub  best of all  no clothes to lose

we endure  months of winter and try to keep the heating bills down by setting our thermostat pretty low overnight  degrees  it gets pretty cold especially when you have to get up because one of the kids has woken up  i was going to bed with two layers of clothing the top being sweats and fuzzy socks every night and keeping flannel sheets on the beds and i was just not warm enough  therefore it didnt surprise me when my son complained about it being cold and he was taking longer to go to sleep at nighta friend showed me the aromatherapy warming seal that she had but i didnt like it because it was so hard it also had a smell that wasnt lavender any more and wasnt pleasant  i thought it would keep my son up at night so after looking at all the options on amazon we got wooly the sheep  we were so happy when he arrived  he is so soft he surprised us by being so hefty  he has a bean bag body and it is the filler that retains the heat when you put him in the microwave his head legs and arms are all normal soft plush without the filler  hes soft and pliablewe put him in for about  seconds and my son wraps him in his arms and falls asleep happily  after seeing this i had to get one  im so glad i did because this sheep suffuses me with warmth yet i find it cools down in the middle of the night and prevents me from waking up with a toohot feeling that i sometimes get if i go to sleep with all my layers onthis has been wonderful for my son and for me making our  months of cold a little easier to bear

this is a great toy for kids and adults  the creators took all the fun aspects of the harley quinn character and loaded it into these vehicles it has a license plate that says love joker and all kinds of silly graphics to put on the truck that is very harley  both vehicles move easily on big rubber wheels and dont fall apart easily  easily this is one of the more playable of the lego sets  and fun too

this toy is hot she looks great with her skintight suitskintight gloves and skintight boots i dont know why spoofs of her say that she is ugly well in reality shes smoking hot get this if you like her in this suit or just a shehulk fan i give this hottie a  out of

this toy is great the color and detail are firstrate it comes with a folding chair in order to do the double axe handleyou have to pull the minilever on its back a infamous reminder of the time he threw the nwa world title belt onto the floor in  i give this toy a  out of

as we build my  year olds thomas set we look for interactive elements  hes had the roundhouse for about two weeks and he absolutely loves it parking his wooden engines there to sleep  we saw this deluxe water tower and thought it might be another nice addition more fun than the regular water tower due to the lights sounds and actionthe water tower is a combination of wood and plastic and the spigot is plastic  the water is a plastic lit plastic interior piece that goes up and down as you move the spigot around  at the same time it makes water and train sounds and lights up when the tower is full  its cutemy son now stops the engines to fill up with water and turns the spigot around  one thing i like that is different from other water towers is that the spigot doesnt lower and raise it swivels  ive seen these other water towers have problems with the water spigot arm falling and getting in the way of the trains coming through  with this one if the spigot is turned over the track my son can still just whoosh the engine through pushing it aside as he goes  and he tends to do a lot of whooshing

i honestly cant even remember seeing this droid on the original star tours ride however as a figure its great its got a unique look with a very different head from r it has translucent plastic on top and for the eye meaning that the eye looks like its glowing when the figure is under a light source its a nice effect one that i wish the newer figures still used overall a nice tribute to the original star tours ride

the color  deatil are firstrate it looks just like the real thing the leather strap is the glue that holds the belt together in more ways then one buy it if you are a wcw fan i give this belt a  out of

along with the tie defender and ewing jabbas sail barge was one of the rarest and most sought after action fleet items in the late s while the sail barge might not seem like the makings of a great action fleet ship this one is pretty good on its own its pretty realistic looking and probably still one of the best toys of the sail barge weve yet seen the hidden compartment with jabba doesnt do much for me but its not bad to have and is pretty inconspicuous also the figures are way too large for the ship but again under the sails are pretty inconspicuous the sails do twist and can come off a nice feature if you want to add more figures underneath the sails overall this is a nice ship but isnt big enough to be proportional to the figures fortunately this ship isnt nearly as tough to find as the tie defender and ewing and you can probably find one for a decent price

its too bad this set is so hard to find the figures are all great depictions of force unleashed star galen marek theyre all well sculpted and painted the sith stalker is the most visually interesting a cruel mix between darth vader and starkiller the light side galens brown and white robes are a nice twist on the traditional brown jedi robes the plastic good and cloth sleeves work well the key figure is the galen in battle suit overall its a great figure but the ankle articulation is a bit limited preventing you from putting him into a runningaction pose if you can find this set for a decent price definitely get it

its great to finally have some of the sith lords from the expanded universe i got this set particularly for darth bane who has become one of my favorite star wars characters ever after reading drew karpyshynspath of destruction kotor ii fans will also want to get darth nihilusthe darth bane accessories are probably not technically accurate according topath of destruction which describes banes robes as black also banes lightsaber is clearly red and is frequently described as having a hook like dookus but i like them anyway hasbro did a nice job of giving bane a purple color scheme with subtle purple highlights on the cape also his lightsaber is amethyst like mace windus the overall effect is to give bane a somewhat more exotic yet royal look which complements the otherwise ridiculouslooking orbalisks i have seen some fans repaint this figure black and give him a red lightsaber but then bane looks like just another dark jedi this is one case where hasbros mistake made for a visually more interesting figure i only wish they had taken more care with the orbalisks they are a seethrough yellowish plastic which isnt horrible but almost look a bit too bright also when you take the orbalisks off banes chest theres not much underneath  indeed he looks like he shed  poundsi havent played kotor ii so i cant comment too much on darth nihilus he looks like a sith with the creepy skull helmet the tattered cloth cape has a great effect flowing behind him in fact this is one of the few figures i wish had entirely cape clothing because i think it would have given the figure a real sense of formlessness as it stands this figure is great however my understanding was that nihilus was like a vacuum of dark energy this figure has dreadlocks under the hood which seems to imply that there was a man behind the mask i didnt like that touchand the darth maul figure do we really need another one this ones pretty good but with so many other great sith lords out there its a shame the third figure in the set is maul oh well

this is a nice set if you want to build up fighter squadrons and need more imperial pilots they all have removable helmets  with jango fetts face  and full articulation however be careful of overpaying for this set online especially if youre only looking for one of the figures also hasbro is releasing the tie fighter pilot separately later this summer so if you just want that one it probably better to wait for that one

given that there is already a vintage boba fett and a vintage jango fett on the way i pretty much got this set for mandalore the ultimate since this is the only place to find him he is a pretty cool figure especially for kotor fans with the rustic brown clothes and battle he really does look like a more ancient villain than the more modern fetts he has all the points of articulation one could want more importantly his accessories are awesome i already mentioned the battle axe which looks fearsome if you have him swinging it over his head mandalore also comes with a small shield with a strap which you can slip on his arm with all the articulation its pretty easy to set him up in dramatic poses say charging at revan and malak with his battle axe swinging overhead you can probably get mandalore separately via ebay or secondhand but the fetts are pretty good as well if you are looking for some more for your collection

its definitely nice to get a group of rebel pilots the twilek female pilot is probably the highlight of the set her helmet is a unique design and fits really well the other two are good for dioramas and well done but not particularly interesting

i bought these pilots to add some crowd to a home made diorama  it includes  pilots  kesin ommis has a horrible helmet so i advice not to put it on  cesi doc eirriss has horrible eyes so you better put the helmet on  why is is ok  because i intended to buy them to add some pilot crowd to a diorama not to be a highlight in a collection  so for that purpose it gets  starskesin and cesi wear hoth outfit and keyan farlander wears a red costume from return of the jedi and is supposed to be a bwing pilot but his helmet matches awing pilot helmet in the movie  these arei was amazed by the poor quality of kesins helmet and ugly eyes of cesi

i love the design on this rancor the florescent blue stripes give him a unique look the felucian rider is also a beautiful figure i just wish he could stand properly as it is he can stand but only in a crouch i cant figure out how to get him to stand but also get the rider and his platform level if thats not a concern for you i highly recommend this guy

none of these figures on their own are particularly amazing but theyre all pretty good the stormtroopers are some of the best ive seen the wookies seem a bit too big and chunky but the hair effect is well done id mostly recommend this set if you can find it for a good price as a setbuilder having extra wookies and stormtroopers is always good for a diorama

i love the idea behind this its so seldom that we see anything regarding ralph mcquarries concept art for the original star wars these figures are a great representation of what might have been boba fett without his green armor  what a sight it definitely shows his origins as a cousin to the stormtroopers though  when put side by side boba blends in the figure itself is highly posable and has great detail

this game is dumb the object is to feed gus food cards without making him pass gas who made this game the guys who made the amazing world of gumball this game is rudecrude  tasteless as the jokes on family guy i give this mess a  out of

tout de suite is from the high end collector bfmc series  she is a silkstone  made of a vinyl plastic that is similar in weight and texture to porcelain  since she is in the bfmc series her clothing and accessories are of the highest quality  most bfmc dolls also have vintage facesshe comes with a lovely lingerienightwear outfit in spring pastels of lavender and yellow  she has a matching headband and slipperstout de suite has remained one of the more affordable in the bfmc line and is perfect for dressing in the bfmc fashions  shes also a great starter doll for those interested in collecting the higher end barbies

its waterlog is hard to explain its hydro pump attack does  points of damage plus  more for water energy card attached to blastoise but you cant use pay for this attacks energy cost you cant add more then  points of damage in this way i give this card a  out of

what demented person unleashed this bizarre um game craze i dont know what upon us unsuspecting victims you get about four of the ugliest pieces of longlasting plastic to grace humankind two game ideas to stunt intelligence in general and stickers with the mugs of the aforementioned plastic characterspineapples presents your guess is as good as mine cause some of these plastic pieces are clear and some are clear with glitter but the glitter does not aid in identification the balance are whole colors but still somehow mysterious they are not attractive in the least so collection fantasies bite the dust upon viewing one game had players throwing down all their gogos and one earns a certain amount of points depending on if a gogo lands faceup upright etc but as i stated before the faces upon the bones are not even clearly discernible on the colored ones no contrast let alone the clear ones so how the heck can excessive squinting equal great fun the second game calls for just making a line on the ground in some way and then throwing the gogos whoever gets closet to the line after any number here rounds wins no rolling just throwing and god help you if you only have parking lots in your parts did i mention that the directions also includes a line on keepsies hey if there is ever a purge of witchcraft again just whip these out for torture purposes

preferably pink is another lovely addition to the barbie fashion model collection bfmc  she is a silkstone  made of a material that is heavier and softer than normal barbie vinyl  it gives the lookfeel of porcelain without the breakabilitypreferably pink comes in a lovely textured chanel type of s suit a detailed purse and matching accessories everything is of the highest quality  as expected from the signature silkstone collectionin all she is a lovely doll and makes a beautiful display

these blocks are very fun and interesting  my only problem is that theyre on the expensive side but my kids do love them  krinkles are just like these but cheaper so get whichever but do try out these kinds of blocks because they offer something new that the same old wooden blocks or legos cant

i purchased this to go with the harley quinn deluxe and the poison ivy deluxe figures from tonner  i admit it was a bit of a disappointment compared to the other two dollsthe doll is quite high quality  a large articulated figure nearly twice the size of a barbie doll and much wider  the outfit is high quality as well  the clothing is layered and made of thick cotton  he comes with a green joker cane with a carved likeness of his head at the topi think the let down is the headface  its a bit too cartoony  scary even  my  year old wont even look at it and she loves the batman comics and animated series  somehow in d relief it comes across as a very disturbing display  unlike the harley and ivy which were created to look like ivy and harley in real life the joker is very cartoony looking its appropriate for the comics but just doesnt feel right when seen in d reliefthe hair is very stiff to hold that molded like shape  so it does stay in place but loses some of the realistic feel in the process unlike harley and ivy who have springy soft hair  jokers comes across as having been plastered hard in place from several cans of hair sprayin all i think this is one of the few regrets of purchases ive made from tonner  if you like your joker scary then likely this figure will greatly please you  as with all tonner dolls hes fully articulated and you can pose him in all kinds of wild and funny ways

i managed to get this bear when it was on clearance a while ago which was great considering how stupidly high vinyl collectibles go for at standard retail everything about this figure is visually appealing right down to the packaging theres so much color here that even stevie wonder could see it a mile awaysahara is  inches tall and made of vinyl the paint was applied very carefully and i have no complaints about it everythings bright clean and cheerful despite the grim reaper appearing to be in need of water you can move saharas arms legs and head around im not digging the qee design though its never appealed to me and looks like a hunchback lego personmy main complaint is the same complaint i have with any vinyl figure it scuffs too easily right out of the box sahara had two small scuffs possibly from the inner box rubbing against the figure and it gets scuffs from other things just as easily if youre a picky collector dont let this sucker rub or drop against anything paintedany tokidoki fan is sure to love this guy or anyone who just loves cute colorful toys is it worth the insane price now not really but when you combine tokidoki and qee collectors wont care as long as they get it if youre new to the tokidoki craze start elsewhere before handing over a benjamin for this

ok nobody actually cares about pax bonkik and the rodians in the prequels looked even less realistic than greedo still this figure looks great and is arguably even more realistic than the greedo figures the face is painted in subtle shades of green and the blue flight suit and dark blue vest are a nice change from the typical greedo outfit this is a good figure to get if you want some random rodian in a diorama

i love the idea behind this its so seldom that we see anything regarding ralph mcquarries concept art for the original star wars these figures are a great representation of what might have been i have to say this version of darth vader isnt that different from the final version the helmet is a bit more squashed but otherwise not too different this is partly because mcquarrie designed vader early on so he had a good idea of what he wanted the figure itself is very detailed and highly articulable

i bought this toy because i always liked the see and say toys when i was a kid  i had the classic farmer one and so did my nephew  i like that this one is geared more toward little girls  mine love it  it has great sound quality as well  the voice is very clear

the color  detail are firstrate a good reminder of their starrcade  world championship match in which sting won infact if look carefully you can see the starrcade  logo on the right hand corner it also comes with a figure stand and the toy verison of the wcw world heavyweight championship belt i give this set a  out of

these really do capture the feel of the original doll to me  it was like having a piece that my mother would have owned  i especially liked the fuzzy hair under kens helmet  looked and felt as i remembered dolls did when i was little  the quality of the clothing is very good and the dolls hold several poses  it makes a lovely display piece

call her spiderwoman or arachneshes still hot the color  deatil are firstrate the only thing that troubles me is that she has no legs and shes standing a spiderweb ball its still hot i give this minibust a  out of

this is the fourth ein  science product ive bought  weve loved the others and this continues the trend of very affordable soft vinyl models  these are great for little kids just starting to get into biology and science  the models are anatomically correct but not so detailed or intricate that they might end up being more confusing than usefulin addition to the removable pieces there are also cut outs in the figure itself  the vertebrae in the back eye and nostrils the pieces are large and easy for little hands to manipulate though they will take an adult to actually fit the pieces back  when not in use they make a nice colorful displayin all the pieces as with all ein o science products are nice thick vinyl and not cheap lightweight plastic it includes a stand and small booklet on the parts  my only nitpick would be that the pieces fit together easierbetter

i dont care how crazy youll think i am for saying it but tia dalma is hot the second i saw her in potc my eyes got huge give me her over elizabeth any day i waited months for some kind of figure to be announced but had no luck for a while then low and behold there she was at the disney store but upon closer inspection the figure didnt look like tia that much the dress was great and the accessories were a great bonus but face it this aint her this looks like a tia dalma cosplayer at bestthe pros for this figure are few but still pretty good you get a big jar of eyeballs a bowl and some other cups and jugs presumably from her home that she uses for her magic tia also has articulation at the arms and elbows so you can get a couple of poses out of her because shes got that huge dress you cant pose her below the waist her braids are a softer plastic or maybe rubber so theres no worry about these breaking the paint job on her dress is fantastic as is the work on her facebut everything else is bland the face is someone elses and the original price this went for was more than it shouldve been if it were the only figure of tia ever made then id bump the score up at least one more star as it is though the neca one exists and if you can get it then you have the best tia dalma figure these disney store exclusive figures were made more for kids i think and thats cool but i dont think many kids were fans of her since she wasnt a pirate and didnt have any big action scenes

these are decently made and hold up well in the water  it is a bit disconcerting to see aurora in a bathing suit with a modern interpretation of the original classic  but young children wont mind and can enjoy playing and singing with the doll in the bathtub  its priced right and holds up well

the goldgreenbeige aqua coloring on this elf is quite striking  he goes very well with the summergreen playsetthe elf has a staff and acorn wings in the back  there is a consort to him as well though she is sold separatelyas always beautiful hand painted schleich quality

this is an elderly elf queen type of figure with a raven staff and dark purpleblack wings  as with all the schleich elf she is hand painted and highly detailed made of high quality vinyllike plastic that is both durable but also flexible  no part of her will break off easily  she goes great with the summergreen playset and has a consort king sold separately

think of this guy as ponda boba in robes its a pretty nice figure great sculpt and paint for a senator hes got quite a bit of articulation  for his arms at least the legs are under a robe this guy makes me excited for the new ponda boba thats supposed to come out next year

i was very glad to see this figure as b is such a versatile droid and is great for many dioramas this figure has wonderful articulation which im sure was tough for hasbro to include given the thin appendages the legs are a bit tough to position straight but more due to the design of the character than hasbros doing and the paint job has a realistic metallic sheen definitely recommended

this version of episode iii obiwan is actually better than the more recent vintage collection version he has a fabric skirt and the head is more accurate the figure has a wide stance so standing him in a relaxed pose is difficult but overall he can be posed in great action poses definitely recommended

these cupcakes are so exquisite they meet the look requirements for both a girlygirl or a tomboy they are supported on the bottom within the fabric by a plastic disk to give the cake extra oomphstandupstraight power unlike the lillian vernon brand of fabric cupcake which i saw once in a goodwill plus these babies are machinewashable people only one cupcake comes with a howtocarefor tag so thats great if you or your kid is complusive about removing tags from items here are the four care symbols translated in order on tag from left to right wash at  degreescold water do not bleach do not tumble dry and do not iron outer material is  polyester my daughter plays with them everyday either outright or in some small way

these animals are great  my kids love to manipulate the heads and legs in different ways  they also love the squeaker that the pig and the crocodile have  the roar the tiger is supposed to make when you shake it is more like a quiet skittering sound and the giggle the hippo is supposed to make is a quiet wheezing sound but my kids dont care about that at all  they still love playing with these animals

you can see this action figure with its helmet  right arm has a very odd articulation that seems made to hold the helmet  but you cant make his arm to be straight to make him enter a vehicle  also the helmet seems a bit weird one it is on his head  other pilots like wedge or luke look better with their respective helmets but not this one  i wonder whybiggs was a friend of luke in tatooine  he left to join the rebel alliance before luke did  biggs was luke wingman and he died in the trench run after wedge departedthis biggs action figure is a bit more like a statue  it has nice detail but it arms are not very poseable  articulations are very odd

on the st day of christmas  im going to reviewa bobbby lashley action figure the color and detail is firstrate it comes with a championship belt which has not great but pretty good detail a good reminder of when he won the ecw title on december  i give this toy a  out of

this is a good reminder of their ecw championship fight from summerslam  you can make a better match for yourself and post it on youtube the detail  color are firstrate it also comes a folding chair buy it if you are a fan of sabubig show andor ecw i give this set a  out of

this might be a bit too hoochie for your under year olds  it is after all a collector barbie  but the outfit and hair are beautifully done and she definitely has a sanrio japanese feel to the outfit  shes a great choice for girls who read a lot of manga or have a like of japanese anime or manga

i am an adult and still think this is a fun game  i play this with my yearold all the time  i think it is a great educational toy  it teaches matching on all  levels  on the first one you just match different fun sounds  this is good for younger children  the upper levels have more learning opportunities  you match things like opposite words letter sounds rhyming words and words that begin with the same letter  i also liked that it has an option to play with two people instead of just one  this means that two children can share or you can play with your kids  another good feature is that on level  and  it will tell you how fast you beat the game  this way kids can learn to set goals like trying to beat their best time

in theory this toy is a great idea and very educational  it teaches kids how to put things in order and how to remember a sequence  the only problem with it in practice is that there arent enough sequences to do so kids get very bored quickly  there are only  different ones on the first level and only about  on the other levels

momoftwo is right this bird is so beautiful that i easily passed over the bird that i intended to purchase we bought our first audubon bird seven years ago and that bird is still working they are that great i love the fact that they offer this female cardinalwe have her male counterpart as well and my daughter is happy to have both these birds definitely foster love of birds and birdwatching in general we see our set of cardinals almost everyday so owning these two cardinals brings even more joy to our home and encourages great bird conversations my daughter even brings her birds outside and plays them in order to entice birds to her location this does not seem to work but we will try again prices for these birds are great here on amazon at nature centers they are a bit more at thrift shops near nature centers they are very inexpensive included tag on bird has some general female cardinal facts migration patterns map states when and where the song was recorded and even the song type go ahead tweet yourself or someone loved with this gal

necas teenage mutant ninja turtle figures are an awesome tribute to the original tmnt comics by kevin eastman and peter laird as per necas usual standards the figures are incredibly detailed and come loaded with articulation the turtles also have very detailed weapons baby turtles accessories and stands shaped as city streetsthese turtles are made in the style of the original tmnt comics the style and paint scheme are in the spirit of the original comics even down to the red bandanas and detailing on the shells as such the figures look like they just jumped off the page of one of the comics the stark contrast of black grit on the yellow plastrons and green bodies generally works well to highlight the detail the pictures i saw online dont do justice to how awesome these figures look in personas other reviewers have noted these arent really toys per se theyre primarily for collectors theyre not fragile but might break with rough play however these guys work beautifully for display the articulation means you can pose them in almost any action pose you want id be wary of twisting and turning the joints too much but the poses do hold wellunfortunately these figures are expensive and its tough to find them on the secondhand market however for diehard tmnt fans these guys are a must i did manage to score them for around  so its not impossible

summergreen works well with all the schleich fantasybayala series of figures  it is very durable high quality hand painted and has a lot of lovely detailing  in the bottom hair is a little grotto hidden behind overhanging vines  the middle level has a swing that can be used with the fairies that are purchased sitting on horses they sit on the swing as perfectly as the horse and then there is a top level  flower decorations clip on to the sidesyou could drop this down the stairs and it wouldnt break  made of soft molded vinyllike plastic its made to grow with your child over the yearsmy  year old used the bottom level for the unicorn and pegasus the middle level for the dark elves and then the top level for the lighter elves  one of the fairies she bought riding a unicorn was placed on the swingin all a great purchase and one to grow  id much rather have this more expensive toy than several cheaper ones without the quality to last and look good

this toy is great  we have other melissa and doug dressup toys but this one is by far the best because it comes with more dolls and accessories  my kids love to mix and match all the clothes  a lid is all that might improve this

jango was my first medicom figure eventhough i was always iffy on their  scale line medicoms face sculpts and paint tend to look less realistic than hot toyss and even sideshows but i loved how he looked in pictures so i went through with it last year i seemed to have bad luck with figures because again there was a problem with this one but thats due to medicoms poor quality controljango just comes with two extra hands and his blaster pistols his outfit looks outstanding and medicom really did a heck of a job with the tailoring and sculpting on the helmet jetpack and armor trust me when i say that he looks even better in person the face looks pretty good too in fact itd be perfect if they hadnt used an almost orangeish paint color on it this is one of medicoms better human sculpts and its too bad they didnt get the color right because it couldve been a perfect head and since jango uses the real action hero body the poseability is flawless the limbs arent too tight or loose and you can get any pose possible in real life and of course some crazy ones that even the best gymnast couldnt do i cant say enough good things about the rah bodyhowever the quality isnt all there the tubes on jangos arms come undone very easily and this is a common problem with each figure you can glue them back in place but they shouldve been properly secured in the first place so it wouldnt need to be fixed the blaster pistols are also cheaply made the ends of both of mine broke off in the box and had to be replaced as well my jango also had a crooked breastplate and that was beyond fixing since it meant potentially ruining the jumpsuit my main problem though is the helmet and putting it on theres only a very thin piece of tape on the inside on the face portion to protect jangos face from burring against it and losing paint its a tight fit i put the helmet on him twice and the nose was fine but silver paint rubbed onto his hair how hard would it have been for medicom to make the helmet be on a generic head and switch them that way one jango head and the other being a blank head with the helmet on it problem solved and itd justify the price they ask for these figuresjango is still a great addition to any collection just be aware that medicoms rah figures arent inscale with other  figure lines and if you plan on having him displayed with the sideshow star wars figures hell be a bit shorter by about half an inch

red xiii has always been one of my favorite character designs the red and orange colors flaming tail native american hair style and markings tattoos missing eyeeverything about this guy is rad and not over the top like many other ff characters are hes been one of the most soughtafter play arts figures for some time and is always selling for big bucks it got to the point where i didnt expect to own the figure because prices were going up so much but i managed to luck out and get one recently im glad i didnt give up on him this is easily one of the best figures ive ever ownedlet me repeat that for you one of the best figures ive ever owned as in every toy ive had since i was little even back when the huge megazords from power rangers were the beall of toysyou have to see red xiii for yourself to really see how great the sculpt and paint are nanaki looks absolutely perfect and easily tops the figure that came out in the late s this is the first play arts figure ive bought which might have been a mistake since the bar is so high now and others are going to have a tough time measuring upfirst up the articulation is phenomenal you can move the following his mouth head neck upper front legs lower front legs front paws upper back legs middle back legs lower back legs back paws tail each part moves easily though id be careful with the back legs as the ones on my red xiii feel much looser than the front legs even in the regular standing pose that you see in the stock picture above red looks awesome but you can get some nice action poses out of him too and if you have a good stand the number shoots up even more as i mentioned earlier the sculpt and paint are top notch with many little details sculpted into the figure especially in the hair areas both on his neck and head and those around his jaw reds flaming tail has a nice semitransparent appearance as well something i was pretty impressed by how often do you see a solid painted flame on a figure instead of one like thisincluded with red is cait sith a nicely sculpted figure in its own right cait sith can be posed nicely but is pretty limited because of his size you can move his head arms hands legs boots and tail around he also comes with an alternate right hand to swap out with the hand that holds his megaphone cait sith can stand up on his own or sit atop red xiii for a nice displayof all the play arts figures that ive seen inperson i have to say that red xiii definitely stands out as one of the best and is very much worth the money at the same time its clear that its a fragile figure and we all know that the play arts line has a bit of a problem with limbs breaking off and not staying on im going to be extra careful with my figure because of that especially since this figures practically extinct theres a reason why the others from volume  are still easily found for regular prices while red is  times as much buy this figure

i remember the excitement when hasbro released this figure in the late s  the first rebel fleet trooper ever the sculpt is still pretty realistic if on the muscular side however there have been better versions including the incredible new  vintage version if you want to get a few rebel fleet troopers id recommend spending your money on those ones first

of course when luke first saw the millennium falcon he exclaimed what a piece of junk i had the opposite reaction when i first saw this ship its absolutely gorgeous the sculpt and paint job on the hull are nearly perfect unlike with the older versions hasbro doesnt require you to use decals for the hull so it looks extremely realistic more importantly its huge measuring almost  feet long which is over  larger than either the potf or otc versions while its not quite scale with the typical  figure its not too far off either the falcon comes loaded with lots of other features from the lightup hyperdrive looks great in the dark to a boarding ramp that declines at the press of a buttoni will just make a few recommendations and one area where this nearly perfect vehicle could be improved first it seems a lot of people have complained about the landing gear i havent had a problem so far however you do have to be a bit careful because the instructions arent very clear about how to put them in certain pieces go into certain slots if you do it correctly the landing gear should stay in finesecond the interior of the ship does require decals its not too bad and for the most part theyre easy to apply however if hasbro were ever to redo this ship  not that they have to  id recommend getting rid of the decals altogether and just sculpting and painting the buttons and gear in the interior although im sure thatll be more difficult itd probably look fantasticif you loved star wars loved han and chewie and the millennium falcon this is probably going to be the definitive version of the falcon if you get no other star wars toy in your life make sure its this one you wont be sorry

when i opened it i realized it was huge once assembled length  inches  cm width  inches  cm  you really need a table to keep it  it is not something you could put in a small closet and for people in a small appartment it could mean a real problem  the fact is that it is the biggest toy for a shelf i have ever seen in my life  i had seen the old kenner version once and it was not impressive but this one isi thought the newest version of atat that was  inches  cm tall was big but this is way bigger  you see the pictures and you know it is big but it is not until you open it that you realize how huge it isissuesi was concerned about all the comments about legs not properly in place but i found that i had no problems  it is like the monkey game of fitting shapes into holes as pin sizes are different and it also has some shapes under the pin so you can put the leg where it belongs  so landing gear did not suck as some reviews suggested landing gear is not an issue it would detach if you have it on the floor and you try to move it sideways so instead of breaking landing gear would detach  it is about  kilograms too heavy and big to have a kid moving it around and flying  so it is better as a landed playset and the landing gear will show no problems for that roleit is a toy that requires assistance from an adult the manual does not tell you how to open the top cover and how to open the minivehicle canopy  i had to figure it out myself hoping not to break it  fortunately i did notit is a great playset for kids but try not to let small accesories to be close to some places where they could fall and you may need to disassemble the toy as it may fall too deep inside  there is a small hole near the medic bay and try not to store small accesories in the hyperdrive compartment eitherthe dejarik star wars chess table does not allow enough room between the seat and the table  so chewies legs must point somewhere else  the best version of cpo is the star wars  saga legends action figure sl no  that has knee articulations alse it will not be able to sit down a play chessfitting action figures in the seats require some time  since many star wars action figures are unable to sit down seats will be useless for those  it is a bit difficult to fit action figures in those seats anywayprobably all these issues come from trying to fit all these elements in a small area as the falcon is still not as big as the sets in the moviethe addition of a minifighter instead of the top hatch where lando rescued luke was a wierd choice  it may add playability for a kid but it somehow reminds me the escape pod used in the movie alienthe falcon does not include the accesories like the helmet for saber training the hand accessory for luke in the medical bay and since i already had ben and luke from bluray commemorative pack i will not buy the battle pack training on the falcon as paying  for some masks and a helmet is just too much  i miss those accesories but i will not pay  for the battle pack training on the falcon that has themnone of the issues is bad enough to make me not to feel this is a great product way bigger and better than i imaginedprosi loved the ramp mechanism  push a button and it opens smoothly like in the movie while it plays a soundthe laser cannon below the ship used when escaping hoth was a nice additioni loved the lights sounds and voices as it brings this toy to lifestickers and sculpted details to make it much more movie accurate is a great thingall the functionality it has all around in such a small area is just amazing as a work of engineering this toy is an outstanding job  it must have been a real challenge to design this toyit is impressive even for non star wars fans  an old lady i know said as a joke she would ask me for divorce if i was married to her and i had spent that money to buy a toy  but as she saw it she loved it and stepped back on what she saidit is the perfect doll house for star wars fans  and it is even bigger than a barbie doll houseit is the best star wars ship in my collectionif hasbro will continue making toys that big i will need to buy a museum just to have a place to store them  i want to congratulate the makers of this fantastic toy  you really amazed me for this  well the new vintage version of the falcon is a repack of this deluxe ship with no action figures included and if you feel two action figures are not worth  difference in pricing you better go for the new vintage version of millenium falcon and not the deluxe version

there are so many things i love about this version of scrabble  first of all the spots for the letters are recessed so the letters are held in place more securely  you dont bump them out of place while putting other letters on the board  i also love how the board swivels and folds in half to become a portable storage system for all the pieces  this is so great  i am really glad i bought it

i wouldnt say this is a close likeness of the actress in the movie but it is a lovely doll nonetheless  the shirt is nicely stitched and does match the star trek movie costume  the star fleet badge is a separate plastic piece and not just a patch or painted onto the shirt itself  the pattern of the star fleet logo on the dress is painted on rather than a texture  but it doesnt feel to cheap from being so  the undershirt is only a small piece and not a full shirt  it would have been nice for a pink label product to at least have a full undershirt underneath  her boots are solid vinyl and not molded on so they are removable which is a nice touch  she wears small gold earrings and comes with a phaser that is nicely detailedin all a highly recommended collector item that looks just as good outside of the box as in

this is a very nice star trek doll though it does suffer in comparison to the kirk and uhura barbies  spocks shirt is nicely deatiled with piping around the edges and the star fleet pattern texture though this is painted on and not a part of the weave  the star trek communicator logo is d and not a patch or painted on item  the military braiding at the cuffs is also nicely detailed looks like braiding and sewn in separately for a more realistic feel though it lacks the texture detail of kirks  the pants are sewn with extra details that specifically match the costume in the movie  they arent just brown pants  the communicator and tricorder are also well done  the molded vinyl boots also carry quite a bit of detailthe dolls likeness to the movie character is fine but perhaps missing some of the directness of the movie character  his hair is very stiff unlike the kirk dolland looks more like a helmet even though it is rooted hair as with the other dolls the undershirt is not separate and just sewn in at the top  i would have liked to see a full undershirt underneathoddest of all the way the hair is stiff and cut makes the ears look rounded  im going to need to take some small trimmers to the hair to make the pointy ears stand out because the doll looks like a human and not a vulcan  i would have liked the ears to stand out away from the head rather than being molded solid against itin all id rate this an excellent dollcharacter  suitable for both boys and girls it definitely doesnt feel like a barbie doll

this is a lovely doll for the adult collector  lots of detail sewn into the outfit and a beautiful modern face paint  i love that mattel chose to do a modern gothic line of dolls  sexy and mysteriousas with most of the barbie collector dolls she has solid legs that are not bendable  since shes meant for display and not play thats fine these dolls are meant to be displayed on a stand  but unlike the cheap barbies the legs arent holly and dont knock aroundthe quality of her costume is amazing  she has a raw musline undershirtchemise with lace edging at the collar  the  sleeves are also capped with black lace and delicate ribbons matching the garters on her stockings  a black velvet corset has lovely lace up ribbons that are tied at the top in a bow  i really like that the ribbons are scaleappropriate for the size of the doll  she has a very interesting puffy skirt with tartan details  the skirt is sewn to the musline undershirtbodysuit and not really meant to be removed for play over the outfit is the fourth layer  a red cape with a rolled up hood  interestingly the hood doesnt open  it is rolled and stuffed her hair goes over the top of it  and of course she has the fishnets with lace at the top and redblack shoes  on the inside of her cape is a barbie collector labeli think the only distraction is that the skirt does not fit well on my doll  its too big and bulkyher hair is long in back with a loose curl at the ends  she comes with a basket full of goodies appropriate for a forest rompthe wolf doll is about half the size and equally if not better made  im not a fan of the plastic head  i do wish it was a ken doll with a removable wolf mask  but other than the plastic soft vinyl really head on the wolf i really love this setas with all barbie collector dolls it is intended and priced for the adult collector  and i think the adult collector will love her

this is one of my favorite of the barbie collector dolls  i was so surprised when they released this as a subject for a barbie doll  its definitely not for kids and kind of scary  but the box is beautifully designed and you really get a feel for the movie from it  i havent taken it out of the box but i am very happy i purchased this and it is displayed right next to my computer

the color and detail is firstrate it comes a headset and a microphone his glasses also come off for some reason a good reminder of his infamous shoot against wwe on monday night raw back in  buy it if you a ecwshoots andor joey styles fan i give this toy a  out of

i went allin with my international playthings rocket purchase so that meant buying the space base too or space base  as its calledthe space base like the moon buggy that pulls it has rubber wheels that ensure it rolls smoothly  unfortunately the little hook that connects the buggy to the base is not very sturdy so a strong enough push ends up easily disconnecting the two vehicles  my son doesnt roll the base around much as a resultthe space buggy has a shovel connected to it that clicks upward or downward  this makes it slightly top heavy so that it falls over easily  putting an astronaut or the robot in it helps balance it outthe space base itself opens across the top with the lower flap acting as steps and the upper flap as a solar panel  it sounds ingenious until you see the mechanism to openclose the base in action  its flimsy and very difficult for little hands to open and close  i have to do it for my son who gets annoyed when he cant close it himselfinside the base is a laptop and a screen with an astronaut presumably from rocket  talking  my son finds this to be the most interesting part of the basethe astronauts are green and blue and theres a robot helper thrown in for good measure  the robot is the same size as the astronauts so you know what that means  hell be driving the space buggy while the astronauts kick back in the base for a napunlike the rocket the space base has limited functionality  you roll it around and you openclose it  and it does both poorly  with no special effects noises or lights no cool alien and a flimsy door this toy is better suited for older kids three years at least who can operate it

i love the idea behind this its so seldom that we see anything regarding ralph mcquarries concept art for the original star wars these figures are a great representation of what might have been i have to say i like this version of the rebel trooper better than the version that appeared in the movie the figure itself is highly posable and has great detail the helmet even comes off definitely worth adding to your collection

its teaches you how to build your own crazy straw you can think of many ideas you can buy many many straws so you can bulid giant letter zsstick figure handsgiant squares and many more they also come in many colors too like blueorange  green i give this kit a  out of

my  and yearolds love this toy  i think it is a great problem solving toy too because they have to figure out how to correctly assemble the pieces so it looks like cookie monster  i also like that the pieces arent that small

this was actually one of the better barbie toys  after mariposa whose wings never stayed on or worked the elephant from island princess which never caught one of the girls with its trunk and was boring or even princess ro whose peacock feathers never stayed on this seems to be holding up well  and seems to be really enjoyed for beyond a single day by my daughterthe play value is there  if you jiggle the horse in the air it prompts a flying sound there is a little button at the bottom of a hoof so that if you push down on the horse the button is pressed and the horse makes clip clop noises  if you push its mouth open it sounds like it is eating and will eventually make a sound like it doesnt like more and if you leave it alone after playing with it it will make sleeping noises unfortunately as with all barbie toys there is always something that doesnt work  in the case of brushing it with the comb its supposed to make happy noises it doesnt sense when you are combing and my  year old has to yank on the hair to get that particular sound out and i really mean yank  which im not sure i like encouraging her to do to any animal  the horse also randomly plays the connected song and lights up prettilyid highly recommend this toy if only it wasnt so expensive  and lets be honest here there are a lot more toys that might be more interesting or educational than this one and for a lot cheaper  i would expect this to be priced around  to be a decent choice for a good toy value and productand surprisingly i would have liked for better product placement in the video  this character is not in the dvd other than in the background being turned to stone with another horse behind two minor characters  when i bought the horse i had thought there would have at least been a scene in the dvd that my daughter could relate to  but she asks me where is the glimmer horsie in the movie and then asks which of the two horses in the background is glimmer  and i cant tell i had thought one of the main characters would have at least rode or been given the horse  the grapes that it eats seem pretty random  perhaps glimmer is in a book or other story place

this comes with quite a few little pieces making it perhaps not as fun as other barbie dolls  i really wish mattel would clue in and include some kind of small bag or purse for the doll to carry all her junk in  otherwise these all just end up lost or underfoot all the timeits a lovely doll and the hair is thick and full  but youll probably lose  of the accessories within the first three days

this doll is very beautiful  one of the nicest and sweetest looking in the barbie fantasy line  i really like that her tail is vinyl and not hard plastic like previous mermaid dolls  because it is vinyl she bends at the knees and that allows for even more posingdefinitely one of the best barbies for little girls who like fantasy style dolls

i like this toy  it is a cute train that will move even on carpet when a lot of toys wont  i also like that you can play with the animals individually as well  my only complaint is that the train doesnt stay together when you pick it up to put away  i just had to put the animals next to each other on a shelf  you cant leave it connected  it falls apart when picked up  its a great toy in spite of that though

this is a great toy with so many great learning activities that it makes it worth the money  this comes with some accessories though that i think are totally pointless  you get a little table and chairs that the two figures cant even sit at and a car that they dont even fit in  one doesnt even fit by itself  i dont even get these out with the toy when my kids play with it  this is a great toy but the extras arent needed at all

this bust is hot shes wearing her skintight purple suither hot angry lookher black flowing hair and last but not leastthat skintight mask she also looks like she is ready to fire at someone or something the only thing missing is the rest of her legs i give this bust a  out of

first of all this is a repack of figures having said that its not a bad repack theyre overall still pretty decent figures with most of the articulation youd need theyd go great on the legacy millennium falcon

bunearys a pokemon my daughters wanted for a few months but since she was part of an older wave it was only available online and overpriced like most older mini plush but now bunearys come back as part of the newest wave of mini plush and we got one the minute we saw it at the store but once i really got a look at it buneary didnt look all that cute to me the design of the pokemon in the games and animated series is cute of course but the translation to plush formehlike most of the mini plush from the last couple of waves buneary is extremely wellmade and theres not a single thing on her that could easily be torn off the head arms and feet are made of the usual material i think its fleece mini plush pokemon are made of and the body and ear fuzzies are poofy if youve ever seen a plush sheep or lamb thats exactly the look they were going for hereand it doesnt look that great i dont know if its just because its a different material or what but this buneary looks like it was put together from two different stuffed animals it just looks weird when you have it in your hand ill put up a picture in the customer images above so you can see for yourself buneary also cant stand up on her own which isnt a big deal since a lot of mini plush pokemon cant but ive met some people who refuse to buy them if they cant stand up on their own believe it or not her eyes eyebrow dots nose mouth and pink pads on her feet are sewn in i dont care for the super wide smile shes sporting if it were trimmed down by even  itd look better but thats just meif you or your child are huge fans of buneary id go with the bigger talking plush over this one since it looks better but not by much my daughter loves this version and thats all that matters in the end but i collect some of these myself and i gotta say that poor buneary is one of the worst ive seen in a long time great quality but it just looks off

this toy consists of animals with wheels and a little rattling penguin that you put on a platform so you can watch them spin around  i dont think thats worth the price at all  my kids love the little animals but wouldnt touch the platform part  basically i payed a lot of money for  rolling animals and a penguin rattle  the songs this thing plays are really annoying as well  i think they should skip the rest of this toy and just sell the rolling animals for a cheaper price  they are cute and kids really do like them  i would save my money and just get my kid something else  the animals already have wheels  i dont know why they need to be spinning around on a platform anyway

i didnt like these cards because they were double sided but only had textured patches on one side which means half of the numbers have nothing  i also didnt like that there was only one patch to feel instead of the number featured on the card  if the card says  there should be  patches to count  i was not impressed

sometimes he rolled over and sometimes he didnt panted loud enough to creep one out went through batteries like no tomorrow would often get stuck in strange positions in the middle of performing then one day he took a tumble and tumbles was no more he has been gone for several years now but his short life was filled with such pain that i felt that i must discourage others from adopting him i cannot let sleeping dogs lie

i found this little guy in my sisters room while i was cleaning out my parents house i love him hes adorable hes a bit small but has brilliant blue eyes and a stylish hooded sweatshirt definitely a good et plush for any fans of the movie

its been years since ive seen the movie mask staring jim carrey i feel the people who made this really captured his likeness when i was a kid my dad would pick me up on his court mandated visitation time and take me to the movie theater he let me watch whatever i wanted seeing basic instinct on the big screen at the age of eight really opened my eyes  during the movies he headed across the street to play pool and stuff at the bar there were a few times his games would last a really long time so the theater manager would take me home in his neat van with carpeted wallsafter i saw mask  i really wanted a toy from that movie but my dad said they didnt make any and to quit bothering  him
