i do not like clipos at all  i bought this set and the table for my daughter but they went to a thrift store a week later  the blocks do not stay together because the little notches dont line up very well

with all due respect to the positiverating reviewer i saw nothing on the box that proclaimed that the wings were removable we purchased this doll because we had such a horrendous time with her leader mariposa well lets just say that she is not much better her wings broke off after circa two months you can cover the semidangerous spike that is left protruding out of her back with the dolls hair or you can throw her in the trash so she can eventually be pecked at by a rather dirty seagull at your local landfill which is the fate that she deserves

diamond select has had some spotty quality control issues in the past my original enterprise had a few problems including a black saucer dish however i got this enterprise d today and im stunned i love it its about the same size as the old playmates one but much more detailed the ship looks great and to my eye at least ive spotted few problems the lights are very bright and its not just the warp engines that light up  the impulse engines deflector dish and bridge do too it might not be model quality but if youre short on time and can spend around  dollars this is a perfect item for any tng fanive seen other reviews complain about the stand just using one stand to support the entire ship is a bit risky because the stand is pretty thin and wobbly however theres a simple trick to make it work out well the instructions recommend using the taller stand for the battle section and the smaller one for the saucer however if you reverse those two you can actually use both stands to support the enterprise this gives it extra support and also allows you to pose the enterprise in a lot of neat positionsim not a huge fan of having a bunch of quotes for sound effects the captain picard voice is passable but what id really like is more ship sounds like phasers torpedoes etc thats one thing playmates got right and diamond select still hasnt really learnedthe only real problem i have with the enterprise d is that its lonely the other diamond select ships other than the enterprise e arent in scale diamond select needs to make a romulan warbird or klingon vorcha cruiser to keep it company

bobby jacksons really outdone himself with this sculpt a figure that leaves no doubt as to who he is this is a highlevel knight wielding a holy sword he obviously belongs to some warrior cult of female angels as depicted on his shield  and oh yeah his sword is on firealmaran isnt wearing a helmet the more to show off his dashing good looks his armor is beautifully detailed with another angels head and wings on his breastplate  if you have any sort of goodaligned fighter wielding a flaming sword this is the miniature for you i painted almaran blue and gold but my poor painting skills simply arent up to the task of doing it justicethe only downside is that almaran pretty much commits  if your character doesnt have a flaming sword hes not going to be of much use  and if i know adventurers the hold on to flaming swords for a few levels before they move on to something else  still if you paint the flames a different color perhaps gold and silver i didnt think of this when i painted him the sword could easily be a holy avenger  in which case almaran is truly a force to be reckoned with

this is a great toy  my kids love it  it is colorful and the music isnt irritating like some toys  you have to reset the trains before they will pop out again but that is just part of toys like this  you have to do that with all of the popup toys i have seen  besides it isnt hard to do and my yearold can by herself so it causes me no problems  this would be great for any kid that loves thomas or trains in general

necas teenage mutant ninja turtle figures are an awesome tribute to the original tmnt comics by kevin eastman and peter laird as per necas usual standards leonardo is incredibly detailed and come loaded with articulation his katanas feel weighty and made of sturdy plastic leo also comes with a base a baby turtle and other accessoriesleonardo is made in the style of the original tmnt comics the style and paint scheme are in the spirit of the original comics even down to the red bandana and detailing on the shell as such he looks like they just jumped off the page of one of the comics the stark contrast of black grit on the yellow plastron and green body generally works well to highlight the detail the pictures i saw online dont do justice to how awesome this figure look in personas other reviewers have noted this figure isnt really a toy per se its primarily for collectors its not fragile but might break with rough play however this guy works beautifully for display the articulation means you can pose him in almost any action pose you want id be wary of twisting and turning the joints too much but the poses do hold wellunfortunately this figure expensive and its tough to find on the secondhand market however for diehard tmnt fans its a must you can look for the figures in the tube packaging which are the same except that they have fewer accessories and no baby turtles

this is a nice game that is easy for young ones to play  no dice or counters  just simple memory game and matching  and thats why i rated it at  stars instead of   its just a bit too simplethe game play is simple  you have one set of cards middle layer with dinosaur bone pieces on them  these fit together to assemble  of four dinosaurs you place those face down and then put a top layer larger card on top of each of the them  the top layer cards have little notches in them so you can use the excavator tool to life up the top layer and then secretly peek at a middle layer card  if the piece is for your dinosaur you take that middle layer  if it is someone elses dinosaur part you put it back  you keep going until someone assembles their dinosaur about  cards per dinosaur  there are ruby cards let you take an extra turn and snake cards you flip up an extra top layer and whosoever dinosaur part it is you give to them  the way this works it is much more fun with  players than it is with just   with only two players if someone flips up a middle layer card and its not theirs they put it back and thats an obvious tip off to the other player that the piece is for their dinosaur  which makes it kind of unchallengingi guess the easy way to describe this is that it is similar to a preschool memory game but changed to resemble a dinosaur bone hunt game play takes about  minutes or so and there are a lot of pieces since there are the larger top layer cards and then the smaller middle layer cards  if you lose a card it severely affects the game so you need to be very careful with thisfor educational purposes the back side of the top layer cards all have dinosaur facts  but with only  of those cards those facts get exhausted pretty soon  and with only  dinosaurs to get the bone pieces of theres not a lot of depth of play or learning  each of the dinosaur piece cards is lined by a color making it easy for kids of all ages to know immediately whether the card goes with their dinosaurin all a nice game but definitely for the very young dino lover

after hearing nothing but positive things about necas ninja turtles figures i had to go and get one to see what the fuss was about on a couple of toy collecting sites these guys won awards for being the best figures that came out when they were released neca usually does a good job on the sculpting of their figures but more often than not theyre ministatues and dont have much in the articulation department well guess what these tmnt figures are the ultimate tmnt figures and any fan needs to pick these up before they go up in price yet againmy review covers the original donatello figure that came on a card not the one that comes in a plastic tube or with the other turtles the carded one comes with extra accessories that make him an even better figure than he already is donatello has articulation everywhere and basically any pose that he did in the cartoons or comic you can recreate shoulders elbows wrists waist thighs knees feet and head this guys got it all just be sure to not overdo it because the joints on mine got loose after a few months because id keep getting him in cool poses for photography and the joints arent anywhere near as tight as they originally were the sculpting on this figure is fantastic though all  turtles use the same body sculpt only the head is different because of the facial expressions but everything looks perfect it really does look like they took a d image from the comic and turned that exact image into a d figure just look at the little black specks here and there on him he practically looks like an illustration neca also did a great job with the paint on these and mine didnt have any slop at allaccessorieswise don comes with his bo which separates on one end where the tape starts this makes it easier to get in his hands since the grip on both is tight he also comes with a baby turtle sewer base ooze canister and two extra hands with ninja climbing spikes on the palms these hands swap out with the closed bo hands easily and these ones are in a more open position like hed use for climbing these hands add even more pose possibilities to the figureare there any cons with this guy yeah the price these figures sold very well when they first came out and were still easily available until about a year ago now theyre going for three times as much not cool and i cant say just one of these is worth that price but if you can get one for half of that its well worth it otherwise there really isnt a single bad thing to say about this figure its perfect the sculpt and articulation make it look awesome on the shelf and kids can actually play with it

beautiful little set but expensive for what you get my daughter has other sets as well and the catdog bling as well as the child bling has not held up too well also a leatherpossibly pleather leash has already ripped in half thats the best way that i can put it the toy included with misty was nothing other than a fuzzy craft ball obtainable at any walmart the purses are great the included blanket is cozy but boring no pepjazz to em the dish is very regal misty herself is elegant and finely made the mag that comes along with the set is too careeroriented for my taste and although i came across an article on the web that referenced a book that blasts the mag for portraying these critters as being too imageconscious i have not seen any ill effects in my daughters psyche as of yet wish that these sets came with at least one outfit or a bed and that they were not partially poorly made get the smaller set my daughter was just as happy with that one as she was with this bigger set

rms right the filler beads the smallest ones cannot fit on the included cloth strands nor the included hempy strand some iridescent beads were even fused together rendering them useless if you were to utilize the remaining balance the glitziest beads well the combos are not attractive at all ok maybe one combo but i still stand by the cheapo tiny everyday beadsthey just provide a good base and balance for the fancier ones besides if you were to make a loose necklace with the fancy beads you will have very little left to enjoy a second beading session glad i got this set at a thrift shopwhat ya get contents vary my set is the first thumbnail picnatural seashells cowries and small ones that look better on the boxpastel shell beads circular in shapeflowershaped shell beads one large one medium a bunch of small ones abalonewood beads did not fitglass ebeads no fitpetite flower beadsiridescent beads see abovecrimp beads  metal claspsgel cord very small amount does not hold knotsmy daughter experimented with outside beadswaxed cord  hempy at least to metriple strand necklace cords  three colorsinstructions and ideas

got this at babies r us because the price was reasonablethus i would not have to order one and add more moolah to my credit card bill i always wanted this one when growing up it has all the basics is durable and i think that the blood pressure cuff is small due to the fact that this is a kids product and that fp assumes that a kid playing doc will have another kid as a patient however i am grateful that i have small wrists bc in my house i am always the patient yeah yeah i know where its supposed to go i only gave this kit three stars because heres the kits downfall all of the doc instruments are very difficult to get back in the case and then it is difficult to snap the case shut i cannot even do it recently i have just started shoving everything in leaving it open and calling it a day i do not have time for chinese puzzles in the the form of doc kits and folks i do not plan on inspiring my kids to go into the medical field we are just having fun learning about our bods

ive been playing this with my  year old and we love it  it is much more fun and less frustrating than regular yahtzee  the game is about rolling dice to try to get a card eg  of a kind s etc  or to steal a card that an opponent just won a previous turn if no card is stolenrolled then you use chips to add up they add up fast on harder cards such as  of a kind  making it a trump if you roll a  of a kind on your turn  what makes this fun is that with each roll and each player gets  rolls on their turn you can go for one of the three cards on the board or try to steal an opponents card  so there are very few wasted turns as there are with regular yahtzeealso of note is the beautiful presentation of this game  it has a fancy fold up board that turns into the box bottom  the top is lined in flocked paper so you have a rolling surface that is contained  the board has special holders for your dice from each turn and the storage box is flocked also  even the instructions are beautifully presented in a special die cut fold out  its ironic you cant see just how interesting this is from the outside of the boxin all ive never really liked yahtzee but i greatly enjoyed this game  the presentation and play are first rate fun and it is something that is good for a wide range of ages eg if you have a family of  of different ages they can all play together equally with no advantage for someone being older

this game goes by a lot faster than the original but it is still fun  we play this as a family and enjoy it  we have tried all four different games you can play and like them all equally  i like the original better but this is a nice change sometimes

ahoy there first off i did not get a lemon the first polly pocket item that i purchased was so i know that lemons are popular in pollyia we have had this since july  and nothing has ever broken off of this boat it does everything that it claims to do i like the included rubber clothes because they adhereconform to the polly girls thus they do not fall off easilybut it is difficult for fouryearolds to try to put these rubber clothes on the dolls sevenyearolds have no problem i find it very strange that in all the twostar reviews parents complained that the pieces were too small got all over the place and were constantly being knocked over uh hello but are you gonna tell me that handzilla never intruded in these parents barbie strawberry shortcake glamour girls or even sunshine family setups the kid can just place it back if so desired or just put the pieces away and try again later listen it takes me thirty seconds to pick up the accessories that come with this baby and then they get thrown in a drawer or shoved in a ziploc if one is handy what the hell live a little and invite some littlest pet shops and playmobil peeps onboard yes i know i have a big mouth i just want to point out some things that should not stress us out as parents we have enough to deal with note title shoutout to bob marley

fine and dandy is a doll inspired from the graphic cartoon drawings of french illustrator monsieur z  she has a very schoolinspired briefcase high socks heels and a high quality outfit  shes barbie doll sized but is fully pivotal and easy to pose  her quirky features and quality ensemble really make her a cut above the average doll  she has a removable plaid scarf and kneehigh socksbeneath her red jacket she has a s style jumpsuit with a hiplevel black belt  the top is a light blue with a white collar and it ends in the pleated red skirti highly recommend this doll  shes one of my favorites from the monsieur z collection  for the adult collector who wants something more than the plastic barbie doll smile

this is from the integrity toys monsieur z collection  monsieur z is a french graphic designer known for his computer drawn cartoon like imagery evoking a very stylistic s  the dolls bring the cartoons to life nicelythe outfit is quality material on the doll  her hair stays neatly in place but isnt a plastic shell  it has movement her purse has a snazzy monsieur z logo on it  the sunglasses are the best touch though  really complete the ensemblethe suit dress is made from thick and quality material that feels the part  the jacket has a midriff cut and high collar the dress underneath in the s sheath style  her scarf has a soft blue s inspired pattern her gloves are a soft blue to match  her hair has blue streaks throughout to complete the ensemblethe doll comes in a lovely box with certificate of authenticity  shes a beautiful display in or out of the boxi like that she is fully pivotal and easy to pose  really i feel shes better than a barbie doll since she is unique stylish and quite fun  definitely for the adult collector and not a child

this is the latest in a series of dolls based on french graphic illustrator monsieur z  the dolls are very s inspired barbie sized and fully pivotal for great posingthe afros on her is gorgeous  lots of dark and light highlights and nicely tight but moveable curls  she has a very s pattern inspired scarf a working belt and long tall brown boots  surprisingly she is completely nude beneath the dressher face sculpt is quite lovely with honey colored eyes that stand out well from beneath all the hairin all a lovely doll with a lot of details that make it a beautiful displayposing

this is another in the series based on the drawings of french illustrator monsieur z  the dolls have an inspired s retro jet age feelcool it wears a padded nylon jacket with a faux fur hood cuffs and pompom ties at the neck  underneath she sports a nylon mod functional belt and a see through knit jumper  fishnets and fuzzy boots complete the lookher hair is molded and short so you wont be doing any styling but she is fully pivotal and can do many many poses as a result  i rate this one star less because the jumpsuit underneath is too thin and see through  it looks cheap  but the jacket and boots are high quality integrity toys all the way

i ordered the bacterial model along with the skin and virus models from this manufacturer  for the price i expected tiny displays with the quality of a happy meal toy  i was pleasantly surprise to find a very quality item inside and a very decent size  feels much bigger than the little box it came inthe model can be taken apart to check out different areas  all parts are made of a soft thick and flexible vinyl that could easily be dropped or thrown against the wall often without it breaking  the tail is bendable and it is a very tactile model  it comes with an information booklet that is brief but informative  it also comes with a card that condenses the booklets info and can be placed next to the model for reference  and it all comes in an attractive storage casethis is my favorite in the series  it stays together well is large and is very handleablethe only detractions i can find is that the stand itself is cheap thin plastic  i wish the stand had been of the same quality as the model and it might have been more interesting if the inner genetic material had been incased in a gelly bag to mimic the protoplasm that keeps the bacterias shapein all i highly recommend this  i was happily surprised when i received this and my daughter loves examining it  the booklet was a nice bonus in that it was just informative enough to be interesting but not overly heavy or clunky

i was excited when these cute blocks came out  i loved bristle blocks as a kid and these seemed similar but brighter and more durable  i was disappointed to see that cute is really all they are since they barely stick together  anything you try to make with them falls apart  this frustrates my toddler to know end

i was one of the stupid ones to ignore the where the wild things are line of figures by mcfarlane when they came out ages ago while the book is a cherished classic in my life and i was a big toy collector at that time i just never got around to picking them up instead i payed a pretty penny for each one over the last year were they worth it absolutely i havent felt so happy opening a package for something that i knew what was inside getting to hold a wild thing figure let alone seeing it inperson made me feel like i was  years old again these figures are masterpieces and goes to show you how great mcfarlane used to befirst things first this figure looks exactly like moishe it has the ink scratch look all over and the colors are perfect attention to detail is something i really appreciate and mcfarlane didnt hold back in that department each hair scale and even every groove in his claws is there i didnt think an illustration could be converted to a figure so flawlessly but heres proof that it can be done moishe is a pretty solid heavy figure and could hurt you if dropped on your foot he has articulated arms legs and his tail can move around too he comes with a little patch of grass that acts as a stand which youll need if you want any of these figures to stand up at all when putting him on the stand i had to move the tail down a little so it acted as a third leg and guaranteed that he wouldnt be falling oversadly none of these figures are that strong despite being heavy and solid they break very easily i bought another moishe for my daughter to have and his tail broke off as did an arm its not her fault either the limbs on these figures arent fastened very well if they were thered probably be no articulation though i wouldnt mind that as long as it meant no breaking be very careful when moving his limbs around and take extra care with the stand it has a peg that goes into the bottom of his foot and i know a lot of people have accidentally broken that peg when taking the figure offwhile the prices of these figures hit the roof once the movie started to get more hype early last year i feel theyre worth up to three ben franklins each this line was only out for a little while and that was a long time ago now and trust me you dont want to be stuck with the medicom vcd figures i reviewed two of those and ended up selling them being happy with my mcfarlane set get these guys while you still can

watch out sleestaksheeeeeeeres swampfire stands freely has jointed knees and elbows no weapons so kids cannot pretend that swampfire is the next charles bronson comes with educational fact card methane gas swamp life limb regeneration was looking for his next possible abductee at big lots well made and very radps for the record i do love both sleestaks and charlie

the previous reviewer said it all this plane rocks i have always wanted to add a plane to my kids toy collection and this one fits the bill extra info for clean freaks the guy at the toy store where i purchased this plane told me that it is dishwashersafe and that the wheels are nonmarking kudos for the swedes

i am visually impaired so was looking for a game i could play with my children and figured this texture matching game would be perfect but i was displeased with the product when it arrived  the inside of the round game pieces was very rough and actually gave me a splinter  besides that a few of the textures felt so similar that i could barely tell them apart  do not buy this toy

the color and detail is firstrate it comes with a folding chair a good reminder of his match against jushin thunder liger for the wcw light heavyweight title at superbrawl  on february  i give this toy a  out of

this toy is great but the suitcase thing all the pieces come in is a total joke  you cant get the pieces back in it and it wouldnt stay shut even if you could  i keep all the pieces in a small plastic container along with the mr potato head pieces we have  this is great because you get extras with it like earrings

this comes with lots of fun accessories but the suitcase they come in is totally useless  you cant ever get everything back in after opening it the first time  the container is also very flimsy  i bought a plastic tub for all of our potato head stuff

fallons head was removed from her torso yesterday by my threeyearold peekaboo heads are not the type that can be placed back on once removed the necks are small bits of plastic molded directly from the head to the body my daughter wrenched it off essentially destroying the peekaboo we have also had problems with a few others eglegs falling off easily alas they are not as tough as i previously believed as cute as these suckers are save your money and do not purchase or at least keep them away from toddlers if you do decide to purchase one

this action figure has a nice finishing and is sculpted fine but the face is quite generic mostly because of the painting of the face  you know it is a  inch action figure  what can you expectthis action figure is quite posable but you cant sit it down so it will need to stand up  i tried to make it to pilot a speeder bike and it did not work  also i tried to put it into the cockpit of the atat by hasbro and the holes in the feet are too small and do not fit the pins of the vehicle floor easily it should be a nightmate for kids to try to do it  since foot are a bit mobile and the holes are not located in the heels fitting it inside an atat is quite a painthe character in the wii game is more like a pilot but given these features it seems she will have to remain as a bureaucrat while playing giving orders while remaining stand up  since her feet are small making her to stand up requires the usage of vehicle floor pinshowever if you are willing to accept these limitations it is a nice toy  i do not regret it  but they may prove to be a problem for kids if they try to fit them inside vehiclesface detail averageoverall body detail excellentfabric clothes noaccesories gunmovie accuracy noissues it cant sit down  will not fit ina vehicle with seatsbenchmarking naposeabilityshoulder articulation ballelbow articulation ballhip articulation ball but limited by costumeknees articulation ballfeet articulation ballnotice i use this nomenclature for articulationsno it has no articulationstandard rotates around a single axis provides limited poseabilityball provides the best poseability

so entracing the details on these little cakes is so remarkable just like the haba soft cupcakesmuffins these petit fours are not too prissy nor too plain and hey these are washable as well gentle cold water no bleach no dryer my daughter actually hugged the box when she opened these on christmas they are that adorable
when you move its legs or tail a clicking sound happens and when you close its mouth a squeak happens  its also a very durable toy  babies and toddlers love these animals

i love the idea behind this its so seldom that we see anything regarding ralph mcquarries concept art for the original star wars these figures are a great representation of what might have been ive got to be honest the boba fett figure isnt my favorite its basically the same as the final version but white i prefer boba with the green armor the figure itself is highly posable and has great detail still its worth getting for any fan of boba fett

this turtle is cute and cuddly and has lots of different textures and sounds  it jingles crinkles squeaks rattles and is very soft  my baby loves to hug it and also shake it around to hear the different sounds

blows away the competition the colored sand in this set is so vibrant directions are easy to follow my daughter just turned seven and we both knew that she would have trouble scoring out the paper to reveal the sticky area with the included knifethingy thus better for kids with more coordination included illustrations are so charming wish that small frames were included to preserve the art its that awesome

the color  detail are firstrate a very good reminder of their famous match from april  in which andy won when lawler got dqed for doing the piledriver which was a illegal move in tennessee and most states but andys neck ended up been broken in the end it also comes with a neck brace in which andy wearscrown for the jerry the king lawler and a stretcher to carry out poor andy with overallits great for any memphis wrestling fan i give this set a  out of

this is one head knocker ive wanted for a while as soon as i found out that neca made one of frank he was at the top of my list for most wanted bobbleheads the design isnt super detailed like some of the other head knockers out there but ill be damned if it isnt just plain charming having this guy on the shelf along with the others adds even more diversity to my collection really going from the stay puft marshmallow man to stripe to slimer to the hulk toa pug in a suit yes this little guy stands out despite being so basicfranks made out of the same resin as all the other head knockers but feels hollow hes one of my bigger ones but is much lighter than stripe or stay puft he looks just like he does in the stock picture with no changes made from the prototype to the final product frank sits on a silver base with the miib logo ready for his next task despite being a basic dog sculpt they did a good job adding some details like wrinkles in the hind legs like a real dog would have when sitting down the suit looks good though again its pretty standard in terms of design the part where this guy shines is the head sculpt it looks like a real pug complete with the bugged out eyes the bobble feature on him is very good and his head shakes all over the place but theres some danger of chipping because the bottom of the head is very thin and if his head moves too much and hits the neck peg it could break some pieces off but most people who get these will be carefulthe only con as with all neca products the paint is hit or miss my frank has great paint on the head but the suit is messy with black from the jacket going onto the white shirt same with the tie luckily it wasnt too bad but if you care about getting a really good one check pictures before buying if you canfrank isnt going for very much these days so hes a good deal at the current price im happy with him

the talking railway series features train pieces such as cranky and a waterton station that have sir topham hatt talk to each train when they are close to that piece  toby is a nice engine sir topham hatt will say toby cranky is ready to load the cargo when toby rolls over the track by cranky  my  year old loves it without needing to understand the technology behind the sets ability to recognize and speak to each individual enginewe got toby to expand our talking railway set because we didnt already have a wooden toby hes one of the main  engines from the series  the sets revolve around the great discovery the feature in which thomas goes wandering and discovers the long lost town of waterton which sir topham hatt rebuilds  one of the set pieces is the mine which thomas falls intonote that toby doesnt talk  hes part of the talking railway series that recognizes him and talks to him  this can get confusing because there are three wooden engines also available on amazon that do talk  talking thomas talking james and talking percy not to be confused with talking railway thomas talking railway james and talking railway percy  talking james takes one aa battery and says three different things when you press a button on top of his cabin and makes his whistle soundso just realize when purchasing this item that you wont get the maximum benefit unless you own one of the pieces from the talking railway series brendam dockscranky brendam barrel company morgans mine talking railway knapford station talking railway oval set and waterton station  these can be added on to your regular wooden thomas sets and youll find that toby and the other engines are the same high quality as the regular wooden sets but with added benefits

i purchased this putty the other day hoping that my kids would get a kick out of it well the younger rugrat seems a tad wary of it and the older one does not dig the smell it has a very slight criscolike scent but this detail is only noticed when one actually places his or her schnoz right up to the stuff in hand it feels like somewhat sticky softer silly putty it becomes more pliant the more you handle it anyway when i was waiting in a doctors office the other day i glanced around and noticed other people either texting others on their highend communication devices or lost in anxious thoughts since my daughter had eschewed this putty and i did not want to join the latter humans actions i figured why not and whipped out the putty and got crazy with it i was only partially ignoring my daughter she was at an art table it can be manipulated through pulling smushing twisting general shaping you name it it can be done simply put using the putty was engaging yet calming you definitely can enter another realm with this stuff it does glow in the dark after exposure to light and it does bounce when in a spherical formation i have not tried the other cool stuff that you can try with this putty as i purchased a sample size and not much info was published on the packaging so i am not aware of the spark and shadow photo experiments but i will attempt to inform myself in order to have even more fun with it do not place in pocket if you purchase a sample size it takes forever for the putty to reach a more solid unheavy gluelike consistency made in the usa perfect for travel fun for older emphasis on older please nonpicky rats please note my older daughter has pddnos and a great alternative to yoga

early in the nineties several super star artist gathered together to start their own companyone such star rose above the other stars and eventually left them to start his own shining company again and again each time burning brighter than before the bitter jealousy of the other other stars remains to this daywhen a smaller company by the name of a bandai was able to be given partial rights to create an action figure from the movie dark knight they were left to their own creative devices to interpret what they could make workthis was their moment to shine with the japanese culture being so stifled in creativity they turned to america for helpenter rob leafeld creative genius great fortunes have brought him notoriety for both good and bad but all in admirationrob leifelt was tasked with interpreting a design for the batman action figurebandai took a hit financially but knew their investment would deliversadly in blowing all their money on the lefeld design cuts in production of the action figure had to be madegone are the finer touches that truly defined the master lefeldd was such as the  extra pouches shoulder pads for shoulder pads and technology not yet comprehended by those of our generationbandai you dropped the ball here by  not going all the way with greatness you were so close to having what could of been the greatest batman figure everrob liefld you sir i salute you and all your acid wash s

so sweetim not an organic nut but i try a hair yarn or two might come loose but who cares great for just general pixiefairy awareness one daughter has never been a doll chick no interest when i tried to tell her about the everglades the other is too young for the ecosystem talk just get it and snuggle

a lot of these bigger talking plush pokemon are great my daughter has  or  right now and still plays with them nearly a year after she got them chimchar here happens to be one of her favorites if your child loves chimchar this is probably the best plush form of him that you can getchimchar is stuffed well and not bloated in any areas like some of the mini plush buizel im lookin at you the stitching and everything on him is great and hes made of very durable material his back opens and closes with velcro which gives you access to the battery pack when you press chimchars hand hell say his name and if you press it again hell say it in a different way the first time he sounds like hes asking a question and the second time he sounds like hes stating a fact chimchar chimchar its cute and you gotta love how they did the flame on his caboose toothere arent any real problems with this toy chimchar cant stand up on his own because his heads so big so hell need to be leaned against something or propped up also use caution if he gets dirty as these pokemon need to be cleaned with a wet cloth and cant be washed but be careful there too when chimchar got a little dirty and i cleaned him up some of the water mustve gotten into the battery box or hit a wire or something because his talking feature didnt work for a few hours but after a while it kicked back in and all was wellwhat else can i say chimchar fans will adore this im kinda jealous and want one of my own now

this has got to be the best ludmilla drago figure on the market todayneca has done a wonderful job making rocky figures and i was delighted to discover they made the wife for ivan  drago to play with when he wasnt training which seemed like all the time in the s montage movie rocky ivyou can take off all of her clothes except for the painted on boots bra and panties to be honest i will have to go back in check but i dont remember that from the movie however its a cool feature nonetheless

this isnt the greatest luke figure but its still awesome to get a figure from this deleted scenes its not a bad figure but the articulation is a bit off the knees dont lock the accessories fit really well overall id definitely recommend getting this figure in honor of the bluray release

leektar and the little baby ewok are two more great additions to hasbros ewok figures leektars headgear is incredibly sculpted and has extremely fine weathering the baby is of course adorable while it doesnt have any articulation its quite well done

this isnt the best han figure but its awesome to have one from the infamous sandstorm deleted scene the articulation is there but doesnt lock well theres a gap on his back between his upper torso and waist and the legs dont lock at the knees its too bad hasbro didnt make a definitive version while they had the chance id still recommend getting it in honor of the bluray release

of course chewbacca never had a broken leg in any of the movies this figure is from the deleted sandstorm scene instar wars episode vi  return of the jedi as a figure its probably one of the best sculpts of chewbacca out there one of the biggest problems with earlier chewie figures was the waist  because the wookie doesnt wear pants its hard to hide the waist articulation joint however this chewbacca has a great deal of articulation all of it hidden there is hair covering the waist joint so even this is hidden meanwhile his hair looks wild and unkempt overall even though this version of chewbacca is nowhere to be seen in the films its a great figureone quick note the bow part of the bowcaster is tough to assemble you need to slide it in between the two barrels of the gun and snap it in place im not sure why hasbro chose to make chewies weapon this way as its actually quite frustrating

the color is firstrate the detail is secondrate a good reminder of when they team up against lex luger  the giantbig show in wwe at the  bash at the beach and loss its perfect for any wcwnwohogan andor rodman fan i give this  pack a  out of

the rebel trooper comes with a separate helmet and head though the helmet is not removable  he has nicely painted details on the chest and arms  he definitely is presented in his fine s costuming glory because the arms and legs are movable you can have fun posing him the legs move independently which is nice even the wrists move so you can move around the handsthe really nice thing about the lego keychains is that they actually stay on the ring and dont fall off easily ive had some on my key chain for over a year now with no problemits a great little keychain and a fun toy to boot

the pens give an anemic amount of color and then just die off  the twisty action is a novelty at first but that gets old fast  who wants to have to make their color each time just to draw a picture  not to mention that the color lasts for about  strokes and then dies outmy daughter who is  ended up putting them aside and just using regular markers  she said she didnt need a wide range of colors and that the pens colored so poorly scratchy and dry that the pictures didnt look goodin all the concept is nice but flawed  and the execution is especially poor  they just dont work well and take too much effort for a simple task as coloring

the juku couture dolls are quite different than the standard barbie dolls  they are a bit shorter barely comes up to a barbies chest and therefore dont fit into all the barbie clothes out there but they do fit into bratz or tinkerbell fashion doll sized clothes and that gives a lot of options  but each juku couture doll comes with so many little pieces of clothing that it really is easy to mix and match and get all kinds of interesting lookskana outfits are probably the least attractive of the girls sets but she has interesting hair that is fairly brushable not as stiff as juns and more interesting looks the kana shown here is the premier launch edition  the newest editions nd edition now on sale have in my opinion nicer features  especially kana whose looks and clothing changed quite a bit  the launch kanas clothing was very tacky  with fake large pearls and jewels belt that was truly cringe worthy  the newer version does a much better job with her outfitthe really neat thing about the juku dolls is the amazing posability of them they can do so many poses and stand on their own just fine ive put juku couture dolls into head stands sitting on various objects even hanging like a monkey from a shelf  just for fun  for that reason i give the juku dolls much higher marks than most dollsi really like that she looks like a teenager  the clothes fit the personality well  ive had a chance to buy all the dolls and all the extra outfits and enjoy putting the different variations on these dolls  jun is my favorite of the line since her looks are so very similar to the very expensive highend japanese dolls that cost   and although these dolls dont fit barbie sized doll clothes they come with so many options with their wardobes that it would be hard to get bored of them  the whole point is to layer everythingtheres a new version of this doll in target for their second year and the improvements made are very good  id recommend getting the newer version of this doll over the premier edition for that reason  the newer dolls arent as glassy eyed and their expressions not as unrealistic

sturdy safe and does not come off easily small included horses are interchangeable and fit snugly onto the main charm which is shaped like a horseshoe my fouryearold daughter wore this necklace all day today comfortably its hard to find necklaces for tots that i trust this one fits the billsing to the tune of brass in pocket
it maybe small but it is still fun to play with no small pieces to lose so no baby can choke on it its also so softcute  cuddly its perfect for any kindergarden kid i give this toy a  out of

this pack is a pretty good reminder of their match from wcws final ppvgreed you can make a better match with these bad toys and post it on youtube the color  detail are firstrate it also come with a toy michael buffer too i give this pack a  out of

the object is to arrange these cute and colorful blocks to make a picture  each of the  sides of these shows a different part of one of six different pictures so you have to find the right side and then figure out how to arrange them  this is very fun and educational  these blocks are also easy to stack if your baby isnt to the puzzle stage yet  these are cute inexpensive and durable so i would recommend them

ive always been a fan of the mon calamari the tartakovsky clone wars had a brief segment about the battle for mon cala it was short and in some ways a bizarre interpretation of life on that world with shirtless quarren and mon calamari who use primitive crustaceanshaped weapons however as with much of tartakovskys star wars it had some stark visual imagery the mon cal soldiers had a very organic feel to themthis figure represents tartakovskys vision well the figure surprisingly isnt a rehash of the potf admiral ackbar figure the head is new and the feat are also new  incidentally the first time weve ever seen mon cal feet the accessories are very detailed and the mon cal can hold them all very well although they could have used a bit more weathering or variation in the paint scheme my only small nitpick about the figure is that the arm articulation is limited while the joints are there the range of motion is limited by the placement of the joints its really not a big deal for an otherwise excellent figure

i cant help but think about heman when i see this figure despite that its yet another excellent figure from the tartakovsky clone wars hasbro made the quarren soldier in realistic style the skin even has small bumps and texture resembling a sea creature the figure stands very well even without a stand and holds his trident in either hand the skin color of the head looks a bit brighter than the rest of the body but this doesnt detract too much from the figure in fact it makes the face more prominent against the body overall a fun tribute for fans of chapter  of the series now wheres my tessek figure

i like all the modes except for the sing along one because the womans voice isnt great and the words to a lot of the songs are wrong compared to what is commonly taught at schools on tv etc  i just dont use that mode  the timer is a great feature as well

i had been looking for an activity center for some time and came across this one by accident  i bought it on a whim and am very glad i did and couldnt be happier with the toy  it is doublesided which means double the activities  one side is for younger babies and one is a little more advanced  i love both sides and think they have their own merrits  the activities are as followsyounger sidesqueaky balla ring that moves a rattling hammer up and down when pulledspinning propellermirrorlarge music buttonrolling ball that rattlesmore advanced side clicking levers that move up and down in and out and side to sidea small squeaker buttonbutton to open a jackintheboxlike door with a creature that pops out with sound effects music buttons with different instrumentsa lever that operates a spinnerspinning gearsi dont think this toy has one single flaw that i have found  i never hooked it to a crib though so i cant vouch for that aspect of it  it has been great for floor play at our house

bane malar was a character from jabbas palace who unfortunately was cut out of the final version of rotj despite that hasbro made a figure of him and did him justice its a could design and the figures coloring really leaves a strong impression even though its only a mix of blue brown and silver my only complaint is that the rifle was made of soft rubber and the way it was packaged seems to have bent it a bit out of shape you can try to rebind it back but its such a silly error with an otherwise great figure

this rattlesnake is quite large and has a lot of play value as a result  the stuffing is soft inside so it makes a great bedtime toy  but the stuffing is also firm enough that the snake retains its shape after all kinds of play  in the tail is a rattle that gives added play valuein all a great toy if your child loves plush and snakes

this is the figure that single handedly ended my hobby of collecting  scale figures when i first saw pictures of the medicom chunli i fell in love they got her likeness down which is rare for medicom and her legs looked like they should the fact that they went the extra mile and made an entirely new leg sculpt just for this figure was really awesome of them to do the price was pushing it but for a good looking  scale chunli i was willing to pay the price when mine arrived i was happy beyond wordsfor the first  minuteslets get the good out of the way first since it wont take much time the figure looks excellent as i mentioned the legs are the main attraction here with great muscle definition if you take the tights off but it shows through them as well the head sculpt looks like chunli from third strike more than any of the other titles and her whole body is done well her breasts are actually a seperate rubber piece glued on rather than sculpted plastic from the body her hair bun covers have ribbons that can be rotated and she comes with an extra pair of open hands which i personally think look better than the closed fist ones also for you customizers out there hoping to use the legs for a project the boots are seperate from the legs they cant be removed to expose the feet keep that in mind if you had high hopes for them her outfit looks good too with a wire in the skirt portion so you can have it match any dynamic pose shes inthats also the other key positive here medicoms real action hero body to me is the best  scale body on the market even with hot toys newest that came out last year the limbs can be moved so effortlessly without feeling like theyre going to snap however thats where the problems with mine startedas you may or may not know medicom has horrible quality control many chunli figures were shipped with problems some were missing the rubber breast piece some legs had cracks in them others had very loose limbs a common problem with medicom figures i was fortunate enough to get one with only one of those problems the loose limbs but then there were more chunlis right arm wouldnt stay in the socket at the elbow while it could be glued in place itd lose the poseability and i couldnt get as much out of the figure next a few of the spikes on her bracelets were bent downward these are rubber so its a pain to fix them also her outfit had a lot of small tears the outfit isnt the best quality despite looking good if it gets one little snag you can kiss it goodbye the sash looks gorgeous in pictures with a dragon design but in truth its printed on and not sewn as it may look with the broken arm ruined outfit and other problems i returned it why bother getting another when you risk getting the same problems or moreif youre lucky enough to know a store that lets you inspect figures before buying them and they have chunli by all means check it out and then see if its worth your money it really hurt to get what couldve been a perfect figure only to see that medicom dropped the ball again buy at your own risk

this is a great update to the potf awing hasbro repainted it with a richer red more weathering and also repainted the gun tips the best parts though are the cockpit which has a detailed control panel and the new pilot green leader in short this vehicle looks extremely realistic definitely worth getting for fans of the battle of endor

nothin more disappointing than a mom who doesnt do her amazon homework and does not have a bulb for her kids easy bake on christmas day alert below is the bulb infoge decorative crystal clear a   watt bulb packaging is peach colored we got our bulb at target you cannot find it at cvs or supermarkets only get frosted or standard bulbs do not purchase soft white or long life bulbswhat you need before the bakery opensthe above bulbphillips head screwdriverflournonstick cooking spraymeasuring spoons the included spoon is one teaspoon but for some strange reason hasbro does not let you in on this infomixing bowl any small bowl will do and would be easier anywaymini rubber spatula my recommendation for removing batter from bowlcake testertoothpicknote do not freak about the smell that is released from the oven within the first few minutes it is just protective foodgrade oil evaporatinguseful tipswrite out a cheat sheet so that you do not have to keep on opening up the instruction booklet to get to the info that you needuse a paperweight to hold open the booklet while you are working on a recipe otherwise the booklet will just close up on its ownlay out a big towel on your kitchen table if you do not have martha stewart counter space or an islandhave rags ready for spills or crying if projects taste terriblethe dirt on the mixesour easy bake oven came with sugar cookie yellow cake and chocolate frosting mixes all the recommmended amounts of water stated in the recipe directions was never enough water to add to mixes the sugar cookie mix the brownie mix and the cake mix all needed more water in order to get adequately moistened just add extra water slowly and sparingly as disaster can strike here i killed our frosting with too much hydration all recipes were easy to follow and everything came out fully cooked please see reviews on the mixes belowsugar cookie mix easy to make tasted just like the pillsbury fridge cookies no kiddingyellow cake mix just ok had an anise taste to itchocolate frosting mix before i killed it i tasted it who can resist it was too sweet and somewhat grainybrownie mix give to someone you despisemy daughter did use the warming cups to make her own cashew chocolate bar and it turned out great check out diy mixes on the webnonobvious reasons for my star ratingsi gave four stars for educational value because a kid can learn the value of preparation trialanderror and fractions while still having fun five stars for durability because i believe that unless you take a hammer to this thing it will last will update if i have any problemsmy critiquei had to stop myself from reading the prior negative reviews because i get so frustrated and flabbergasted where are some people coming from really people this thing has not changed from when i used it and that was about thirty years ago gasp it is not called the easy bake oven for nuthin this baby is truly easy to use it was inducted into the national toy hall of fame no small feat there i love spending time with my kids while reliving my childhood and piggin out what can be betterpsi will one day read all of the heartbreaking negative reviews in order to disperse accurate info to the masses please do not misunderstand me i just feel that some reviews are written out of sheer furious revenge because we become grizzlies when we or our kids are disappointed call me crazy i have decided to give the easy bake a pro bono defense please see the charges listed below with my defense arguments following each charge emanation of a plastic burning odor upon engaging oventhis is not due to plastic parts burning within the oven it is the foodgrade oil evaporating child gagging upon opening and smelling powdered mixpossible inhalation of product working timer not a product featurea general household timer can be utilized presence of working timer on oven can provide an educational opportunity in learning to tell timea nondigital clock would actually provide a better lesson in learning to tell time digital is fine for learning time management  and for learning how to read numbers  oven should include upgraded silicone panssilicone pans are not cost efficient for hasbro metal pans are more homey pan placement and removal from oven is difficultthis may be so if you have physical limitations it did not seem difficult to me although i am an adult i am sure that hasbro has gone through numerous trials in order to affirm that an eightyearold and up can perform these above actions light bulb cooking method is strangethis is how chestnuts were roasted by nyc street vendors in the early s this was the inspiration for the ebo also this strange method works children require adult supervision with this ovenyes what a pity children sometimes do require supervision one reviewer stated that it was easier for her children to use a real oven implying that they use a real oven alonenow thats a crazy situation with a real oven even more supervision is needed mixes are not the same as the big name brand mixesyes they basically are just compare the ingredients using the ebo involves a lot of workhow is it any more work than baking with a real oven it is the same process just kiddifiedminiaturized oven only allows a small amount of batter to be baked during a cyclethis product is aimed at children plus this is all the oven is capable of baking at one time if youre looking for larger amounts i suggest calling your local bakery if you have a larger brood waiting for the goods tell them to wait or clean up the kitchen for ten to fifteen minutes if they can wait for you to get off of facebook then they can wait for a cake an aside here i think that the small cakescookies are charming bulbs are not included with the ovenbulbs are delicate items that could possibly break during transport of the ovens hasbro does not want a lawsuit due to a brokenbulblaceration upon opening their product hey batteries do not come with other toys so whats the problem they have to be purchased separately as well my daughter was disappointed when told that we had to get a bulb for the oven we had a huge snowstorm at the time and she ended up waiting for at least two weeks for us to get a bulb she lived bulbs are hard to findthey are at your local lowes walmart and target we live in a rural area and we have the aforementioned retailers nearby oven used two bulbs during one baking cyclereviewer did not state condition or wattage of bulbs that she used she reported that they were already in her home and implied that they were used she still gave the oven a negative rating mixes do not come with instructionseither the reviewer did not check the box of mixes thoroughly or she did not realize that the directions for the recipes directly follows the directions for the oven in general see booklet that comes with oven it is entirely possible that a hasbro employee was daydreaming about paneras and forgot to drop the instructions in the box of mixes before sealing preparation takes too long reviewer plugged in oven for warmup after prepum you can prep while the oven is warming up using this oven commits one to a long projectdoes the person who made this statement ever bake with her own oven note about fortyfive minutes for my ebo process fifteen minutes for each of the following actions prep doing dishes while the oven is baking puttting back supplies while cakescookies are cooling it could even take less time than that it is so easy batter does not reach the top of the provided panwhen making a nonebo cake one does not fill the batter to the top edge of a standard adult baking pans the ebo does not teach children how to bakeyes it actually does just in a simplified way and what eightyearold needs to know how to make a serious cake anyway theres time for that in the future the ebo created a blue surge from plug to socket when plugging in and is therefore dangerousthis is basically an overloaded circuit and its the red surge that is dangerous not the blue my dad is an electrical engineer ebos were recalled in that was a recall roundup in  top ten wanted dangerous toys the ebos that were recalled were the frontloading ones not the types that are being used and reviewed on amazon presently the frontloading ones were first recalled in january  children can put hands inside of ovenof course they can they can also put their hand inside of a real oven as well but are people complaining about that basic kitchen appliance if your kid is not the rulefollowing type do not give him this oven a reviewer had to give her child the false advertising talk due to the fact that cakescookies came out of the oven in an unsatisfactory state ieitthey did not look like the baked goods on the box thus gave the oven a negative reviewfirstly this is not false advertisementit is a legal dirty facet of the advertising world if her daughter is as bright and as independent as the reviewer stated then her child should be ready to handle this subject ive been telling my kid  about the above subject for about a year and a half now and it has not given me or her a nervous breakdown my kid also noticed that our end results did not look professional i knew from past experience that the end results were not going to be stunning we were just having fun not trying to imitate our local upscaleyetearthy bakery note one senator in the early s did try to stop ads especially commercials from being aimed at children with obviously no success ads aimed toward children are not regulated by the federal trade comissionlast jabs professional chefs have used this sucker since the early s and have published at least one book aimed at adults for creating incredible tidbits they are using more difficult recipes but have you heard them whining some pros even credit the ebo for getting them interested in their trade in the first place a clinical psychiatrist stated in a web article that when a child uses this oven and combines the elements of play and practicality that it touches our psyche deeply in her other words its primal hey the same article stated that louisa may alcott mentioned her version of an ebo in little men and that book was published in  people just loosen up and bake

i havent gotten star wars figures in a while but when i saw a new version of thrawn i couldnt resist overall id say this version of thrawn and talon karrde are definitely well painted and detailed thrawn looks a lot scarier than the  version thrawns jacket comes down over and is separate from the legs and of course theres never been a karrde before i didnt really know how to imagine karrde before but his goatee and drab vest and clothes i think are a good fitunfortunately since my last star wars figures it seems hasbro has begun adding more articulation to the figures i personally dont like this the points of articulation on the elbows and armpits are glaringly obvious moreover the limbs have small numbers printed on them in the same color as the paint so theyre hardly visible but still i can understand making a superarticulated version of anakin skywalker or han solo for kids to play with but for figures like these that will end up mostly on collectors shelves i think the articulation just undermines the overall ambience of the figure the almost look like gi joe figuresthese figures are easily  stars and would be perfect if they had fewer or better disguised articulation points definitely recommended for fans of the heir to the empire series

there hasnt been a figure version of prince xizor sinceshadows of the empire star warsfirst came out in the mids thats a shame and im very glad hasbro remedied that by putting out a great new version of xizor first things first this xizor can stand unlike the prior version which notoriously could not stand because of the plastic cape this one stood right out of the package  almost no manipulation required also the paint sculpt and articulation are all wonderful i particularly like the color tones with subdued yellows and purples running throughout it really gives the air of royalty where the previous figure just looked like a big bullyi took a star off of this set because the leia figure is horrible this set should have been the ideal time to make a figure of guri xizors sexy android aid or a new dash rendar instead the leia is ugly with thick legs an unrealistic face and a shawl that doesnt stay clipped on given the price this set is worth getting for xizor alone but it could have been even better

ganner and antares didnt play a big role in the legacy comics but they were important supporting characters as such its a nice surprise to see that hasbro made both of them and hasbro did a good job with them the white lightsabers look awesome leg and arm articulation ensure that you can pose them in almost any stancethe armor looks ok but the metallicstyle armor on sigel dare looks much more realistic

i had been eying this at toys r us for quite awhile  it really is gorgeously done  cloth clothing detailed sculpting and huge  this is th the size of a person  i think the box came up to nearly my waist  the biggest action figure i had ever seen  the figure has quite a few points of articulation and is incredible posable  you can really make that large size figure interesting by doing all kinds of interesting poses from the moviei am very happy i bought this  it really is one of those ultimate star wars items that can be proudly displayed or played with if you have kids or are so inclined yourself  its too well done to actually leave it in the box as a collector item

i was one of the contributors to reaper miniatures bones kickstarter and they finally arrived last month im now on a journey to paint most of them and as i finish each miniature i plan to review it i am by no means a professional painter but i do try to spend time on detailcassie female gnome wizard is an excellent sculpt by wener klocke  klockes work is uniformly excellent and this gnome caster is no exception  she wears a buttondown trench coat and wields a staff tipped by a gemstone  she also has a scroll case on her right hip and a potion bottle on her left cassie even has a tiny ring on one finger this is an adventurer who has been aroundthe back of the figure is equally interesting  cassies hair is in a long braid and it ends in a key ring  the end of the staff is a gear complementing the gnomish theme of clockworks  as is typical with reaper photos cassie is a small figure so painting the details right is not easy  i particularly enjoyed painting cassies hair and nails and lipstick bright pink  a hallmark of a good sculpt like this is that you want to play a character inspired by it and cassie is definitely perky enough to put in a campaignfemale gnome sculpts are pretty rare and this one is worthy of adding to your collection

the imperial engineers didnt receive much time onscreen in the original trilogy but they stuck out because of their distinctive helmets and nononsense attitudes this figure is a wonderful replica of these guys and frankly the best job hasbro has done with any imperial officer thus far its largely a repaint of thestar wars  the saga collection basic figure death star gunner but the paint color scheme for this one is more distinctive and accentuates the detail also the helmet and vest come off  obviously something that never happened in the movie but nonetheless neat

necas teenage mutant ninja turtle figures are an awesome tribute to the original tmnt comics by kevin eastman and peter laird as per necas usual standards the figures are incredibly detailed and come loaded with articulation the turtles also have very detailed weapons baby turtles accessories and stands shaped as city streetsthese turtles are made in the style of the original black and white comics neca decided to do something really bold and actually make the figures black and white with the same tones as the original comics as such the figures look like they just jumped off the page of one of the original comics the stark contrast of black and white generally works well to highlight the detail the pictures i saw online dont do justice to how awesome these figures look in personas other reviewers have noted these arent really toys per se theyre primarily for collectors theyre not fragile but might break with rough play however these guys work beautifully for display the articulation means you can pose them in almost any action pose you want id be wary of twisting and turning the joints too much but the poses do hold wellunfortunately these figures are expensive and its tough to find them on the secondhand market however for diehard tmnt fans these guys are a must i did manage to score them for around  signed by kevin eastman no less so its not impossible

i love the melissa and doug chunky puzzles and this one was not a disappointment at all  the pieces are just as sturdy and durable as the other puzzles  i love how they can stand up to being played with alone or with the puzzle board  my kids pretend with these all the time

im not an elvis fan  just like barbie fashions and historical costumes  i really like the wedding dress  it does feel very authentic and look as it should  elvis looks like elvis and the whole set does feel very quality done  in all i was happy to have purchased this  they make a good display especially out of the box when you can fluff out the wedding gown to see its full length

these two figures are a lot smaller than the regular star wars figure line the lightsabers are made of cheap plastic and look pale red rather than ruby also the asajj figure looks a bit too cartoonish however the skorr figure has an interesting body armor and both figures have nice soft goods i used them for spare parts for custom figures  theyre useful for that at least

this toy looks like the real thing the only downside is that you cant move its arms and legs the pose is basic it looks like it wants to hug you which is kind of creepy for a wrestling toy to do its great for those you are sting andor wcw fans its also great for those who want to collect and save these toys so they can sell them for more money in the later years i give this toy a  out of
the discription says the animals spin while the train rolls but they dont  mine isnt faulty  they arent supposed to  i dont know why it says that on amazon

there have been some real clunkers in the hsm series of dolls  this one however is one of the loveliest of the dolls made  it is a generic doll  doesnt sing or pose  but given the choice of the less than attractive singing dolls or this one i think this one is the better choice

the ultimate  scale figures are all awesome  highly detailed richly posable beautifully sculpted  you can tell that each is made with great love and respect by the company for the fansindy comes with two whips  one to hang on his belt that is coiled up and another uncoiled to use for posing purposes his faux leather jacket is highly detailed cargo pants thick and realistic and he comes with fedora and s shoesthe sculpt has a great likeness of indy  one of the best on any figure ive seen  hes highly posable  lots of articulation to put him in a pose from about any scene from the movies  also included is an idol from the first movie  when you push his stomach he says lines from the moviethe figure is heavy large and just solid in every way  if youre looking for a great display and conversation piece this is really it  the star wars  scale are similarly impressive and truly worth every dollar  with these figures you feel like you are paying for the quality of the item and not because someone is trying to suck out money from fanboys  any indy lover would greatly appreciate this impressive action figure in their collection

i just wanted to add that these are actually better than colorforms they are more lightweight stick beautifully and even adhere when creased colors are cheery the two included scenes are under the sea and in the lagoon amazons price is terrifici was just checking out the small colorforms sets at toysrus and you got a lot less with a high cost  unusual stickers include birds purses palm trees hearts whale tails crabs the balance are of all sorts of sea life very enchanting

the color  detail are firstrate it comes with  toy forms of the world tag team championship belts a good reminder of their title win over the champions at the timedemolition on july aired on july  im not sure if the coats come off or not but if they dogood for you its still a good set for any brain bustersfour horsementully blanchardarn anderson andor s wrestling fan i give this set a  out of
these blocks are great for babies because of their softness and bright colors  theyre also easy to clean  i would definitely recommend them

i have searched for the best mosaic toy and this one appears to be it because it has the most pieces and comes in a durable and longlasting storage box where the lid actually stays on to prevent lost pieces  its great for creativity and artistic fun

you can never have too many ewoks this wicket and logray is a bit old and theres since been a newer one in the new vintage line its a much better figure so id recommend getting that one the paint job on that one is a whole lot better
indestructible my tot also uses it in lieu of a doll stroller i have even used it for transporting toys to their destinations terrific

the color and detail are firstrate it shows her rising from the sea just like in the s animated series infact its a good reminder of the phoenix saga from said cartoon she also looks hot in that skintight suit and perfect  body figure i give this mini statue a  out of

this is a great little set that is quite fun to play with and explore  my  year old loved the sounds and the whole idea of a jet airport  the one downside is that it might have been nice if this fit into its own carry case so pieces didnt disappear easy  it doesnt really fold up very well
the color  detail are firstrate its a little cartoony but its still hot shes sitting on the bat signal light for some reason the pose is basic but fun to watch i give this statue a  out of

these ultimate  scale figures really do represent the best in star wars collectables  the obiwan figure comes with authentic feelinglooking muslin under tunic voluminous woollike cape and cotton under pants  he even has the accurate undershirt beneath the tunic  the detailing and level of quality on these figures is unmatched  they make beautiful displaysobi wan comes with lightsaber and training globe  press his midsection and he says thats no moon  thats a space station the figure also comes with a sturdy stand for display out of the boxin all i have  of the figures and have not been disappointed in any of them  they really are amazing items for the star wars fan

this is a barbie that has better play value than the usual vanilla versions  she has tabs at the side that you push to have her do a ballet jumpmove  her legs split and her arms come up gracefully  the dress she is wearing is quite lovely and she has long curly hair in the back  her feet actually pivot  giving her the ability to land and then stand  its one of the best design features about the dolldont be put off by the hollow legs  this gives them the ability to move easily with the button mechanism at her sides  since the mechanism is mechanical and not electrical she has a lot more play value and less of the gimmicky feel of the dvdbased barbiesmy  year old was surprised at how much she likes this doll  shes not all that into ballet but likes how the doll moves

this barbie feels more like a gimmick cheap and easy present for those who cant figure out what to buy for a child rather than something that is actually playable and enjoyable  she doesnt pose much since she has hard molded plastic body parts the facial features are generic and inoffensive  the dress about the usual cheap quality  clearly this was made to be priced inexpensively as a throwaway gift for a birthday partytheres not a lot of reason to get this doll  little play value or interest  especially considering how many decent themedplayable barbies there are out there  itd be better to get a couple of barbie outfits for dolls a little girl already owns

these are baby dinosaurs and their size reflects that  i feel they arent too big to lose the cuteness but not so small that they arent interesting  they have very cute baby sounds and even do a mock chomping on fingers that my daughter loves  she has the set now and each dinosaur has a different sound and behavior  the kids are her school really loves these and keep asking her to bring one back for show and tell each time  they seem to very durable  can be thrown into the toy box with no worries  just dont be surprised if you hear phantom sounds coming from them  they talk and make noises after your child has done playing with them

this toy is both cute and fun  it offers opportunities for learning as well because you can match the bugs to the right colored flower  its also fun for babies to put bugs in the flower pot and tip them out

these are baby dinosaurs and their size reflects that  i feel they arent too big to lose the cuteness but not so small that they arent interesting  they have very cute baby sounds and even do a mock chomping on fingers that my daughter loves  she has the set now and each dinosaur has a different sound and behavior  the kids are her school really loves these and keep asking her to bring one back for show and tell each time  they seem to very durable  can be thrown into the toy box with no worries  just dont be surprised if you hear phantom sounds coming from them  they talk and make noises after your child has done playing with themthey are hard plastic with moving parts  so this isnt a snuggle toy or something that kids can sleep with  the pteradactyl hatchling makes bird like noises and flaps his wings a bit i think his features are perfect for young children  they dont need a history lesson and the anthropomorphic qualities do make it more appealing

soooooo cool just the same as the ones in  ouchcomes withfiber optic fairy wand wwhistle on one end goin back to the s even more ouchfive shrinky dink sheetshole puncher in order to make jewelry if desiredeight colored pencilssmall jewelry hoops for attachment purposessmall felt purse worn as necklacelong felt braceletstwo modernday barrettestiny pastelcolored bells for adornmentdownywhite glitterone lobster claspbracelet fastenersfoam stickers only for utilitarian reasonsnotes i am not sure if you can use your own colored pencils for more color variety check out the website or call co if this is a pressing question for you i will try to remember to do so in order to update this review you can use a toaster oven i am not so sure that the whistle works too great will update that info too do not panic when cooking the dinks just let them do their shriveling ritual and you will see them straighten out right before your eyes i did mess one up due to panic sigh the involved crafts are easy to do my daughter and i completed the purse craft and i am a total chimp with stuff like that i do feel that the involved crafts are delicate so keep away from nosy toddlersprekers you can get shrinky dinks from target as wellitems to have on hand before purchasebaby powder pure cornstarch with scent aloe and all that jazz ok to prevent stickingaluminum foil to line cookie sheeta nonair insulated cookie sheetcraft glue to further reinforce jewelry hoops optionaladdenda on  finally found our fairy wandthe whistle does not work that great but no biggie it does flash different colored lights first slowly then quickly so be careful if a family member has photosensitive epilepsy the wand takes three v button batteries they are included i checked out the companys website in order to see if you can use outside colored pencils and they do not suggest it because they cannot ensure their functionality or safety
