to say your childs name of course how well he can say their name depends on how normal it is which ill get to in a minute you can adjust the volume with buttons on scouts collar and the battery life is surprisingly good i think he went a month and a half before needing new batteries scout sings a bunch of cool happy songs and im not ashamed to say that i know them all by heart now when connected to your computer you can imput a few things like what your childs favorite color food animal and more are and scout will use those words in one of his songs also you can download and print out a lot of cool coloring pages its like this guys just full of surprisesi dont have any complaints about this toy at all but regarding scout learning names you have to be a bit forgiving my daughters name is kairi pronounced kheyeree and scout says it kayeyeree its not a hard name for people to say and i really didnt expect scout to say it right either but think about how simple her name is and then wonder if your childs name is more difficult how hes gonna say it all the other words weve programmed hes said alright but its still worth mentioning in case youre that concerned about pronunciationthe only thing to take care with regarding scout is cleaning him use a damp cloth to wipe any marks on him and be careful taht you dont use too much water because it could still get inside and mess with his battery box or the wires be careful around his paws and collar where the buttons are located also some people complain about the usb cable being too short but it wasnt a problem for me it all depends on your computers set up and where you plug it in but you just need enough room for scout to sit while connected to the computer not a big dealfor the standard retail price scouts an amazing deal a lot of toys like this cost twice as much so this is a great purchase for your child that doesnt hurt the wallet hes cute fun and even provides his own kind of coloring book as long as you have a printer this is a great toy and im glad to see my daughter care so much for him

my daughter got this as one of her jesusmas presents and she uses it just about every day i remember when i was younger we had the magna doodle but that thing would break or have bad spots on the screen after a few days this baby here has no such problems in fact of all the kailan merchandise thats come out over the last year this is probably one of the better products you can get especially if your child likes to draw but you dont want to keep buying paper and risk ruining clothes with markers and paintthe screen on this doodler is really big and the drawing pen doesnt make lines so thick that youre wasting space what you see in the product image on this page can be drawn on the doodler with no problems the frame with kailan and her friends is sturdy and has yet to crack or peel away the eraser knob at the bottom never gets stuck either in fact everything about this pad is great though i dont like how the pen is connected from the top by the handle that seems a little odd to me but my daughter doesnt care so thats all that matters the kailan graphics are bright and cheerful and miles ahead of most other drawing pads like thisyou also get some colorful tracing sheets with kailan and friends on them we didnt use these much since with something like this its all about drawing what you want but im sure a lot of people will appreciate the additionthough it says this is for kids age  and up theres nothing on here thats going to break and be a potential choking hazard the pens secure the erase knob is on tight and theres nothing electronic to it any child of age  can get a lot out of this heck probably even at age  though it depends on the child

my kids had this and other similar toys  this is not the best  the balls dont tumble around for more than a second when you push down on the top  the balls also dont really come out except for   after the first ball has popped out no others do

the set comes with everything youll need to fixstyle barbie hair  brush protective cape a working sink brush chair and a small bottle of the barbie highlights creator  the highlighter works great  but it will go fast and mattel doesnt make a replacementrefill for itthe doll itself is rather generic but really all you need is her hair great toy for budding stylists or girls who want to pretend play with their barbies  just use it in a place where you dont mind water everywhere the clothing on the doll is nicely waterproofed

this talking james is for the thomas wooden sets there is a trackmaster talking james too thats the larger plastic set that is motorized  james has a little black button on the top of his cab that is easy to press though fairly nonobvious as it is flush and it makes james light come on while he says something  he says three typical james things fizzling fireboxes im a splendid red engine and mind my paintwork  theres also one train whistle sound  james comes with his tender as well which is attached via magnets  my  year old just calls it james special carwe had it for a month of heavy pressing when the battery wore out and were afraid it would be expensive to get new batteries we were really happy to find the ag button batteries james needs two of them at an astounding price of fifty batteries for five dollars you need a tinysized screwdriver and the batteries are very easy to exchange outhe loves playing with james who gets as much attention as his take and play chocolate percy  the talking and lights make james a little more interesting than the other wooden sodor engines

i doubt that my daughter will ask what the science is behind this fella when she was a toddler at the height of baby einstein popularity this would have devastated me now i could care less she is having fun with this fella and that makes me happy easy to get out of packaging and easy to use pull the little white tab out of the remote control make sure both the remote and the worm is on and on the same band a or b and start pushing buttons one button sets the worm in the direction that you want him to go the other gets him going keep the heck away from fivers and under i could see a gleam in my fiveyearolds eyes that radiated destruction great price here at amazon i got ours somewhat before xmas and the price was  it is now about four bucks more but still cheaper than what they are at target  sometimes hex batteries go on sale at target so keep that in mind anyway last night i unknowingly dismantled some kind of pathway that my daughter had set up for hex action so this robot certainly gets the brain waves moving in all the right directions my daughter is nine and this toy is for eight and up i chose this one because of the top positive review its gentle nature no scurries into dark corners and because my daughter has control of its actions she is easily creeped out by real insects locomoting on their own innovative fun and cool to the max

this game is gross it teaches kids that gluttony  obesity are okay as long as its not you i mean kids torture a poor pig by stuffing it with tons of burgers until it pops who made this game the guys who made saw i give this game a  out of

if you have the international playthings rocket you known that a threeeyed alien made his debut in the iplaythings universe  unfortunately said alien could only cower under a rock  he was too big to pilot any of the astronauts vehicles  that problem is finally corrected with the iplay flying saucerthis has to be the first flying saucer thats made for young children  being a scifi fan i scooped it up along with all the other iplay scifi sets for my son for christmaslike the rocket this set comes with its own aliens one orange one blue theyre the exact same sculpt but considerably more civilized as they have their own rocket ship  no hiding in rockets for these guysunlike the rocket the flying saucer is kidsized  my son can easily carry it around by the helpful handle thats connected to the saucer which incidentally looks like a giant death ray hee hee  lights circle the ship and blink to a series of sounds whenever the rocket is jostled  pressing the purple button on the green handle also cycles through a series of sounds  each of these sounds mimics the saucer landing taking off or flying through space  they are all unique and distinct from the rocket which is appreciated  this feels like a s style ufothe alien pilots have a dashboard they can interact with  it includes three kidsized buttons  two are blips and beeps but they are distinct from the random sounds you get when pressing the button on the handle  the third my favorite is what can only be described as alien language  these three buttons unlike the handle button play the same sounds each time so you know what sound you get  when youre roleplaying the first encounter between aliens and astronauts this is very important  the aliens can speak on cueanother nifty feature i didnt discover until later is that theres a sliding plastic cover to the cockpit  it recesses into the ufos wall giving the aliens inside the saucer an air of mystery  my son hates this feature for some reason and always pushes the lens back into the ship but i think its neatthe flying saucer definitely has more multimedia than the rocket but i wish it wouldnt have to remind me all the time  the flying saucer goes off at random moments whirring to let us know its still there  it can be a bit disconcerting to hear an alien spaceship sound coming from your childs room in the middle of the night sometimes i find the astronauts from the other playsets inside the ufo and wonder if the saucers been out abducing other toysof the three toys rocket one space base two and the flying saucer this is the best of the bunch if you plan to raise a little scifan yourself this is a great place to start

so cooli have to confess i bought this set mostly because the food accessories that came with it were the perfect size for pretend play in general the drink machine can actually be loaded then the bottles can be dispensed the cash register opens to reveal money its actually a sticker placed inside of drawer stickers are small but easy to apply the little blue pieces that can be seen on the back of the box are toolshandyman gear also included toolbox box crate six bottled drinks three apples three milks package of cookies rolls tray broom pail dustpan dustpan brush plunger counter one big dude and one little dude my younger daughter always has this set within arms reach and my older daughter has already monopolized it

definitely produced naturally which is a good thing we have three of these streamers two regular sized one mini in our joint one of the decorative ballsstreamer retainer did come off easily i believe that this is due to the natural glue that is used to keep the ball and streamer in place as opposed to chemicalladen glue that can attach and hold burly men and their hardhats to girders the ball is easy enough to put back in place either use wood glue like a prior reviewer suggested or you can even just twistpush it ontweak it until you feel it is secure thats my method dont obsess just let your hands guide you i do want to clarify that it is not that these streamers get tangled easily they just get knots that magically appear here or there on the streamer after maybe like three play sessions whoa hold on a minutei just asked my daughter what she thought about the knot situation and she confessed that she knots the streamer on purpose and that some knots are natural so i will have to update this review after experimentation anyway the knots are easily removed and do not affect the performance of the streamer i have seen a wide range of prices on this toy so do your homework first i sometimes use this ribbon myself and i swear that i could make it to the olympic games with this baby

satheras elf warlock by bobby jackson is the first elf in the reaper bones line and as such provokes an interesting question is an elf and elf if you cant see his earsjudging by the other sculpts in the bones line reapers elves are primarily defined by their long limbs thin frame height and yes pointed ears  since you cant see satheras ears because theyre hidden beneath his hood satheras elf status is determined by his other features  which means that really theres no reason this figure cant be a tall humansatheras status as warlock is appropriate  theres something sinister about his cloaked appearance the way his face is partially hidden in his hood and how he clutches his gemtipped staff  he also wields a scroll in one hand  you dont see this very often in sculpts which gives painters the option to put whatever they like on it i prefer the yellow sign but that tends to limit the usefulness of the sculpt in games  i went with reds and yellows in traditional cultist fashionthe whiff of the infernal follows this sculpt which makes satheras very useful as a villain  also satheras name just sounds villainous when you say it out loud satherasthere may be a world where satheras hopes to be an agent of peace bringing love and joy to orcs everywherebut it seems more likely satheras will be summoning unspeakable horrors instead  a versatile sculpt that could be villain or antihero with the right paint job

this statue is hot the color  detail are firstrate the pose is basic but fun it looks like shes flying in the air to save someone but who her retro costome is just as stunning as her other suit i give this statue a  out of

just want to note that the main pic of the above house is the one i am reviewingnot the one with the balcony they are fundamentally alike when we were in the market for a dollhouse i compared the following brands with educo facts about dollhousesreasons for not going with the other brands follows the name brands whewvoila at the time had no customer reviews i loved the notsobright colors but not the limited sideaccess my husband nixed this one for unknown reasonsmaxim great accessories liked the fact that it had a flexible floor plan i was concerned that if it wasnt in highrise mode that it would take up too much space in our living room we were at the time downsizing from the den of dora another concern was that there was the possibility that one of the interlocking nubs that connect the rooms could get broken offplan too expensive i know that it can take a beating but its not like my kid is going to use any dollhouse as a substitute for a ufc opponentwhat you getfridge wfreezerhooded range wsink and two hideyholesdining room table wfour chairscoffeepotfour placematstowelsfloor lampcoffee tabletwo easy chairs wcushionsone sofa wcushionentertainment center wtv and cool shelveskingsized bed wmattress and two pillowswardrobeshowertoilet wtoilet paper holder even has a bit of papersink wawesome mirrorone hand towel one full size towel that can double as a shower matfour peeps that can take a beatinthe goodsturdy yet light frame whandle to make relocation of the house easysturdy furniturelarge openings from all sidesspace efficienthas sunny citrusinspired colors it is not garish in the leasthas stairs this was not a total biggie for mei know that it bothers some kids to not have stairs in a dollhouse we have just always teleported our play people to the upstairs of our old dollhouse and we are still continuing to do sogreat valueeasy to put together have electric screwdriver handy and small allen wrench that is included will be usedincluded mattresscushions easy to clean one of kids already used the mattress as a drymop on my less than pristine kitchen floor i surfacecleaned the mattress with an old washcloth and it came out beautifullythe badthe alignment of our top floor in the bathroom area against the wallroom divider was a little off thus the floor is slightly crooked in that area this does not bother me but it might bother others please note that warping can occur with wood products our dorahouse had straight floors but was made of plastic ughour oven door would not stay closed so i solved the problem by cutting out a small piece of bandaid that included the absorbant cotton area i then placed it on the side of the door and it now stays closedour entertainment center door would not stay closed as well i used the above method with a furnitureprotector sticky dot knickknacksized with great success you might have to experiment wdifferent thicknesses of different materials in order to solve these problemsour toilet does not stay upright i think that the base of the toilet is too narrow and tall iebase should be wide and short and that is what causes it to always tumble over i am thinking of just eventually removing the base in the meantime i have tried to fix this problem by cutting a small box to fit the dimensions of the toilet and then bolstering this little creation with extra cardboard on the inside it has not met with great success and my kid just destroys my little foray into the tinkering world please note we do not place our toilet in the crooked floor zoneand the uglywell if i had to pick something i would say that the little tv can use some jazzin up ours just had the brand name printed on a silver screen so i just taped a little pic that i cut out of a mag on it for now our pic has lasted so far in the future i might experiment with tougher materialsoh and anybody in the character of tuco playin with this dollhouse

the larger buzz lightyear toys are expensive and this one had a more affordable price tag  knowing that our  year old loves toy story we got it for him for christmas along with a lot of other presents mostly toy story  and thomas the train toys hes a thomas fanatic  as will always happen at christmas there will be the toys that get played with and the toys that dont  this was one that he hasnt played with yetwhen he first opened the packaging he was really excited  he immediately tried to push buzzs buttons on his chest and said it doesnt work  at the toy store hed played with the buzz lightyears that talk when you press the buttons so he was disappointed and perplexed  when we showed him the karate action he didnt seem interestedso this toy probably would be fine if  he didnt have things that excited him more like his new thomas logging adventure as well as a smaller buzz figurine that he already had and  he hadnt been exposed to similar toys that had more interesting elements
i have these and love them  i have low vision so these help me a lot  i never used to be able to play cards very well with others and now can  i am very happy with them

cute but pizza box is a dud all it is a piece of cardboard with a pic of a pizza with one slice missing inside it is not durable at all i do not know why hasbro did not include within this set a plastic pizza box with a plastic pizza inside as they did for a mini my little pony set circa  also only one piece of plastic pizza is included although there are two dogs present in this setgo figure i guess they will have to fight it out for that one stinkin slice i took away two durable stars because of the crappy pizza situation dogs are finesome kids focus more on the accessories than the pets themselves so i took away two overall stars because i would hate for a kid to be disappointed by the lame pizza box
dont get me wrongi love the mrmen show but this game is nothing more then a ripoff of the other famous gametrouble it may be fun after awhile but its not as good as trouble i give this game a  out of

for whatever reason hasbro seems to have trouble making good emperor palpatine figure the potf version from the late s was a decent first go but since then theyve all looked quite silly this droid factory version is probably the best version yet although its far from perfect first the bad as the other reviewers have noted the face looks like a cross between the original hologram palpatine in empire strikes back and a horror movie freak its not too bad and actually fits there character it just doesnt look like ian mcdiarmid fortunately the good outweighs this i think this is probably the best use of fabric clothes on a star wars figure yet the robes really flow nicely and can be positioned well for different poses the hood is plastic which makes it easier to see his face the accessories are great too including a lightsaber and cane its been a while since weve had a palpatine with a cane best of all it stands up really well i would recommend hasbro use this figure as a starting point for any future revisions and just improve the face

my  year old daughter loves outdoor sports but gets very frustrated when shes stuck indoors through the snowy winter months  this ended up being a good compromise  funnily enough she ends up using it with other toys such as dinosaurs barbies and winx fairiesthe one caveat is that the pieces are small  i ended up having her keep these in a zip lock baggie to keep them from underfoot

the color and detail is secondrate they dont move very much all their arms do is go up  down while the their legs go back  forth nothing else the poses are mediocre scott is doing the goaltouchdown pose while nash is doing his muscle pose overallits soso but not that good its only good for saving it and selling it for more money i give this  pack a  out of
this would be better if it sang the whole rhyme but it only sings the first few lines of each  it is also kind of hard to operate the buttons for small hands

this is a great learning toy  it has  different activities to choose from  it teaches about telling time animals letters spelling and more  it has a music mode with  different songs  this is a great toy all around

i remember wanting a chain chomp when i was younger id played the mario games in the late s and early s but it wasnt until i played super mario rpg when i was in th grade that i really thought these things were cool bowser used a chain chomp as a weapon swinging it around his head and then hurling it at the enemy if you pressed a button just before it connected with the enemy the chomp would bite them for some reason that seemed like one of the greatest attacks ever in a game to me and i tried making my own chain chomp but was unsuccessful well  years later my daughter got me one as a present and while unexpected its something i was secretly excited for now i can relive those glory days of the lateskindathe chain chomp is surprisingly cuddly for being a killer ball with teeth the body feels like fleece the outline around the pupils and whites of the eyes are sewn and the rest is kind of fuzzy the mouth is held open with cardboard under the fabric and the teeth seem to be made of vinyl it has a short chain attached at the back and its pretty durable for being part of a stuffed toy the links dont bend when you squeeze them or anything so it could actually be aluminum or another lighter metal and not plastic of course ive spun the chain chomp around and let him go with the wind a few times since i got him and he flies pretty well you can attach another chain to the one thats already on him or just take off the existing one and replace it if you likeof the three colors available im partial to the red but theyre all cool and this blue ones fun to have around it looks great hanging from a wall or just staring down people from a shelf ready to attack the only reason im giving it  stars is because the teeth can get damaged easily since theyre so thin but for the price this is a good deal and one of the better mario bros plushes out there now if only it had a voice chip that made the chomping sound from mario rpg

the color  detail are firstrate a good reminder of thier  team battle royal victory at wrestlemania  in  it comes with a sunny action figure who was their manager for awhile the spiked shoulder pads are kind of hard to get off but easy to put back on makes sense to me overall a perfect  pack for any road warrior fan i give this set a  out of

this toy is actually pretty boring  i was disappointed since i normally like the little people toys  its just a little play set with a bunch of plastic junk included  my daughter only likes to play with the fairy doll by itself without the rest of it  there just isnt much to hold a kids attention  theres the flower swing but thats really it

these toys really do a great job of being a replica of the original s or so toys  it wasnt about looking like the character at the time and the hair could be all over the place  lets not mention the material of the clothing but thats the charm  if you want a modern looking version of uhura youll want an action figurei really like these as displays outside of the box even though the box has the groovy s graphics of the era  these arent really for kids wanting to play  these are for adult collectors who enjoy reminiscing about these wonderful old dolls  and the price is very reasonable compared to what youd have to pay in order to get a ratty real vintage versionin all im glad i bought it

im not entirely clear on what makes a black orc a hero to other orcs but its probably not his menacing demeanor belly plate or spiked slippers because all of the other black orcs have that too  at a guess tre manors sculpt is a hero because he gives up on all form of subtlety just picked up a blade and started hackingand what a hacker he is  every muscle in this black orcs body is dedicated to laying the beat down on whoever happens to be in front of him  this is an orc you dont mess with  not that you would consider messing with any of these orcsincidentally while the black orcs are relatively easy to paint i interpreted their title as a sign of their tribe not their skin color

this toy is a great one because it provides babies with a chance to hit things with a mallet and not get in trouble  its a pounding toy but nothing can get lost like others ive seen where you pound balls  when you hit all  shapes the turtles head pops out and it works in any order  when you push the head back in the shapes pop up again

out of nowhere my daughter got into ghostbusters she had never seen the movies or the cartoon but somehow she knew what they were based on the logo even more strange she thinks that slimer is just the cutest thing right now so we got her this bank she got super excited immediately upon seeing it yeah its more for the adult collector but this is a great banktoy for all ages im just jealous that i didnt have one when i was littleslimer is made of a good soft vinyl that wont crack or break if it falls from a shelf or anything the sculpt is fantastic and anyone whos seen ghostbusters even once will recognize who this is neca did a great job with the paint too which based on my experience buying figures by them is rare they didnt go nuts with paint so no detail is spared the slot for money is on the back and theres a standard circular closure on the bottom that you twist to pull out and access the money this is a great sturdy bank and makes for a good display piece too the glow in the dark feature is a nice touch and it only takes about  minutes of being under a light to get the full effect once you turn the lights offmy only minor complaint is the price but when you consider that most of necas standard action figures cost close to the same amount and are much smaller its not as bad something also worth mentioning is that yes the arms are a bit flimsy they tend to break around the elbow area but its nothing some good super glue cant fixtheres not much more to say any fan of ghostbusters could do a lot worse than picking one of these up get the stay puft one too while youre at it
beautiful doll with a very s chic feel  but note that her legs do not bend so she isnt able to sit on the adler couch that is sold separately

the color  detail is firstrate it comes with a nightstick a good reminder of his return on october  when he took out all of vinnie macs stooges inside of a steel cage but it if you are a fan of the big boss man i give this toy a  out of

honestly what is this garbagei went online to purchase a bedset for my little sisters dollhouse and this is what i geta young woman with some sort of skin condition tied to a bedmuch to my error when i received the package in the mail i immediately wrapped it up and presented it to my sister a few days later we were both looking forward to seeing what was in the box as many of you already know how this played out i will leave it in closing that there were tears and the cops eventually showed up the local news didnt even get our names rightno wonder amazon kept the product picture so small they dont want you to notice a poorly made doll that has been cobbled together

the ugnaughts in the potf line from the mids were little more than glorified statuettes by contrast this ugnaught is a real figure despite being small hes got all the articulation fans expect nowadays including elbow and knee joints his face is ugly by very well done i personally like the idea of including the computer terminal instead of a second ugnaught  its great for dioramas id recommend getting multiples of this figure for cloud city dioramas

despite being in the more premier line of barbie dolls for little girls the ones meant for movies this and the other dolls in this line are surprisingly vanilla  they dont sing or have any other gimmicks  the cape can make a dress and thats about it  the dress itself is rather plain and like the previous movies the doll looks nothing like the dvd counterparti wish this doll sang like the others  that was the real draw for my  year old to buy this  plus the character in the dvd never even used a sword  it would have been nice if this doll had the same weapon from the movie rather than the generic rapierof note the sword broke in half on the very first day then my daughter didnt want to play with it any more because it was the toy she broke

this is a very interesting barbie doll her hair in front is both thickly straightened in front as with mud decoration and then loose in back  she wears a canvas type of top and then a loin cloth of woven material which adds to the quality of this doll that it isnt just a painted on pattern on the fabric  the loincloth flap is held in place by an intricate weaving of leather like material  she has very detailed tattoos on her arms and legs and real feathers in her head dress  finishing the doll are  strands of different types of beadsnote that her legs dont bend  shes a beautiful display but not a play doll  but in all beautiful quality and originality for the price  highly recommended

this vehicle is a significant step up from the micro machines hounds tooth released during the late s the paint application is very detailed with appropriate weathering its a fairly large ship at  inches long my only complaint is that the main bulkhead of the ship was very obviously fused together with two pieces because there is a seam that still shows this is frustrating and takes away from the overall effect but from the side hounds tooth still looks perfect

these are listed as toys but are not and should not be given to small children because the chains can come undone easily and create a choking hazard  as key chains these are very cute and fun however  they would be great gifts for someone who likes tupperware or just to use as key chains for your keys

these are fun unique and let kids make up mosaic style pictures  there are pattern cards to follow if they want but they will have fun coming up with their own patterns as well  these are sized perfectly for little hands but can be fun for kids of all ages and even for adults who want to play

scythers swords dance powers up its other attackslashing stike from  to  the  downsides are you cant use them on the next turn and it only has one useful attackslashing stike i give this card a  out of
this is a shape sorter blocks and an activity toy all in one  theres a roller spinner squeaker mirror and more to keep little ones occupied  my kids love this toy

this is a really fun toy  my kids love trying to catch the balls as they pop out  the only complaint i have as that kids cant really play with this one alone because the balls go all over the place  they often end up under furniture where my kids cant get them so i have to help  i enjoy it and so do they but you would definitely want to supervise

we have  of these wild rupublic snakes and my daughter loves them  it was hard to tell from the description if the open mouth would be hard or soft  turns out it is a very soft non ouchie type of vinyl perfect for little kidsit also has a rattle in the tale to add to the play fun

the popularity of zhu zhu pets came out of nowhere it seemed did anyone really think this was going to be the next tickle me elmo or robosapien little electronic hamsters that make sounds and crawl along the floor it was sad to see such cheap toys go for ridiculous amounts of money and of course once december was over things calmed down are these little hamsters worth their price retail price yes anything over that nothis was my daughters first zhu zhu pet num nums shes pretty cute with the little heart on its back num nums makes various sounds when you press the button on its nose including a moo it also walks with the two wheels on the bottom side for a little bit before stopping on its own even on carpet thats needed replacing for a while num nums inched its way without any problems and glided along smoother surfaces yep this is a cute toy and aside from the plastic bottom soft to the touchits not the price that keeps this from being a  star toy that all depends on the seller come on parents call the store early and see if they can hold it for you but two small problems one is that these do go through aaa batteries quickly so youll want to just go the extra mile and buy some good rechargeable ones i can also see these breaking very easily because of their construction and id bet anything that one good drop on a hard surface would mess it up for good there are already stories about kids stepping on these and breaking them so dont run around while these guys are doing their thing i also have a minor nitpick about the nose did the button have to protrude out so much it looks weird and im sure they couldve just made the nose itself a button instead of having the button stick out of italso take care cleaning this if it gets dirty use a damp rag or sponge while making sure no water reaches the plastic bottom or it could get in and then youll be out of a num numsfor the actual retail price these are great toys that will keep most young kids entertained if they were big enough to be the musthave toy last year they had tove been doing something right right

the lego games have been doing pretty well since lego star wars debuted a few years ago take a wildly popular franchise turn it into legoform and you have a simple charming fun game for all ages lego star wars was huge when it came out and got great reviews for the most part i enjoyed both of the games in that series and had a blast playing with a friend thanks to the easy dropindropout coop then lego indiana jones came along andwell the less said the better lego batman did ok but was pretty forgettable ask anyone who bought it if theyve played it at all in the last year so now its harry potters turn does the boy wizard make magic for the lego series and turn it back in the right direction yes and no harry potter is definitely suited for similar play style to lego star wars what with magic being the force here and blasters being replaced by wands but the games still glitchy as all heck even after the software update installed when you go online either way this is a fun game for kids and their parents to enjoy together but therell be frustration here and therechances are that if youre on this page youre a fan of the harry potter books or movies so its kinda pointless to go over the story especially since this game covers  years worth of material but if you never played a lego game before it takes the movie its based on simplifies it into a pretty cute but not embarrassingly cute plot with lots of tongueincheek comedy while having more emphasis on gameplay than story the story progresses through cutscenes usually before and after levels and the game actually lets you play for long periods of time something a lot of games for mature people are lacking seriously how sick are you of playing through an intense portion of an action or shooter only to have the flow interrupted by a cutscene that wont happen here here youll play as harry and his friends with many characters to choose from in the harry potter universe if you have a favorite character who had a few lines of dialogue in the movies theres a good chance youll get to play as them here a second person can join in just by pressing start on a second controller and they can leave at any time allowing the ai to take over again like the previous lego games this is an actionplatformer for the most part and youll blast enemies with spells build devices with legos and collect tons of lego pieces after blowing things apart its pretty good funwhile lego harry potter is easily accessible to people with any level of gaming experience the bugs will ruin it for some as you mightve read in other reviews some people have lost things they bought in the games store when purchasing items as player  and some entire files have been mysteriously erased levels have parts where you may get stuck in a wall or your character will somehow get stuck in the floor while running its frustrating and i dont get how this series has been plagued with these problems for so long without being fixed example in the very first level of the game i did dove towards some lego pieces early on and my guys head got stuck in the wall their body gyrated for a few seconds before they started to lose hearts then he died when they came back a second later everything was fine but stillwhy was something so stupid overlooked reminds me of some of the glitches in super mario  back in the day my other problem is more of a nitpick but it bugged me enough to take off a star this whole game seems too busy there are lots of objects and characters to interact with in levels what with a lot of the action taking place at hogwarts and it takes a few seconds to select the objectperson you want to use magic on or blast with your wand before you actually get to do it i hate to keep going back to lego star wars but it seemed like the two games in that series had more polish and there was more space to get things done in here everything felt very clutteredthe graphics arent going to be impressing anyone as theyre very simple and this game couldve been done on the systems from the last console generation but it still looks good and the games simple lego design gets the job done there wasnt much slowdown when i played but there were some other visual problems like the levels looking a bit wavy when id move the camera its no big deal though and shouldnt bug anyone unless theyre looking for it the music is sure to be familiar to fans of the movies but dont go expecting much in the vocal departmentlego harry potter is a fun game but it lacks polish i almost want to say that they rushed the release to go along with the last movies but this came out at the end of june and the movie just came out  days ago maybe the next lego harry potter will get more attention to detail and be less buggy but as it is i highly recommend this over indiana jones and batman but if you havent played a lego game before id recommend star wars first

the star wars series of ultimate  square figures are top quality in every way  the jedi robes are made of thick muslin and the belts boots and accessories are all meticulously researched and detailed they look and feel like the high quality expensive and interesting figures that they areobi wans face has an excellent sculpt  capturing the seriousness of the character  the belt is especially intricate and exact to the smallest detail  i especially appreciate how the muslin overrobe is of the crinkled bleached material as in the movie  the boots have articulation  even the lightsaber is true to the originali have the entire series now of  star wars figures and none have disappointed  the sculpts clothing and accessories are all rich in the details of the sw universe and lore

this is a great game for little kids the game consists of tiles with parts of several paths on them some paths end and others are open  you match up path tiles and try to put end points to close off a path  if your characters color is in a path thats closed you place a wood token there  the player with the most wood tokens when all the tiles are done wins  its that easy its a richer version of pipe or snake games where you build the piecesthe tiles are sturdy easy to place and beautifully illustrated in rich illustrations and bright colors  the person tokens are made of thick wood and the entire set is made from very obviously quality materials  no plastic anywhere  there are no dice spinners or any type of counting needed for the game  each player takes turn placing tiles and trying to close off the paths on which their characters are sitting  the strategy is easy here so this is great for families with children of multiple agesthis is a quality game and we received it as a wonderful gift  its one of those wonderful gifts that families can enjoy playing together

reeyees was always my favorite and this original figure was a classic pretty detailed for its time although its head is a bit big if youre a fan of this goatalien as i am be sure to get one of thesebe sure to check out the more recent reeyees figure atstar wars power of the force freeze frame  reeyees action figure

i remember getting these figures for christmas before even playing the game they were advertised in a game magazine and cost quite a bit when i got them everything looked cool but frankly thats about the extent of what these figures can do look coolcloud here is probably the only one who had some work put into him his arms are articulated at the shoulder and elbow and he can turn his head around the rest of him is immobile and like most of the others in this set he may as well have been a pvc figure he comes with the signature buster sword and the hard edge as well as an odd looking stand that you snap one of his feet intothat thing is none of these figures are made very well clouds head and arms pop out of the sockets effortlessly the buster sword is too heavy to be kept in a pose without falling down and his bangs are barely glued in place so theyll probably be the first thing to go add in some sloppy paint work and youve got a mess of a figure this is a pretty small figure too especially if you compare it to the newer play arts ones which are better in every waysomething cool though is that these were some of the first figures to my knowledge that came in easily resealable packaging the plastic bubble folds around the sides of the cardboard backer and you can put the figure back in for semimoc display if you wantthe only people who should shell out the stupidly high amount of money these go for now are those who absolutely have to have everything ffrelated orno thats about it i ended up selling my figures to someone when i was in highschool for less than  of what they cost when they came out and didnt feel like it was a bad deal at all these figures are terrible and if you have to have one of cloud go for any of the play arts ones

these ultimate  scale are expensive  but they are so worth it  these have the most intricate details and use the highiest quality materials  from hans soft knit cotton undershirt to the black khaki vest and pants  even the original seams are in the pants and the side red stripes are made of trim and not paint  the belt is correct down to meticulous detail and has all the original belts and patches  han wears the medal from the end of episode hans face sculpt isnt idealistic  shows all the moles and scars  and has lovely shading  included is the prototypical han solo smirk  he says han solo captain of the millenium falconin all an excellent collectible that makes a great fully posable display  i almost wish they had a leia to go with him

the halloween special barbies are really a great value  they are fun for girls to play with very different from the other more generic fashion type of barbie dolls and look good as a fun display  and unlike the valentines easter and even christmas barbies these are quite fun for girls to play with well after the holiday is gone  now that witches are so popular the halloween barbies go great with the other fantasybarbies for fun  interacting magically with the mermaids and fairiesthe hat is a soft vinyl and doesnt get destroyed with play  in all i feel the halloween barbies are one of the best values out there  especially considering how much more expensive and gimmicky the latest fairy and mermaid barbies have become  my  year old views this as a fantasy and not a holiday barbie and plays with it year round with the fairytopia dolls  this particular halloween doll often is the bad guy in her play time  the evil witch

although this is one of the cutest lps figures i have ever seen it has the fake furfuzziness thing goin on and hes looking a little dreadful due to his coat fallin off i would suggest waiting for hasbro to release a nonfurry affordable version i am stating affordable here because the only other meerkat i have seen in person was at walmart on sale for  due to the fact that it came with a lps carrying case which you can view here on amazon i saw the one with the carrying case in nov  so it still might be at walmart that meerkat is nonfurry my daughter has owned the furry meerkat for about a year now he is not a favorite so i would think that his wearandtear would be more minimal but alas this little guy has the mange

this is definitely worth the money  it is a decent size and isnt made of a breakable material so it can be given to small children  i also like that the cork isnt too hard to remove like some banks  my daughter loves this because of the removable princess figurines  she plays with them all the time  i would definitely recommend this

this barbie collector quality dolls is quite lovely  with a suitably mean looking face  her dress is quite lovely and the only reason i am giving this a  star instead of  is that the oz emblem on the front looks like it will chippeel off easily  for that reason she might be better left as a boxed displaythe dress comes with tulle and her hat also has a matching tulle band down the back the hat also has a red ribbon her striped stockings end with the iconic ruby slippers  her broom attaches easily in her handwhen you press her mid section you hear sounds from the movie the witch of the west screaming also her arms are articulated  leading to great posing ability if you do debox herin all a beautifully detailed doll worthy of the barbie collector label  this is much nicer than the wicked witch of the west doll

i always regretted not having found these when they first came out in the late s i finally tracked them down for a reasonable price i like both ships the space jockey ship is actually pretty detailed for a toy of this size it looks a bit too shiny for the ship but of course it was dark in the movie i always saw the ship as more reddish than bluish the armored personnel carrrier looks good as well the two guns swivel the apc is also close to scale size with the action fleet drop ship the two figures are decent about the size of action fleet figures so if you have those aliens action fleet ships these figures are a nice addition but if you dont have the action fleet ships and those were rare then the figures are just kind of extra id have preferred another ship overall if you can track this down its a nice treat for aliens fans

this is a soft fabric padded couch  very much like a miniature of the real thing except that the real couch would have wood and this is very plastic  what you are paying for with the high cost is a very highly detailed and exception piece of furniture with which you can use for displays of your more expensive barbies  the couch is large and likely not very useful for doll houses  but i have to admit i enjoy using it with some of my gold label barbie displaysif you have your adult collector barbies displayed youll definitely want this couch  but i dont recommend it for kids or kids playsets due to the qualityhigh cost  the regular think pink barbie furniture is more than suitable for childrens playsetsone problem with the companion jonathan adler barbie doll is that her legs dont bend most of the modelbarbies dont  so she wont sit on the actual  was kind of disappointed with that

ive been meaning to buy some of the minimates figures for a long time now but unfortunately most of the ones i wanted to get are long gone my daughters into ghostbusters at the moment and when she saw these lego ghostbusters she had to have them after checking these things out when she wasnt looking you know what these are pretty cool toys even being as little as they are any kid or adult collector is sure to get a kick out of thesein this set you get the slimed version of peter and the clear version of slimer peter has a disgusted expression on his face and it looks great he has green slime all over his jumpsuit and comes with his proton pack which has the gun portion that he can hold in one hand he has pretty good articulation too at the shoulders elbows wrists head and legs he even has little elbow pads that you have to move out of the way so you can bend his arms i was surprised with how well they painted him right down to the ghostbusters patch on his sleeve i know with these minimates figures you can mix and match parts with other minimates for example you can take off peters hair and replace it with say winstons the only things to watch out for with him are the cord on the proton pack connecting to the gun part since its very thin plastic and could snap easily and making sure that his limbs are all snapped in place so you dont lose anything finally he comes with the laser stream for his gun so he can catch slimer i actually couldnt get mine to stay on the gun but its therethe clear slimer looks great and im glad they made a new sculpt for him instead of just slapping the face on a regular minimates body theres the outer shell for slimer which makes up his body and it slides onto a minimates body with the arms and head where the shell snaps onto from the inside he also comes on a clear plastic stand so it makes him look like hes floating around the body also has some food painted on it making it looks like how he did in the movie when he took in plate after plate of goodies no complaints here at all slimer looks fantastic and this is my favorite version of him from the minimates series he also has articulated arms like peter but thats it for obvious reasonsoverall these are really cool toys and i cant wait to buy my daughter and myself more you can get a lot of good poses out of the basic minimates body and the different facial expressions in this ghostbusters line makes for lots of display possibilities the price is usually good too provided you get these when they come out at retail rather than paying inflated prices hint hint highly recommend these guys and now i have to track down those man with no name ones

castle panic is a collaborative game that features a very simple concept warriors are trapped in a tower and goblinoids of all varieties are trying to eat them  thats it despite its simple and grim concept castle panic is a highly entertaining collaborative game for familiesthe board consists of six segmented concentric circles divided into two segments of three colors red green blue radiating from the center  in order from the center towers walls then the swordsman knight and archer circles and finally the forest circle  the tower and walls act as hit points of sorts and the circles are striking range archerlong knightmedium swordsmanshort  monsters move one circle towards the center each round and a variety of other monster tokens can move them between segments or closer to the tower boss monsters of various types also influence the number of monsters that appear and how they movethe game consists of two components cards and monster tokens  the cards consist of each type of warrior as well as special features like a barbarian who can take monsters out anywhere on the board players refresh their hand each round and can use as many cards as they like  although its possible to compete between players with a monster trophy system highest number of monsters slain wins the games cooperative element really comes into play during the trading phase when players can share cards between them  the colorcoding makes it an easy game to understand for children which is why it works so well as a family collaborationthe monster tokens have some challenges however  the monster tokens are triangles with a monsters stats on one side and a leering face on the other each triangle points inward toward the circle with the monsters hit points goblins have  orcs have  and trolls have   when the monster is hit by a warrior the triangle is changed to point the lower number of hit points towards the center so a troll that gets hit for  point is turned so that the number  points toward the centerthe problem is that the tokens also have effects like a plague that wipes out certain warriors a boulder that smashes through everything in its path and other monsterspecific effects  the monster tokens are shuffled which is relatively impossible given the way theyre designed  these tokens would have been better served as cards that would be easier to shuffle and place on the boardthe other problem is what happens once the monsters get inside the castle walls  only a handful of cards can actually affect a monster within the walls which means that if enough monsters breach the outer defenses its a foregone conclusion that the monsters will win this is a simple fix however  just make it so that swordsmen can also affect monsters within the castle wallscastle panics simplicity perfect for kids  the game is easy to tweak  despite its grim subject matter its a great family game for budding geeks of all ages

first for those who havent been introduced for the world of kubricks theyre usually very cool and cute little figures similar to lego people theyre a little bigger than those but much more detailed kubricks tend to come in blind boxes where you get a box with a random figure inside its a fun line and theyre huge in japan and with collectors everywhere if you want to see good kubricks check out the star wars oneshowever these kubricks for where the wild things areare just plain ugly they look exactly as they do in the stock picture which isnt good at all every single one of them looks like they have downs syndrome or just took a bunch of sleeping pills douglas got it the worst when it comes to the design category and looks like a mutated chicken more than anything the paint on these guys is all wrong too im being very generous with my rating because yes you can have fun playing with these since theyre wtwta figures and just as durable as any other kubrick but theyre just so ugly i highly recommend getting a different kind of kubrick for a better first impression if you havent gotten any before because these will probably make you hate the seriestheres also a chance of getting a rare bearbrick figure and you could always sell that for a pretty penny but again i cant recommend buying these at all unless youre the hardest of hardcore wild things collectorsmedicom really screwed up with this license the vcds were overpriced and cheaply made and these kubricks arent any better stick with the mcfarlane figures if you need some wild things

the color  detail is firstrate a good reminder of rob van dams title reign it lasted for  days the longest reign in the history of the tv title it comes with a bag carrying with  logos on it the ecwthe wwe and the wrestlemania  logo i give this belt a  out of
i think the version of cad bane with the little robot sidekick is the best version of the character out it comes with more accessories and the face is painted a darker more realistic blue

ive ordered  of these now within  years  they are very large and full of great play value  the snake has firm stuffing inside that allows the snake to be bent and twisted but still retain its shape ive purchased other stuff snakes and they would always bend permanently unnaturally if the stuffing wasnt firm enough  of course it is a plush and soft enough to keep in a bed as well  just remember that at  its probably going to be much taller than your childwe love it

at  this is huge  probably taller than your child  but it is made of a soft plush with firm but resilient filling  it can be twisted bent and smothered and still goes right back to firm shape  its definitely soft enough for beds or playtimein all we love it and it ended up being a great purchase  what little kid doesnt want his own large plush snake

i love the idea behind this its so seldom that we see anything regarding ralph mcquarries concept art for the original star wars these figures are a great representation of what might have been the differences between the concepts and the finals are mindblowing leia was more like han solo with a smugglers outfit and blaster ben kenobi looked more like a traditional samurai boba fett was pure white han solo had a lightsaber the stormtroopers had lightsabers as figures theyre also fun they all have incredible detail i particularly like the snowtroopers dirty look the only drawback is that the stormtrooper figure does not come with the shield pictured on the box and boba fett figure does not come with the alternative helmet thats too bad but frankly for the price of this set i really dont mind  its a great deal

i dont know why this got such bad reviews because my  kids all love it  i do as well but i almost didnt buy it because of the reviews  im glad i did because it is a fun and educational toy  it teaches what animals eat their sounds and some other facts about each animal such as how cows make milk and chickens provide eggs  as for the knobs being hard to manipulate my kids   and  can all do it just fine  we also dont find the voice creepy as one reviewer said  it is just a mans voice with a slight southern accent  my oldest daughter said he was a farmer

i like that this noahs ark playset is also a puzzle and it comes with more animals than most other arks ive looked at so it was the choice for me  its not too hard to put together because the different levels are numbered but finding where each animal is supposed to go is a little more of a challenge  its definitely not one of those puzzles a toddler or preschooler will master too fast and then ignore  my only complaint is that the wheels on the bottom are too stiff and dont roll at all  the ark just slides across the floor instead of actually rolling

these two figures are based on the star wars novel shadow hunter one of my favorites in the eu both are great additions to your collection the maul in this set is a shirtless version of a younger mual in training hasbro did an excellent job painting mauls body with tattoos and even camouflaged the joints im very impressed iyq is a cool character and a fun character hes a protocol droid like cp but has a compartment in his chest with a hidden holocron again hasbro did a beautiful paint job my only complaint is that his hip joints dont allow him to fully sit down overall definitely recommended for maul fans

these star wars  scale ultimate figures are just amazing  the materials used for the outfits are top notch  they look and feel the part  everything is in perfect scale with all kinds of little details  its almost like having a maquette from the movie  a perfect scale model of the costume and details  push the stomach and he talks from the moviethe sculpt on this is excellent it is highly posable comes with extra hands for even more posing options has the padawan evaluator screen and of course his purple lightsaber  he even looks annoyed  really capturing the character of mace winduif you are looking to be the ultimate present for a star wars fan any of these highly detailed figures would suit  they truly are one of the best star wars items weve ever purchased and make a display that always draws attention  just for the intricately detailed clothing made with muslin just like the actual costumes from the movie make this worth the purchase price

this is from tonner dolls so you know it will have an excellent sculpt excellent likeness and the highest quality materials in the dress  and there are never corners cut  the dress is a beautiful full dimensional and accurate to the moviethe evil queen is dressed in a thick satin dress with long kimono sleeves she has her trademark white winged collar and has large fully lined double sided cape that snaps under the collar  a thick metal not plastic crown sits atop her head and she has a full head of hair coming out hood in the back  a red rope braid belt adorns the waist loosely as in the moviethe evil queen is fully articulated  you can pose her in any number of positions  this makes for an ever changing display and also is perfect for recreating scenes from the moviein all a high quality doll and perfect for display

this teaches cause and effect as well as working on fine motor skills that every baby needs  it is also very cute  the pictures change color as they pop up when baby does the different things which include a slider with bell sound squeaker button twisting knob and flipping switch

the concept for this was interesting  you can turn the dress up and hide the torso so that she turns into a frog  it should have given you the best of both worlds  both a doll and a stuffed animal for added play valuethe problem is that the frog mode has pointy hard plastic arms and body inside that make it a lumpy looking stuffed animal missing half its stuff  the girl version doesnt do anything  the skirt is soft and there are no legs to keep the shape of the dress  so she just flops over  it ends up feeling like there is only half a doll there or a really sad sack stuffed frogmy  year old cant get the head into the frog velcro area very easily so shes given up trying to transform from girl to frog  the velcro catches on tianas hair and wrecks it unfortunatelyit just sits in the closet right now because it isnt a doll it isnt a stuffed animal it doesnt transform easily and it isnt even that attractive as frog or dollthis was a disappointment

this is clearly meant for those who want an elegant item for a formal room or den the case is large and it really says quality in every way  from the leather inside and out to the quality pieces inside  this is a step above wood sets and clearly much better than the typical plastic sets one finds these daysthis is perfect as a classy gift or for a displayplayable item for when guests visit bring out the wine and enjoy a game with this beautiful set

this comicpack includes figures of two of the star wars new jedi orders most powerful warriors first the star of the set is obviously the yuuzhan vong warrior this is a big figure easily a head or two taller than most star wars figures not only that but hes got above average articulation hasbro did a superb job with the paint and sculpt of the yuuzhan vong the aliens muscles and veins bulge out reminding me of the veins on michelangelos moses i cant ever recall any figure with such exquisite anatomical detail im so glad hasbro treated the yuuzhan vong with respect and made such a good figure hasbro hasnt made many new jedi order figures and the series hasnt always received respect from fans the yuuzhan vong is such a distinctive villain so its important to get it right my only complaint is that the figures face isnt covered with blue tatoos as many yuuzhan vong are but of course there is variation amongst the yuuzhan vongthe second figure is kyle katarn hero of the dark forces video games i remember playing the first dark forces when i was younger but that katarn looked quite different sans facial hair the later dark forces games portray katarn as a bit more of a mix between a jedi and smuggler the figure captures this mix perfectly and katarn comes with both a lightsaber and blaster the blaster is particularly detailed the figure itself is pretty good although the face is a bit bland hes got a good range of articulation but surprisingly less than the yuuzhan vong which also has ankle jointsoverall both figures are done well its nice to finally get some new jedi order figures im looking forward to nom anor whos coming out later this year

fans of the star wars legacy comics have wanted a figure of darth krayt for years this version is pretty good but not perfect the armor is a bit dull and doesnt have a metallic sheen the spikes could be bigger however the biggest problem is that his left hand doesnt hold a lightsaber meaning krayt can only hold one saber at a timethere are two versions of sigel dare one of them has too much eye blush and looks a bit silly while the other is well painted be careful and ask sellers which one youll getoverall this set is great for fans of the legacy comics too bad its so expensive

neca did an incredible job with these figures the detailing is extremely realistic if you rub your finger along the body it feels like rough wrinkled skin neca also managed to get quite a bit of articulation including wrist leg elbow shoulder and two neck joints one at the base and one near the head et is around  inches tall but hes a pretty bulky figure and looks quite largethe galactic friend figure comes with a wraparound towel the towel is moulded not cloth so you can really only dress et up in it one way however it looks great on him it can be removed to get a naked version of et one warning with the towel is that at a few points some of the white paint rubbed onto the figure i was initially pretty upset but i noticed that just rubbing those spots with a wet cloth completely removed the white paint and solved the problemthis figure also comes with a neck extension so you can make the neck longer it looks great although admittedly is a bit tough to get on you have to position the ball in the ball socket straight so you can push it in my advice is to just switch to the longer neck and leave itmy only complaint is that the small reeses pieces accessory doesnt have a label its just an orange bag of candy the trademark was probably left off for legal reasons still thats a pretty small complaintthe dress up figure comes with moulded hair dress and a mink scarf just like from the scene in the movie he also comes with a small bag that you can take off the clothes and hair are not to my knowledge removable they seem glued on although in theory you could probably rip them off and still have the base figurethe thing i love most about this figure is the face rather than simply using the same head as the galactic friend figure this ets face has a very concernedpuzzled look just like in the movie the mouth looks a bit scrunched up and the upper lip starting to frown as opposed to the other et figures smile its awesome that neca took the time and effort to add that amount of detailit took  years but finally we have an et figure worth of the film well worth the price

the color and detail of both wrestlers are firstrate a good reminder of their feud in  it comes with a spray painted trash can with wcw on it and the wcw world heavyweight title belt which also has firstrate color  detail i give this pack a  out of

these liv doll wigs are of decent quality not great  but for the price more than acceptable and have interesting styles  they are also a great size for various types of dolls that need wigs  note that they have a plastic ball tab on the inside for inserting into the liv head  so if you are going to use it for a different type of doll youll need to snip it off and use doublesided tape to keep the wig intactthis is a shorter style and tends to look a bit young it also seemed to be a bit thinner than the other liv wigs ive purchased
its tackle does  points of damage to the defending pokemon while its vine whip attack does  points of damage i give this card a  out of
its flame jet does  points of damage to one of toue defending pokemon if the coin lands on heads its heat blast does  points of damage i give this card a  out of

its green aroma protects venusaur from the defending pokemons special conditions but first you have to remove venusaurs and your other grasstype pokemons special conditions in order to work its desperate pollen does  points of damage plus if venussaur has  or more damage counter cardsthe defending pokemon is also burnedconfused and poisoned its special reaction attack does  points plus  more if the defending pokemon is affected by any special conditions i give this card a  out of

ibuki is a character i dont care all that much for but when i saw this figure in the store last weekend and saw that she came with a tanuki i made sure to buy her sota made a ton of pretty good street fighter figures not that long ago and covered a good portion of the cast before they stopped of all the companies that have put out street fighter figures id say that theyve done the best job converting the d sprites to action figure form most of them were wellarticulated came with some good accessories like alternate heads and extra hands and the scale of some of the bigger characters like sagat and birdie was just plain cool yep you never felt ripped off when you bought one of these guysuntil they broke unfortunately i broke ibuki within minutes of taking her out of the package if youve never owned one of these figures before be very cautious when changing hands but ill get to that lateribuki stands at about  inches tall and the sculpt on her is great she looks like she popped right out of the game the pants are super baggy the slits on the sides are just right the hair looks greatanyone whos ever played street fighter iii or iv will know who this is i was especially impressed with the articulation on her you can move the following head shoulders elbows hands the waist in two ways bend forwardback or twist around upper legs knees heels toes you wanna pose her doing a tiptoe ninja sprint go for it you want her to be doing her cool fireball blast throw thingy you can get her in that pose without any problems my figure had a few stiff joints at first but as long as youre careful moving them around they shouldnt break ibuki also comes with  extra hands  right and  left a single kunai an extra mask with a different sculpt and of course her tanuki the hands look really good especially the ones with the fingers pointed out her little clenched fists just look too tiny to me so id suggest using these to get some cooler poses out of her the kunai can be held in the other hands easily and hasnt fallen out once im not going to try getting the other mask on for reasons im about to get into but that tanuki is just so adorable that you cant help but want to put that guy anywhere in the house hes one solid piece of plastic with no articulation but is cute with that big goofy expression on his face and he has a yellow bandana around his tailso whats the problem and why wont i put on her other mask well as i said earlier ibuki broke almost immediately upon being taken out of the box to change hands and get her head off so you can switch masks you have to pull the hands or head out of the sockets sometimes you luck out and do it right other times the peg of the hand breaks off and stays in the arm and is stuck in there for good this means no putting in other hands and thats exactly whats going on with my poor ibukis right hand the only solution unless youre really good with tiny knives is to super glue the hand back on the arm but that kills the articulation for that hand you cant move it around any more and itll be stuck in one pose this may or may not be a bad thing though if you have a pose that you really like and want ibuki to stay in it then theres no issue but for people like me who like to change things now and then it bites and i wish theyd have made it so you could just screw the hands in with a few twists instead im not even going to attempt taking the head off just to put on the other mask since id like to be able to move ibukis head around and not have it stuck looking forward i cant stress it enough be very very careful when changing out the hands maybe dipping her arms in a cup of hot water before doing so to loosen up everything wouldve been a good idea well now you have that to go by from my mistakeeven with her messed up hand i really like this figure and im glad i bought it the tanuki is constantly being moved around by both my daughter and myself since we love it so much hell be next to the vinylmation figures one minute and then on the chunli fightstick the next pick up this figure if you can get it for a good price

i think my daughter just about blew a gasket when she saw shaymin in the store a few months ago having her own shaymin made her day her week even and of course hes a cute little plush its shaymin after all jakks did a good job converting him to the plush form though hes still not as good as the official poke center onesshaymins a good size about the size of the mini plush torkoal and the colors on him really pop out at you the flower leaves are made of a thick felt that wont easily tear and the flower itself is a thin felt and some other material ive never seen before the felt layer separates from the other layer easily so be careful with that if you want shaymin to last a long time his eyes are sewn in and look good and hes also got a cute little smile toothe problem is that the top layers of grass or leaves on him dont look like they do in the stock picture every single shaymin ive seen so far has this problem they stick up and out i dont know what happened with production but chances are that youll end up with a shaymin that looks like hes trying to be some kind of shark you can see this in the product pictures ive uploaded of course your child probably wont mind because the fact that they have a shaymin should overpower any little problems but for adults that collect stuffed pokemon and want their plush to look as good as possible you might just want to skip over this shayminagain thats just a little nitpick and my daughter sure didnt care about it she plays with him constantly and takes him on adventures outside now and then if your child loves shaymin definitely get this one while you still can

reapers orcs like its elves have a distinctive appearance thats unique to this line  all the orcs are similar which i appreciate  you can tell that they all belong to the same species tre manors orc spearman isnt meant to be flashy but he does what he should  wield a spearmost of the orcs wear chainmail hauberks with hide underneath spiked metal shin guards and forearm guards and thats about it  all orcs are bald  i find this interesting given that tolkiens orcs were technically corrupted elves and the distinct lack of facial hair including on their heads could be a throwback to their shared lineage  or maybe im just reading too much into itthe one problem with this orc is his stance  the orcs are large and dont easily fit on a oneinch base you can glue them on a base but its not a good fit  the orcs themselves are hulking monsters so this isnt necessarily inappropriate but theyre large enough to almost be ogresthat aside this is a solid sculpt if a little fearsome for your typical orc

we brought this vacation house well on our vacation it is so easy to pack every piece of furniture and accessories within the house itself trust me i cannot enable most of the functions that my  cell phone offers and i can do it this is a spaceefficient affordable alternative to barbies mansion hey forget that elevator stairs are great for exercise takes only two minutes to set up i had it up and runnin in fifteen when taken straight from the box i would say that this is durable enough unless you plan on taking this baby into a moshpunk pit perfection for the living roomnope no playroom in my abode

this droid pack is a bit old from  but the figures were all really well done and have aged extremely well the paint job and articulation are excellent for all the figures best of all you can get rex which sole alone can go for nearly half the cost of this case overall a fitting tribute for star tours fans
hasbro has an offer where if you send it  proofs of purchase you can mail away for this figure makes more sense to do that than actually buy the old one

this is one of those rare games that adults will find as interesting and challenging as kids  its a d spacial puzzle  you have to move a small ball through a d path that includes climbing walls and leaping pits to achieve this you will be rotating the globe all kinds of crazy waysthere are  paths to take  each with a different difficulty level  the first is good for younger kids  id say and then they have challenges for future puzzleswhen not in use the puzzle globe comes with a small stand for display it makes an interesting display toothis is perhaps one of the most ingenious toys i have ever seen

before i start though the rating applies if you get this package for retail which is more reasonable but here youre getting  fairly popular pokemon figures in one deal shaymin wobbuffet and yanmega all  figures look great and exactly like their animated versions like i said in the reviews for other pokemon toys its a shame we didnt get figures of this quality when pokemon first hit huge in the late snone of the figures really have articulation except yanmega but thats also the one thing keeping this from being a  star product yes you can move his wings up and down but theyre likely to pop off since theyre not set in his body very well in fact mine did pop out when i moved them around its not a huge problem but they shouldve fastened these in there better otherwise yanmega looks fantastic and its about time we got a cool bug pokemon figure wobbuffet is in his infamous pose and shaymins looking cute as usual i like that shaymin isnt super tiny and they made him pretty big these figures dont really follow the right scale if that were the case regigigas figure would be massive even in this scale but since theyre all big that should give your kids even more fun and less of chance to lose them somewherethe only other gripe is standard with this line the paint used isnt that great if your child takes these toys in the bath with them the paint will fade after a few weeksso if you can get these figures at the original cost its a great deal this pack is pretty recent so you can probably still find them if you look around and come on just look at wobbuffets face how can you turn that down
