honestly i thought i wanted to own every single neca twilight actionish figure madeat one point i didwith the recent release of the new twilight movie i paid for the entire row of seats in the theather in front of me so that it would remain unoccupied i then proceeded to line up each and every one of the twilight actionishfigures on the back of those seats even the variants were there i kicked back and began to enjoy the moviemy joy was short lived an hour into the moviehaving suffering the horrendous lack of acting skills kristen stewart posses i realized that the bella figures that i owned had failed in every imaginable way possible to catch her likeness it was clear that the figures had more lifepersonality and overall compelling character appeal than the actual source materialhaving read the books four times in a row before going audio with the cds on my portable cd player that i listen to on the bus i packed up the figures and left the moviei gave bella a fitting end by being fed to the dogs teamjacob rather than suffer any more of her onedemensional acting and her trumped up actionish figure representation

i got this recently for my nephew i remember back in the old days the jawas were always pretty stiff with no joints and little detail this guy looks pretty cool his arms and elbows move and he can be posed in quite a few directions also the droid he comes with is actually pretty big and looks nice assembled if you get any jawa figure make sure its this one

i prefer these to other wooden puzzles because they have sturdy large easytohandle pieces that can stand up to being played with  i also like the look of these  they are very educational as well which is obviously a plus in a toy

i had a snowspeeder and i did not have a gunner from the movie  so this was the logical choice the helmet doesnt look just right but the paint scheme of helmet and the hoth outfit compensated a bit  the other two characters are not from the movies and if they are i never saw them despite of the fact i watch them from time to time  if you want to clutter your shelf with pilots extras these packs are a good way to go

this barbie sings two clips from the  musketeers movie all for one and making my way  shes about the same quality as the other singing dolls from previous movies  the dress does feel rather thin and cheap and far less fluffy than in the box due to rolled up paper under the skirt  her crown fell off within a day and doesnt have the mask feature of the other dollsin all if your child likes the singing dolls this is a good purchase  otherwise for play value i recommend the doll series where the cape transforms into a skirt and the crown slides down into a mask

this toy is educational and offers lots of activities to keep kids occupied  there are pegs to hammer that light up a ruler with a sliding thing on it a drill that spins when you pull the handle and a paint roller to spin  it also sings educational songs  i think this toy is definitely worth the money i spent since my kids play with it daily and love it  even my yearold likes it though its not meant for that age

perfect for kite newbies lightweight durable and easy real kite material container closes well and can even be hooked to stuff via a keychain about  wide at widest point string is tough goes darn high despite what others say dragged on soggy ground still looks sterling we love it

honestly i cant say id recommend this figure the sculpt is bulky with the plastic dress and the face seems off i only got it to use as a base to build a custom darth traya figure from kotor ii for that purpose it works pretty well

this toy rocks this is rock emsock em robots times  in this game you have  fighters instead of  they also punch and kick at the same time its like having a wild wrestling brawl in your house the color  detail are firstrate its prefect for any pro wrestling fan i give ulitmate clash a  out of

hasbro has gotten so good with making these figures look like their onscreen counterparts malakili was only in rotj briefly but hasbro captured his likeness perfectly hes fully articulated but the points of articulation are fully hidden hes more a work of art than a toy definitely recommended to help take care of your rancor

finally an updated nien nunb the last time we had this character was during the old potf line this time hes in a bwing bomber suit its not entirely clear nien nunb ever wore a bwing suit in the film but there is a sullustan in the rebel briefing scene so i guess hasbro decided it was nien nunb regardless this is a solid figure the face is a pale peach color perfect for the sullustan race in fact its a more realistic tone than what we saw in the movie the pilot suit comes with dangling hoses and straps which really makes it come to life of course the helmet comes off allowing you to see his whole face overall one of the better rebel pilot figures i hope hasbro makes a vintagestyle nien nunb in his smugglers gear

this nikto gunner came out alongside the niktogiran and like that figure this brown nikto shows hasbro at its finest the paint job and sculpt are superb he bends his knees and elbows and the strps on his clothing are separate from the main base of the figure the helmet is also removable and sits comfortably on his head  although i imagine it would fall off if you play with him unfortunately he cant really stand well while holding the gun as its supposed to be attached to jabbas skiff or sail barge my only criticism is that his neck seems a bit too thin

more great ewoks paploo and nhoapakk look extremely realistic their fur looks hairy and their hoods have subtle signs of dirt and weathering hasbro also painted feathers and ornaments on the hoods the weapons look like theyre made of wood  in fact you might mistake them for small sticks these two guys will be expensive secondhand but not quite as expensive as the current listing on amazon over

giran is the nikto guard who comforts malakili after the rancors death instar wars episode vi  return of the jedi this figure of him is great and easily of the same quality as hasbros vintagestylestar wars  vintage collection action figure skiff guard wooof like wooof his reptilian face is really detailed allowing you to see the scales and all also the hood comes off elbows wrists ankles and knees are all articulated although the knee cannot bend just swivel of the two nikto i like wooof somewhat better because of the fabric loincloth but its pretty close

my daughter got the shaymin keychain for one of her smaller birthday presents hes one of her favorite pokemon and once we saw these it was an instant buy its cool to see something notsobasic for a very low price plus its great to see pokeballs that open and close coming back after a few unsuccessful attempts over the last couple of yearsshaymin is the standard keychain figure size and they did perfectly with sculpting him in fact i think he looks more true to the original design than the bigger one that comes in the set with yanmega and wobbuffet hes attatched to the keychain and its connected pretty well the pokeball has a small opening on one side so you can even use the pokeball as a keychain ornament though its probably too big to fit in anyones pocket unless you still wear jncos the ball looks like it should and all you do is press the button to open it up to access the pokemon insidethe reason im giving this  stars for durability is that the pokeball is made of pretty thin plastic and you could easily crush it in one hand by accident watch out when throwing it and pretending to catch things too because if it contacts a hard surface itll be a gonerthese pokemon keychain figures make great little gifts and im about ready to go get one for myself too now how can you say no to a shaymin keychain

after you throw it out into a busy highway and encourage traffic to hit itseriously this is one of the worst toys ive ever seen all of these negative reviews speak the truth this thing doesnt work like it should by now youd think the maker wouldve replaced it with a newer version that can be played but nope this unplayable mess is still being shipped to stores this is supposed to be a toy story take on the classic magnetic fishing game that you can still buy with the ts aliens replacing the fish and you pick them up using the toy machine claw instead of with a fishing pole whereas the fishing game works since each fish has a magnet in its mouth thats not the case here or maybe it is and its just plain defective in that aspect toosee when you turn the game on the purple area with the aliens rotates and some of them pop up youre supposed to catch those with the claw but the claw is set in a pretty wide open position and it rarely closes down on the aliens regardless of how close you are to them be it directly above touching the sides of the aliens head or pressed down on them  times out of  you wont catch the alien theres no button or anything on the claw stick either you just dangle it over the aliens hoping to catch one you know its pretty bad when you really do get excited when you finally catch one of these suckers especially in a toy store with tons of people around and go i finally caught onethis is just a bad product and i hope that no good children get this for christmas or for their birthdays even if they want it this is the kind of thing an abusive parent gives to their child when they want them to think theyre getting something fun but its really the toy equivalent of being told to go out back and cut a switch save yourself the money and save your kids the torment by not buying this thing
this is still a pretty new figure and has a pretty good sculpt like the other reviewer i just wish it had the rifle shown in episode iv the newer vintage figure is probably a better bet

just check out my star ratings abovehow did we live without this bug for so long i am not ready to give the robotics talk to my older daughter yet she is seven and not interested right now and i do not even carethis toy is that good that the science behind it will ruin the appeal and intrude upon our fun right now this little robot is quiet and has soft rubber on the outside to absorb impact acts just like a darkseeking bug except on carpet will fall right off of tables does not sense height i found out my reading others reviews that they do not come back after going under kitchen appliances and i do not want to experiment with our bug my daughter has pointed out that a black more realistic hexbug would scare the pants off of people neatoupdate hexie was washed in the gentle cycle cold then dried on low heat and lived to tell the tale no visible leakage into battery chamber no visible damage to exoskeletonimpressive no cockroach could survive that

if you want to get one action fleet ywing get this one the ship is probably the best of the ywings in the action fleet series the concept art ywing is a nice touch and looks very retro if you already have the red ywing the main vehicle isnt much different so youd really only be paying for the ship it would have been nice if hasbro had repainted the ship but as it stands it still looks great

the star wars the legacy collection dewback with imperial sandtrooper exclusive figure setis an incredible update of thestar wars power of the force beast pack dewback  sandtrooper action figures it is perfectly proportioned and looks incredibly realistic for a creature it has a fair amount of articulation including legs and ankles fortunately i didnt have the problems the other reviewer did of sitting the sandtrooper onto his saddle my only complaint is that unlike its predecessor the mouth of this dewback doesnt open i always thought that was a cool feature other than that this is easily the best star wars creature ever to come out

the doll feels like good quality and one of the things i like best about it is that she has flat feet  and wears flip flops  as such it feels truly like a beach doll and not another barbie with pointed toesthe tailflips up over her head and does some strange positioning to make it into a hoodie  we never got the hang of it and it never looked right  all that hair was just too bulky and looked wrong when we tried for the beach look  but then again its really a doll that is much more fun in the water as a mermaid than as a beachcomberthe color changing is interesting and she seems to be holding up well in the bathtub  her crown long since fell off and ill have to sew it into her scalp to keep it there as my daughter wantsthe other really unique feel about this barbie is that she is proportioned very muscularly  with a thicker waist and those flat feet  as such she feels more like a real doll than a fashion doll and does stand out from the other barbies

this toy is hot watching her in that skintight racing suit makes me what to say start your racers the toy itself is your basic pull back car with no real surprises but if you are a fan of princess peach go get it now i give this toy a  out of

round  has put out an impressive collection of fighters in their toy line from ufc ultimate collector to the world of mma theres a good chance that theyve made some of your favorite fighters into cool little semideformed figures there arent that many ladies though aside from two of the octagon girls the number of female fighters theyve made is pretty scarce ms gina carano is one of those few and shes made the jump to figure form quite well little gina is in a less bulky style than the men for obvious reasons and looks the most normal if you have her next to any of the dudes i was planning on keeping my figure in the box with the hope of meeting gina someday and having her autograph it but i finally broke down and opened the packaging she looks even better out of the boxms carano stands at  inches and is very wellmade her petite frame makes it a little hard to stand her up at first just adjust the legs a little and shes ready to go the sculpting on the face and body is excellent and you can tell who this is as soon as you look at her this figure has articulation at the head shoulders and legsnot a whole lot but given that these are kind of like the mma version of bobbleheads its ok i think the pose shes in looks good and the smirk on her face makes it seem like she knows she has the upper hand she looks great when placed next to any other round  figure and the pink shorts help make little gina stand outi cant tell if this figure is discontinued but you can easily get her for the original retail price just about anywhere even with this version being an exclusive to the website in the title there seem to be plenty to go around its a great collectible for any fighting fan or anyone who loves gina carano and come on who doesnt

my  year old son resists taking a bath like crazy so anything that entices him into it is great  every time we call for a bath we then face the struggle of getting him to leave his thomas trains which usually means they get to sit on the floor by the bathtub while hes in the bath  so i was very happy to get this thomas and bulstrode bath setthe boat is made of plastic and does have holes on top so it does fill with water as he plays with it and ends up at the bottom of the bathtub  however he knows to take it out and hold it upside down to empty it and start again  what are little engineers for  keeping busy fixing things of coursethe little attached boat is cute and the propulsion just a fun extra to keep him interested  its thomas who is the main action  the perimeter of the tub becomes the track and thomas goes around and around until he falls into the water and has to be saved  the thomas squirter is a little difficult for him to use at his age he doesnt understand leaving it under the water to fill up very slowly and then cant shoot the water out unless he holds it upside down mama water is coming out of thomas funnel  but he works it out  if it was too easy would he keep playing with it  maybe not and the downsides arent ones that make him frustrated such as train cars that dont stay connectedi know the top is there and can serve as a scoop to play with the water but i wish it was attached  he doesnt ever play with it and the water and just ends up putting it back on when he empties the water out of the boathe has fun with it and thats what counts and for under  i get a  year old who is willing to get into and stay in the bathtub

we have the thomas trackmaster set zip zoom and logging adventure  it features the fun logging area from the misty island rescue movie complete with a fallen tree tunnel and a zipline which my  year old loves  he loves to play with his thomas trains on the logging adventure set manually and only every once in a while turns on the motorized thomaswe just got this remote control thomas from amazon and it gives a whole new dimension to our already fun track set  we i say we since its fun for the adults too love having control over thomas moving through the tracks going backwards and forwards with the sounds of chugging when you move the throttle forwards and the sounds of reversing train when you move the throttle backwardsnot only that but you have two buttons one with the authentic thomas whistle sound and one with music  he absolutely loves it  all he needs now is an engineer hati highly recommend both the logging adventure set and the remote control thomas for great family funyou also dont have to use thomas on the tracks  although you cant steer thomas its still fun to start him out down a hallway and chug along  i think this is another candidate for something to bring at boring kids places like the crafts store we go to  the thomas engine and car dont disconnect so we dont have to contend with the decoupling frustration he gets with other thomas  car setsit is a tad loud  we had his grandparents on skype in england and we couldnt continue the conversation while sounding the buttons  but its not annoyingly loud  it really adds an air of funstock up on  aaa batteries
this figure is misleading for so many reasonsthere is no articulation on this figuregives the impression that obama is a hero of some sortbased off of the antiamerican artwork of alex ross

as a selfdeclared ultraultraman fan im wearing one of my nine utraman suits as i write this i have to say that this is one of the best ultraman figures ever producedthe sculpt accuracy paint and overall articulation have really raised the bar for any ultraman figures that come after thisi had to buy three of these figuresone to keep on my ultraman shelfshrineone to keep boxed up as a collectors item when it goes up in value but i will never sell itone to take with me everywhere i go

this figurine is hot the color  detail are firstrate she holds a sword downward for some reason it comes with a comic book with psylocke herself on the cover i only wish her suit was black instead blue i give this figurine a  out of

if you have a little girl who wants to be just like mommy or any other adult this toy is perfect  it allows them to have their own pretend jewelry box with makeup that isnt real  i wont allow my daughter to wear makeup no matter what so this is great for mewith this toy you get a comb a pretend lipstick tube and pretend perfume  the accessories are different shapes  you put them in their own areas and the toy will tell you things like what color or shape they are  it also sings cute songs to your child about how pretty and special they are  my daughter loves hearing this over and overthis toy will teach colors shapes and more  it also gives an opportunity for pretend play with the accessories  my only complaint is that it only teaches  colors and  shapes but this is fine for a young child

wcw may have messed up mike awesome in the real world but in the toy worldthey got it right the color  detail is firstrate a good reminder of his wcw debut on april  when he attacked kevin nash from behind you can move this toy into any way you want you can make it do the awesome splash  his top movethe awesome bomb the only downside is that it comes with nothing but it is still a fun toy to play with i give this toy a  out of

this is a nice set in that it has complete dresses and not mix and match pieces that get lost easily  the material for the dresses is on the thin side even for barbie standards but the outfits are at least not as tacky as some that mattel has put out this year  one thing i dont like is that the designs on the front never continue to the back you cant see that when they are in the box of course  the gold dress in this set for example has the belt and tie on the front  but the belt and tie stop at the side seams and the back is plainim rating this a  star because this is a classier set than many of the alternative fashion sets this year

mike awesome was an awesome wrestler and he is a awesome toy wrestler too its perfect for ecwmike awesome fans it also comes with cards too it also comes with a toy championship belt too so you can make it defend its title the color is firstrate the detail is soso a good reminder of when he first won the ecw title in a three way bout against masato tanaka  tazz at ecws anarchy rulz  ppv on september  i give this toy a  out of

the outfits here are nice and have a bit of diversity  but they seem like a lot of little pieces top here skirt there boa there purse here that dont really add up to a concrete set of  looks  because there isnt much too them it makes them easy to get on and off a doll for a young girl  i just wish there was more to them since the pieces get mixed in with other clothes  younger girls seem to like to have just one dress rather than little pieces of other dresses to put together

this is one of the better dolls in the my career vintage repros  note that the swirl on her banks differs and some are better than others  but the clothing look of the doll and accessories make her a winner when deboxed  i have her on display and was really pleased with the purchase

i think mattel must have stayed true to the original  but for the modern collector it may be a bit off to have a doll with big clumsy boots and gloves clumpy formless suit and giant plastic dome  the hair is stiff and not really moldable  it seems like something best left in the box  the flag looks like one of those c party cocktail toothpick decorationsin all this was my least favorite in the barbie career dolls  feels like a better concept than actual reality

i was really glad i chose this one of the barbie basics  she has a sweet face a beautiful smile and i like that her face is more rounded and healthier looking than the other model dolls  shes more beautiful and fun girl next door than she is haute couture model  her hair is quite lovely out of the box and she looks very good from all angles when displayed  i especially like how open and friendly she feels  as if she has a personality and isnt just a random molded doll with typical pretty features

this doll is really interesting  my  year old loves it  when you push the button on her leg a blade in the back rotates and as it does creates wings made out of lights  the lights are programmed so that the wings appear to be flapping and moving around  its something that is hard to explain in writing but very interesting when seen  of all the electronic wings barbies this was definitely the best concept  the only downside is that when the wings arent spinning there is the blade left in the back rather than wings  i would have liked it better if the blade had been encased between transparent filament wings so that she was pretty when the blade wasnt whirring and creating her lightbased fluttering wingsthe outfit she is wearing is nice as is her hair and styling  note that the legs and arms do not bend so she is a standingflying doll only  but in my opinion something original and different and well worth the price for a little girl who loves fairies

this doll is really interesting  my  year old loves it and has both versions  when you push the button on her leg a blade in the back rotates and as it does creates wings made out of lights  the lights are programmed so that the wings appear to be flapping and moving around opening and closing  its something that is hard to explain in writing but very interesting when seen  of all the electronic wings barbies this was definitely the best concept  the only downside is that when the wings arent spinning there is the blade left in the back rather than wings  i would have liked it better if the blade had been encased between transparent filament wings so that she was pretty when the blade wasnt whirring and creating her lightbased fluttering wingsthe outfit she is wearing is nice as is her hair and styling  note that the legs and arms do not bend so she is a standingflying doll only  but in my opinion something original and different and well worth the price for a little girl who loves fairies

skinny pink space babe probably isnt the most popular character in the hasbro toy line however if youre a fan of the cantina scene leesub sirln was there so you have to get her and fortunately hasbro did a great job leesub comes loaded with articulation but hasbro managed to hide it surprisingly well given that most of the joints are showing on her bright pink skin i also really like that she comes with a glass which is great for cantina dioramasdefinitely recommended for fans of the star wars cantina

dengar has always been my favorite of the star wars bounty hunters while boba fetts slave i has been made dozens of times and even bossk and ig had micromachine versions of their ships but not dengar as such i was very happy to see that punishing one was included in the titanium series its a pretty good replica but sadly its not perfect the cockpit is a matte black but really should be glossy because its a window moreover something about the ship just doesnt look realistic still its great to finally have it

ive always loved this version of kiadi mundi i love how its a whole new take on a jedi rather than the drab brown robes they always wear ive always thought he looked more at home in the force unleashed game the figure is well done although given that hes supposed to be a battle veteran he could have used a bit more dirt and weathering definitely a must for your collection

i dont ever remember hrcheck kal fas being particularly creepy in the actual cantina scene yet hasbros rendition of him makes him look pretty scary for that alone i cant say the figure really captures the likeness of this guy still its a great figure very detailed a good amount of articulation and a versatile pose my only complaint is that the jacket doesnt come off  its essentially fixed to the body itd definitely be worth picking up one or two of these guys for your cantina diorama
the blocks are easy for toddlers to put together and take apart and the theme blocks make it perfect for imaginative play  all in all this is a great set and so are the others in the series
this is a simple cute and durable building toy  it isnt hard for little ones to use and sparks their imagination with its castle themed accessories  i definitely recommend this

the palm beach series coral bathing suit and this one breeze were a very welcome addition to the more classic and traditional bfmc collection  instead of evening dresses or career dolls we get a great look and feel of palm beach florida in the sbreeze is wearing a soft flowing almost seethrough crepesilk like caftan  underneath she has light blue silk undergarements  the arabesque neckline is decorated with beads and she wears matching earrings of blue beadswhat i really love about breeze is that she is so different from nearly every other bfmc collector doll  her clothes arent form fitting or even form enhancing  instead they are light and airy and swirl around her beautifully  her hair is thick and lush but admittedly has to be occasionally tamed because there is so much of it  she wears matching blue high heelsbecause this doll is so unusual she really does stand out from the other more glam barbies  i think she is quick lovelier in person than the picture shows and was very pleased when i bought her  i immediately took her out of the box and she looks just as good on displaypalm beach breeze is from the high end collector bfmc series  she is a silkstone  made of a vinyl plastic that is similar in weight and texture to porcelain  since she is in the bfmc series her clothing and accessories are of the highest quality  most bfmc dolls also have vintage faces

the costars of the barbie movies never seem to get much care  they arent given the characters names or likenesses not even close and the quality usually falls greatly off from the main character  honestly they feel kind of pointless theres not a lot of play value if the dolls dont look like the ones who talk to merliah in the movie and certainly their quality doesnt compare to merliahthis doll has a hard plastic hollow body that feels cheap and doesnt bend  the tail rotates on the base and the body bends forward  but the body has a bathing suit that doesnt match the tail and looks kind of dumb when the doll is sitting the arms and chest are also stiff plastic that just feels cheap  the face is very generic barbie dollthe doll is inexpensive and thats really the only redeeming feature  but for twice the price i really recommend the mattel barbie splash and style meraids  they have rubber bodies and tails that twist and bend httpwwwamazoncombarbiesplashstylemermaidangeldpbetfurefsr  ieutfstoysandgamesqidsr  since the co stars are generic and not tied into the movie anyway might as well get a mermaid that feels and looks goodin all i dont recommend getting this because of the dvd  it doesnt appear in the movie and doesnt look like the costars  its fine as a generic inexpensive fairy doll

this is one of  destinies from the movie a mermaid tale  of the three this wasnt the head destiny and was more of a supporting character  if you are trying to decide on which destiny to buy i would recommend the pink one in the jeans over the purple and blue ones  the pink destiny most resembles the movie character and had the most lines in the movie  the blue and purple ones did not do much at all in the movie  or as a dollthese are smaller than a barbie doll even though the destinies were full barbie size in the movie and made of hard plastic  they dont move at all and arent posable the sea horses come with a little stand on their back and the destiny doll clips into it loosely  which can be problematic  they arent very useful out of the water since they dont stand at all and certainly they dont float right in the watersince this purple destiny doesnt resemble the character in the movie isnt posable doesnt sit right falls out of the saddle easily and doesnt allow for you to change her clothes i dont rate this highly if your daughter really wants the destinies i would get the pink one only and be done with it

ok our boat did not come with the babe the boogie board or the cocktails but hey we only paid ninety cents for this sea vessel at a thrift shop jumping up and down here swing is cumbersome so we just ignore that whole deal cute graphics on side of boat boat is sturdy our boat does not sink it was fine in the water until a kraken in the form of a small child capsized it our playmobil boat capsized too and that boat is seamless with a higher prow i think that all toy boats in the bathtub will eventually capsize due to rugrats creating tsunamis whirlpools and rogue waves i also noticed that if the dolls sit properly in the boat ie looking straight ahead with hands in lap the boat does not capsize as easily one of our polly dolls was gettin spring breaky and sitting up a bit too high with proper placement tragedy was averted for about six minutes strange but true sweet little boat that will not sink your spirits or your wallet even at retail price

so he went byebye ok ok seriously do not purchase just ran around on the floor made some noise and was blah wheels can get tangled in hair always forgot what the closetothebuttback button was supposed to do cute but i can always watch gizmo in gremlins to get my monthly dose of physical cuteness combined with vocal chirps and halfenglish charming utterings just writin about this zhu zhu is making me want to zhuzhuzzzzzzzzzzzzzzupdate  hope this helpsnugget is now a nugget at the landfill yes he died several days ago he refused to locomote even with a battery transplant alas what a short lifetime he had in which he seldom met my daughter may he rest in peace

while boba fetts slave i has been made dozens of times and even bossk and ig had micromachine versions of their ships but not lom and zuckuss as such i was very happy to see that mist hunter was included in the latest wave of the titanium series its a nice replica the colors are very vibrant i am glad hasbro didnt decide to put cheesy little figures in the cockpit of the ship  it would have ruined the effect however it would have been even better if the cockpit was glued closed to make it seamless otherwise this is one of the best eu ships in the series

its about time we got an accurate version of dash rendars outrider hasbros earlier version barely resembled the ship this version isnt bad but i just wish hasbro had dedicated a bit more effort to the paint job the top portion is weathered and dirty while the bottom is clean which looks jarring when viewed from the side moreover the light from the engine looks painted on and not natural at all its too bad because the rest of the ship is beautiful

i love the idea behind this its so seldom that we see anything regarding ralph mcquarries concept art for the original star wars these figures are a great representation of what might have been the differences between the concepts and the finals are mindblowing leia was more like han solo with a smugglers outfit and blaster the stormtroopers had lightsabers as figures theyre also fun they all have incredible detail i particularly like the snowtroopers dirty look the only drawback is that the stormtrooper figure does not come with the shield pictured on the box thats too bad but frankly for the price of this set i really dont mind  its a great deal

i love the idea behind this its so seldom that we see anything regarding ralph mcquarries concept art for the original star wars these figures are a great representation of what might have been the differences between the concepts and the finals are mindblowing ben kenobi looked more like a traditional samurai boba fett was pure white han solo had a lightsaber as figures theyre also fun they all have incredible detail i particularly like the snowtroopers dirty look the only drawback is that the boba fett figure does not come with the alternative helmet thats too bad but frankly for the price of this set i really dont mind  its a great deal

had a funny undertaste re rosemarys baby the chocolate mousse scenesorta like too much emulsifier andor chemical preservatives allergen info contains wheat milk egg soy trace amounts of peanuts tree nuts and sulfites ingredients of the kid version are comparable to duncan hines chewy fudge brownie mix look for diy easy bake oven recipes on web

this truck is fun and the blocks stack easily  it is also good for pretend play since it comes with a fireman figure  my only complaint and the only reason for not giving this  stars is that the lid doesnt latch so you really cant keep kids out of it unless you actually put it up  other than that it is a great toy that i recommend

the color  detail are firstrate it has ravens coat waving in the air more or less she only has half her legs because the rest maybe in the titan tower overalldespite it flawsits still a pretty hot bust to havelook at i give this bust a  out of

raised its head barked a bit and wagged tail thats the whole show in fifteen seconds does not interact as the other furreal friends do plus side can take a beating and does not pee on the carpet if you have to have one check out thrift stores after xmas they are swarming with these things hint hint

i love the idea behind this its so seldom that we see anything regarding ralph mcquarries concept art for the original star wars these figures are a great representation of what might have been ig is a pretty minor figure to even have a concept art figure nonetheless of all the concept art figures thus far he differs most from the final version this ig is fat instead of thin he isnt very exciting and i like the final version a lot better the figure itself is very detailed and highly articulable however he isnt really playable so i recommend this one only for collectors

i love these little aliens the utai figure has a great stance for the character his legs arent exactly straight and he has an almost bulllegged stance the detail is pretty good especially for the eyes definitely one of the cooler aliens from the prequels

the only good thing about this version of jabba is that it was the first to feature soft leathery skin otherwise its pretty much useless this jabba was a victim of hasbros occasional belief that all large toys need to shoot something this jabba shoots a fish head from his mouth it looks ridiculous and if you dont put the head in his mouth it looks cheap there is a new version of jabba out that is not only more realistic but comes with a full dais oola and salacious crumbstar wars  clone wars exclusive deluxe figure battle pack jabbas throne with oola

this toy combines the fun of a shape sorter and a popup toy into one great baby toy  it is also adorable  you put the shapes in their places press down on them and you get popup action along with spinning action  this is a toy i definitely recommend

id always thought plo koon was one of the more boring members of the jedi council this figure redeems him in part first he has a removable mask which is a cool feature it stays on pretty well while hes standing although i dont know if it would stay on quite so well for kids who intend to play with him second the armstrap lightsaber with two shoto blades looks awesome its from a concept design drawing of plo koon and im glad its finally available there havent been any more plo koon figure since and in my opinion we dont need any

this isnt going to be the best figure in your collection but it is a needed update of the cloud city guard this ones certainly better thansergeant edianbecause utris mtoc is a bluish alien who was actually slated to appear in empire strikes back but his scene was cut at the last minute as such hes got some cool historical valuethis figures uniform is a beautiful royal blue he has a lot of articulation but unfortunately the shoulder joints are a bit too conspicuous even with the dark blue of the uniform which is a shame other figures released around the same time including the infamousstar wars  legacy collection buildadroid action figure willrow hood dont suffer from this problem hell go great with the newcloud carvehicle

once again sideshow delivers a wonderful iconic star wars character the sandtroopers armor is intricate in its detail and the number of accessories i was very impressed that the packpack comes with string straps that you can tighten on the troopers back what really amazes me is the weathering on the armor it looks very realistic the armor itself is shiny as it should be but the weathering does dull it down  a great contrast  definitely a great addition for sideshow fans

these postcard pets are a bit different than the regular lps figures  they come with fancy designs swirls flowers etc drawn onto their bodies  this makes them look a bit fancier and more upscale than the regular lps characters  these come with all the quality of the regular lps but that little extra detailing that little girls love for originality in their toys  my  year old plays with these first out of all her pet shops

good lord are rainbow dash toys hard to find in stores this bath toy is literally the only one ive seen in stores for the last couple of months and since shes my daughters favorite of the ponies we had to buy it right away at first i thought this was going to be like the wow wow wubbzy bath toy that came out a few years ago where you put a little shampoo on it while in the bath then squeeze it and tons of bubbles come out that kind of happens with rainbow dash here but this is basically just a big bath toy to play with and it even comes with its own rubber duckyrainbow dash has a soft meshy body and a semisoft plastic head she has a removable diaper and towel too in addition to the rubber ducky everything is wellmade and the paint isnt showing any signs of coming off after  months of regular bath use this is a very durable toy and theres nothing to watch out for the duck floats like it should and rainbow dash can kind of float around too though its all because of her head when youre all done with her simply hang her up by the little loop on her head and after a little while shell be dry to play with outside of the bath tub theres not much else to say about this toy its a cute my little pony to have in the bath and most kids love bath toys my daughter always plays with rainbow dash though the diaper and towel were quickly thrown aside if theres anything negative to say its that i wish they would start making toys that are in the style of the new my little pony show instead of going with a more babyish look after all thats what ignited the return of the ponies recentlybe careful if you order her online doing a simple search for rainbow dash toys on here will show you just how much prices on her are jacked up compared to the other ponies this one seems to be the only reasonably priced rainbow dash toy at the moment but she should be in stores if youre fast and know what day new shipments come in this bath time rainbow dash would make a great addition to any my little pony fans toy box or bath tub

this set is over ten dollars more at the local crafts store that carries thomas toys  although that store tends to be a little higher all of the local stores have a much higher price on this set  if you can find it  the wooden sets are all crazy expensive so you really should think ahead which of the thomas sets youd like to purchase and expand on  options wooden set expensive high quality attractive durable and nonmotorized trackmaster less expensive motorized plastic take and play smaller doesnt fit on wooden track die cast and plastic a little less expensive than wooden the sets are portable but not extensive good for younger children megablocks can be costly needs construction has flexibility for older children very small sections are in each set most have a short length of trackso if you choose wooden you already know that when you buy a set like this you may be disappointed once its all unpacked at just how little there is  but thats typical with wooden sets and the amazon price is better keep in mind the resale value is good  this set comes with a bridge railroad crossing some track sir topham hatt and thomasthe railroad crossing is the complex piece it has gates that open and close to stop the trains or the cars and a little red button that you can press to make railroad gate sounds  i couldnt find this mentioned anywhere in the amazon description and its a nice feature  the interactivity on this piece is great as other sets just have pieces that sit there and look nicei was a little disappointed with the bridge  we have the wooden coal set and it has a nice bridge with tunnel that connects easily  this one has two risers and then a wooden piece that settles on the top of them on two pegs  what this means is that when he plays with it my  year old sometimes knocks the top piece offthis is from an episode he really likes splish splash splosh  what child doesnt connect with splashing in puddles  the amazon information doesnt mention it but thomas gets in big trouble when he zooms under a bridge and muddy water splashes high into the air and all over topham hatt and alicia botti  my son has fun reenacting this getting sir topham hatt cross

i dont love the new logging locos from misty island rescue much theyre a bit obnoxious but my  year old does so i thought id expand his set with ferdinand  hes one of the three new engines introduced in the movie and the most boringall he ever says is thats rightbut this isnt a gift for me of course and my  year old is having a great time with him  interestingly though he doesnt act out anything that happens to ferdinand like he does with other engines  for example with diesel he acts out the unfinished bridge nearcrash complete with flatbeds falling into the sea below  but thats probably because there isnt much for him to act out  ferdinand doesnt have a spotlight event that occurs in the movie nor in the newer television episodes his activity in the thomas tv series got better over timeit doesnt matter though ferdinand is getting lots of play time with his other older enginesfor those looking to get one of the main more well known engines from thomas and friends look forthomas every kid i know has  or  since thomas comes with so many setspercyedwardhenrygordonjamesemilytoby

gordon is a little full of himself hes a big strong engine who pulls the express  express coming through he says  when asked to pull freight cars gordon says oh the indignity  therefore hes a very fun addition to a thomas collectionmy son already had about  engines including talking james  he enjoys talking james more because of his cute sayings fizzling fireboxes and the lightup lantern at the front  therefore he was so excited to get talking gordon that hes played with him nonstop  he took gordon to meet the other engines and there has been constant button pressing  thankfully the sound level is lower which means it never annoys usgordon is a big engine with  wheels  to account for this the front six wheels are on a separate rotating piece so that gordon doesnt go off the trackswhen the button on the cab is pressed there are four sounds gordons whistle and gordon saying hello im gordon fastest and best i pull the express clickety clack express on the track  gordons personality comes right through with his petulat voicetalking james had his batteries wear out but we ordered very inexpensive ag button cell batteries from amazon fifty for five dollars  so we have replacements if gordon ever needs themnote that the talking engines like talking thomas talking percy talking james and talking gordon all have buttons that you press to make them talk  dont confuse this with the talking railway series which has wooden engines that dont talk but trigger talking railway features like cranky and the station to talk in sir topham hatts voicemy  year old loves his talking engines and i highly recommend them

just for the record this set can be combined any other preschool mega bloks sets iethey are on the same scale the choking hazard warning is printed clearly on the box nuff said there brobee still has his arms after a year so you know that this stuff is tough my daughter and i have fun with this seteven though it is small we do not feel challenged to come up with a scenario while playing with it the enjoyment just flows sorry bout the corny title best i can do with a headache at  pm

this is the perfect set for the age group  the controller is simple to operate and this whole set seems to be able to stand up to typical toddler play very well  i had no problem with my controller or the trains ability to pull all the cars like other reviewers had  my train pulls all the cars just fine even on the incline  my kids love this

my daughter always loves the bad guys in games movies and books so her liking bowser jr wasnt a surprise when she spotted him at the store yesterday she literally froze in place her jaw dropped then she ran over and gave him a big hug i was really surprised at how welldesigned he is and how close to the game model he looks this is a very good plush but theres a tiny problem that keeps it from getting  stars in my eyesfirst yes bowser jr looks just like he does in the stock picture he has the black bracelets little stubs for horns mean mouth bandana and lots of spikes on his shell this is as good as youre going to get as far as bowser jr plushes goat least at this price though i did get him for a lot cheaper the colors are bold but not too bold and it looks perfect to how he appears in the games his eyes are sewn on rather than having plastic ones and hes as cuddly as a little spiked turtle can getthe tiny problem i mentioned has to do with minor details on the spikes on his shell the fabric that goes around the base of each spike was done pretty sloppily though that has more to do with quality control than anything and you could probably find a perfect one easily id also be careful with the bandana if you or your child wants to put it over bowsers face it doesnt work but this little dude still rocksyou might want to shop around and make sure you arent paying too much for bowser jr before buying especially since hes just a little under  tall but for fans of the character this is one of the best things you can get them

when these charms were hot for about thirty seconds in the fall  of  my daughter did not covet them although i did come to find out jakks stopped making them and that made my heart burn for them even more i found out that walgreens carries the last of the this species hopefully you are lucky enough to score em i could not find them in asheville so i got my mom to hunt them down in burlington county nj she found different sets in several different walgreens in her neck of the woods they are for age  we do own the above setthe lucky deal extremely cute my younger daughters set included a burro pinata which actually opens to reveal a small piece of removable candy bracelet does not slip off my sevenyearolds incredibly small wristthe unlucky deal bracelet is a glorified hair rubberband little metal ring that is attached to the bracelet in order to clip the charms onto it via lobster claw clips seems slightly weaknote will update this info in the future if metal ring quickly becomes kaput

who doesnt love viewmasters i had one as a kid the classic red color and fondly remember seeing pictures of weird animals beautiful locations and pictures from shows like sesame street in the little picture reels that would come with it for those whove never had one a viewmaster is a little plastic object that looks like binoculars and theres a switch on the side you look into the viewmasters eye holes after you put a paper circle with little images on it along the radius and press the switch to go through them think of it as a minislideshowthis one here is the where the wild things are version its a viewmaster and includes the entire book on three picture reels yep the entire book is here page by page its really cool to see it like this even if a big selling point on the actual book was getting to enjoy the illustrations on the full sized pages the picture reels come in a little hardcover book of where the wild things are but its not the full book just a few pages showing the wild things and their names and the last page has a slot that holds the reels the names of the wild things are taken from the movie not the original names given by maurice sendak that were based on his aunts and uncles like the mcfarlane figures usedtheres not a whole lot more to say about this the viewmaster is the standard quality youd expect and its fairly durable the picture reels require some care though but thats pretty obvious kids ages  and up will have no problems using this my daughters  and thinks its the coolest thing to see where the wild things are like this hearing her go dad the sea monster and seeing her big smile while holding the viewmaster over her eyes was priceless ill definitely be buying a few more picture reels cant believe i forgot about these things until now

ive never been a huge fan of the use of cloth on figures it never stays exactly where you want it and often puffs out still this is a much better and more detailed version of zuckuss he looks much more dyanmic i love the insectoid belly on the front this is the version to get for your bounty hunter collection

registeel was the first pokemon figure my daughter wanted from this line a few months ago given the original retail price and how good it looked it looked like a steal sure enough once she opened it the figure was great and she was super happy like ive said with the other regi figures these figures are worth it as long as you dont overpaythis figure has ball jointed arms so you can move them in circles which is very cool since the other two can only move theirs up and down you can move his legs a little too registeel doesnt need a stand hell be fine on his own they did a good job wit the paint on this one too though its still the slightly cheap paint thatll wear off fast but the quality of work that they put into painting it would please any collector who wants their figures to look as good as possible out of the boxmy only gripe is that they didnt articulate his innerbody the dark grey part that has his eyes on it moves up in the animated series and it wouldve been nice if they had done that too but registeel will please any fan of the characterso what are you waiting for go out there and get these guys they look great on the shelf and are a blast to play with

for the last  years or so nearly every pokemon figure thats come out has been pretty cheap paint jobs were poorly done limbs would fall off and sometimes the figure wouldnt really look like the pokemon its supposed to be thats still going on but it looks like this line of figures is trying to change thatregirock is a great little figure the sculpt is deadon the paint is clean and he has articulation at the arms and legs and the limbs dont fall off if you or your child loves pokemon and especially the regis this is a must i know its just a small figure but i couldnt believe how much better this guy is in the quality department compared to some figures that came out just a year ago the only problem the paint used for these figures tends to wear out fast after just a few uses as a bath toy some of the orange paint on regirocks shoulders is fading away but at five bucks you might as well get another for back up just in case hes that coolthis lines really impressed me so far with the quality and price hopefully we can get a few other overlooked pokemon soon

along with the great regi brothers series  brings us some eevee evolutions and like the regis all of them are worth picking up as usual im reviewing these figures based on the standard retail price which they should still be available at since these are all pretty new figuresjolteon looks just like he should lean pokey and ready to whoop some pokemon hes got that look on his face like he just found out his favorite show moved to a later time slot and hes ready to bring the pain jolteons legs are all moveable and none of them pop off like some of the earlier pokemon figures or those found in the plastic tube sets of  the points on his body arent sharp so your kids can play with this without potentially getting cut and like the other figures in the line jolteons a good size for what youre payingi dont have any complaints about this one weve had the figure for a few months and his paint hasnt rubbed off like regirocks didfor a fiver all of these pokemon toys are well worth the price and i wish i had gotten back into pokemon sooner to get the earlier releases my daughter absolutely loves each and every one and in the chance that one gets lost buying another isnt a blow to the wallet im glad theyre doing single releases for cheap instead of forcing you to buy a  or  figure set where you could end up buying it for just one cool pokemon

glaceons probably going to be the smallest figure of this line given the slim design it has going on but that doesnt take away from the figure one bit just like every other figure in this line its a great toy for your dollar and you wont find a better figure of glaceon in this sizeglaceon looks as she should with the flat tail and long strands of hair on the sides of her head shes also got a bit of a smirk makes you wonder what shes smiling about maybe a counter to stealth rock her legs and head are articulated and nothing falls off like all the others this is a sturdy figure unlike those made just a few years ago glaceon also has some good paint and ours has yet to have any spots rub off theres really nothing bad to say here this is another home runat the standard retail price these figures are a steal instead of buying sets just to get one you want you can just get the one pokemon you want on its own dont pass any of these up while theyre still available

its about time we get some good figures based on eevee and its evolutions i dont know why it took over  years but here we go like the regi figures i reviewed my rating is for the figure if you can get it at the standard price my daughter and i both love pokemon and some of her favorites include the eeveelutions as some call them flareon here was a sure thing to buy and once more im impressed by the quality put into this lil guyflareon has articulation in the head legs and tail the tail is really huge but doesnt make him fall over while standing this is the one piece youll have to watch out for as its held into the body by a small peg and could fall off i havent had that problem but it could happen the paint on this figure is excellent as is the sculpt i love how they gave it a more firey look instead of the poofy look of the original flareon design for some reason the paint on this figure seems to be a bit better than that on the regi brothers and none of it has faded or rubbed off yetwhile none of these figures do anything theyre great for kids with imaginations that like to make their own battles and play them out i highly recommend flareon to any pokemon fan or if you just want a neat colorful toy on your shelf

after my daughter got registeel and regirock i got anxious looking for regice my favorite of the regi group once i bought this bad dude i can easily say that hes probably the coolest of the  and keep in mind that my rating is for if you pay the regular price for him and not some inflated vendor price tooregice looks great he has pillars of ice sticking out of his back you can move his arms and feet and he looks exactly as he does in the game my first concern was how he was going to stand up since his feet arent like his brothers luckily he comes with a clear stand that lets him well stand youll need it too because hell end up falling over without it they did a good job with the paint as well though like regirock its kind of cheap and will wear off over time quicklyif you or your child is a fan of regice or just want a good pokemon figure look no further this line has impressed me a lot so far and i look forward to the next wave bring on torkoal and miltank

of all the pillow pets out there which one did my daughter want the pterodactyl not the ladybug not the puppy not the moose not even the panda no she wanted the pterodactyl it being her favorite dinosaur she was thrilled when we walked by a little booth that sold pillow pets and saw a pterodactyl one it looks like this guy is selling out at most stores and sites quickly so we had to hurry and get one before the price skyrocketed like some of the others by now most of you should be familiar with pillow pets big soft stuffed animals that can be used as pillows they feature a little strap on the side that has a velcro closure so you can bundle it up a little there are tons of different animals to choose from including some kinda obscure ones like what you see herethe pterodactyl looks great exactly as it does in the stock picture hes pretty big and just as cuddly as the other pillow pets the eyes are hard plastic probably the only thing here that could pose a threat to a small child and the teeth feel like a hard felt as to keep their shape the pterodactyl itself is made of super soft chenille but i wouldnt go by the machine washable instructions shown in the commercial for these the tag clearly says surface washable and i can see one of these falling apart after a couple of trips to the washing machine its also worth mentioning that because of the material if its used as a pillow the user will probably get hot while sleeping other reviewers for other pillow pets have mentioned waking up with a soaked pillow pet so maybe its better off a something to cuddle with still kids have a blast playing with these and dont be too surprised if they start having little pillow pet parties theres really nothing bad i can say about this guy aside from the inflated prices some people are listing it at the clerk at the pillow pet shop i got this from mentioned that the pterodactyl is a limited edition one so that could be the reasonthe fact that they made a pterodactyl pillow pet is rad in itself and the fact that its cutely ferocious is an added bonus if your kids like dinosaurs and want a pillow pet you cant do much better than this or the triceratops one i just might get one for myself because its so soft and puts all other pillows to shame

for the last couple of months my daughters been obsessed with dogs it didnt help when she noticed that we had nintendogs for ds and started playing the heck out of that midlast year she ended up getting all the mini plush nintendogs over time and this bark back chihuahua is kind of the big one of those its a simple stuffed dog with a few features that dont justify the inflated prices its now going for but since i got it for retail cost im reviewing it at that pricethe chihuahua is a pretty good size bigger than most real ones and probably weighs about the same it can stand on its own and is stuffed well aside from the tail which probably couldnt be the nose and eyes are plastic and look good and they went and added some fur in the ears to make it a little more realistic it also has a pink collar with the nintendogs paw print logo on the license when you squeeze its left ear the dog barks whines growls howls and then shakes its tail over the course of a few seconds thats all it really does but at the price point i wasnt expecting it to walk around or interact with other stuffed animals or anything but its good for what it is and my daughter was so excited when she opened the box he was in on jesusmas and she carried it around for most of the daythe only thing youll want to watch out for is getting the electronics wet if the dog gets dirty and you wipe it down with a damp cloth the stomach opens and closes with velcro and the tail contains wires of some kind that cause the tail to wag so just be careful with that and make sure it doesnt get wet at all and make sure the cloth isnt too damp so that the water goes down into the battery box areathis is a great toy and while it may not do a whole lot its sure to make any kid who loves dogs happy

im glad i got this figure this is a very odd and somewhat unstar wars like design for a snowtrooper the figure itself is well done with a great softgoods skirt i only wish the blaster were a bit more substantial  its more a pistol than the usual stormtrooper blaster rifle

so why is this one of the coolest star wars figures ever im not crazy i think this figure represent so much of what is so wonderful about the star wars collecting universe first the star wars universe is so big that even a character who was seen on screen for a fraction of a second has fans and his own backstory its a pretty compelling one at that second hasbro cares enough about star wars fans to make a figure of such a marginal character finally  and this is the best part  willrow hood is the result of one fan in particular lobbying hasbro to make the figure thats a pretty heartwarming story and i cant think of many other products that generate such loyalty on both sides the willrow hood figure himself is very well sculpted has lots of articulation and of course his infamous ice cream machine if youre a star wars collector dont pass this figure up

do not buy these because they are a junk and a huge rip off  they dont stick to themselves or anything else  you cant make anything because it falls apart instantly  skip these and get wicky sticks which are the exact thing but which actually work and are fun
this comes with  balls they really are pretty its great for put and take games and for imaginative play

these are great and come in many unique shapes  im used to the plain round pop beads so these were interesting to me  the only reason i took off a star is that not all the beads can go with all the others so kids have to do some trial and error work to make their jewelry sometimes  this is because not all the beads have the male end that snaps in  some only have two female parts so have to go between two beads with the male end to work

this was bought and put on one of the top model barbies  the dress is what id call scanalously short  if she was a stewardess and bent to pick up a dropped item thered be a show for the passengers  im actually surprised at how short the dress is considering this is a career itemthe plastic boots are big and kind of clunky  makes her feet look as big as her head  that hat only stays on with elastic that goes under the chin and kind of detracts from the look  the cleavage is also surprisingly low for a career type of doll  the dress material is typical barbie  cheap and kind of thin  the luggage has molded wheels but they dont roll  meant more for looksso yeah its not really a stewardess outfit unless its risque airlines  i would have liked to see a smarter looking outfit that actually looked professional and attractive  they have the right idea with the design  just some of the actual presentation is lacking  this is called career clothing  but i dont think the career that this is suitable for is the one they intended perhaps the red light district

today was my daughters th birthday party she got a ton of great presents and seemed to enjoy every single thing she got from monster high dolls to disney infinity figures from teenage mutant ninja turtles toys to freakin gigan here seriously this is the toy that got the biggest smile from her and all the other kids who came over after she was done oohing and ahhing at gigan he quickly went to the other kids who all did the same thing and id be lying if i said i didnt gasp when i saw this toy for the first time too of all the  inch godzilla figures i think gigan may be the best one even better than the incredible mechagodzillaif you havent seen this toy in person yet theres only so much a written review can get through to you how this thing originally sold for a mere twenty bucks is beyond me the amount of detail here is insane from the ridges all over his body to the plates on his tail gigan is a sight to behold its hard to go back to the previous version after one glance at this one im sure godzilla super fans can find faults in the sculpt and say that some things are off but for a toy in this scale and at this price point its practically perfectarticulation is limited just like the others from this series you can move his arms up and down rotate the blades and move his legs a little bit too theres a tiny bit of articulation at the neck as well but its hardly worth mentioning given that these are all vinyl collectibles its no big deal gigan isnt going to be doing any gymnastics or anything i will mention that this toy shouldnt be played with by anyone under  years old because of how pokey it is all those spikes on gigans tail and the blades on his arms especially are kinda dangerous they arent sharp but if a kid holding this thing turned around real suddenly as another kid was behind them theres an accident just waiting to happen just be careful when handling this guy and everything will be ok just imagine if kevin from home alone had one of these when the burglars were breaking ini messed up and didnt buy him at the store when he first released so i had to go the online auction route i only spent a bit more than what he originally cost but the demand is still definitely there another run could always be released within the year especially now that a new godzilla movie is coming out either way hurry up and get one before prices sky rocket gigan makes for a great centerpiece of any toy collection

themed  pack as well as a pull n zoom thomas  as we said  lots of choicesthree years ago we were first time grandparents and grandpa i wanted to start some type of collection for our grandson that he  after doing some research it seemed the takenplay line might be the perfect investment to engage and encourage his active imagination as well as provide a fun way for us to interact with him  its talking a lot about a certain train named thomas a little fella whom  now seems hard to believe  wed never heard of  after doing some research it seemed the takenplay line might be the perfect investment to engage and encourage his active imagination as well as provide a fun way for us to interact with him  what a rewarding decision weve had so much fun together with this quality line of trains vehicles and playsets  hes now  and a large portion of our basement has become a wonderful sodor land of make believe that we all enjoy visiting  and continues to hold his interest which is quite a feat given the tendency at that age to move in and out of toy phases so quickly

tidmouth sheds is north of knapford station and the place most of the main steam team engines call home  the tnp version is bright yellow and green with red trim above the  five green doors along with a large sign reading tidmouth  little windows on each side where you can peer in and check on thomas included as he sleeps and a rotating red turntable in front that he chugs onto and can be turned to provide him access to the large grey oval track  the track has two different places where the set can be hooked up to other playsets or additional track  but oh my  decisions decisions  with only five berths and eight members of the steam team thomas edward henry gordon james percy toby  emily what was our grandson to do  he solved his dilemma by deciding the engines with tenders all but thomas percy  toby would live at tidmouth sheds although with the tender engines the berths arent quite long enough for the doors to completely close unless the back of the sheds  which folds down and provides easy access to the trains  is left open  he then connected his thomas at the farm playset to it where thomas sleeps inside farmer mccolls barn which is connected to his toby at trotters farm playset where toby sleeps inside of farmer trotters barn which is connected to his percys mail delivery playset where percy sleeps inside the maithwaite building  problem solved  tidmouth sheds was on fisherprices original spring  collector checklist and we paid  for our grandsons  update  fisherprices summer  msrp is update  there are  playsets in the tnp line as of summer  that fall into what ive come to categorize as an intermediate range of between  and they are in order of introduction  cranky at the docks tidmouth sheds knapford station knapford holiday celebration sodor steamworks repair shed sodor search  rescue center twist  tumble cargo drop thomas treasure hunt adventure thomas shark exhibit paxton at the blue mountain stone shed and arctic exhibit  the great thing about these sets and those i categorize as basic with under  msrps is that he can very quickly and easily disconnect and fold up the basic sets and even the intermediate sets relatively so and take them with us this was sent to our  year old by his uncle via amazon  there are different thomas sets for different levels of little engineers  we have a mega blocks set too advanced for him but daddy set it up wooden sets he loves pushing trains around his wooden tracks for hours but is challenged when the tracks come unhooked track master sets a little advanced for him but ok with our help and take and play setsthe goodthe take and play sets are just right for him and absolutely wonderful because they are transportable  the set is easy to open up to a big circular track and then collapse back down to carry  he has molly and chocolate percy and they can all store inside the sheds and he enjoys pulling them in and out of the shed doorstidmouth sheds are an exciting and well known feature of sodor so any child who watches thomas would be thrilled to have this setthe okits likely his age and because he likes to run the trains fast but the turn is tight at the turntable and he derails it there a lot  weve taught him to go slowly around the turntable  it has bumps on it too probably to prevent the train from sliding down but he likes that feature bumpy track  dont crash thomasthe badreally dont have any disappointments to report its very durable and great for packing up some engines to take the set and play when visiting friends etc  he also has the take and play quarry set and they hook right up together  its a nice combination with the tidmouth sheds since they have such different interaction aspects

the outside of this toteatrain equipped with a handle and very sturdy has thomas big happy face upon opening it up there are  different compartments for train storage  enough for the entire steam team thomas edward henry gordon james percy toby emily plus one  but also included is a circular track with a stop signal arm  the area inside the track depicts various elements of places and activities on the island of sodor  while it can connect up to other playsets at two points my grandsons toteatrain usually sits on a shelf with his thomas books  dvds closed up with thomas happy smile showing but anytime we go someplace where he wants to introduce someone to the whole steam team this is the playset he takes  the toteatrain first appeared on tnps original spring  collector checklist and we paid  for our grandsons  update  fisherprices summer  msrp is update  there are  playsets in the tnp line as of summer  that have msrps of under   they are in order of introduction  this original version
