i cant lie about the fact that mom and dad had as much fun as the kids with this toy when it was opened  it is a lot of fun to have the cars spinning around and shooting out at the bottom  it kind of reminds me of those charity things where you drop in a coin and it spirals around and down  this is a great toy that i recommend to anyone with toddlers  i bought  extra cars to go with it but you dont need to for it to be a fun toy  it does come with  already

it makes no sense why an educational toy map wouldnt include state capitols  i also dont get why the stars on each state dont match where the capitol is like on any other map  this does teach things and has games where you are instructed to find different objects but i wouldnt have bought this if i had realized what was left out  the capitol of a state is the most important info about it  i remember being tested on that in school  i was not tested on any of the things this map teaches
its only attack hypnoblast does  points of damage to the defending pokemon and it puts them asleep i give this card a  out of

great first puppet for young ones young and old alike find this puppet irresistible and easy to use you can place your hand in the crows wing it fits just like a glove no pun intended to add even more expressive body language to your puppet schtick and get this this crows short feathers actually are touched with purple on a majority of his body very cuddly yet durable he is surface washable with cold water air dry his guts are plastic pellets so if you have an extra curious toddler in your household who has viewed past episodes of macgyver just be aware of this fact the price is great we paid somewhat more for him six years ago has won an award from parents choice awards simple design paired with effective detailing makes an amateur puppeteer such as myself crow across the living room

we got this for our  year old for christmas and sadly woodys pull string that drives the running action never worked  we pulled the string and it just stayed pulled out  we tried everything and it just didnt workour son does like toy story very much and plays with woody and rex but it would have been nice if woody had worked so that he could have more playaction  he likes to use the pose able features of rex and even has him run along on his tail so i like it a lot more than the figures that dont have any moving parts  but it really isnt worth the hassle to return and so well keep them as action figures

holy tamole  unless youre a collector whos going to keep a percy  mavis buddy pack intact and unwrapped to have it for the sake of having it along with the four other buddy packs  annie  clarabel toby  flora bill  ben thomas  rosie do yourself a favor and just purchase percy  mavis separately fisherprices summer  msrp for their small engines and vehicles is still just  a piece

the action fleet tie defender this little ship is perhaps the most infamous and rarest in the action fleet line it came out soon after the pc tie fighter game which features the craft unfortunately it was almost impossible to find in stores i finally acquired two for a reasonable price and boy am i glad its a nice looking ship well sculpted you can remove one solar panel and flip another one so it looks like battle damage both features are done well and are integrated seamlessly with the main body of the ship i do wish the wings were slightly bigger as it would probably be better proportioned with the cockpit but other than that this is a great replica of the ship in the game this is a tough one to find so my only advice is that while its expensive you should be able to find one boxed for around a hundred dollars or so if you do find one get it

anyone just beginning a takenplay collection might think theyll get a discount by purchasing this buddy pack of thomas  rosie rather than buying them separately but fisherprices msrp for their small trains as of summer  is still just  a piece so unless you can get a buddy pack for right around  you might want to purchase them separately  then again if youre collecting for the sake of collecting this was one of  buddy packs offered the others were annie  clarabel toby  flora bill  ben and percy  mavis

added to the review  dog broke  weeks after i had it  no longer moves troubleshootingturning offon didnt work  its doai think the right age for this doggie is about  or younger  it walks well indoors and outdoors which is great it also walks very slow so i dont need to worry about kids tripping or following it to dangerous places  but that slow speed means that the older kids get bored easily waiting for the dog to actually get somewhereit looks durable and the controller is easy to use  the dog has some cute barking noises but unlike the other furreal pets this really isnt about interaction with a lap pet so much as being able to walk a dog on their ownin all i am pleased with the dog and my  year old loves it  just watch for uneven pavement grass etc  those trip up the dog and he falls over

very well made sturdy and clothes are easily removable shoes are not removable i love the fact that they are an alternative to kelly dolls who always sport blonde hairthese gals are blessed with all different shades of locks eyes and skin tones i have seen these dolls at claires and mast general stores as well price is good for the quality that you get the coolest thing about them is the fact that they have different personalities punky as you can see girlygirl sporty fun even snoopied out just like our kids anyway i was pleased to discover that they are wonderful all around go for it

nute gunray looks suitably scary in this nicely detailed keychain  he was one of the bad guys in episode  from the trade federation who blockaded nabooamidalas planet  nute comes with a separate headpiece with nice molded but no paint details  the head has an intricately detailed face and the front of his chest comes with more painted details though the back is disappointingly not painted because the arms and legs are movable you can have fun posing him the legs move independently which is nice even the wrists move so you can move around the handsthe really nice thing about the lego keychains is that they actually stay on the ring and dont fall off easily ive had some on my key chain for over a year now with no problemits a great little keychain and a fun toy to boot

interestingly the woody keychain is larger than the standard lego keychains he dwarfs poor woody by being nearly  tallerlargerthe really nice thing about the lego keychains is that they actually stay on the ring and dont fall off easily  ive had some on my key chain for over a year now with no problemwoody is highly detailed  one of the most detailed in the lego keychain line  he comes with a separate hat detailed painted outfit front and back painted including pull string in back but has painted on hair rather than the usual wig piece because the arms and legs are movable you can have fun posing him the legs move independently which is nice  even the wrists move so you can move around the handsits a great little keychain and a fun toy to boot  just strangely larger than the other keychains including atlantisstar warsprince of persia keychains

the really nice thing about the lego keychains is that they actually stay on the ring and dont fall off easythe admiral akbar is quite detailed and includes a fully painted head with bulbous eyeballs and painted suit and gloves front and back  because the arms and legs are movable you can have fun posing him the legs move independently which is nice  even the wrists move so you can move around the handsits a great little keychain and a fun toy to boot

do you remember the first battle cat toy that came out in the early s i sure do it was one of my favorite toys when i was much younger and i still cant believe i found it at a garage sale for just a few cents for young kids battle cat was cool no matter what he had a ferocious look on his face the saddle and helmet were there and he looked great with the other motu toys yep battle cat made all the battles my toys had even better but when you look at that figure now nostalgia aside its kind of sad nothing is articulated and it just plain looks odd for a toy since it looks more like some kind of cheap tiger statue youd find at a cinco de mayo festival gift tent or a flea market battle cat got another chance at plastic immortality when the new heman show debuted and it looked goodbut was still a little lackingbut nowwe have the best version everbattle cat is one of the best figures in the motu classics line and always sells out whenever he comes back instock for a good reason the sculpt and articulation on this guy are top notch and i wish i could be  years old again to get even more joy out of this but i wont lie when i opened the shipping box and took battle cat out of the white collectors box i had a huge smile on my face theres nothing bad i can say about this figure you can move his jaw head neck upper body tail and each of his legs have several points of articulation as well the front two legs can be moved at the shoulder forearm and anklewrist and the back legs can be moved at the upper leg knee ankle and paw all points of articulation on my figure were tight with no problems and you can get the big green dude into some really cool poses aside from the standard prowling pose hes usually seen in both the helmet and saddle are easily removable with the saddle being removed simply by undoing the strap on the bottom the helmet just slips onto battle cats head and stays on without being too tight i was worried about the helmet possibly rubbing off the paint on battle cats face over time but its unlikely to happen with how perfectly it fits heman with his weird legs has no problem sitting in the saddle eitherif youre a longtime motu fan youll love this figure if you have kids that watch the show of course theyll love this heck my daughters only seen one episode of heman but watched most of shera and shes constantly playing with battle cat having him protect her other toys from monsters and demons get this figure directly from mattel if you can he shows up instock every now and then for the original price and sometimes on sale but even if you pay double the original price i feel its worth it battle cat makes an excellent addition to anyones toy collection

the color  detail are firstrate the pose is pretty good in its own right the clothes she wears are skintight and shows a lot of skin too which makes it in all right for every male fan of this marvel babe not to metionthat perfect  body figure which would make any man go yoohoo i give this statue a  out of  psstay tune of my th review

i saw this at kmart and grabbed it as a sweet stocking stuffer horses are  x  velvety and very delicate they have small bases there are no trading cards with this mini horsei think that even a little bio on the random horse you receive would spark the deal up a bit the pack also includes a secret code to enter the world of equines i checked out the website signing up is easy the website is flowery and pastel easy to navigate but alas our code was a dud free horseshoes did not appear after about thirty minutes so i galloped off anyway one can trade shoes there at the shops play games and just explore the land of bella sara in general please note you do not have to have a code to sign up my daughter is not a horse fanatic but she really enjoyed receiving and discovering this little horse minus one overall star due to code problem

so easy and funyou get the gilded shoe a paintbrush a small pink ribbon for the lace if desired and small amounts of blue white red and yellow paint easy to wipe off paint if you make a mistake dries fast so if you mix paint do so in a very small deep disposable vessel need glue for lace  tall  long  wide at opening  both cheery and elegant

first off for what you get this set is very overpriced my mom paid about  bucks for this set at toys r us the included limited editionart decoish dog is cuter than i expected the baby bunnies hold appeal for the late toddlerprek set the accessories are great the ambulance is a joke hasbro could have at least made an actual vehicle for at least a driver not a modified dog sled i feel embarrassed for any pet that has to lug the ambulance around at least the xray function of the ambulance and the flashing lights are cool the swinging basket is terrible it is constantly falling off a strong yawn can knock the swing off so just put it aside and move on the iv creeps me out for some reason i know that ivs are vital and basic to all hospitals i just feel that kids do not need this extra touch for the foray into the rescue tails world iei did not have an iv until the age of  and i survived yes i did know prior to that what one was through general society onwards the swinging door on the second level is either for hospital refuse or corpses if a pet was to exit from this door it would surely endure some type of fracture thus the whole reason this set even exists have to keep the hospital humor up folks hey is there even a second level or for that matter even a first the floors of both levels are so small in width that pets on the second level can easily fall off if the joint is crowded with pets andor accessories when the medicine cabinets are open on the second level it totally covers the floor in that room thus only one pet can hang off to the side the doors of the cabinets close well and can hold accessories the bed that is attached to the wall on the first level is greatfunctional as well as the shelf right next to it the eye chart is adorable but could have been placed lower the spinning recovery area is ridiculous dont get me wrong it works great it just seems geared to very small children obsessed with fun factors the front desk on the first level stinks a pet cannot even be placed behind it for proper desk duty last but not least hasbro along with mattel committed a great sin in the area of toy design they replaced plastic parts with cardboard please insert snippet of doomed music here these cardboard parts cover two window areas and the front desk and can be easily punched out by a dinosaurwielding tot or even just a curious one hasbro id rather have my kids pets receive medical care from dr harris a character in the movie comanote to the general public please play fair and do not rate a review as unhelpful because the included shtick irks you yeah i know that im annoying but i feel that i provided pertinent information that can possibly assist others in making a purchasing decision in regards to this item i do not want others to waste their monies on demented pet hospitals from the underworld

this does have some drawbacks but it is good solid fun for young kids  it plays two tunes my little pony theme and a caribbean theme has castle horn sounds and has a rotating swing set at the top of the castle  it also lights up  all are controlled with the same single button  so you will have to push multiple times if you want to eg move the rotating swingsbut it has some heavy drawbacks that could very much frustrate younger kids  ponies are top heavy with the tail and fall over easily  whether in the set or on their own  nor do they really sit in anything easily  although they have the hole in the bottom to help keep them on pegs on various items on the playset they dont stay in the pegs and fall over easily  not even i as the parent could get them to stay  i could barely get them to stand on their own  and well they have hollow arms which is kind of disturbing actually  the seal that comes with the set has a peg hole in the bottom so he will stay on items  however if you buy the companion ponies and their friends separately eg the one with the dolphin the friends do not have pegs  we bought the pony with the dolphin and the dolphin doesnt sit in anywhere  he just flops over stupidly  if you put the ponies in the rotating swings they tend to flop over and block the thing from working catch on a piece of the castle  the set makes horrible noises when that happens  the shell sits in a peg and is very stiff to open  trying to pry it open usually results in knocking it off of the peg which frustrates my  year oldi have a very patient kid and she becomes easily frustrated with this set  things dont stay in place fall off dont work or arent compatible with all accessories etc  but it does have good play value in that it moves plays music etc

the cloud car isnt one of the most popular vehicles but it has its fans fortunately theyll be quite pleased with this new cloud car the last time hasbro released a toy cloud car was   almost  years ago this one is quite a looker its a simply vehicle but hasbro took the time to make it well and it shows the most important thing is that there are absolutely no decals hasbro either painted or sculpted all features including the controls inside the cockpit also while hasbro usually decides to ruin its star wars vehicles by adding on firing missiles and other play features hasbro treated the cloud car a bit more respectfully probably because it realized collectors would be the ones who primarily bought this vehicle the cloud car does have a few firing missiles for the kids but theyre discretely hidden within the pods of each car the missile launchers only appear if you push the cars closer together in other words if you just want a movieaccurate model of the cloud car you never have to see the missile launchers  just pretend they dont exist the one tiny complaint i have is the landing gear it sticks out a bit when put up it seems like there should have been a way to make it a bit less obtrusive its not a problem from most angles but still overall this is an awesome vehicle with a few features for the kids but high quality for collectors

in all we were pleased with this purchase but we did purchse this at quite a big discountpros high quality wooden materials easy to put together cute coal that you can put into the sodor coal car playful coal loading action with sound on the hopper very easy to change from a figure  set to anything else including circular lots of track pieces our  year old loves the bridge and especially sending the train under the bridgecons the coal car is so big that it can get hung up on the underpass if the tracks arent aligned just right if the figure  gets a little skewed my  year old loves to send the thomas and his car around and around the tracks and he derails thomas sometimes at the sharp turn by the coal hopper and also when going under the coal hopper  its hard for him to get thomas past the coal hopper unless he uses both handsif your child is very young or gets frustrated easily this might not be the best purchase due to the issue with thomas always tipping over or getting stuck if the track gets bumped  otherwise it is a cute quality set that is also attractively priced

i think ive figured it out regarding the protests in egypt its not just because of the things the president over theres done but ive reached the conclusion that hes the one that approved of something that has driven parents crazy since its releasemoon doughi almost got this for my daughter a few months ago for jesusmas but checked reviews of it before buying and saw the pictures customers put up on here showing the aftermath of playing with moon dough see im not the kind of parent who flips out when a mess has been made or cringes when their child plays with something that takes a while to pick up after but moon dough goes beyond the tolerance of a tibetan monk especially this magic barnyard play set the only magic here is the magic of losing money on this black hole of absurditytake a look at the box for this you get  colors of moon dough white blue and yellow some little plastic molds of farmrelated things like a fence and the barn which is where you can make animal shapes with the moon dough now heres the thing on paper this sounds like a great idea while using a standard cookie cutterlike shape to just press into the dough and get your animal would work just as well here you pack in some moon dough through the top of the barn where animal molds are then crank a lever on the back of it it turns a wheel that churns out an animal through the doors of the barn or at least thats what its supposed to do in the hour and a half that my daughter and i spent trying to get something out of this play set we successfully made  sheep  chickens and a few animals that looked like sheer abominations  of the time the moon dough would get stuck in the wheel just past the doors yeah somehow regardless of how tight or loose you pack the dough into the animal molds the piece will still get stuck and not go through the doors so when it comes down to it you have this huge barn play setthats just really used to shape a few animals if youre lucky the crank on the back constantly breaks off since its not fastened on the wheel itself will sometimes get stuck inside the barn even without moon dough in it and the separate mold pieces like that wonderful wonderful fence one take a few seconds to get the dough out yes whoever designed this toy was having a midlife crisis and wanted to take innocent children and their parents with themso how about the moon dough well you can see for yourself in the customer images i was going to put my own up but itd look identical to those already there the dough crumbles a lot but always retains the same semisticky feel it definitely feels better than playdoh but isnt in the same class as that classic at first i was worried when i took the packets of moon dough out of the box and saw how broken up everything looked as i was expecting it to be like playdoh and have some shape to it then you mold it or break it up from there nope it just shatters all over the place once you open the packet and god save you if you or one of your kids open this for the first time on carpet then step on it according to the directions youre supposed to squeeze the moon dough for a little bit kneading it like dough or something in order to make it stay together better it works but that lasts for a few seconds before you break off a piece and dozens of tiny pieces go along with it the only thing i can compare the messes that moon dough brings is if youve ever used one of those big metal hole punchers that can do  holes at once on sheets of paper and how the punched pieces go in the hole puncher you slide out a tray and all the paper dots are in there if youve ever spilled one of those on the floor thats exactly how moon dough looks when its all said and doneim giving the educational value of this  out of  because it teaches kids what a ripoff is i feel im being fair when i give this thing one star for fun as well since my daughter never asked to play with it again after the first time and i sure didnt have any fun with it either the fact that i gasped and felt accomplished when i successfully made a moon dough chicken should say something the durability gets a  but thats mostly because the actual barn is wellmade but everything else isnt like the crank base and more kinda sad that the plastic mat that comes with this is the one thing that doesnt disappoint last year the worst toy i saw was the toy story alien fishing game but if i had gotten this  months ago moon dough wouldve easily beat it out

whats more fun than buying a snow cabin for dolls in the middle of july well um lots of stuff but lets forget that for a moment this crib was only  at toysrus this past er july in my excitement i didnt even notice that this cabin could produce snow i was enamored with all the cool accessories here they are bar chair stool campfire radio fondue pot wskewer tray muffin  croissant  milk carton cups and mugs snow shovel pack of snow polystyrene beads aka styrofoamtakes three aa battsthe low lowdowndolls not included are they ever campfire does not light up like the liv one does re liv cabin lantern roof and icicles fall off of cabin constantly if you can get the ice on more power to you pushing soft rubber into hard plastic just does not work assembly of cabin is awkward the snow function works for about thirty seconds and in order for it to spew snow relentlessly one has to shovel the beads at the back intake slot constantly which sucks up the beads and throws then all over our fine world in my case the kitchen mga suggests making a snowcatcher but i am a tired mom kids love it but are they the ones whipping out the vacuum i realize now that this purchase was a mistake as long as they know its present they will want winter wonderland  i will just tell the kids it melted in an incinerator

great for openended playjust tonight i made a toga for a teddy bear my tot sports it as a cape a skirt and as a ghostly covering sometimes it is used as a blanket for stuffed animals and has even been included in elaborate toy setups as a protective dome the possibilities are endless tag states  silk hand wash do not bleach line dry low iron simply perfect for inspiring kidsaddenda on  i am so tired of people voting my toy reviews as unhelpful because related children or even the adult voters themselves crave products that i dis in my reviews iedisney princess costumes or even vice versa my reviews get blasted because i am lauding a product that somebody hates an offbalanced adult takes it to heart and then clicks away at that no button well i think thats unfair voters should at least have to choose a reason as to why they are voting a review as unhelpful thus if they have a conscience they will possibly think twice before voting a review as unhelpful just because britney totally wuvs cinderella andor her wardrobe choices once she marries the royal dude listen this playsilk does blow away princess costumescan a princess costume do any of the above no is a princess costume comfy no can a princess costume be washed yes but i betcha its not as tough as this here playsilk which can probably be washed more times in the long run can a playsilk be a princess costume yes can a princess costume be a playsilk nofootnotessample unhelpful review reasonsreview was not understandablereview did not contain useful informationreview was too longreview had terrible grammar which confused mereview had terrible spelling which confused mereview stated that the product which my please insert relation here loveshates please choose one is terriblewonderful please choose one and that bothers me so much that i have to be petty

i really like that scrabble has been updated with modern technology scrabble dates back to the s after alland so a whole new twist on the game can be played theres no board now  just electronic tiles  players have  seconds to shuffle and slide their electronic cubes to create words before the time runs out each of the five scrabble flash cubes letter tiles has smart tile technology so that each one recognizes the letters placed next to it and automatically keeps score and checks if the word is spelled correctlywhile traditional scrabble fans will probably stick with the board game since a lot of the board strategies are no longer valid with scrabble flash such as leftover tile strategies and doubletriple word score challenges scrabble flash game is great for casual play  it provides a way for families to play together with several challenges aimed directly for family play and parents can work on ways to make it age appropriate for all family members eg under  need only to get  letter words  have to get  letter words and  have to get  letter wordsthe game also provides a nice outlet for solitaire play  something the board game doesnt do that well  you dont need a computer to challenge yourself any longerthese use coin sized lithium batteries and dont look to use too much power so id expect them to go a long time before you have to replace the batteriesin all a very cool update of scrabble that is very portable and suitable for scrabble enthusiasts as well as the casual family players

the biker scout includes a helmet with separate head though the helmet is not removable and painted detail on the chest though not the back  because the arms and legs are movable you can have fun posing him the legs move independently which is nice  even the wrists move so you can move around the handsthe really nice thing about the lego keychains is that they actually stay on the ring and dont fall off easily  ive had some on my key chain for over a year now with no problemits a great little keychain and a fun toy to boot

just got this guy because during imaginary play with both of my daughters we sometimes have dinosposingasaliens attack the local littlest pet shop population we decided to look into buying actual aliens and ben  fit the bill for us i saw this guy at big lots and fell in love hes mantaish slightly devilish and alienmonster rolled into one stands up with no hand assistance knees are jointed andthis dude does not come with weapons which i noticed right away guess he relies on his alien powers and that makes a mom happy trust me my girls toys are punching each other out during play so less violence is a plus we just leave jet rays tail off you dont even notice that it is missing the tail does attach snugly so far his included fact card can inspire scientific discussions sea life speed of sound nervous systems etc he is already attacking clueless bobbleheaded cats and dogs

when we saw this at the store my  year old son said lets get this i told him it was a toy for little ones like his sister he then said we can share it  as it turns out my  month old mostly gets to watch as my  year old plays with it but she loves listening and watching the choo choo sound when you press the funnel is really cute and the abc song that is activated by pushing letters is also cute my  year old sings along to it to the babyhe loves moving it along the floor or using the remote  hell also give the simple twobutton remote to the baby and she presses the buttons making the train go forwards or backwards he takes a box and calls it a blocked tunnel and stops the train with it if she keeps pressingthe logs rest in a recessed part of the tender and come off as an entire piece  my  month old loves to catch it and put it in her mouth or bang it on the top of the trainthere is a low and high volume button as well as an english  spanish buttonthe three of us love itnote that it did not come with tracks i have no idea why one reviewer said it did
my daughter at age six and a half was able to string the beads and charms without a lot of screaming pretty stuff not prissy great for a firsttime beader

farmer mccolls farm is situated along thomass branch line and thomas helps to deliver his produce to various places on sodor what more important job could there be than to make sure the ice cream factory gets its supplies  this playset features a red barn imprinted with mccolls farm and one side flips down for sodors favorite engine  thomas included to chug right on into for transporting  opposite the barn is another building with the name ice cream factory encircling a big vanilla ice cream cone with deliveries printed above the doors  farmer mccoll is good friends with farmer trotter and both the thomas at the farm and toby at trotters farm a tesco exclusive playsets have a neat figure  track rather than just a circular one  the ground has imprints of various objects ie ears of corn milk containers bales of hay ice cream vats etc and you can connect it to other playsets at  different points  this playset first appeared on the original tnp spring  collector checklist and we paid  for our grandsons  update  fisherprices summer  msrp is update  there are  playsets in the tnp line as of summer  that have msrps of under   they are in order of introduction  the original version of the toteatrain playbox colin at the wharf thomas at the farm percys mail delivery tidmouth tunnel toby at trotters farm sir handel at great waterton sodor engine wash talking diesels fuel  freight delivery sodor paint shop around the rails with thomas muddy adventure go go speedy railway sodor lumber company treasure tracks a new version of the toteatrain playbox and brendam docks  the beauty of these tnp playsets is that he can choose one to easily disconnect from the others fold up and take with us on excursions  theyre definitely the simplest to take n play withwe were first time grandparents of a   year old when my husband and i began a tnp collection for our grandson hoping hed pass it on to his own kids one day  weve all had a great time interacting with this overall quality line of trains vehicles ad playsets  he turned  at the end of april and still enjoys spending a couple of hours of each day he spends with us in the sodor land of make believe that spans a large portion of our basement  although disneys cars characters are beginning to occupy a different portion its nice to see our investment continuing to hold his interest engaging and encouraging that active imagination  grandson  came along in march so we plan to continue collection tnp for several years to come

this themed pack stems from the  misty island rescue movie after diesel ends up dumping all of the precious jobi wood from hiros homeland into the water thomas gets stranded on misty island where a bountiful supply of jobi wood is found and edward helps transport it to sodor where theyre building a new search  rescue centre  there was also an episode in tv season   episode  jumping jobi wood that featured edward as well  we really love it when the trains included in these themed packs have something differentiating them from the trains you purchase separately in this case edward  his tender  even his wheels  appear to be covered in what we can only assume to be sawdust from the sawmill on misty island  although he pulls two rustybrown pretty nondescript rail cars each carries a piece of jobi tree that have unseen magnets so that you can connect both pieces to form a larger tree  edward  the jobi tree first appeared on takenplay final  collector checklist and we paid  for our grandsons  he loves it  update  fisherprices summer  msrp is update  weve really enjoyed collecting all of the  packs especially those with extra designing on the trains  if youre interested in starting your own collection there are  of them as of summer  and they are in order of introduction  gordons snowy special spencers heavy haul edward  the jobi tree thomas  the bees percy hard at work emily stuck in the brush james muddy mess hank  the fishing cars saltys catch of the day james ice cream express percy  kevin to the rescue surprise surprise at the steamworks tree trouble at the dieselworks rockys search  rescue thomas hard at work talking thomas  percy hard at work thomas at the fair muddy ferdinand and tales from the past engine packa little of our own thomas history as first time grandparents my husband and i wanted to start some type of collection for our grandson that he could possibly pass along to his own kids one day  our grandson was   at the time and had been talking a lot about a certain train named thomas a little fella whom  now seems hard to believe  wed never heard of  after doing some research it seemed the takenplay line might be the perfect investment to engage and encourage his active imagination as well as provide a fun way for us to interact with him  what a rewarding decision weve had so much fun together with this quality line of trains vehicles and playsets  as he approaches  a large portion of our basement has become a wonderful sodor land of make believe that we all enjoy visiting  and continues to hold his interest which is quite a feat given the tendency at that age to move in and out of toy phases so quickly
