and i wanted to start some type of collection for our grandson that he could possibly pass along to his own kids one day  our grandson was   at the time and had been talking a lot about a certain train named thomas a little fella whom  now hard to believe  wed never heard of  after doing some research it seemed the takenplay line might be the perfect investment to engage and encourage his active imagination as well as provide a fun way for us to interact with him  what a rewarding decision weve had so much fun together with this quality line of trains vehicles and playsets  as he approaches  a large portion of our basement has become a wonderful sodor land of make believe that we all enjoy visiting  and continues to hold his interest which is quite a feat given the tendency at that age to move in and out of toy phases so quickly

i hadnt heard of these teacup piggies until earlier this week when a commercial was on and my daughter pointed out that she had to have one as it turned out she had more than enough money in her piggy bank for one so she picked out snowflake here at the toy store i wont deny it these are some of the cutest toys ive seen in a while probably since the furby era at the same time the ideas just so weird little pigs that sit in teacupsand you dress them up still my daughter loves this thing and i can see it being one of the hotter toys this year easily becoming this years zhu zhu pettickle me elmofurbyrobosapienthe teacup piggy is just a cute plastic pig with fuzzy skin you can move the head and legs around a little bit but theyre pretty stiff theres a switch on the bottom that goes from demo off and on snowflake says a bunch of different things when you move her around or press her nose and even when you dont do anything which could be a problem for parents with little patience and for those who hate buying batteries all the time snowflakes a cheerleader pig oh the irony and says some cheerleadery things here and there she even says lol she comes with a little bow sunglasses and the teacup to set her in though she stands up perfectly without it accessory packs are sold separately but add some more play value to the toy a lot like the accessory packs for zhu zhu petsso why the  and  stars in the ratings first the durability i was very very surprised when i picked snowflake up and felt how thin the plastic is if anyone accidentally steps on one of these pigs theyre toast fortunately the price isnt anywhere near as much as it couldve been for something like this so you wont feel like its a huge blow to your wallet whenif you have to get a replacement the fuzzy coat on the pig is also pretty cheap and i noticed that snowflakes right ear was missing a bit on the tip right out of the package there are also some weird indentations around the chin that dont look like anything the plastic bubble caused its also worth mentioning that the fuzzy skin gets dirty easily since shes a lighter color bits of fuzz from clothing and carpet will go straight to poor snowflake in no time also the person who they got for snowflakes voice sounds kind of bored i wouldve went with a more enthusiastic person to do the voice especially for a cheerleader character but its something i doubt any kids will care about when playing with the toy theres not much in the way of education other than your kid learning a little songbut overall i really dig these pigs my daughters almost  and picked this over several other things that shes really into or wanted for a longer time and she even had snowflake on her pillow when she was sleeping if you or your kids are interested in these teacup piggies at all you might want to hurry and get one or two now before it gets harder to find them in the next  months but at the same time i see on the companys site that they already have  more waves on the way so it looks like therell be plenty to choose from

i love the fact that all the main characters are in one set butsandys tail is constantly falling off and our spongebob is supposed to blush when placed underwater and he does not blush i will repeat he does not blush i placed him under running water for about two minutes nothing i then placed him in three different temperatures of water cold warm hot bowls of water for several minutes nada i have taken away one overall star due to the above squidwards hat is nice and snug when placed on his head sandys helmet is removable and stays on fairly well when placed over her cranium my daughter does not care about a wayward tail nor remembers the fact that bob is even supposed to blush so thats the extant of the drama cute set just one small dolphin noise to cover up certain words i would like to impart to jakks pacific yes i was excited about the blush dealaddendum on  our spongebob has finally begun to blushhave discovered that it is very cold air that is the catalyst will update after experimentation with very cold water i am keeping rating the same because bob is supposed to blush when he comes in contact with water not airupdate on  really cold water definitely workswarm water takes the blushing effect away instantly so weird that it took so long for the blushing deal to engage but now i am totally satisfied that i got my moneys worth still fun in the tub but he might be possibly even more fun in a justfilled kiddie pool that turns one into an instant popsicle just kidding

this is the first grievous figure ive gotten so i dont have much to compare it with still i can really respect the detail and articulation this is a tough figure to make because the limbs are so thin but by and large hasbro got it right the only problem for me is that the cape is too thick it looks like its choking him ok i know hes a cyborg he cant choke maybe try flattening it out a bit before putting it on him

the really nice thing about the lego keychains is that they actually stay on the ring and dont fall off easily  ive had some on my key chain for over a year now with no problemthe clone pilot comes with a brightly painted helmet that has a separate head glued inside more detail  the head is fully posable  the painted detail on the front and back of the chest is quite exception and intricate  very impressive attention to the details with this key chain  because the arms and legs are movable you can have fun posing him the legs move independently which is nice  even the wrists move so you can move around the handsits a great little keychain and a fun toy to boot

the second i saw the classic ostrich in vinylmation form i had to have it and promptly bought one of the have a laugh boxes it ended up being pluto inside which was fine since he was my second choice still i was ostrichless and decided to cheat and buy the figure from an auction site man do i love this thing while i do like a lot of the vinylmation designs a lot of them do look a bit bland and there are very few that stand out from the rest this thing sure as heck stands out and im surprised he isnt very popularthe ostrich is nearly a full head taller than the other regular sized vinylmation figures thanks to the neck piece which you can remove if you want when you open the foil and get the ostrich it comes with the neck joint separately packed obviously they do it this way so there arent random boxes that are taller than the others easily revealing whos inside to get the neck piece on you simply pop off the head snap on the neck joint then pop the head on that piece and youre set the neck can be rotated separately from the head and body too though theres no real point in doing so since the design is the same all around the ostrich sports an angry look on its face and has its egg down at its feet also the mickey ears are clear something more vinylmation figures should have if theres nothing else needed above the head as usual it also comes with a little card of the figurefans of the old cartoon featuring this wacked out bird should definitely pick one up the only thing to be careful with is the arms as theyre flimsy on all vinylmation figures in this size but it doesnt affect the overall score heres hoping that future vinylmation figures are more unique like this one

this hammer is pretty cute and simple  it makes sounds when you hit something and the face pops up  it also has a disc that spins and a clicker  the sounds arent too annoying either and amuse babies  this is a pretty straight forward and fun toy for any baby

my  kids all love this toy because they can control it with the rattle  they like that aspect of it the best  my youngest will occasionally spin the ball on top but the rattle gets the most use  i keep mine on the circle function because it goes too far at a time on the straight one and you need more room for that than we have

my baby has  different pop up toys because she loves them  this one is cute and easy for her to manipulate  my only complaint is that the first switch on the left and the third one are very sensitive  you barely have to touch them  they make noises only if slid all the way so i wish they werent so touchy so my baby would have to do that

the twlight jane doll is quite lovely and as with all barbie collector dolls comes with stand and certificate of authenticitysome things to note  she is not posable  the legs and arms are hard hollow cheap plastic and do not bend or move in any way  janes going to be posed the same way always  her body is also hollow hard plastic plastic that feels very cheap like a dimestory barbie knock off  its surprising the lack of quality in a barbie collector dolljane is probably best displayed on a shelf or left in her box i wouldnt recommend her for younger kids who want to play with her  likely theyd break a hollow leg easily she clearly is not of the same quality as the previous twilight barbie dolls which is a shame

i bought ellie mae at the same time as the i dream of jeannie doll  i ended up liking the jeannie doll much moreellie maes hair is not stylable or brushable  it is practically glued into place into stiff and unmoveable gobs  even the twirls at the back are hard and unmoveable  shes clearly meant to be a statue and not a dollanother detail im not as happy about is the shirt  the faux buttons on top hide two snaps underneat  and those snaps are placed one above the bust and one at the pants line  that leaves a gaping hole under the  fake buttons  the snaps also bulge out from under the shirt  making an unattractive ddisplaythe rest of the details of the outfit are fine and she comes with a slingshot  in all if choosing to buy only one or two of the retro s tv character dolls this might be the last one you would chose  jeannie and bewitched look better

this ken collector fashion doll has a wonderful interpretation of classical japanese fashion  note that the windows peak on his forehead is painted on but it does make the doll more interesting  he comes with a sword for display purposes and his hair is long and unbound in the back  in all it is quite a striking doll and makes an excellent display  im very pleased with this purchase

as others have noted this ken doll is quite fun  you can play back whatever you record in several types of voices  it really makes my  year old laugh to hear her voice deep like a mansthe only detraction for me is that he has solid legs so he isnt that posable other than bending at the waist  his clothes are nearly identical to the shaving fun ken doll and his hair is nearly solid from the gel  you cant style itbut in all a fun doll with a lot of play value

what a mess  on the second day my  year old was playing with this doll it snapped in half  what we didnt realize is that the bust is attached to the waist with a small plastic rod to make the transformation happen  she doesnt have any poseability and my daughter didnt realize that she bent the doll over to sit her and snap  there was a sharp broken plastic piece exposed on both ends the doll has hollow hard plastic cheap legs so the only way to make her sit was to bend her at the waist just like the other barbies  except you find out the hard way that she cant bend sit or even posemore disturbing was the sharp plastic pieces on each end of the broken area  that cant be safe  we made sure to look for any pieces that might have flown off when it snapped as well in case her  year old cousin visitedeven before it broke however we could tell it suffers from the same problem that mariposa and a lot of the other transforming fairy dolls had the wings do not stay on nor will they stay up  i wish we had bought the less expensive non transforming version insteadeverything about the doll feels cheap the legs are cheap hollow plastic not softer vinyl the dress works oddly if at all she doesnt have undergarments so when she bends over she bares all the face and hair are very generic looking barbie actually reminiscent of the cheaper  line of dolls and her chestbody is very square and oddly shaped  that doesnt even take into account that the wings just fall off all the time even our winx dolls have wings that dont fall off  whats the point of a fairy doll if the wings dont stay on everfinally the whole transforming thing is a joke  you pull strings in the back that hang down below the length of the doll when not in use to pull up the dress so it goes from ankle length to fairy length short  but the strings only pull up one inner skirt and not the outer oneneither my daughter nor i can push the small sharp edged butterfly button on the wings to make those raise up and when they do only one goes up limply and the other goes half way and falters  even if the wings stayed on we couldnt get them to workin all an incredibly bad dolls in every regard  get the nontransforming version of this doll and save yourself the disappointment

raps face is cute with a sort of basset hound look about her eyes we got ours out of a big bin at a goodwill outlet center so i figured that with all the people pushing her out of the way she would look like heck well her hair was in perfect orderly condition forty minutes later chaos struck her hair was tangled i whipped out the shampoo and conditioner and got to work let her hair air dry overnight and brushed her locks presto hair was tamed as it turned out those actions were pointless she was locked in her locks several hours later o glorious scissors arise yes we are gonna go with a bob

this fairy who really isnt identifiable in the dvd is very similar in size to polly pockets ie half the size of a barbie doll  she comes with highly movable legs so she can assume quite a few positions on her pony astride side saddle etc  theres a little clip on the top of the saddle that goes around her waist and keeps her on the pony  the clip rotates  degrees so your child will have quite a few ways to position herthe fairy comes with removable wings that can be interchanged with the horse flying horse or flying fairy  they clip on fairly firmly and dont fall off easilythe horse has glitter glued on and some does come off in your hands with each play but not enough to ruin the toyin all i think it is a really cute set  there are  different sets  and the only difference between the sets is the color  as such you probably only need to buy one set  we have all three and my daughter prefers the orangered one best since it is so brightnote the wings snap but it is very hard to get them into either the doll or horse  even my  year old who is fairly dextrous is unable to snap the wings into doll or horse  i have to do it for her every time  if you have a child that gets frustrated easy you might want to avoid this or youll end up having to change the wings from horse to doll often

although you cant tell from this picture kevins helping hook is a  pack first featured on takenplays  collector checklist  weve been so pleased with almost every single takenplay themed pack weve purchased for our grandson but this one was a little disappointing  since wed already purchased kevin separately msrp of  we just dont believe the very nondescript plastic rail car yellow with red base and removable cargo that comes with this two pack is worth an extra  in msrp  update  fisherprices summer msrp is still   yes the cargos in a container with a handle that kevin can use his hook to lift up and we went ahead and purchased one but we wouldnt say this is one of takenplays better valuesits also fun to collect the themed  packs  update  there are  of them as of summer  and they are in order of introduction  thomas  the treasure pop goes thomas kevins helping hook scruffs dirty job thomas  the raft kmart exclusive thomas at the winter festival thomas at the spring fair thomas at the summer festival thomas at the halloween celebration the last four have lightup cargo victor  oil cargo thomas to the rescue iron arrys oily mess and scruffs dirty mess the last two are color changers  there were also several buddy packs annie  clarabel toby  flora bill  ben thomas  rosie percy  mavisa little of our own thomas history as first time grandparents my husband and i wanted to start some type of collection for our grandson that he could possibly pass along to his own kids one day  our grandson was   at the time and had been talking a lot about a certain train named thomas a little fella whom  now seems hard to believe  wed never heard of  after doing some research it seemed the takenplay line might be the perfect investment to engage and encourage his active imagination as well as provide a fun way for us to interact with him  what a rewarding decision weve had so much fun together with this quality line of trains vehicles and playsets  as he approaches  a large portion of our basement has become a wonderful sodor land of make believe that we all enjoy visiting  and continues to hold his interest which is quite a feat given the tendency at that age to move in and out of toy phases so quickly

this themed back stems from tv season   episode  pop goes thomas thomas is pulling a load of lemonade bottles to the childrens summer picnic  as he crosses bumpy tracks he hears a popping noise which he likes but cant figure out what the noise is its the corks popping out of the bottles  he decides to search out more bumpy tracks to see if he hears the noise again and in the process  one cork knocks off the nose of mr bubbles the clown who was supposed to perform for the children and falls down a drain causing him to be late more corks fly into a field of pigs more corks fly and hit bakers who are baking cakes for the picnic causing them to drop the cakes another flies off and hits james whos transporting children to the picnic and isnt happy about it hitting his shiny red paint another hits a signalman who gets flustered and ends up sending james down the wrong track and when he finally arrives at the picnic the last cork pops and knocks off sir topham hatts hat and the bottles are now completely empty  thomas heads back to the bakery to pick up more cakes then onto the station to pick up more lemonade where he also sees mr bubbles and gives him a lift to the picnic  now this is cute  we love it when the trains included in the themed packs have something distinguishing them from the versions you buy separately in this case thomas has lemonade splashed all over him from pulling a rail car of lemonade bottles whose corks have popped off after bumping along the tracks  the metal rail car a goldish color with blue base carrying the lemonade has pictures of lemonade and bottles on its sides and the bottles themselves are removable  this themed pack first appeared on the  takenplay collector checklist and we paid  for our grandsons  he loves it  update  fisherprices summer  msrp is its also fun to collect the themed  packs  update  there are  of them as of summer  and they are in order of introduction  thomas  the treasure pop goes thomas kevins helping hook scruffs dirty job thomas  the raft kmart exclusive thomas at the winter festival thomas at the spring fair thomas at the summer festival thomas at the halloween celebration the last four have lightup cargo victor  oil cargo thomas to the rescue iron arrys oily mess and scruffs dirty mess the last two are color changers  there were also several buddy packs annie  clarabel toby  flora bill  ben thomas  rosie percy  mavisa little of our own thomas history as first time grandparents my husband and i wanted to start some type of collection for our grandson that he could possibly pass along to his own kids one day  our grandson was   at the time and had been talking a lot about a certain train named thomas a little fella whom  now seems hard to believe  wed never heard of  after doing some research it seemed the takenplay line might be the perfect investment to engage and encourage his active imagination as well as provide a fun way for us to interact with him  what a rewarding decision weve had so much fun together with this quality line of trains vehicles and playsets  as he approaches  a large portion of our basement has become a wonderful sodor land of make believe that we all enjoy visiting  and continues to hold his interest which is quite a feat given the tendency at that age to move in and out of toy phases so quickly

this toy is great its a good or bad reminder depending if youll a hogan or a inoki fan of the infamous  antonio inokihulk hogan fight from new japan pro wrestling where hogan koed inoki to win the title the detail is great the colors are firstrate i give this toy a  out of

my daughter requested one of these dollsi think she was interested in the werewolf but i got this one instead due to the fact that the werewolf was not in stock the werewolf clawdeen has a delicate fur collar and i was concerned anyway that the fur might end up lookin ratty or possibly fall out frankie is just as cuteshe has more of a british punkangus young look goin on clawdeen reminds me of more of s punk her pet watzit has silver wings and dino spikes in the pic they appear white i gave this a high educational rating because i believe that enlightening my daughter with monster myth info is a great intro to what else dracula frankenstein dr jekyll and mr hyde the turn of the screw poe lovecraft you get the picture great lit that has impacted our society durable rating is three stars because a frustrated toddler could destroy her in fifteen minutes they are suggested for ages six and up great collectibledecormojo for nottoodark nottoocheerleadish chicks

this is nothing more a clone of the grape escape game not only thatthis game also encourages murdergenocide and playing god i feel sorry for any kid who loves this game and for any parent who thinks this game is for kids overallthis game is just as sick and twistedminded as the grape escape game but with potatoes instead of grapes i give this game a  out of

the good stuffdress and shoes are easy to get on and fit well on dollheadband doubles as bracelet for small ones threeish and upbutterflies adhere well to headbandbraceletthe notsogood stuffbutterflies do not adhere well to dolls hairpurse opening is very small purse is not able to be closed iehas no lidflapdoll is only slightly scented unlike her pal strawberry shortcake i did attempt to find manufacturing dates on the dolls for comparison reasons thinking maybe that when we purchased ss in november of  that she was fresher sadly any numbers that i can find on the dolls do not seem like dates at all so i have no idea if we just got a lemon pun intended or if somebody at hasbro went wild with the strawberry perfume on our ss doll only three overall stars due to lack of scent

all i can say is wow sideshow really outdid themselves with this yodas hut environment it is a large environment and yoda looks right at home in it not only do we get a beautiful recreation of the hut but also the set comes loaded with accessories  over a dozen bowls and plates cups and vases  snakes a flying reptile  bundles of sticks a stove with a burning fire and wall lights you really have to see it to believe it check out the jedi temple archives review for good closeup photos its a perfect way to display your yoda sideshow figure

like tierdeleria werner klockes sculpt is another matriarchal spellcaster who prioritizes cleavage over practicality  as a spellcaster she can be forgiven for wearing fewer clothes  or really any clothes at all  with the exception of her fabulous shock of hairof all the drow in the series liela has so much feathered hair that it look like a native american headdress she wields a sacrificial dagger in one hand and a gemtipped staff in the other she has the same holepitted cloak that other drow in the series have because these drow dont seem to know how to clean their clothestheres nothing in particular about this sculpt that keeps her from being used as an elf sorceress although she does have an undeniable wicked bent to her appearance

when i found this doll at a thrift shop she was in perfect condition minus the shoes i had to scoop her up because she is so well made and as you can see has brown tresses an unusual trait in the baby doll scene eyes are green i beg to differ with an earlier reviewer but her dress is removable and hand washable her crown with attached small comb is sewed loosely onto her head but can be removed with a few snips our crown was removed via deft child hands so if you or your child is a crown fanatic keep this in mind once it is removed it will be nearly impossible to get it back on her head due to her massive amount of thick hair the comb which is supposed to assist placing the crown in her hair does squat underwear is painted on sturdy perfect for four year olds hankering after a first dollysince i got mine at a thrift store even though she is virtually brand new as i mentioned above she definitely needed sprucin up i do fear bedbugs and invisible funkiness heres what i didhair sprayed lightly with rubbing alcohol mixed with perfume once this dries doll is safe to play withskin she had a slight smudge of something pink on her cheek a magic eraser took it right offdress pour a tiny amount of detergent or even baby shampoo in enough water to cover the dress and to allow for agitationyou do not have to fill up the container with the soap and water all the way i used about ten cups of water mix then place dress in let sit for ten minutes agitate gently with your hand for about two you can even just swish the the whole deal around by moving the container itself rinse for about a minute in clear cold water right from the faucet or in a container then shake out excess water gently place some kind of plastic bottle  loads fluid ounces bottle of downysimple pleasures fabric softener bottle is perfect on top of small towel make sure the velcro on the dress is open and just place the dress over the bottle as if you are dressing the bottle as a princess it will dry overnight

i wanted toy tools that would foster imagination and that didnt require batteries  thats exactly what i got with this set  it comes in a sturdy storage bucket and it has toy nuts bolts washers etc so kids can pretend to build  its a really great toy tool set

the color and detail is firstrate it comes with a easytocome robe which he never wore in real life a good reminder of his many matches with sting in wcw mainly at the  great american bash for the wcw world title in which he won its perfect for any vader andor wcw fan i give this toy a  out of

the box makes it look like you get a lot  but when you open it up you see that nearly half the space is purposely wasted to make it look like there is more than there is  the pieces are cheap plastic and dont look very good  i would have priced this as a  dollar toy with a very faulty ir thrown in to frustrate and annoy  my  year old gave up quickly trying to get the ir to connect and worknot recommended
perfect for budding flashlight enthusiasts just press the button on the pigs tummy and beholdlight what can be easier for a threeyearold cute to the max and wellconstructed

so exquisite heres the dealhair just like in above pic do not pay attention to hasbro pics she has had some pro stylin doneeyes just like above pic they look more greenish in hasbro pics on the outside of the boxi guess they were doctored for the hasbro pics because when i checked out the dolls eyes in the sunlight i did not notice any green flecks at all do not get me wrong the eyes somehow do have a slight green cast to them in certain lighting situations they remind me of a lake on a fall dayoutfit easy to get on has velcro at backshoes easy to get on but fall off easily unlike our other blythe dolls shoesnecklace looks like it can be removed but we have decided to leave it on unless my younger daughter gets to it somehow wish it was iridescent will update this review if necklace comes off and report if it is easy or not easy to get back on dollaccessories all accessories fit well on dollpets or are held well by doll theres a leash headband rose barrette two pairs of sunglasses purse that does not open a small cardboard map of france and a cardboard shopping bagnote the inner box scene that the items are secured in can be utilized as a cafeboutique if you remove all items very carefully and tweak the included little stools we cut the legs a bit to make them stand up straight and to add more supportstar ratings four for ed value because a kid can become educated in geography french culture history my daughter tried to make a paper marie antoinette wig for the dog we are now experimenting with a cottonball wig five stars for durability because our other blythe dolls are holding up to the rigors of a threeyearoldall in all a beautiful little gal that does not look down upon americans and keeps her svelte figure by not eating too much brioche

the outside of this toteatrain equipped with a handle and very sturdy has thomas big happy face upon opening it up there are  different compartments for train storage  enough for the entire steam team thomas edward henry gordon james percy toby emily plus one  but also included is a circular track with a stop signal arm  the area inside the track depicts various elements of places and activities on the island of sodor  while it can connect up to other playsets at two points my grandsons toteatrain usually sits on a shelf with his thomas books  dvds closed up with thomas happy smile showing but anytime we go someplace where he wants to introduce someone to the whole steam team this is the playset he takes  the toteatrain first appeared on tnps original spring  collector checklist and we paid  for our grandsons  update  fisherprices summer  msrp is update  there are  playsets in the tnp line as of summer  that have msrps of under   they are in order of introduction  this original version of the toteatrain playbox colin at the wharf thomas at the farm percys mail delivery tidmouth tunnel toby at trotters farm sir handel at great waterton sodor engine wash talking diesels fuel  freight delivery sodor paint shop around the rails with thomas muddy adventure go go speedy railway sodor lumber company treasure tracks a new version of the toteatrain playbox and brendam docks  the beauty of these tnp playsets is that he can choose one to easily disconnect from the others fold up and take with us on excursions  theyre definitely the simplest to take n play withwe were first time grandparents of a   year old when my husband and i began a tnp collection for our grandson hoping hed pass it along to his own kids one day  weve all had a great time interacting with this overall quality line of trains vehicles and playsets  he turned  at the end of april and still enjoys spending a couple of hours of each day he spends with us in the sodor land of make believe that spans a large portion of our basement  although disneys cars characters are beginning to occupy a different portion its nice to see our investment continuing to hold his interest engaging and encouraging that active imagination  grandson  came along in march so we plan to continue collecting tnp for several years to come

this engine wash has so many cute details  one side of the wash facility has a big sodor engine wash sign underneath which is an open window through which you see overflowing bubbles and can watch percy move through  when you position the usually bright green  percys dirtspeckled front hes included to where hes touching the yellow washing mechanism underneath the entrance sign then press down firmly on the top button the washers incrementally move percy through until he pops out at the other end marked with exit inside an arrow through several hanging strips  the track itself is a large figure  and features a little bridge with two different places to connect the set up to other playsets  the only disappointment was that it was supposed to come with a tethered brush but it could be that grandpa just accidentally tossed it out with the packaging  this neat set was featured on the tnp  collector checklistand we paid  for our grandsons  update  looks like we overpaid since fisherprices summer  msrp is update  there are  playsets in the tnp line as of summer  that have msrps of under   they are in order of introduction  the original version of the toteatrain playbox colin at the wharf thomas at the farm percys mail delivery tidmouth tunnel toby at trotters farm sir handel at great waterton sodor engine wash talking diesels fuel  freight delivery sodor paint shop around the rails with thomas muddy adventure go go speedy railway sodor lumber company treasure tracks a new version of the toteatrain playbox and brendam docks  the beauty of these tnp playsets is that he can choose one to easily disconnect from the others fold up and take with us on excursions  theyre definitely the simplest to take n play witha little of our own personal thomas history as first time grandparents my husband and i wanted to start some type of collection for our grandson that he could possibly pass along to his own kids one day  our grandson was   at the time and had been talking a lot about a certain train named thomas a little fella whom  now seems hard to believe  wed never heard of  after doing some research it seemed the takenplay line might be the perfect investment to engage and encourage his active imagination as well a provide a fun way for us to interact with him  what a rewarding decision weve had so much fun together with this quality line of trains vehicles and playsets  hes now  and a large portion of our basement has become a wonderful sodor land of make believe that we all enjoy visiting  and continues to hold his interest which is quite a feat given the tendency at that age to move in and out of toy phases so quickly

i like that this is similar to a ball drop toy but uses the drums instead to be different  it is a fun and unique toy that my baby loves and it doesnt light up or play annoying music which is a real plus  it is great for cause and effect also

my  year old played with this for two days for about an hour each day and didnt touch it after that  my guess is hell play with it again over time  on day one chuck went up the elevator and down the ramps many times  on day two thomas lightning mcqueen and may other wheeled vehicles went up the elevator and down the ramps  all of the vehicles had varied success in being able to get down the last ramp without getting stuckthe good limited parts  theres the main tower chuck the brown ramp and a red fenceramp portability  stick chuck in the botton put the red ramp up as a fence and put up the brown ramp and youre on your way chuck talking when you press the red button or when chuck goes through the crash coursethe bad chuck and other vehicles often get stuck on the way down the elevator isnt inclined enough so that when you start to move it upward chuck moves forward and gets caught on the levels as you go up the base is thin so it wobbles a lot  you have to tightly hold the base to get the elevator up part of the sacrifice of portability  light weight no extended play valuemy son likes driving his cars and trains along hes never been into toys where you let the vehicle go and it completes ramps etc he didnt play with the little people wheelies much eitherfor fun i included the very short video we made with a train car

if you watched clone wars movie or early episodes of season  this is the standard republic fighter  aside of the movie they do not play a key role in the tv show  but the design is somehow cool  it is very streamlined and it feels like it was designed for a japanese animethe two grey plastic engines detach too easily  cockpit opens and it has a wing commander console and a joystick  wings and rudder fold for landing and at the end of the wings it shoots projectiles which are actually the laser guns of the fighter  it has two legs underneath for landing  and thats pretty much it  plastic is quite sturdyaside of the aestetic value it does not have too much value in terms of functionality  but i like it  worth buying it for a moderate price

on their own both gowron and worf are great figures gowron is definitely the better of the two the likeness to robert oreilly is great the klingon armor has a lot of detailing my only complaint is that the figure is a bit too large oreilly is at least two inches shorter than the actor who played martok jg hertzler yet this figure is taller than the martok figure im not sure if the head of the martok figure is too small or the gowron head too large but theyre not quite in scale despite this its still a great figurethe worf figure is a bit more of a mixed bag the body looks a bit too slim for worf even if you compare this figure to the next generation worf he looks a bit too slim the face has a good likeness to michael dorn although its a bit soft the skin tone is a bit too light dorns skin is a few shades darker also the hip joint particularly gaps near the tcrotch makes it look too much like a toyoverall these are probably some of diamond selects better star trek figures id definitely recommend the set for the gowron but if youre just looking for worf i recommend the tng worf instead

there have been a few versions of the tie bomber but this is definitely the one to get the original version was pretty good this one just adds a few tweaks as the other reviewer noted the bombs are blue instead of red and theres a frontfiring missile the cockpit has been totally redesigned and looks great for me the best thing i can say about this vehicle is that the wings are nice and sturdy i remember the old potf tie vehicles always felt like their wings were going to snap off i have no such qualms with this one definitely a good ship to get for your collection

this toy is cute and very educational  i love that it encourages pretend play shape sorting and even manners  the food shapes fit into spaces on the plates like a puzzle  this is a toy my girls will play with for a while  it wont be quickly outgrown like so many other toys

cad bane is back with his star fighter for cad bane fans that should be incentive enough to get this vehicle its a well designed ship with an opening cockpit detailed interior and landing geart however the most striking aspect of this ship is the paint job hasbro did a wonderful job making the ship look weathered the red and yellow lines look worn out and there are clear signs of scraping that makes the ship not just a toy but also a work of art

great waterton  once the largest railway town on sodor but abandoned when the springs ran dry  is what thomas came across in the  movie the great discovery all of the engines pitched in to help restore it  this playset features a building with great waterton imprinted on it with one side that pulls down for bright blue little  sir handel included and with his name printed on both of his sides to chug right on into for transporting  opposite the great waterton station is another little building that shows some rail cars stacked with logs bricks and other building materials  it has a circular track with  places to connect it up to other playsets and the area inside the track has several wheels a couple of wrenches and rocks strewn among the greenery along with a little pond  great waterton has never been on a fisherprice takenplay collector checklist so maybe it was a big box store exclusive when we purchased it for just  in late fall  though we didnt see anything on the box distinguishing it as a walmart exclusive  update  comparable playsets on tnps checklists have summer  msrps of  so we think we got a great deal  it was the first thomas purchase we made for our grandson knowing nothing about it at the time we thought sir handel was thomas until our grandson just   at the time pointed out that it was wasntupdate  there are  playsets in the tnp line as of summer  that have msrps of under   they are in order of introduction  the original version of the toteatrain playbox colin at the wharf thomas at the farm percys mail delivery tidmouth tunnel toby at trotters farm sir handel at great waterton sodor engine wash talking diesels fuel  freight delivery sodor paint shop around the rails with thomas muddy adventure go go speedy railway sodor lumber company treasure tracks a new version of the toteatrain playbox and brendam docks  the beauty of these tnp playsets is that he can choose one to easily disconnect from the others fold up and take with us on excursions  theyre definitely the simplest to take n play witha little of our own thomas history as first time grandparents my husband and i wanted to start some type of collection for our grandson that he could possibly pass along to his own kids one day  our grandson was   at the time and had been talking a lot about a certain train named thomas a little fella whom  now hard to believe  wed never heard of  after doing some research it seemed like the takenplay line might be the perfect investment to engage and encourage his active imagination as well as provide a fun way for us to interact with him  what a rewarding decision weve had so much fun together with this quality line of trains vehicles and playsets  hes now  and a large portion of our basement has become a wonderful sodor land of make believe that we all enjoy visiting  and continues to hold his interest which is quite a feat given the tendency at that age to move in and out of toy phases so quickly

the silkstone mila doll is pretty  and was the affordable of the russian collection  silkstone barbies are made of a heavier thicker material whose weight and feel resemble porcelainmila has two braids that are huge  very off scale for the head and her dress is a silky material with nesting doll themes at the hem she was meant to be a fashion interpretation of ethnic russian themes and motifs on her scarf and dress  from the nesting dolls to the bohemian thick sleeved undershirt  somehow it just doesnt feel or look right and i would have liked this doll much better if her clothing wasnt thin satin and instead was more in the line of traditional russian folk costumes in cotton and wool

the nicolai ken is one of four dolls from the barbie fashion model collection bfmc russia  each is inspired by russian fashion or culture and this is the only male doll from the collectionken comes outfitted in a heavy cotton textured suit black undershirt and pants a ceremonial knife that comes out of the holster medals on the chest belt and boots  the hat is made from a great material that really feels like a real fur cossack hat and has matching fur on the cuffs  and underneath his hair is fully rooted and quite nicekens sculpted face has a  o clock shadowthis ken is a silkstone  a material with more weight and density than the normal barbie vinyl and with a feeling much more like porcelain note that several of these ken dolls did have black staining on their forehead under the fur hatin all this is definitely one of my favorite barbie collector silkstones  since it is not poseable and made from a less durable material it really is only intended for adult collectors and not children

like many others i ordered this figure online as a gift for a fouryear old shortly after receiving the package in the mail i opened it up and found it in good condition before i wrapped it up in festive paper i promptly drove down to the childrens hospital to deliver it to a special child by the name of timmytimmy was thrilled to get a colorful action figure as a gift and he could not wait to play with the superman as soon as it was entirely unboxed and freed from all the twisty ties that secured such a wonderous itemby the time the figure was freedthe nurse came in the room to take timmy to a critical medical proceedure no words were exchanged as he looked at me to see if he could take his new superman figure with him with a smile and nod i said that he could timmy was thrilled with his superman figure immediately as he went to play with the figure the leg snapped clean off it fell into the wheel of his chair causing the nurse to push timmy a hard left right down an elevator shaft followed by an enormous explosion that lead to an evacuation of the entire hospitalmost of the kids made it outi do not think that this is a figure that i would recommend to anyone

this is one of the most interesting toys i have seen in a while  the pieces are easy to connect but it will still help with fine motor skills  they also have beautiful bright colors  they are made of very smooth wood and the paint doesnt seem to chip or flake like some other wooden toys out there  these will definitely foster creativity problem solving and lots of fun

this was sent to us by our  year old sons grandparents  he had already been playing with his thomas the train take and play quarry set which features a windy descent similar to this but of course with a train  so we were concerned that he wouldnt be as interestedwe set it up and we have had a few problems with the pieces not staying as tight as we would like so for example the elevator gets stuck halfway up because the joint doesnt stay straight  we also do have some problems with the cars coming off the tracks but usually only if the track has become loose  our son thinks its funny when they crashit is sturdy and doesnt fall over when he plays with it he likes to guide the cars back up the ramps more than he likes to send them down the ramps  thus far hes enjoyed playing with it and so were happy that his thomas toy didnt ruin his funthis item is currently on recall due to certain cars having wheels that could come off and cause a choking hazard
i really like this toy because i can use it to help my yearold with shape sorting and size differentiation  she groups big to small with this as well as by shape so its helping her a lot

i have mixed feelings about this figure one the one hand its a beautifully sculpted and painted figure he comes with two axes and a staff his helmet also comes off showing his bald head one blog named this the figure of the year and in terms of quality its hard to disagree on the other hand the skirt is puffy making the gamorrean a bit of a fuzzball the previous version of the figurestar wars otc gamorrean guard with the plastic skirt actually looks a bit more like the guards instar wars episode vi  return of the jedi    versions disc widescreen edition this certainly isnt enough to take a star off in fact this version of the gamorrean is even better looking than the one in the movie id just recommend combing the skirt down or even using water so it stays down another option is to twist the skirt around because the back part of the skirt is shorter than the front doing this actually works really well

when i first started collecting star wars figuresstar wars power of the force admiral ackbar with hologram green card action figurewas my favorite figure while hasbro kept making various versions of the main characters there hadnt been an updated version of ackbar for  years until now this brand new  rendition of ackbar blows that one awayadmiral ackbar return of the jedi black and silver vintage action figureis beautifully sculpted and painted the skin tone is much more realistic than the older figure a deeper shade of orangishred the eyes and skin almost look moist very appropriate for a mon calamari best of all this ackbar has items including a pad and pointer  the first for an admiral ackbar figure this is now my new favorite star wars figure i just hope its not another  years until we see another mon cal figure

i had mixed feelings about getting this figure but am definitely glad i did its  perfect the face sculpt is spot on and the this figures got all the articulation you could want my only complaint is about the wrist joints  they allow for a greater range of motion but theyre a bit too big fortunately this isnt a deal breaker in fact the wrist joints look a lot smaller in person than in many pictures and it really only sticks out on lukes natural hand you cant notice it on the gloved hand still if thats whats preventing you from getting this figure my advice is to not worry about it once you pose luke with his lightsaber preferably gripping it with his natural hand on the bottom to hide the wrist a bit more youll never notice

its always nice to get another goon from jabbas palace especially with hasbros vintage series which is incredibly well done this later wave is perhaps the best yet andstar wars  vintage collection action figure skiff guard wooofis no exception to this this is an incredible figure easily the best amongst jabbas guards aside from the amazingstar wars  vintage collection action figure gamorrean guard wooofs helmet comes off and his bandolier is removable and the face has an incredible amount of detail the vibroblade has a thin silver lining and looks pretty sharp even though its made of plastic you can even see wooofs black fingernails this figure is a treat for fans and collectors and i really hope hasbro keeps making figures at this high standard

wicket is a figure thats seen several rereleases over the years truth be told the original potf version wasnt half bad and could still be used as a generic ewok today however this vintage style wicket goes way beyond its predecessors first the paint and sculpt look extremely realistic and a bit grittier hes got about as much articulation as is possible for such a small figure with ball and joint hips and shoulders however what really makes this wicket better is the accessories he comes with a removable cloak as well an extra black cloak and handbag from the ewoks movies this is a nice tribute to the ewok movies next to the kaink and teek figures in thestar wars star tours boarding party  disney exclusive action figure collection overall if you get just one ewok for your collection make sure its this one
i got these to go along with the spinning speedway and my girls love them  they are very cute durable and also rattle

im not knocking them but i still dont understand the appeal of silly bandz little rubber bracelets shaped like animals and other things that people can trade with their friends and they break really easily then again i was into pogs when i was younger so i guess its not much different either way i had to get one of these once i saw they existed and of course my daughter wanted one too since were playing okami together right now and she absolutely adores the game i ordered three one for her one for me and a back up one because i just know these things will break at some pointwhat is there to say about this its a little rubber bracelet shaped like chibiterasu halfred and halfwhite it comes in a small plastic bag with a cardboard okamiden label the bracelet looks very cute and while im usually against leaving things in the packaging ill be hanging mine up on a wall since its too small for me to wear my daughters been wearing hers nonstop since getting it a few days ago im pretty sure ill end up ordering a few more while theyre still practically available in bulk this is one of those few limited promo items thats still easily available a year after it was released and is still selling for peanuts i highly recommend buying several instead of just one and finding a seller that doesnt overcharge on shipping seriously this thing shouldnt cost as much as a book or movie to ship and especially not moreif you like okami get this if only they had made more characters

this includes a turret a dish cannon a gun with tripod  rebels and one droidthe dish cannon is the atgar  fd ptower and it is bigger than the one that comes with deluxe hoth rebel soldier potf edition  this atgar tower looks bigger and more detailed than the potf counterpart  the potf version fired the cannon that comes out of the dish while this version of athar actually fires whats inside the cannon  potf version has an extra feature in which if you press a button it will drop the dish simulating damage  this version dies not have that as it only has a base that allows it to rotatethe white turret is a golan arms df battery  it has an upper hatch where you can put an action figure and a door in the side to enter the tower  it has no floor so it is more or less like a glass upside down  and the interior is hollow with no internal details  the paint scheme outside looks good and it fires a projectile  it improves the hoth battle potf turretunlike potf hoth battle kit this pack does not have ice pieces or shield generatorthe rebel soldiers have parts made of cloth which is cool so extra care must be taken to protect them from dust  droid is a white kpo droid all figures are nicely articulated and well sculpted

these are total junk that i cant believe are even allowed to be sold  they dont stick together and arent flexible  i wanted something like the wicky sticks i had as a kid but these arent as good  i would never get them again

the color and detail is firstrate it has her ready to fly from a mountain or something like that and ready to fire at someone thats why her hair and belt are waving in the wind once againshe still got that perfect  body figure and believe or notshes even hotter as a anime character then she is the other way i wonder how shell look like as a pokemon character a human pokemon character i give this statue a  out of

madame alexander made a vinyl olivia doll a few years ago based on the book appearance of the beloved little pig and it was great additional outfits and accessories were made such as a huge circus set but all of those have been discontinued and now go for big bucks fortunately madame alexander has made another olivia doll this time based on how she appears in the tv series needless to say i was happy to finally get my own little olivia without having to pay an arm and a leg but by the looks of things some people might be doing that for this new version as a lot of people are already raising the price this thing just came outolivia stands at  inches tall and the box even states this so im not sure why its titled as  inches everywhere else shes made of a soft vinyl so shes kinda squishy she looks great exactly as she appears in the stock picture this version comes with her red overall dress and the striped shirt and tights the clothes are removable thanks to velcro closures and the outfit isnt too big or small on her it looks great olivias arms and ears can be moved around and her legs can move in different directions she doesnt have a tail for some reason the previous olivia doll had a little ribbon tail but this one has nothing no big deal but it wouldve been nice i love the smile she has though i still prefer the charming squiggly smile of the old version and the eyes looks look like they should zero complaints about the appearance of this doll in any category the sculpt is fantastic and the outfit doesnt feel cheaptheres one main thing that keeps little olivia from getting  stars though she cant stand up on her own ive tried adjusting the legs this way and that but havent have any luck getting her to stand still without toppling over the reason might be because of her tiny legs and big head sticking out a little bit if only they had included a stand with her any other accessories wouldve been nice too this version of olivia comes with nothing except the dollfor the original price that you can still get her for at a certain big toy store hint hint i feel shes worth the money its cool to finally have a big olivia figure on my shelf even if she has to lean against something or sit down additional accessories and a stand wouldve boosted the rating but as she is this is a doll that fans of the show and books should get while they still can ill probably get the other versions that have been released too like the artist and fancy dress one but if you want just one olivia i recommend spending the extra money for the version that comes with a couple of extra outfits the fancy dress a tutu and wings and her cow costume with ribbons on the ears

the kids love this and it is one of those games that the youngest can play with an older sibling and not feel disadvantaged  we have mischievous squirrels in our area who love to take our garden vegetables and halloween pumpkins  this reminds them of those urban squirrelscute concept and engaging for young siblings

blythe is such a breath of fresh air in the affordable everydayfolksbuyin division of dolls her price is a bit steep but at least she comes with accessories unlike the kelly doll that i saw in target yesterday kelly was a bit steep herself but all she had goin for her was a valentine theme a vacant look and a dull smile you can see in the pic what this blythe comes with her headband clothes and shoes are removable the shoes fit snugly and just appear to be open sandals the shoes are actually one continuous piece of soft rubber with some fleshcolored paint thus the shoes are easier to put on the doll the basket does open at either end but opens stiffly and then does not exactly close with a satisfying snap if you receive a lemon basket i believe that it will one day always remain slightly open due to small children constantly putting errant hi ho cherryo cherries in it this is trivial to me so i will not take an overall star away but i will take one durable star away i am reporting this basket flaw because i know that this same fact might not be trivial to another shes totally dreamy even with a basket that little red riding hood would hate i know enough with the basketaddenda on  i am sorry review blackballer i sense that you worship kelly dolls however my quest to give the lowdown on blythe is of the upmost importance to me and truth always prevails thank you

smells just the way she did in her retro days waaaay baaack in the early s please say way back like an announcer at a monster truck rally it brings me right back to childhood we released her from her box in mid november  and her scent is still kickin comes with little headband that doubles as a bracelet for small tots ieit fits my petite threeyearold three little ladybug charms in different colors can be placed on the felt leafs on the bracelet via velcro on the bottom of the bugs dress is adorable but does tie in the backhowever the ties are long enough to not cause much trouble for learningtotie kids or adult hands shoes fit great and are easy to get on the included purse is a little weird it does not open nor close it does have an incredibly small opening that can hold a sunflower seed or a bit of mashed strawberry if you prefer sweet doll that brings back memories

its surprisingly difficult to find a good figure of a skeleton warrior using the jason and the argonauts skeleton warriors revoltech made a beautiful figure that is both incredibly detailed and fully articulated the skeletons bones look like well bones each figure gets a nice black wash so he looks dirty supposedly each figures wash is slightly different so each figure is uniquewhen i say this figure is fully articulated i do mean fully hes got doubleball joints for all major joints including two for his back you have to work with him a bit but eventually you can get him into almost any pose you could imagine some of the joints might be too loose some too tight if theres a critical joint that doesnt work well you could always replace it with one from the spare arm or the skeleton coming out of the ground just carefully pull the body part out of the joint then take the ball joint out and replace it but be carefulthe figure also comes with quite a few different accessories including  different hands an arm dedicated to holding the shield two swords a spear two shields and a base with a skeleton coming out of the ground the back side of the base includes peg holes so you can store all of the unused accessories there its a brilliant solution to keeping everything safe and sorted i can stand how i have so many accessories for my figma figures just lying aroundoverall if youre looking for a skeleton warrior or even just a skeleton this will probably do the trick i got him to use as a stalfos with my  figma link figure its almost exactly in scale highly recommended

whats hot  whats cool this statue thats what the action pose tells us that shes ready to attack someone with her laser powers the color and detail are firstrate like jean greyher skintight suit is one of the hottest feaures about this statue i give this masterpiece a  out of

the color  detail are first rate shes even cuterhotter in anime form the pose is weird but fun to look at it comes with a stand that has the word amecomi on it she looks hot in that skintight suit and even with the helmet on her i give this statue a  out of

we have two other take and play sets including tidmouth sheds  this one combines our  year olds beloved thomas with hot wheels car action all three of us love to play with this setfirst the take and play sets are pretty compact and this one is nicely expanded to have many different interactions running the train up the hill lifting the gate on the way then stopping the train at the top of the hill at the second gate  my son releases the second gate and zoom thomas and his cars go round and round and come out at the bottom on either side depending on how you leave the direction switchgate pretending to be a really useful engine at work he takes thomas and his car to the elevator putting the rock into the elevator and then moving thomas to the top of the hill  my son then pulls the rock all the way up and it tips the rock into the car getting thomas in trouble by taking thomas and his cars up the windy track the wrong way he can get thomas all the way to the top of the hill by alternately pulling thomas at the front as far as he can into the tunnels and then pushing the last car forwards enough so thomas peeks out at the other side of each tunnel  he then says thomas look out big hill and pushes thomas down the hill surprisingly thomas and his cars rarely derail going down the big hill and around the curve which means the manufacturer planned for reverse play and engineered accordinglyyou can attach this take and play set to other take and play sets  this is one of those toys that i really wish id had when i was little

this toysrus exclusive is one of the more elaborate tnp playsets and our grandson was thrilled with it  once you raise the cargo up in the lift it dumps into thomas cargo car both thomas  the carcargo are included and then he can decide which path to take out of the rock quarry our grandsons favorite is circling around and around then bursting through the quarry doors  this set features an inclined section of track and there are  points where it can be connected up to other sets or additional track  we were able to find our grandsons for  and thought that was a decent price in comparison to other takenplay setsthe only thing id caution is that if you want a set your youngster can easily and quickly take on the road with you you might want to consider one of the   under msrp playsets instead  update  there are  tnp sets as of summer  that are what ive come to categorize as elaborate with msrps of   up and they are in order of introduction  rescue from misty island rock quarry run load  go rumbling gold mine run thomas at pirates cove the dieselworks the great quarry climb thomas at the ironworks thomas adventure castle slate loading station and lion canyon i wouldnt recommend them for easy transport  those are the only ones that grandma says have to stay put in the basement  theyre great if you plan to keep them set up at homea little of our own thomas history as first time grandparents my husband and i wanted to start some type of collection for our grandson that he could possibly pass along to his own kids one day  our grandson was   at the time and had been talking a lot about a certain train named thomas a little fella whom  now seems hard to believe  wed never heard of  after doing some research it seemed the takenplay line might be the perfect investment to engage and encourage his active imagination as well as provide a fun way for us to interact with him  what a rewarding decision weve had so much fun together with this quality line of trains vehicles and playsets  hes now  and a large portion of our basement has become a wonderful sodor land of make believe that we all enjoy visiting  and continues to hold his interest which is quite a feat given the tendency at that age to move in and out of toy phases so quickly

this small table and chair set is a great way to display figures from sideshows scum  villany line sideshow did its typically amazing job sculpting and painting the set it really looks like it came out of the cantina and has suffered from years of use the set includes the table with a lightup lamp in the middle two chairs and three glasses best of all the figures sit down comfortably in the chairsi took away one star because of the price at nearly  this set is expensive i dont know how much it cost sideshow to make this set but it seems expensive the parts are well made and actually quite heavy so sideshow isnt simply passing along cheap plastic sets this is very high quality still for the price i would have liked a little bit more

ive been on a roll collecting the bioshock figures over the last month or so and managed to snag a subject omega gift pack on clearance the other day last store in the state that had this thing i was pleasantly surprised at how nice omega and the little sister looked and even though hes just a repaint of delta when it comes down to it i like him a little more than subject delta the little sister thats included is again a repaint of the other little sister figure but this one comes with a unique accessory the obvious selling point of this gift pack is the bunny splicer mask there was a big deal about many of these being damaged during shipping with the ear thats supposed to be intact breaking off easily mine is just fine so its not a problem for me but it is something to consider when ordering this set online if possible email the seller and see if they can make sure its ok before sending it out and make sure its packed securelysubject omega is the exact same figure as subject delta except with different colors and he comes with a giant gun instead of the drill arm the paint on this guy looks great and he stands out from the other bioshock figures because of it he even has the appropriate symbols on his hands something that was missing on the delta figure the slightly brighter color scheme pops out when hes with the other big daddies omega has articulation in the shoulders elbows wrists waist upper legs knees and feet the gun can be held in his right hand without any problems and it looks better inperson than it does in the stock picture above once again just like delta youll have to attach the tank on his back as well as the tubes but this only takes a few seconds this is a very sturdy figure that shouldnt have any trouble standing up on its own over time and theres very little at risk of breaking here the one thing to watch out for is the knife on omegas left hip it doesnt come out of the sheath so dont pull on it too hard as it could break off of the legthe little sister is perfectly inscale with omega as well as the other bioshock figures she has a good amount of articulation headneck shoulders elbows and knees just the right amount and not too much so she wont be doing insane poses the paint on this figure is very good too and i like that they gave her a red dress instead of simply repackaging the other little sister figure she comes with her good ol syringe which can be held in either hand and a subject delta doll that can be held with a little work or you can give it to delta or omega to holdfinally theres the splicer mask made of resin the mask sculpt looks just right and should fit most people the elastic strap on the back goes down diagonally so just be careful when adjusting it so it doesnt slip off all of a sudden im actually a little disappointed with the paint work on the mask it looks rushed and like the weathering was randomly done still it looks good when worn and is the key piece for any splicer costume if youre going for the look just use extreme caution when removing it from the plastic tray theres a small tab that holds the full ear down and since resin is a much more fragile material than most people give it credit for you could easily snap the ear in half when trying to take it outas long as you can get a good deal i highly recommend getting this set the paint on the mask may be lacking but its a heck of a lot better than the welder mask that came out seriously why bother making that thing its just weird that the one big daddy figure that does come with a little sister is the one that was exclusive to a certain store and came with another bonus

dash is one of the three logging locos along with bash  ferdinand introduced in s misty island rescue movie  dash is bashs twin both funloving characters who try to finish their work on time  dash has a yellow boiler wheels and lining with a greyishblue cab and dome with a semicircular symbol depicting  yellow trees and  brown axes crossing each other on the right side of his cab  he also has freckles  dash first appeared on takenplays  collector checklist and we paid  for our grandsons  update  fisherprices summer  msrp is   we paired him up with the rest of the logging locos and the rescue from misty island playset  thats where our grandson keeps hisa little of our own thomas history as first time grandparents my husband and i wanted to start some type of collection for our grandson that he could possibly pass along to his own kids one day  our grandson was   at the time and had been talking a lot about a certain train named thomas a little fella whom  now seems hard to believe  wed never heard of  after doing some research it seemed the takenplay line might be the perfect investment to engage and encourage his active imagination as well as provide a fun way for us to interact with him  what a rewarding decision weve had so much fun together with this quality line of trains vehicles and playsets  as he approaches  a large portion of our basement has become a wonderful sodor land of make believe that we all enjoy visiting  and continues to hold his interest which is quite a feat given the tendency at that age to move in and out of toy phases so quickly

the green mermaid barbie is quite lovely  much better than she shows in the picture  her colors are a much more vibrant transition from bright yellow to deep reach aqua blue  she has a lot of details in her tail and just enough glitter everywhere to look magical  her hair changes from pink to purple in hot water  then back to pink with cold water  in comparison to the other two barbies mermaids which have blue eyes she has brown eyes to match her hairone of the features i like with this particular series of dolls is that they have a rubber molded area at the top of the fin at the waist  so when you bend her to sit you dont see any seams or underwear as with the other barbies  its a smart design and really helps keep the illusion of the doll being a mermaid however the rest of the tail is hard plastic  i must preferred the soft bendable plastic of previous more expensive barbie mermaidsshe is one in a series of  that all have the same exact details face etc  only the hair color and the color on the tailsbikini topskin changes

im not a huge fan of the clone wars but cad bane is a pretty cool character this is probably still the best version of him hes got a removable jacket two guns a bag and his little robot assistant  and of course the hat the sculpt and paint application are great and dont look cartoonish at all in fact he blends in pretty well with the regular line of figures

i chose to review this set as opposed to the others because this set had the most current packagingi can review only half of this set the yellow cake mix it was just ok i could detect an anise flavoring in there thats about it i will never review the devils food cake mix because i am thrifty and refuse to spend money on a kids cake mix that can possibly end up tasting like dog food after baking in my defense i was trying to be politely informative to the public at large by stating that this is the most current packaging for the easy bake mixes thus easy bake products with the cursive script are the most current and therefore the freshest i could not review the yellow cake mix that is packaged alone here on amazon because the packaging of that particular one is older with different script could be an entirely different recipecontain different ingredients and was not the one that i purchased these products with the current ohsotrendy cursive script were the ones that i saw in toysrus in november  i also saw at the same store the easy bake mixes with the former simple kiddish script iethe old version and swiftly concluded that those products were less than fresh so basically i wish to clarify that i tried to make the wisest purchasing decision and we did purchase and try the yellow cake mix with the most current packaging and yes it was nuthin to write home about now if half of this set was just ok and not spectacular would you want to take a pricey roll of the dice and then find out that the chocolate half was indeed terrible and with the odds against you let me tell ya these mixes are not exactly stellar i am taking way one overall star so that i do not cause general confusion in the area of whether or not i endorse these mixes i do not and maybe the readers who voted my review as unhelpful are easy bake mixes zealots or they thought i was lame for only reviewing one half of a product jeez i thought i was helpingfootnotes  i do not know if the packaging has changed since november  five stars for fun due to general baking excitement five for durability until the end result of the prepared mix is masticated

hey kids do you need a barbarian well today is your lucky day matt gubsers goldar is the man for the job a bald musclebulging loinclothandfurrybootwearing hunk of bristling violencebarbarian pc check barbarian villain check massive bulging thighs uh yeah that tooits telling that many painted pictures of goldar give him elaborate tattoos its because hes pretty boring as barbarians go theres no flowing hair animal pelts unless his loincloth counts or much of anything hes mostly beefcake with an axeits justhes also got unreasonably large thighs goldar looks suitably menacing but did i mention his thighsa suitable sculpt for any barbarian who isnt afraid to show a little leg
