i cant say ive always wanted a stuffed animal dalek  but this thing is great  it is soft but comes with a solid base so it doesnt fall over  also the balls on the side are hard plastic so they hold the shape as wellthe dalek says when you push his chest ex ter mi nate and better you would make a great daaalekthe dalek is decent sized  not big enough to be bulky but not small enough to disappear either  even my  year old loves it and shes never seen dr whoin all very happy i purchased this

seriously how stoked were you when it was announced that rita repulsa would finally be immortalized in action figure form i remember dreaming about finding a rita figure at the store when i was little and a huge mmpr fan but one was never made for some reason or another we got practically every bad guy from the show except for her even finster was made on more than one occasion but here we are and the rita figure has been hitting stores for a whileand im seeing tons of them still sitting there on the shelf where the gold white and green ranger figures were instant hits and sold out quickly they had all been made many times before but with the first ever rita being released you think shed be the most rare figure of the current power rangers toys nope this is one ugly figure and only the most hardcore of hardcore collectors should bother getting this thingrita is as plain as you can get ironic that this is labeled as a collector item right she sports the absolute worst paint job ive seen of the classic character figures with two black spots for eyes and a pink bar for her lips there are parts of her dress that arent painted including the boots that you can see under her dress and they didnt even bother painting her rings or anything either her wand fares slightly better but even here they couldve done a better job rita barely has any articulation either with the main ones being her shoulders and elbows granted she didnt do much in the show apart from screaming at her cronies and throwing her wand but itd be nice to get her in a cool pose instead of just standing around looking like a ditz with that blank look on her face and although they dont show it in the stock picture her rufflething around her neck is included in the box its poorly painted too and snaps into her neck making it easy to remove if you ever want to do i even need to bring up the manly hands too look at those things with those skinny lanky arms and huge hands she looks like the lost love of pumpkinhead or somethingid like to say that it hurts me to give the lone rita figure one star but thatd be a big lie i was hyped when it was announced that shed be one of the classic figures but as soon as i saw it inperson i laughed out loud i still laugh when i go to the store and see  of these still in the same exact spot they were the week before dont give in to any higher than standard prices online as you should have no problem finding this sick puppy at any store that carries the samurai line but trust me when i say that youre better off buying some pop tars or maybe a nice new toothbrush

dont most included stickers were of poor quality stamps were cheesy and did not do the job some markers were dead within the week cardboard borders for photo framing were flimsy inside the notebook l x w every other page is a clear plastic sleeve for scrapbook tidbits the twelve paper pages for artwork or journal moments are pink and blue and have graphic backgrounds to add pizazz the only plus is the notebook cover with the cute graphics themes are rocker chick or woodland babe hasbro could do better

dont i bought this item on sale at toysrus even though some of the stickers adorning some beads were falling off in other packages ours was fine but i thought that these beads would be a lilliputian version of those fisher price plastic shapes with pegs at either end these beads are very hard to conjoin my fiveyearold cannot do it and neither can i plus we have been able to make only one small bracelet i think the beads have been intentionally marketed in that way so that a child cannot get hooked on something that can hurt them iethe beads will not give and they only give you so much that a necklace cannot be made yes so if you do attempt to try to make a necklace you end up with either two male ends or two female ends if you try to correct this by strategically removing and moving some beads the necklace ends up being too small for human use nice that the company is trying to be safe but too weird for me the packaging does not even state what you can make with these beads i never learn the company states on the back to make just one design at a time but i have yet to find the designs included within under three is not admitted nice try but no go

the color  detail of both wrestlers is firstrate a good reminder of their many matches mainly at sacrifice  in which sting won they move very well after you play with them for a while its prefect for any tnarvd andor sting fan i give this  pack a  out of

i have no idea why this miniature exists i mean being a steampunk witch requires a very specific set of circumstances that brings up other questions like why a witch would go through the trouble of turning her broom all steapunky if she has access to technology that would most assuredly provide better alternatives for flying than riding a broomstill bob ridolfis created a decent sculpt of a witch the steampunk elements are primarily limited to her goggles and the weird metal accents on her broom but that can be easily excused as magical attributes of a staff that happens to be a broom  also her left arm appears to be made of cybernetic  excuse me steampunk  materiala weird sculpt that will likely have little use in most campaigns but if you happen to have a steampunk campaign combining witches and technology ditas got the market covered

y wing is perhaps one of the most famous ships after the x wing  it was piloted by luke in the animated cartoon of the very old christmas special that featured boba fett you may find it in youtube i believe  it also was part of the first attack run in the death star trench but they never got to fire to the target  in the star wars simulators it is shown as a slow ship but its design is quite coolnow lets go for the review on this toyit has some features one seat very detailed cockpit that includes a retractable targeting computer a moveable gun on top of the cockpit front landing gear should be manually deployedretracted while it has a handle to retractextend rear landing gear a button on top to drop a missile that hangs under the ship room for a standard astromech droid red paint job and engine exhaust nicely paintedthe cockpit is very tight so it is hard to fit a pilot inside mostly because of the handles that pilot has to control the ship  i was lucky to find the pilot pack that contained an astromech and two y wing pilots but even they are hard to fit inside  when you pick a rebel pilot action figure be sure that it is as poseable as possible ball articularions in the arms and knees or you may not be able to put a pilot inside  for example there is a pilot luke that has no such articulations and he does not fit as well as biggs action figure  so buying the right action figure for this ship is a tricky task  one less star for thatalso finding an astromech droid may also be an issue  for example the sail barge version of rd does not fit because of the cables in the legs of the droid do not fit inside  you need to remove or retract the center leg so it fits insidethe missile is barely hanging so it may easily fall as it is not strongly attached  a kid may loose it easily  also the astromech may fall if the ship is inverted they did not add any type of device to secure the astromech so it does not fall  it is just a hole to put the astromech inside  it may be disappointing for a kid to put an rd inside and have it falling and discover that the antenna is broken  so as i see it it is a toy for collectors not really for kids unless parents are star wars geeks who select the action figures carefully and kids do not plan to put a pilot inside and then remove itthe ship is very detailed on top and bottom but it has generic details in the sides giving it the look of a toy like the details in the side of the old diecast metal version of millenium falcon that had generic details instead of a collectors artifact  the paint job is red not yellow as in episode iv  it has a rear window which is not movie accurate as in the movie it had a metal panel  and it has a panel behind the pilot instead of just a seat where you could see through the rear side windows as in the moviethe cockpit panel is very detailed but not movie accurate but more detailed than older versions  so in that respect i like this version better  this ship always had some visual cool factor and even if it is not  movie accurate it is a nice classic ship which is valuable in terms of nostalgia but not sculpting or paint jobthe paint job is mostly for the nose and engine exhaust and the rest is beige painted pipes not battle damage  the rest has a plain color as it relies on sculpted details  and since side details are generic it looks a bit more like just a toyso if you are a parent looking for a nice experience for your kid you now know that this may not be the best toy for your kid specially considering the price that is too high sellers price  toys r us for   but if you want it for a stand and you do not bother to pay  extra out of nothing it is just ok it is a collectors item with the quality of just a toy for kids  its price is given by geeky nostalgia and some sellers greed not sculpting or paint job

the otter comes with painted details and then glittered tail collar flower decoration on the head and inner ear  the glitter stays on well and doesnt rub off easily adding to the detail of these new pets the paws have painted relief pads on them  very cutethe box is good for holding accessories or carrying  pets to school  it closes securely and easily

just be aware that you are getting a blind box no one including you has any idea which set you are getting we ended up with the little cabinet set the theme is alice in wonderland chocolates the cabinet  tall x  wide has a teal wooden door with a golden knob and opens to three small spaces sized just right for the three included chocolates that you get all pieces are plastic and we got a small creamcolored mad hatter  a small dark brown square printed with a pink cheshire cat  and a soft pink onedimensional inchworm  not the caterpillar but it has been a long time and i cannot place this character we also got a small golden embellished frame  for putting in included paper pics of characters they slide into the frame and are held there well the frame does not fit into the cabinet you can also cut out a very small paper placard which announces chocolate assortment alice wonder sweets shop the cabinet is not latched so if you turn it upsidedown the pieces will fall out we are pretty good with holding onto small pieces so that is no biggie to us it is a definite choking hazard and i would not buy this set for anyone under nine i can just see anyone under that being blase and losing the pieces shipping was extremely quick and they even added in free bonuses of a bit of gum and deco tape we already knew it was a bit pricey but we wanted to go down the rement road even just once glad we did

i saw this at the boston childrens museum and put it on my  year old sons amazon wish list for his last birthday almost a year ago  this block set has seen weekly use since then and although i think it has provided both children quite a bit of bathtime fun it doesnt live up to what it purports to  id give this four stars otherwiseboth my  year old son and  year old daughter use the big yellow base to build things on  my son tried many times to do a ball run in the early days and doesnt try anymore because it never works  the blocks just dont stick together well enough  so although it doesnt do well for a ball run they do love stacking the blocks playing with the cup and ball and sticking the blocks along the tiled wall they stick to the wall just fine they dont do so well sticking to each otherthey have really enjoyed the set but i wish id gotten them one of the more castlelooking block sets rather than this ball run since it didnt work out even if i did itthe pieces have stood up to a lot the  year old just stopped chewing on the pieces and still look like new  maybe im being too hard on the set by giving it only  stars

ig was one of my favorite star wars bounty hunters when i was younger however most figures of this guy were relatively stiff even the more recent hasbro versions of ig has much less articulation than most other figures one almost wonders how the droid could ever kill his targets if he can barely hold his gunthats one of the reasons i love sideshows ig so much he comes loaded with articulation his arms and legs dont just swing back and forth but also laterally this allows you to pose ig in much more dramatic poses in addition igs eyes light up with a deep red when you pat his headoverall ig has never looked so good  or moved like the assassin droid he is

this is a pretty cool toy for younger kids wanting to have their own camping adventure i was surprised by how big it was when it arrived but even more surprised at how dim the light was the campfire kids lantern would be best for young kids who want to pretend theyre camping indoors maybe under a blanket propped up with chairs anyone hoping to bring this along for some real camping will be disappointed the key feature to me anyway is the sounds it makes theres a wolf howling crickets chirping and frogs croaking the portion of the lantern that lights up the glass even has some designs on it that you can see if its placed near a wall deer trees a wolf and a crescent moon are all featured and look great when you can actually see themas many others have pointed out the problem with this toy is that the light is provided by a single white led bulb but the other issue is that it requires  aa batteries maybe its just me but it seems like this kind of thing should use less than that these problems aside this toy is a steal at its current price and a must for any parents with children who are scared of the dark what better to have at their side when walking through the house at night than their own little lantern well maybe a robot dog with flashlight eyesbut still

these erasers are bright thick and good quality  they also erase wellthe erasers also separate into pieces  eg the bow comes off the monster high skull and the blue of the lightning bolt pops out of eraser this gives them a bit of playabilityi purchased these as party favors  separated them out of the package of  and gave each person several in the party bags they are very thick and heavy which attests to them having a good qualitynote that the packs are themed  one is themed for draculaura batvampire lips and one is themed for frankie stein bolt stitched heart

i found these to be sturdy of decent quality and able to hold warm or cold beverages over long periods of time without soaking through or breaking easily  especially for younger kids who tend to grab things strongly they held up easilyi would have liked them to be a bit taller  they are bathroom cup sized  which i feel is a bit too small for the kids that like monster high tweens and pre tweens  but then again if they spill there isnt as much in there either

these napkins are made of thick paper and worked well  the graphic is printed nice and bright and they look great at a monster high themed party  keep in mind that they are small in size  half the size of a regular napkin  but that makes it easier to use them at parties and not have them take up too much room

the plate sets are brightly patterned with strong graphics  they are thick coated and very sturdy we put everything from hot food to ice cream that melted everywhere and they held up well  they dont bend at all so they are great for carryingthese are dessert plates so they are very small  think the small plate that you put a roll on at a restaurant you can fit ice cream or a cupcake  perhaps a small slice of birthday cake only

the items in this package are of very good quality  the plates are thick brightly printed and held up under ice cream cake and greasy french friends with no problem  the cups are a bit on the small side causing plenty of extra refills but that can be an asset if one is knocked over and spills  less to go everywhere  in all we were pleased with the items

the first wave of black and white miniplushes left a lot to be desired problems like overstuffing and poorly sewn mouths were on nearly every plush i saw in stores and the overall quality just wasnt that great i was wondering if the superb quality of the last couple of waves of prebw plush was just a fluke fortunately it seems like the previous black and white miniplush hit a bumpy road and all is well again series  just started showing up in stores earlier this month and all of them are very wellmade my daughter picked out deerling and minccino first and well be going for the others soon even i went awww out loud when i saw this little pink deer on the shelfdeerling is incredibly cute and looks exactly as she does in the stock picture above she can even stand up on her own if you adjust her legs a little the material shes made of isnt as soft as the kind they used for celebi jirachi and the others in those waves but its still very soft and kids will love to cuddle with this little deer the colors arent too bright or too dull they looked about right to me based on the tag attached to her the flower on her head isnt as wimpy as snivys arms from the last series which is a huge plus in my book all the stitching and work on the eyes and mouth look great and i have zero complaints about her theres nothing to watch out for no areas that could rip or break easily but as usual if she needs to be washed use a damp cloth instead of throwing her in the washing machineof all the pokemon from series  i think deerling is going to be one of the two most popular shes too adorable for kids or parents to pass up and looks great with all the other mini pokemon and like i always say with these do not give in to the online prices these guys just came out and if theyre not in your stores yet just keep waiting i remember it took about a month before series  hit the east coast so just be patient and youll get a good deal and keep deerling in mind as a stocking stuffer too what pokemon fan wouldve love to see her head poking out of their stocking

update  there are  takenplay playsets in the line as of summer   by setting a little money aside each week grandpa and i have collected all but a half dozen of them for our grandson so we were very happy when fisherprice came out with new ways to connect them all in   its a bit surprising that while fisherprice widely distributed their tnp bridge flexitrack and scurve they gave toysrus two great exclusives  a straight  curved track pack which has  pieces and this especially helpful  piece straight curved  crossings track pack  the tconnector and crossing pieces in this pack are so great when youre spreading out and making more elaborate connections  this set also includes  straight tracks  large malefemale  medium mf and  small  mf  mm  ff and  curved tracks  large mf  small mf  while all tnp sets connect up to each other its great to have these other fun ways to connect them  and now theres a mini spiral track and bridge track not to be confused with the first bridgewe were first time grandparents of a   year old when my husband and i began a tnp collection for our grandson hoping hed pass it along to his own kids one day  weve all had a great time interacting with this overall quality line of trains vehicles and playsets and now fun new ways to connect them all  he turned  at the end of april and still enjoys spending a couple of hours of each day he spends with us in the sodor land of make believe that spans a large portion of our basement  although disneys cars characters are beginning to occupy another portion its nice to see our investment continuing to hold his interest engaging and encouraging that active imagination  grandson  came along in march so we plan to continue collecting tnp for several years to comeif youre interested in starting a collection of thomas treasure hunt adventure muddy adventure thomas at the ironworks go go speedy railway sodor lumber company thomas shark exhibit thomas adventure castle treasure tracks slate loading station so easy that your dog can make these you get  fabric shapes of various colors and shapes  different colors of bracelet bands  necklace cords  assorted snaps and  multi attachments i chose this particular kit for  at big lots this past spring because i could see that the bracelets were adjustable my daughter has a tiny wrist all you do is pick three swatches but the biggest on the bottom and the littlest on top of the attachment put on a snap slide on the wristband and you are gorgeous directions include how to loop the cord and how to make a keychain sturdy and the selection of fabrics to choose from is terrific the combos are endless no kids three or under flirty and fun

these sets are so fabulous no major messes and simple to doyou geteasy to follow instructions ice markers orange green and magenta plastic pendants to use as necklaces or keychains with plugs black nylon cords for above plastic rings with bubble covers plastic bracelets  bases with clear flat covers silver elastic cord square inserts some are designyourown some have zebra print some have peace signs some have flowers for bracelets big circle inserts same designs as above for pendants small circle inserts same as above for ringsyou docolor the inserts with the markers if you mess up just wipe and redo let dry a few minutescarefully punch out inserts try to hold edges only and as little of the front as possible so you do not smear design inserts are not stickers so do not try to peel off of cardboard backing yes i did tryplace insert in pendant and put in back plug or put in bracelet base bead and put on clear covers with notch in right place thats important or put insert on ring base and snap on clear bubblethe black cord is used for the necklace and the silver is for the bracelet both are easy to string up i am bad at that sort of thing so trust menotescan change your creations whenever you want by just wiping off previous deisgn markers actually do crystallizesilver cord should not be elastic it is impossible to knot the bracelet when we tried the beads just fell right off when i tried again with a super knot the same thing happened buy nonelastic silver cord if you can so hearts are not brokenwe did not have trouble with the snapping or unsnapping of any plastics in this set as a previous reviewer stated we did not need toolsrings are a bit big fit ten and up at big lots and upminus one star because of the silver cord fiasco end results are always lovely and poppy right on

sidney is one of the diesels introduced in s day of the diesels movie  nicknamed sid sidney is an attractive looking diesel  navy blue with yellow lining black roof red base and  black wheels  sidneys known to be a bit forgetful  he made his debut on the  takenplay collector checklist  we were able to find our grandsons for   he loves him  update  fisherprices summer  msrp is   we paired sidney up with the rest of the day of the diesels intros  den dart belle flynn paxton norman  talking percy at the dieselworks as well as the percy  kevin to the rescue themed pack and the dieselworks playset  our grandsons other diesel trains dennis d and the regular  talking versions of diesel live at the dieselworks as well  the only exceptions are mavis who lives at his rock quarry run playset salty who lives at his cranky at the docks playset and the regular  talking versions of diesel  who live on a shelf in permanent time out because our grandsons afraid of hima little of our own thomas history as first time grandparents my husband and i wanted to start some type of collection for our grandson that he could possibly pass along to his own kids one day  our grandson was   at the time and had been talking a lot about a certain train named thomas a little fella whom  now seems hard to believe  wed never heard of  after doing some research it seemed the takenplay line might be the perfect investment to engage and encourage his active imagination as well as provide a fun way for us to interact with him  what a rewarding decision weve had so much fun together with this quality line of trains vehicles and playsets  as he approaches  a large portion of our basement has become a wonderful sodor land of make believe that we all enjoy visiting  and continues to hold his interest which is quite a feat given the tendency at that age to move in and out of toy phases so quickly

out of the twentyfour critters that one can adopt i fell in love with a little ish cloud with the moniker of dipsy i too have the teletubbies theme song running through my noggin here his pal is a coy smiley cat purdy ouch and the suprise guest is a demented starfish fumble related to patrick moshis are composed of tough plastic the included collector card was folded up instead of being packaged in a flat fashion which lends that area a feeling of trashiness yeah yeah just throw the card in who cares i regret buying these things as my older daughter has already expressed a desire to get some for herself and this was about ten minutes after viewing her little sisters new moshis right now purdy is hangin out in the back of a tonka pickup we are weird and we include weird characters in even weirder plots but after releasing the moshis in my abode the moshi music died for me

these were a hit at the birthday party and my daughter has been using them at school for the past  weeks the erasers are thick heavy and feel of good quality some of the pieces can be removed  eg the bow comes off the skull or the teeth pop out of the lips the graphics are bright and the girls had fun trading them during the party  note that there are two sets either this one the vampiredraculaura or frankie stein has a lightning bolt stitched heart

on the first day of christmas  im going to review the american sting action figure the color and detail is firstrate a good reminder of when sting won the nwa worlds title from ric flair at the great american bash in  it moves well after you play with it for a while the coat comes off easily a perfect gift for any nwasting andor any pro wrestling fan i give this toy a  out of

i was actually somewhat disappointed with the previous force unleashed figures however the figures in this set are all of the highest quality all have lots of articulation and clean paint applications the galen marek as a sith is great his pose and facial expression are truly sithlike the stormtrooper figures are all new designs and pretty fun variations on a classic stormtrooper theme darth phobos is probably the weakest link im glad hasbro made a figure of her but her face looks sad rather than angry also i would have preferred another new character rather than  stormtroopers still overall these are all quality figures

bizu are transformers for girls or gobracelets if you will they go from little pets to bracelets themes are rock wild glam and funky price here is great my daughter paid more for this set at kmartheres how it worksyou get about twenty beads which include a torso head tail and at least three accessory beads egcoffee cup blow dryer lipstick the balance of the beads actually become the legs and arms of the two included pets this set also has a horseyou also get a thin clear rubberband with clasps at each end that fit into one another for bracelet use using the included beading tool which is very easy to use you attach the top of the band to the tool slide the beads on per the included images very helpful stretch the top of the creation off of the tool when finished and presto you got a bizu easy to bead keep tool for future use see belowjoining the clasps together to make the bizu a bracelet is difficult the directions are ikeaish the female end has a groove i cannot figure out if the other end slides or snaps in also while trying to figure out this enigma some of the beads went sliding off and i had to whip the beading tool back out consternation no maybe about itmaking the bizu a pet is easy for me but not my yearold please note she is not the handy type so do not let that scare you all you have to do is fold down the cats head to its torso you then grab her arms which are the two longish beads and twist those two beads together at the same time three times away from your torso to create her arms you do the same with the tailbutt to create the legs the pets then appear to be holding the accessory beads to destroy the creation just pull each end the clear claspsother detailsmy daughters cat is constantly going from pet mode to bracelet mode without her doing however during a throw test in which i threw these pets upon her bed as if i hated them neither one popped out of pet mode hmmm i suspect that this is happening to her because she is tweaking their positions in order to make them sit stand etc and the cats band might be slightly weakerlooser anyway not for under three and contains rubber only three stars because of the clasping problemupdate on  i now give this product five stars my kids cat is now fine she does have a horse that is weak now but i suspect that the bandsbeads got switched however i now know that that is a rarity with these bracelets my older kid age  has no problem with these bracelets now and my yearold even does the beading herself she can also convert it into an animal and then back to bracelet mode also the clasp has changed now you get the simple placebarin circle one terrific improvement shame that they are on their way out

miguel camino is  in the cars  singles line and was one of the  race cars in the cars  world grand prix race  he represents spain very brightly colored and neat looking  though his name refers to a chevy el camino he more closely resembles a corvette  our grandson became a cars fanatic shortly before his th birthday and weve been collecting them ever since  in case you know as little as grandpa  i did last year before being introduced to this world of cars the other racers were francesco bernoulli lewis hamilton max schnell raoul caroule shu todoroki carla veloso nigel gearsley rip clutchgoneski jeff gorvette and  of course  lightning mcqueen  theyre super durable so we know hell be able to pass them along to his own kids one day  we paid too much for miguel    shipping but we couldnt find him at the retail level

i bought this for a birthday party game  figured the  year olds would enjoy playing it  the board is colorful pressboard and holds up to play  but it slots into two small wood feet that hold it up but dont give it any strength when the beanie birds are tossed at it  it falls over immediatelythe bird beanies are cute but more of a flat pancake shape rather than the round birds they are decent quality nicely made but look more like a flat head than the whole bird bodythe graphics on the front are very colorful and cute  and the points are easy to read  but the birds are nearly the size of the oval throw holes making it rather difficult to get them through for points  i am a bit worried the game might be too hard for the  olds to actually get through the holethe size of the game is about that of an x sheet of paper its small and compact  more of a table top game than one youd put on the floor its much too small for the floor

picked up this figure for my boyfriends eighteenth birthday after i loaded up my  mercury mariner with a bunch of wonder womanthemed gifts i drove down to his job in the hot dog booth at the safeco stadium where the seattle mariners play he was more than thrilled see see me much to his charm he has always been a such huge wonder woman fan a few years ago for my fortieth birthday he surprised me at work when he came in dressed as wonder woman the shared delight from of all my coworkers here at the outgoing call center really enhanced the experiencehaving not actually played with the toy myself yet it does in fact seem very durable from its cute shape and construction i really look forward to finding out more so with him after workgiggles

sideshow has done it again where hasbro only gave collectors a cheap paper diorama background of the cantina in the late s sideshow provides a nice large bulky environment for our cantina figures and this cantina environment is large it easily fits the entire modal nodes band  members as well as one of the cantina tables two chairs and two figures seated in the chair the environment also has two lights that light up and a doublesided windowi have absolutely not problems with what isnt included the environment is pretty expensive for basically amounts to two walls and part of a ceiling the set doesnt come with any bar glasses stools or chairs however the thing i found most disappointing is the lack of a floor there is no floor at the bottom of the environment this really undermines the set it would have really completed the scene to have a floor to go along with the two walls and ceilingif you can afford it and love the cantina scene its definitely works wonderfully as a way to display your figures

the color  detail are firstrate the pose is pretty good it has her hair waving in the air it has one claw up and one claw down the outfit they got her to wear is skintight and there forhot not to mentionthe amount of hot skin theyre showing i give this statue a  out of

comes with horse and ladybug little rabbitincarnated box  l x  w opens to reveal a patch of hayrug with a small concave octagonshaped base to place one of the included figures within this base is located on the door when opened please note that the base on the animals is circular shaped and not octagonshaped huh door does not close snugly figures escaped three times twice within seven minutes give or take also included is a small hamster ball which does close snugly pack rats please note ball does not fit within box only one pet at a time can fit in this ball so one pet will either be stuck at home or in rabbitbox lockdown via a broccoli rubberband that was my  daughters idea threeish and fourish rats will have trouble closing the hamster sphere hooking the sphere onto the box hook and then hooking the whole deal on a belt loop hook should be a bit bigger for easier use forlorn sighing here

whats included metallic pieces various shapes and sizes big pieces are  across small are about  ice markers green yellow and purplesilver cord gray plastic linksstencils alphabet  sun stars hearts etcwhat you dopick a design you can do a mobile a wall medallion even a wall flower if you choose the mobile coloring both sides is a mustpunch out the pieces you will need you can follow the images on the box or do your own designlay out your design before coloring we chose to do the wall medallion and we did not fully plan it out the back of the box has a wall design image so i just counted how many small pieces and how many big pieces we would need with nary a thought of where the holes were located more on that below when we went to hook the finished pieces together some holes did not match up with the links in the desired design and we then had to punch holes in strategic places to achieve the same look on the back of the boxpunch out the holes on the pieces you chose we had several rip a bit exposing the inner paper and they look horrible when that happens use a pencil to loosen itpop it out and if it still remains give it a tug towards you not away from youhope that makes sense please note if you decided to make a mobile and that happens you are doomed aluminum foil cover up perhapscolor away you can stencil or get crazy with your own designs if you mess up just wipe away let dry for  minutes markers can stain skin so keep them away from everything in your jointpick up pieces on the edges or the ink could smearplace links in holes to connect your pieces if no hole is present for some reason make your own with a hole puncher remember to punch the hole further in than you think otherwise it could be punched too close to the edge it is easier to redo a colored design that was invaded by a new hole than to repair a halfhole right on the edge this happened to me i used a bit of tape to bridge the hole and it is diceythread your creation with the cord for support and hang it up for all to oooh and aaahhumidifiers in the same room with your creation is a nono the ink will reliquefy and runvery easy and a great price at big lots at first i was going to give it just three stars due to the above hole problems but i would feel petty doing that my daughter had fun doing it and after the small repairs it totally lit up her room

just as well made as hasbromilton bradley puzzles if not better puzzle ends up in a rectangle shape roughly the dimensions of the box pieces do not come apart easily once interlocked the last couple months of my puzzleshopping career nov and dec  i have had trouble finding quality puzzles without special effects or dora for my prek kid all puzzles in discount retail stores nowadays seem to be either glitzy huge floor puzzles or  pieces and up this puzzle is a breath of fresh air

although wed already had the regular tnp knapford station as part of my grandsons takenplay collection this holiday version had enough variations to make it worth adding especially since i won it on an  bid  even with an  shipping charge my total of  was well under fisherprices january   msrp for the regular knapford station  i was so tickled and my grandson will love it  knapford holiday celebration was a toysrus exclusive and would be a great way to introduce thomas into s little persons life at christmas  the regular version included percy this one includes thomas festooned with red ribbons and mistletoe with red banners on both sides of his tank reading happy holidays in white lettering as well as a talking caboose  i wish it was the same quality diecast metal as sir topham hatts musical caboose its a smaller plastic version but its still cute  the caboose is green and red with  green wheels decorated with a wreathgold bow and has a little painted on santa standing in the doorway  when you press the button on top santa says ho ho ho merry christmas there are lots of presents to deliver and plays a few brief musical notes that sound like the beginning of jingle bells  the station itself with its  dome glass roof that spans the oval track and  doors that swing open has holiday lights strewn above the station doors a dusting of snow on its glass roof its sides and atop the passenger station on the nd tier a cute detail is that the passengers that appeardisappear as if being picked up and dropped off as thomas passes by are all carrying christmas presents and the tracks are completely white appearing snow covered as opposed to the regular versions grey tracksupdate  there are  playsets in the tnp line as of summer  that fall into what ive come to categorize as an intermediate range of between  and they are in order of introduction  cranky at the docks tidmouth sheds knapford station knapford holiday celebration sodor steamworks repair shed sodor search  rescue center twist  tumble cargo drop thomas treasure hunt adventure thomas shark exhibit paxton at the blue mountain stone shed and arctic exhibit  the great thing about these sets and those i categorize as basic with under  msrps is that he can very quickly and easily disconnect and fold up the basic sets and even the intermediate sets relatively so and take them with us on excursionsa little of our own thomas history as first time grandparents my husband and i wanted to start some type of collection for our grandson that he could possibly pass along to his own kids one day  our grandson was   at the time and had been talking a lot about a certain train named thomas a little fella whom  now seems hard to believe  wed never heard of  after doing some research it seemed the takenplay line might be the perfect investment to engage and encourage his active imagination as well as provide a fun way for us to interact with him  what a rewarding decision weve had so much fun together with this quality line of trains vehicles and playsets  hes now  and a large portion of our basement has become a wonderful sodor land of make believe that we all enjoy visiting  and continues to hold his interest which is quite a feat given the tendency at that age to move in and out of toy phases so quickly

with how long the vinylmation figures have been around it seems weird that they just now started doing holidaythemed figures id taken a break from collecting vinylmation figures for a while but when i saw this set at the disney store it got me back into everything seeing the lion king ones right next to it helped too if you happen to have a disney store that still has these they should be on clearance now so dont wait any longer if you wanted this cute pair the frankensteins monster mickey and bride of frankenstein minnie are a great duo to have in your collection and would look awesome next to the fanfavorite pumpkin mickeyboth mickey and minnie sport spooky designs with mickey looking disgruntled and minnie looking pretty serious the paint on both of mine was better than usual without any problems actually and most of the ones ive seen in the disney store had good work too aside from the faces theres nothing really scary about them in case any parents were iffy on them no bones or muscle or anything like that is shown this is as grated as you can get for the two characters these are based on its a fun take on the universal classics i personally like the minnie a little more just because of the hair speaking of that the hair on both of this might be removable but im not sure you can pull the hair off a bit from the figures its a very soft plastic but its either risky to take off because of how its molded around the ears or it might just be really loose i dont want to pull at it too much and damage the figures or hair in the process if you can remove it you can throw it on another figure and make a pretty neat variant its nice that the hair is a separate piece as to keep the figure in the traditional mickeyshapethe figures use the newer vinylmation figure bodies and they feel a lot smoother and softer i cant describe it any other way but if you feel these and then another vinylmation with the newer body theres a clear difference between the two it doesnt mean the qualitys bad but its something i noticed immediatelyalong with the weird smell these guys have a very strong odor when you open the plastic tray but it goes away once theyve been displayed for a while my only other nitpick is that the arms on these feel less sturdy than usual so be careful when moving them aroundeven with the small problems i cant give this set anything less than  stars the figures are cute would make for great cake toppers at a wedding or halloween party and are just the beginning of a new vinylmation line the box does say series  after all maybe next year well get a mummy and werewolf of donald and goofy im all for it

as a prior reviewer stated there may be paint mistakes so inspect before buying in person our witch has a small mistake which fortunately looks like a small birthmark i got her because she was the last one left at target and the whole set is covetable by halloween freaks please note limited edition ones go very quickly so get your butt in gear i just wanted to mention that the lid of the pot does come off however book does not open and cannot be utilized in order to cast a spell on name of motherinlaw competitive friend or local bullies here

sturdy handle can get scratched up if the sword is dropped to the sidewalk due to fear of your opponent with the same sword handle is easy to grip and blade is made to look intentionally gritty with grime andor old dried blood the blade is a tiny tiny bit loose at the point where it is anchored in the hilt but i am not sure if this is due to fighting action or if it came that way i will say someone at amazon did take out of one of our swords packaging the card that identifies the sword as an adventure time sword so i hope karma gets him or her hey i paid for it that was my cardboard darnit anyway these swords are not foam as my husband thought great investigating sweetie dont get me wrong i am from the era of plastic heman swords plastic beastmaster swords plastic cheapo swords and the free culledfromnature sword stick all these aforementioned swords will give you a hell of a intentional or unintentional whack as well as the one that i am reviewing its just that when they arrived and i informed my husband that the swords were plastic he did not want my girls to have any sword fights because  he was worried about transferring of pain and  he had read a review that claimed that the paint on the sword was scraped off during fights my analyzation of his above worries arewere  pain is a constant part of life we also met a father in toys r us near some foam swords and he said that they can give you a heck of a whack and  the sword blades are plastic that was dyed at the factory they are not painted whatsover the hilts have small painted areas that can possibly become scratched from general life but unless you are holding the sword upsidedown during fights your sword will be ok you can find these swords at toys r us price is somewhat ok here at amazon do your homework later dudes

these are excellent quality thick brightly printed dessert plates  they are about the size of the plate you put a roll on at a restaurant  they will fit either  scoops of ice cream or cake itd be a tight fit for both but they are sturdy dont bend and held up under french fries and melted ice cream equally

carlo maserati is  in the cars  line of singles and is a maroon car designed as a maserati quattroporte the eldest of the reallife maserati brothers is also named carlo  hes the first of two maseratis in the cars  line the other is  bindo whos blue and is also named after a reallife maserati brother  just a minor showing in the movie but a cool looking car nonetheless  our grandson became a cars fanatic shortly before his th birthday and weve been collecting them ever since  theyre super durable so we know theyll still be around for him to pass along to his own kids one day  we paid too much for him  with free shipping but we couldnt find him at the retail level

these ship flat but it takes a minute or so to carefully separate each strand so it will hang there are only  with graphics  but each graphic is double sided with a different character eg cleo is on the back of draculaura  of the ends of the streamers are just foil symbols  draculauras lips frankies bolt and clawdeens paw print  the rest are just plain streamers with no brandingin all i was pleased with the purchase and my daughter and her friends loved them as well

the tattoos are perforated into groups of s making it easy to open the package and separate them for distribution in the gift bags  this allowed the girls a bit of fun trading and swapping with friends  the decals have instruction on the back of the package  i would have preferred it to be printed on the white side of the back of each tattoo thoughthe tattoos go on by removing the white plastic overlay putting it on a dry arm and then using a wet sponge on the back make sure you bring a sponge to the party  they seem to go on well and wash off after  days

these rubber bracelets are themed with the monster high colors but each only has a saying on them eg  ghoul for school i would have preferred they had the monster high girls pictures instead though  the bands although rubberized dont stretch all that much  they are also fairly large  and none stayed on the wrists of the tweens  in all i wish i had bought a different party favor instead  the quality is fine but they were pretty useless

tonight was the first time we spotted a zorua at the store and of course it was purchased immediately zoruas my daughters favorite new pokemon and its clear that this guy is going to be the hard to find one of series  even though series  has the best assortment in my eyes anyway theres no question that this little guy stands out from the rest if only because of the colors and hey you cant turn down a little foxdog thing i was surprised at how wellmade zorua is since a lot of the other miniplush from the bw series havent been that great id go so far as to say that zoruas right up there with jirachi and celebi from last years linezorua stands at just about  inches tall despite what some others might say and stands up on his own without falling over the quality of the material used to make him is very good and extremely soft the same material is used on the little bits of fur that stick out on the sides of his face though things like this have previously just been thick felt with no texture similar to the body the stitching on the eyes nose mouth and red dots are perfect and not out of place anywhere and they nailed the color perfectly with it being an almost purpleish grey im not trying to make it sound like just because i like this pokemon that theres nothing wrong with it but there really arent any cons to talk about here its good to see another quality miniplush pokemon especially with one of the stars of bw as far as taking care of it goes in the chance that food or marker gets on him id just use a damp cloth with cold water and rub it out all of the pokemon we have have been cleaned this way without any trouble you can always machine wash it but theres a chance that the stuffing inside might get messed up and youll have a lopsided zoruaseries  has only been out in stores for a few weeks but series  and  are still easily available so its safe to say that if you cant find a zorua right now youre bound to find one soon enough dont go for the high prices online yet unless you absolutely need one for a special occasion

this weekend my daughter spotted the green summer version of the deerling mini plush at the game store we always go to i was surprised to see the newest batch of black and white mini plush so soon after series  just came out not that long ago i was even more surprised that they chose to make one of the pokemon in the batch an alternate color of one of the previous ones the pink spring deerling was super cute and stood out from the others in series  but this green one stands out just for being so dang cute theres not much to say about this little guy since its virtually identical to the pink one except for the green coloringsummer deerling is as cute as a button and can stand up on his own the eyes and mouth are sewn in with the same good quality of the previous nonblack and white mini plush lines and im happy to say that i havent seen any issues with quality with the couple of deerlings that ive seen deerling looks exactly as it does in the stock picture above too i always have to say that since sometimes stock pictures are actually prototype images and things change from the time between prototype and final product and it could lead to some disappointments but little deerling looks great and im glad my daughter picked it out though i wouldve been even happier with the mini dewott they did a good job with the materials and stuffing and nothing feels like its in danger of breaking or ripping what more can i say this is a great little pokemon to add to your collectionas much as i love this one its weird that its one of the more dull ones from series  series  has really picked up the pace with different kinds of pokemon with  of them being the evolved forms of the starters who all look terrific as well since thats the case i think deerling will be one of the less popular ones and it should be easy to find once they start hitting other stores in the next couple of weeks

lewis hamilton is  in the cars  line of singles and was one of the  racecars in the cars  world grand prix race  hes designed as a mclaren mpc gt and his blackyellow design was chosen by the real life person he was named after formula one driver lewis hamilton  lewis is one of two drivers representing great britain in the race the other being nigel gearsley  our grandson became a cars fanatic shortly after his th birthday and weve been collecting them ever since  in case you know as little as grandpa  i did last year before we were introduced into this world of cars the other racers were francesco bernoulli max schnell miguel camino raoul caroule shu todoroki carla veloso nigel gearsley rip clutchgoneski jeff gorvette and  of course  lightning mcqueen  the cars are super durable and were sure hell be passing them along to his own kids one day  we got a pretty good deal on lewis too    shipping

ive had to cut back on buying vinylmation figures these last couple of months due to moving and other things that popped up but when the disney store had the lion king vinylmation display up i was floored everyone looked great the figures are colorful have great expressions and one of them even has gasp an accessory something rare for vinylmation figures i immediately fell in love with the rafiki figure and while i dont plan on buying all of them this is one set where id be fine keeping any that i gotthese figures use the newer vinylmation body that so many people are complaining about hardcore collectors throw a fit over any figures that use this body but you really cant tell the difference unless you have one sidebyside with an older body type or if youre that much of a vinylmation expert all of the figures are  inches tall with no short or tall figures and everyone here is a major character you have mufasa scar nala zazu rafiki tmion banzai princeintraining simba shenzi the baby lion some say its simba but im not sure pumbaa and the mystery figure is ed disney did a fantastic job with this line putting cool and wacky expressions on most of their faces ed has a crazy laugh look rafiki looks like hes pondering something about that crazy weather the hyenas look mischevious etc and what kids wont love the timon and pumbaa figures with bugs in their mouths im really glad they went this route instead of giving everyone neutral or smiling faces my personal favorites are rafiki scar ed and banzai rafiki comes with his medicine stick and he can hold it in his right hand its a small piece so be careful when opening the vinylmation box in case it pops out when you open the foil otherwise theres nothing to look out for with these guys durability gets  stars as usual since the arms can come off easily if youre not careful but since these are typically used for display its not a big deali dont think therell be a series  for the lion king since almost everyone is here in this set aside from adult simba adult nala and sarabiwhos left so this is an easy set to collect none of the figures are dull and even those with the least amount of color look great next to other vinylmation figures ive got rafiki kicking back with abe lincoln right now and it looks rad

these are very good quality and held up well at our  year olds party  the plates are of good quality and dont bend  but keep in mind that the plates are dessert plates  about the size of a bread roll plate  you can fit ice cream scoops or cake  but not really both easily  but they are very thick dont bend and are brightly printedthe cups are also kind of small  about the size of those dixie bathroom cups but the cups are strong held up well and dont crush easily

the plates were nice and thick and brightly printed  they made a good display and also held up under cake ice cream and hot food  they dont bend and easily carried loads without falling over  in all i was pleased with them and my daughter and her friends really liked them as well

i really liked the direction the designers went with robin in the arkham series  he looks the part like he could do the business  rather than like a kid who accidentally gets the job done in between quipsthe figure itself is highly articulated and very posable  it is also extremely well detailed and sculpted  its great to see in d just how finely thought out this particular character was in the gamesin all ive been very pleased with all the arkham city figures  very well done and a beautiful display

check please francie is one of the few barbie silkstone collection to feature a nonbarbie model  francie is decked out in s splendor with a high quality suit upscale purse and doggie on a leash  the silkstone material she is made of is heavier and softer than normal vinyl  meant to be much more like porcelain  as such she makes a lovely display in or out of the boxalthough the doll is of highest quality note that the dog is a bit of a let down  kind of looks like an art project rather than a nice plush  also note that for this modern updating of francie she has more of the barbie silkstone cupidbow mouthin all this is a great entry in the silkstone series since it is not poseable and made from a less durable material it really is only intended for adult collectors and not children

neca has their ups and downs but with the gremlins line they seem to be at the top of the hill i liked the gremlins figures from the first movie that came out a while ago gizmo stripe and the poker player one but felt they couldve been a little bit better mohawk from gremlins  though just plain ruled and i couldnt wait to see if they were going to make the other zany gremlins from the sequel in figureform lucky for us they did the first one my daughter and i got from this line is daffy not exactly my first choice but when you see em on sale at free comic book day you just go with it daffy fits perfectly in scale with mohawk and features nearly the same great attention to detail on the sculpt and paintfor the most part daffy looks exactly like how he does in the stock picture the only difference i see between the picture and the real thing is that the spots dont appear in the exact same places and the spikes on daffys head arent as sharp as they look in the picture he sports some good articulation just like mohawk though mohawk seems to have better arm articulation still you can move daffys head shoulders elbows hands upper legs knees and feet getting him in fun poses is easy despite those short legs its hard for him to fall over they nailed the goofy expression on his face giving him the least menacing look of the gremlins apart from maybe lenny even those tiny teeth dont look very threatening daffy also comes with two accessories a pair of groucho glasses and a noise maker party favor thingy the noise maker can be held in his left hand but cant stay in his mouth unfortunately the glasses fit perfectly though and look great when worn they actually work well with other toys we have and also work with mohawk too just be careful when fitting them on his face the plastic is thin and could be broken very easily on thesethe only things keeping him from getting a perfect score are how hes painted and the price its not that the quality control on the paint is bad but the paint just looks cheap for some reason i cant really put my finger on it but comparing daffy to mohawk in the paint department is night and day he looks kindashiny and i really dont care for the price hike in the gremlins over the span of less than  years look for these guys in stores that carry him before giving in to online prices where hes a good  more than he should be not including shippingi get the feeling that well end up getting all the gremlins and you know what im fine with that these are terrific figures and great to have on the shelf i look forward to seeing even crazier ones when they come out like the spider mohawk lightning gremlin female gremlin and the infamous flasher

recently i found out that neca might be discontinuing the gremlins line and that the big hits like spider mohawk greta and others may not be released as a result that doesnt really change my rating for this figure or the other gremlins but if you want to see more of these buy them from legit businesses and support the lineof the three gremlins in series  george will probably be seen as the boring one look at the set daffy is a crazy goofy gremlin with unique eyes and fun accessories the flasher gremlin is an icon and makes for a perfect centerpiece to any toy collection georgeis a grumpy looking gremlin with a cigar dont get me wrong as i still love this figure but compared to the other two its hard to come up with a list of good things to say about him when you have daffy and the flasher in the same series george stands at the usual gremlin height of about  inches and sports the same articulation as the others neck shoulders elbows wrists upper legs knees and feet he has a nice olive green coloring with lots of black spots and markings as well as some small spikes on his arms head and face george also has different ears than daffy and the flasher his mean face shows that he means business and is ready to punt any mogwai that gets too closegeorges single accessory is a cigar it fits in his snarling mouth perfectly yet it can fall out if hes bumped even a tiny bit you can also put it between his fingers for alternate display i dont know what else they couldve given himmaybe some goodies from the musical number in the movie anything extra would be nice considering the price increase on these new gremlins compared to those from the previous line mohawk stripe poker playeraside from the lone accessory deal i have a few tiny complaints georges toes were bent upward when i opened the package the plastic used on the hands and feet is soft and things like this are common as a result the only way to fix this that i know of is to dunk the limbs in hot water for a few seconds then bend them back into place holding pressure for a few minutes and then cooling them off george couldnt stand up on his own for more than a couple of minutes with this problem and it sucks that i had to fix it myself in order for him to be displayed the paint used for my figure also looks a little shiny compared to the flasher and daffy it could just be my figure ive never seen george in any stores but it still doesnt look as good as the paint on mohawkthose problems arent a deal breaker though and he looks great with the other gremlins released so far george may not be a standout like the flasher or even the flimsy lightning gremlin but do you really want to pass up a figure in this line its fun to have a ton of gremlins i dont see the price on this guy jumping past the original msrp but itd still be a good idea to buy him now rather than later to show that people care about the gremlins figures so more get made

up until now mohawk held the title for top gremlin figure in my book everything about that figure was great the sculpt was perfect paint was excellent articulation was wellhidden and when it was released the price was very reasonable the newer gremlins figures have gotten a sudden price hike despite coming with less accessories than the previous waves but were getting many characters that never had any toys of them made before the flasher gremlin is easily one of the most memorable gremlins in the movies and when i saw that a figure of him was being made he shot to the top of my toy wish list unfortunately he either wasnt being sold at the usual big name toy store due to what hes all about or hes just so popular that he constantly sold out i had to give in and buy the set of three which included daffy and george but man was he worth itflasher stands at the same height as all the other gremlins in the line he has a more standard gremlin look with regular eyes and ears but also sports some spikes around the eye and jaw areas his jacket is made of soft rubbery plastic and is easy to open up once you get him out of the box everything looks great from the spots on his ears to the muscle definition in his stomach thats one thing i didnt notice about this wave until i had all three of them standing together some gremlins have different body types so this wasnt just a reuse the flasher has your standard new gremlin body articulation but you wont be able to do much with it due to the coat arms aside his head wrists upper legs knees and feet can all be moved the arms are articulated but again the coat limits what you can do at the same timewould you really want this figure to do much else aside from flash peopleas for his accessories all he comes with are a cigarette and sunglasses the cigarette fits perfectly in either side of his mouth and the sunglasses can be placed over his eyes as long as youre careful there are not slits or anything for these so you have to put them between the spikes on his eyebrows just right so they dont break the sunglasses are very fragile and i can see them breaking even when using caution be careful with the cigarette too since its so small and could easily get lostwith all the good things i have to say about the flasher gremlin theres just one negative thing the price he tends to go for double what george and daffy are i recommend buying the set of three to avoid overspending by buying them individually flasher gremlin is a definite standout and is currently the center of my gremlins display him and the first revoltech woody seem to be good friends at the moment

this is of decent enough quality to be worn as a regular skirt and not just as an occasional costume  it has a wide elastic waist band and several layers sewn together very frankie stein including satin plaid striped black satin and glittery blue dotted net  one of the satin striped layers has a sequin hemlinethe skirt has a monster high skull logo patch at the top right  it comes with a padded monster high satin hanger with bow and clips  in all not super high quality but something that will last more than a day

hudson hornet piston cup lightning mcqueen is  in the cars  line of singles theres also  lightning mcqueen with racing wheels and to be honest its all a little confusing to grandpa  i but our grandson knew the difference right off the bat  in looking at them closely this one has his trademark lightning bolt along with small hudson hornet piston cup logos on his sides a large rusteze logo on his hood along with four other rusteze labels on his rear and lightyear a twist on goodyear  clever tires with red hubcaps  the other version has world grand prix logos his lightning bolt merging into flames on his sides a large hudson hornet piston cup logo on his hood and lightyear tires with gray  racing i suppose  hubcaps  our grandson became a cars fanatic shortly before his th birthday and weve been collecting them ever since  theyre super durable and were sure will be around for him to pass onto his own kids one day  i thought the price we paid on amazon was a bit high  but at least our order qualified for free shipping

ive been waiting on a toy company to make a good chunli figure for a long long time it seems like no matter how big the company is or how much the figure costs theres always something disappointing about the chunli figures they produce neca dropped the ball big time with their stout blank faced abomination a few years ago with their sfiv figures medicom who nearly produced a perfected chunli had big problems with quality control on limbs the outfit and some figures were shipped without certain womanly parts on the upper body while thereve been many great chunli statues and model kits the action figure department is severely lacking when pictures of play arts figure surfaced i was very excited as the company makes some mighty fine toys with great articulation for months their chunli was at the top of my wish list and i finally got to see the figure inperson yesterday along with the other sf figureswell it looks like ill still be waiting on a good figure of ms perfect legsright out of the box chunli looks great she stands at  and a half inches tall right in line with ryu the face which somehow always gets messed up by toy companies looks great and her body is perfectly proportioned those fantastic legs of hers arent grotesquely huge like the neca figures and her arms arent too skinny a problem i had with the medicom figure a soft rubbery plastic is used for the lower portion of her dress and sleeves similar to the robe on the final fantasy x auron figure that play arts put out a while back the paint work on chunli is very good though i really dont like how shiny her outfit is instead of coming off as silk it looks like plastic ryu akuma and cammy dont have this problem so i dont get what happened here there are also different shades of blue used on the outfit making it look a bit off but not horrible surprisingly the boots were painted to have a weathered look this was a great choice and a pleasant surprise she comes with a total of  hands two closed and two open a kikoken fireball a stand for the kikoken and an alternate head with an open mouth removing the head is easy and the hair covers on her head come off effortlessly to put on whichever head you choose ms lightning legs also sports a lot of articulation as youd expect from a play arts figure head shoulders biceps elbows wrists upper body waist hips knees boots and ankles the upper body has a fantastic range of motion allowing for some good action posesgreat sculpt and many points of articulationso whats not to like as strange as it sounds both of those are also the problems with the figure the primary thing that took the score down is how ugly the knee joints are poor chunli has no knee caps here to cover the joint and it looks absolutely atrocious when you bend it want to get her in a pose that looks like shes holding a leg up to do a front kick its gonna look awful you end up with this eye sore that makes chunli look like she has some kind of prosthetic limb instead of something more natural i really couldnt believe how bad it looked and its no wonder you dont see stock pictures of the figure doing more than fully extended kicks or plain standing poses speaking of poses good luck getting her signature fireball stance as it appears on the box i sure as heck couldnt get her to do it her hip joints make exciting poses involving kicks very limited too because of how theyre sculpted but this isnt as big of a problem as the knees no stand is included with her either so as much as id love to be able to display her doing a spinning bird kickthats kind of impossible without a specific stand my last complaint is something most people expect from play arts figures and its easily breakable limbsjoints be very careful with the hip joints when posing her legs these come off easily and if youre not careful something can break here without any effort the same goes for switching out the hands i suggest sticking her handsarms in a cup of hot water for about a minute before trying to take them out if you cant get them out otherwiseits a shame that the knees look so bad and that you cant get really cool kick poses out of this figure because it sure looks great on display and yet it looks best in a boring simple standing poseor maybe in some kind of salute like she does before a fight starts as much as it hurts to say i wont be adding this to my collection any time soon if the price drops sure but at the standard price ill pass shes definitely not the worst out there and probably is the best figure so far but ill keep waiting

the color and detail is firstrate the only thing missing is her legs but the rest of her perfect  body figure is still hot as those steak fries i love to eat at red robin it also has her hair and her belt waving in the wind for some reason but thats okay by me i give this minibust a  out of

although the amazon listing says it is haldey this is actually raquelle and in the barbie movie she plays kylie morgan  barbies australianaccented adversary in the surf conteststhe bathing suit on the doll is nearly the same as in the movie  though this is more of a bikini and the kylie character wears boyshorts in the moviethe kylie character also sports a braid in the movie but the doll has her hair downthis is a great inexpensive character to get to play out scenes from the movie  since she has a major part there are lots of plays for kids to enact

this doll features prominently in the barbie a mermaid tale  movie  she is the air headed sweeter best friend of barbies character merliah her name is hadley in the moviehadley wears the blue and purple bathing suit from the second surf competition in the movie australia though the bathing suit in the movie is boy shorts and not a bikini bottomthough hadley and the other human friend fallon wear pony tails in the movie the dolls have loose hairthe doll does a decent job of looking like the character and is perfect for kids who want to reenact scenes from the movie  since this character was in both mermaid tale movies she has a lot of usefulness both in the bathtub and out for playactingthe beach dolls are very inexpensive making it easier to get a set for playing along with the movie they are of decent quality as well

this character is fallon keaton and features the bathing suit from the second surfing competition in the barbie mermaid tale  movie australia  shes level headed smart buddy and one of barbie merliahs best friends in the movie she has the best and snarkiest commentsthis is one of the better bathing suit designs though in the movie she wears boy shorts and not a bikini bottom and suites her complexion well  since fallon places rd in the first surf competition shes got a major part in the movie and is perfect for kids who want to play along

i guided my  year old toward this toy choice after witnessing her one too many times have to substitute some surferish chick for a male beau in doll world enter ryan his legs bend at the knee his arms bend at the elbow his shoes and clothes are made well easy to get on and off and exude walmart couture hair is soft and easily styled into a bowlish type cut when he is hastily shoved into drawers so break out the hairspray if you are picky eyes are a dreamy blue all the monster high gals fight over himone even draws napoleon dynamite style pics for him give him a whirl

our grandson had been really looking forward to the arrival of the sodor search  rescue playset and getting harold captain butch flynn rocky  belle out of his makeshift barracks for them and into their own home  while the real sodor search  rescue center has a landing pad for harold a shed for rocky and a dock for captain this playset doesnt  but our grandson got creative and added to it with his legos  our first impression was that it was another great colorful playset with nice attention to detail and it is bright blue green  red along with the majority of the track in silvergrey and a goldish base to the centre itself  the centre is tierd the top tier has sodor search and rescue printed in red above a red paintedon door the ssrc emblem above one of  windows on one side plain light grey on the other side with  windows and with a green portion of track running through it that folds out into a downward incline and connects to the silver track  in has a lever that you lift to send flynn included down the track to put out two fires which are supposed to flip down as he passes by them  the bottom tier of the centre has another paintedon red door on one side and the inside has painted on search  rescue type of equipment ladders fire extinguishers an alarm bell axes hoses first aid kits and  shelves underneath a sign that says supplies holding oxygen masks search lights firehats etc  you can connect it to other sets or track at two points coming out of the centre itself and at the end of the silver track loop  unfortunately the downward incline isnt steep enough to give flynn the momentum he needs to round the curve and put out both fires  not a big deal  our grandson didnt mind pushing flynn  or others  along  this set made its debut on the  collector checklist  we paid  for our grandsons which seemed decent especially since our order qualified for the free shippingupdate  there are  playsets in the tnp line as of summer  that fall into what ive come to categorize as an intermediate range of between  and they are in order of introduction  cranky at the docks tidmouth sheds knapford station knapford holiday celebration sodor steamworks repair shed sodor search  rescue center twist  tumble cargo drop thomas treasure hunt adventure thomas shark exhibit paxton at the blue mountain stone shed and arctic exhibit  the great thing about these sets and those i categorize as basic with under  msrps is that he can very quickly and easily disconnect and fold up the basic sets and even the intermediate sets relatively so and take them with us on excursionsa little of our own thomas history as first time grandparents my husband and i wanted to start some type of collection for our grandson that he could possibly pass along to his own kids one day  our grandson was   at the time and had been talking a lot about a certain train named thomas a little fella whom  now seems hard to believe  wed never heard of  after doing some research it seemed the takenplay line might be the perfect investment to engage and encourage his active imagination as well as provide a fun way for us to interact with him  what a rewarding decision weve had so much fun together with this quality line of trains vehicles and playsets  hes now  and a large portion of our basement has become a wonderful sodor land of make believe that we all enjoy visiting  and continues to hold his interest which is quite a feat given the tendency at that age to move in and out of toy phases so quickly

this pull n zoom line of take n play was brand new at the end of  and we found the first  thomas percy  james for  a piece at toysrus right after christmas  although our grandson was originally happy with them we recognize now that he played with them primarily on the floor and on a long piece of straight track  theyre still okay in that respect  in fact when we saw them listed on amazon on  for only  a piece we immediately ordered another set for a nephews birthday  however we noticed our grandson wasnt playing with them in conjunction with any of the numerous tnp playsets we have in our basement and quickly realized why  the trains themselves are the same quality diecast metal as the rest of the tnp line but the caboose thomas pulls a smaller much less detailed version of sir topham hatts musical caboose as well as the mail car percy pulls and james tender are all made of lightweight plastic  when you pull the rear pieces back to make them move forward the trains easily derail on any curved piece of track and they certainly cannot climb any of the inclined pieces of track on the more elaborate playsets  theyre okay to play with on the floor but why put the takenplay name on a product that cant be used in conjunction with any of the tnp playsets  we didnt purchase the  additions gordon  diesel until we were able to find them under  and well do the same with the  additions
