this version looks like the clone wars series not like the movie  she comes with some equipment and aside of the saber the rest of equipment was never in the tv show  hasbro probably added it for playability perhaps  it is very well sculpted and very poseable

aayla securas always been a fan favorite but we havent gotten an update of this figure since the rots line its great that shes not only here in the vintage line but looks great of course youll want to display her without the robes so fortunately the articulation on her arms is well hidden this is no mean feat given that her arms are so thin her head and face really capture the characters prettiness overall shes possibly the cutest jedi next to bastila shan

like the yuuzhan vong figure that came with the  comic pack hasbro did an excellent job crafting and detailing this nom anor however the nom anor figure is overall a more accurate representation of the species the figure is smaller and the body proportions are less comicbookish also hasbro painted striking blue tatoos on his head the chest plate is painted a beautiful light brown with blue dots the only part that bothers us is the hands  the paint color doesnt quite match the yellowish skin tone on the face its not too blatant and really only becomes noticeable under bright lights still it does make us wonder if perhaps hasbro decided to repaint the head before release indeed the head on the final figure does look a bit different from the one in the prototype photosinterestingly the prototype figures we saw in early  depicted nom anor wearing a plastic cloak while the plastic cloak seemed to fit more snugly around his head were glad hasbro decided to go with the softgoods cloak we like the way it drapes behind him the cloak has a hole in the back so you can put his back spikes on over the cloak this looks great from the front although from behind it looks a bit odd then again according to the books the cloak is an organic lifeform so its possible it shapes itself around the spikes one thing we noticed is that if you remove the cloak and chest plate the figure looks more like a generic vong if you like the njo its worth getting multiple copies as vong army builders  frankly this is probably the closest hasbro will ever get to releasing a realistic generic yuuzhan vong figure

this figures got a lot of strengths but i just cant get over the helmet it looks like the same soft plasticrubber from the regular rots clone trooper which turned yellow after a while on this figure the helmet is a shade of white too bright for the rest of the figure it really is frustrating that we cant just get high quality clone troopers the best solution would be for hasbro to include a solid nonremovable helmet as an optionaccessory rather than us being stuck with the soft helmets only still the rest of the figure is awesome so i give it a  if the helmet starts to yellow ill downgrade it to a  or

the vintage series of figures has been very kind to jabbas palace characters this character originally called barada in the s toy line is now correctly released as kithaba again hasbro did a great job kithabas clothes are appropriately weathered and he comes with a blaster pike and bandolier some of the joints are incorrectly colored but because the colors are so muted anyways this doesnt detract from the figure too much the yellow and beige colors arent too far off although the red coloring in the boot joints is more noticeable overall a musthave for fans of jabbas palace

dr evazan was one of the most memorable characters from the original trilogy its rather shocking hasbro hasnt given this character an update since  fortunately the vintage figure looks incredible the facial detail is incredible evazan clearly has a piglike nose scars and a deformed eye you can even see his chest hair through his open shirt next to ponda boba he is one of the highlights of

the okapi has been a favorite animal of mine ever since i was in the fourth grade we had to write a report about a strange animal of our choice and i chose the okapi my teacher thought i made it up and gave me an f that same day i went to the library checked out a book on animals and shoved the page with the okapi in her face she gave me an a and ever since then i cant help but smirk and think of that event whenever i see the animal i have to say im jealous of my daughters new stuffed okapi now too we saw this little guy at our zoos gift shop and she fell in love instantly clutching him with both arms the whole time we were in there this is a very cute stuffed animal and pretty big too its crazy how cheap it is considering the sizethe okapi is about  inches tall and has all the features it needs to be recognized the only thing missing is the giraffe hornthingies but hey its a baby okapi here its a soft stuffed animal sure to make any child happy and makes for a perfect snuggling companion  it can even stand up without falling over always a plus in my bookmy one complaint is that the stitching isnt that great the one i ordered arrived with a big hole on one side of the face where the brown area above the nose meets the white area of the face stuffing was coming out and it was a big downer things like this can be fixed of course but you may want to check your zoos gift shop for one to check for any imperfections before ordering if you have the option its not just this one area that had poor stitching either i noticed a few parts along the stomach that felt a bit loose and will probably need to be reinforced soon as long as your kids arent rough with it the little okapi should be just finewild republic makes a ton of cool stuffed animals with my favorites being the honey badger hyena and giant pink giraffe well definitely be picking up more of these in the near future

to make this review as presentable as possible i have a system see belowthe ayespet griffin is not dorky at all re check other mh dolls pets stonecolored with flecks and light purple eyes can easily be used in other play dramas play comedies play dramadies play horror fests or play black humor fests etcpurse actually opens embellished with a pink fleurdeliswings stay on well and are detachable openings which support wings are hidden by hair no awkward momentsshoes fit well and stay put earrings and bracelet ditto headband stays on with the aid of clear rubberbands that are not noticeable i just noticed them after four days of adoption without the bands the headband will be awolskin is stonecolored with flecks just like her pet very striking fleck hues vary black white gray even slight blueshair has slight teal streaks right down the middle back right to the endsshirt and skirt are easy on easy off velcro under the skirt there is another clear band that i believe helps keep the skirt looking its bestthis band was supported around the dolls upper thigh my daughter does not engage this band the outfit still looks terrificgreat way to introduce history art and architecture to your kid five stars for edcomes with a notebook and stand as wellthe nayslittle necklace of some abstract design seems as if it can get lost easily my daughters hasnt fallen off yet will update if it gets lost quicklythis dolls left forearm was a bit loose when she was let loose from her cardboard dwelling my daughter paid for her and eschewed returning her gave three stars for durabilityadditional recently discovered general factsbratz clothes fit mh dolls its truesome problems are arising with a couple of my daughters mh dolls lagoonas leg sometimes pops out of socket and after repeatedly removing forearms and hands my younger daughter compromised frankies hand when i tried to put the hand back on for her when she was having trouble i broke the hand peg off i just crazyglued the hand back on but i cannot report on how well the hand is holding up because now my daughter has replaced her hand and forearm with a squinkie prosthetic it has been several weeks now and the hand is still attached to the forearm and it rests within our barbie bin i figure with all the locomotion of bin items that the handarm is holding up to at least light actiontouchesbeing buried under other dolls my older daughter has pointed out that if you purchase a createamhdoll set that you will have extra hands on hand ha ha just warning ya about the above in case you havent jumped into the mh pool yetps mattel needs to make a mh hunchback of notre dame doll as her mate please please

whenever my daughter sees a new monster high doll she gets super excited at first after looking the toy over itll either be a purchase or an easy pass rochelle won her over effortlessly thanks to the pink hair pet griffin and being unique in that shes based on gargoyles its good to see mattel branching out and bringing some more variety to the line with character like this and venus mcflytrap rochelles a great looking doll and while she isnt one of my favorites she definitely stands out from the others on the shelf due to her colors and design this one also seems to get the most play time of the other dolls my daughter hasrochelle goyle has the same articulation as your average monster high doll you can move her head shoulders elbows wrists upper legs knees and bend her body up and down she sports a grey skin coloring with specks of blue white and dark grey which give her a cementstone look just like a gargoyle statue her hair is pink with blue streaks on the bangs with two long blue streaks on the back of her hair too rochelle also has unique ears on the top of her head and little wings on her back at first i figured the wings were an accessory that could be removed but it turns out that theyre inserted into her back very securely a nice detail on the wings is that they look like theyre cracked as if rochelles still waking up and breaking the stone shell off as for her outfit it looks good black earrings black necklace a black bracelet on her right wrist black and white shirt with straps that cross in the front a neat black and silver skirt with a very cool pattern pink mesh socks and grey heels the skirt has an additional piece of mesh on the insideas for her accessories rochelle doesnt come with much she has the usual monster high stand a black brush greypink purse and her pet griffin the purse actually opens up and you can store small things in it probably just extra earrings its the pet griffin that nets bonus points though this little guy has a terrific sculpt and just like ms goyle herself stands out from the other monster high petsthe only reason im taking off one star is because rochelles hair can get messy very easily all of the other monster high dolls my daughter has dont have this problem so i dont get what happened here its not a big deal but it could get a little annoying for kids that want the hair to look perfectits going to be interesting seeing what different versions of rochelle they come up with in the coming years shes a great addition to the line and is always sold out in stores just be patient and wait for a good deal dont go for the higher online prices unless you really need her for a gift or something

please note venus was at target in delran nj at the very beginning of august  please see my review on robecca for more detailsnothing to sneeze atdoll comes with two vine bracelets two vine lower calflets a vine necklace held in place with a clear band four small hoops in one ear and one vine earring in the other ear most of the jewelry is firmly in place with the exception of the calf adornments these slip down but can easily be supported with the upper edge of the dolls boots they do not appear to be removable i tried but i think that pushing these vines down past her feet could break them so i gave up after three tries bracelets can be removed if you remove the dolls hands first if my daughter cuts the necklace band i will update this review if the necklace seems too loose or whatnotboots have stylish teeth at the toes for easy mowing boots are easy to get off but venus foot only fits into the boot partially her back heel is exposed but i believe that that is intentional the boots still fit very well and are easy to get on as well she is firmly supported by the boots no worrieshair is soft with hot pink predominating at the back our venus has a healthy dose of soft green in the front hair is layered at the back and she does have a shaved patch on the right side of her head her right this patch is hot pink velourseven fangs protrude on our dolls lipsthese are painted on they look terrific three upper fangs the balance are lower fangsdenim shrug with dayglo yellow mohawk skulleco punk motif is removable the rest of the outfit is separates polyester leggings with abstract vine and thorns print black cotton miniskirt with fluorescent yellow stitching and the poly top features the signature mh skull with mohawk safety pins tattoo banners hearts the words eco punk etc top and skirt have easy velcro the whole outfit is easy to remove and get back onskin on dolls hands is vinyplantlike ears are leaflikecomes with journal brush and standsome things to sniff atchewlian venus included pet plant needs a wider base for easier support he also needs some hamburger meat to tide him overincluded eco shopping bag has a ribcage and mh logo print but not enough room to hold a copy of swamp thing in comic book form or dvd form needs improvement sizewiselittle sumup of horrorthe small above negatives do not affect us i get all details out there for picky people sometimes i will give a mh doll a lower rating if we acquired one with loose limbs etc i am reflecting our actual tangible product educational merits are intense here due to venus whole eco message music and fashion history can also be passed on horticultural anything can be an inspiration hopefully she will create future gardeners i am still in shock about how earth and punk aware this doll actually is great combo hope shes even straightedge get her shell grow on ya

my daughter was super pumped when she first saw pictures of venus mcflytrap a couple of months ago she loves the monster high dolls and has built up quite a collection in a small amount of time and now that shes started to ship weve been able to add her to the family something ive been saying about the last couple weve bought is that those ones really stand out from the others thanks to their colors and design well ms venus is yet another one of those truly unique in her color scheme and with a dazzling outfit to match its easy to see why shes the most popular of the new wave of dolls while i like the others venus is the one that pops out at you when you look at them on the shelf and hey shes even ecofriendlyvenus is on the standard mh doll body with all the usual points of articulation her headneck shoulders elbows wrists upper legs and knees can all be moved around she doesnt have any special features on her body like rochelle goyle does the vines on her legs are separate pieces of plastic and not molded to them the green gal also has a vine necklace vine bracelets and a vine earring on her left ear with green hoops on the right even her shoelaces seem to be vines the makeup she has is very stylish you also gotta love the lipstick which has some white designs to make it look like the teeth on a venus flytrap my favorite feature though is her hair pink with green streaks but the right side of her head is shaved and pure pink as far as i know this is the first female monster high doll to have any part of her head shaved it feels fuzzy and the color is bold very cool venus outfit consists of a denim vest with an eco punk patch black and neon colored shirt with a similar theme black skirt and neon tights her shoes are magenta with green teeth on the toes normally id think that sticking to a theme this much is overkill but they really did everything right with her design this doll is a hitaccessorywise venus comes with your usual monster high accessories a brush journal and stand and two that are new first is an ecofriendly tote bag this thing is a bit too small to be used for anything but you can fit super small objects in here if you want i like the ribcage print on it her other accessory is chewlian venus pet plant hes a cool pet featuring big fangs beady little eyes and a mohawk its good to see that as the monster high line continues they arent running out of ideas for new petsas usual be patient and youll be able to get her for the standard price or maybe a little less venus mcflytrap only recently started shipping so while she might be sold out just give it a little time the same thing happened with spectra rochelle and many others even then i wouldnt feel guilty spending a little more than retail for venus shes one of the best so far

we wish wed seen this themed  pack prior to easter  wouldve been a perfect addition to our grandsons easter basket with its spring theme not to mention that its one of the first takenplay items to include a light up sign  when you start getting multiples of the engines through themed packs and playsets weve always appreciated when theres something that differentiates them from those sold individually and in this case thomas is decorated on both sides with strings of green yellow and white flags and signs reading sodor spring fair  he pulls a blue plastic rail car with a green base and  black wheels and its cargo is a white plastic display sign with a festive redyellowblue balloonsdecorated label announcing greetings from the sodor spring fair when you press the button underneath the label two tiny lights illuminate the sign  couldnt resist a little prebirthday gift once we received it and he loved it  update  fisherprices summer  msrps for their typical themed  packs are     we were able to find our grandsons for  with free shipping and its definitely worth the higher price point because of the lightup featureits also fun to collect the themed  packs  update  there are  of them as of summer  and they are in order of introduction  thomas  the treasure pop goes thomas kevins helping hook scruffs dirty job thomas  the raft kmart exclusive thomas at the winter festival thomas at the spring fair thomas at the summer festival thomas at the halloween celebration the last four have lightup cargo victor  oil cargo thomas to the rescue iron arrys oily mess and scruffs dirty mess the last two are color changers  there were also several buddy packs annie  clarabel toby  flora bill  ben thomas  rosie percy  maviswe were first time grandparents of a   year old when my husband and i began a tnp collection for our grandson hoping hed pass it along to his own kids one day  weve all had a great time interacting with this overall quality line of trains vehicles and playsets  he turned  at the end of april and still enjoys spending a couple of hours of each day he spends with us in the sodor land of make believe that spans a large portion of our basement  although disneys cars characters are beginning to occupy a different portion its nice to see our investment continuing to hold his interest engaging and encouraging that active imagination  grandson  came along in march so we plan to continue collecting tnp for several years to come

finally we get a figure of darth malgus the primary public face of the new swtor mmo malgus has all of the beautiful articulation and paint of the newer vintage figures i absolutely love the head also the cloak has a thin wire around the neck allowing you to secure it on the figure so it rests pretty well on him the hood is a bit too big but its far better than any other hasbro efforts at including cloaks for figures  the only thing on this figure that could be improved are the joints between the legs and hips it would have been even better had hasbro made this a ball and socket joint but its not too bad overall i definitely recommend this figure especially for swtor fans although it might be worth waiting until prices die down i got mine for half the price offered currently on amazon

skeletal spearmen are one of those sculpts created to fill a wargaming niche  i have almost never found a skeleton with a spear in adventure usually because theyre packed together so tightly in a dungeon that spears are impractical you get three of david pughs sculpts which stand at attention with an interesting shield in one hand and a not interesting spear in the otherand thats pretty much all they do  stand there  no sense of movement  just spearmen waiting to be told what to do  theyd make great thugs for a necromancer but by themselves theyre not all that interesting  if you need undead troops these will fit the bill though

the sodor circus monkey rail car is a rolling stock item rail cars trucks etc that  in the real world  cant move unassisted by another vehicle appearing for the first time on the  collector checklist  another colorful addition this light blue rail car has an emblem with the silhouette of a monkeys head encircled by the words sodor circus and a rotating cylinder that turns to display different images of the monkey it has an orange roof red base also imprinted with sodor circus in white lettering and black wheels  several themed pack tnp releases have been centered around fairgroundsanimals themes  thomas at the fair featuring rail cars with removable animal figures thomas at the spring fair featuring a lightup sign with balloons thomas  the summer festival featuring a lightup sign with fruit percys bumpy delivery featuring cargo cars carrying birds  rabbits and diesels spider delivery featuring a spider exhibit car and another with a spider load so the sodor circus monkey fits right in  we picked one up for our grandsons collection  plus  sh  the one disappointing thing is that even though it says die cast metal it feels more like a durable plastic its definitely not the same type of heavier quality metal that so many other rolling stock pieces are made of  as a result of it being lighter the cylinder doesnt rotate as the car moves along the tracks as the one in spider exhibit does its not heavy enough to make the two wheels attached to the cylinder rotate it at least on ours you have to rotate it manually  update  fisherprices summer  msrp for most of their small rolling stock pieces comparable to sodor circus monkey is  the ones with animals are definitely favorites of our grandsonupdate  if youre interested in starting a rolling stock collection of your own there are  items in the tnp line as of summer  and they are in order of introduction  quarry car annie  clarabel  pack sodor supply co rocky troublesome truck diesel fuel tanker storybook car sodor zoo snake car bubble tanker farm animal car sodor mining co spider exhibit car sodor cement mixer sir topham hatts musical caboose crocodile special talking troublesome trucks  pack sodor circus monkey oil tanker hector and separate reintroductions of annie and clarabelwe were first time grandparents of a   year old when my husband and i started a tnp collection for our grandson and weve all had a great time interacting with this overall quality line of trains vehicles and playsets  he turned  at the end of april and still enjoys spending a couple of hours of each day he stays with us in the sodor land of make believe that spans a large portion of our basement  although disneys cars characters are beginning to occupy a different portion its nice to see our tnp investment continuing to hold his interest and encouraging that active imagination  grandson  came along in march so we plan to continue collecting tnp for several more years

this figure is nicely detailed and comes with pieces to the hall of justice assembly  he was one of the last figures put out and can be very hard to find hence the price in the aftermarket  he completes my collection and im glad to have him

ive never quite understood the fijit toys i first saw them last year and didnt know what to make of it a cute colorful robot that makes semipainful robotic sounds and gyrates now this year the yippits have come out and im in the same spot all over again i think what bugs me the most about this toy is that the age range is supposed to be for kids  i cant think of many kids over the age of  or  that would get much out of these guys unless they just plain like cute robots the yippits toys dont do a whole lot and what you can do is more like a cute version of bop it or simonpatter here has a couple of different modes to play with first theres the random mode you get by pressing the left button on her head shell make random sounds and her eyes will light up patter can also perform tricks based on how many times you clap your hands you have to pay attention to her mouth though as it lights up with each clap that it recognizes clap  times and patter will play music and dance around clap  times and shell make one quick sound thats supposed to be begging yeah not too exciting so far huh but when you press and hold the right button on the top of her head the little robodog will play another music track that youre supposed to clap along to the beat withthe last two modes are patternbased press and hold both buttons on patters head to get her in the game mode then press either button to select which one you want pressing the left button gets you a game where youre supposed to copy what patter does if her right eye lights up press the right button if her mouth lights up clap as the game goes on shell want you to go in longer patterns like pressing both buttons at the same time clapping pressing another button once etc the other game isnt any betterbasically youre getting a spruced up version of simon and bop it here just in a cute little robot dog package personally i feel like theyre asking way too much for this thing especially considering that the new furby which does way more is around the same price why not just spend a few more bucks and go for that instead the yippits are wellmade and durable but it seems like they should be doing more than just a few tricks and playing a quick pattern game if you can get a good deal on this toy and your child is really into it then go for it if its one of those things theyre just mildly interested in just pass

this barbie doll wears a suit made of bright pink material with a redwhiteblue trim around the collar her arms are articulated but she does come with the very cheap feeling hollow body note that she is meant for standing on her own and perhaps striking some poses with her articulated arms she doesnt redress as easily since the shoes have a special design to keep her stable when standing  and are on her feet permanently also you cant separate the pink undertop from the jacket  its attachedi think this is the fourth or fifth barbie for president doll and there are four versions of this doll with different skin tones and hair colors which is nice  she was professionally done by an up and coming designer but is surprisingly bland for barbie  lacking the sparkle and interest we usually see in a barbiethis barbie does stand firmly but it only takes a little shake to knock her over as well i think she is made more for the shelf than for little girls to play with though

this barbie doll wears a suit made of bright pink material with a redwhiteblue trim around the collar her arms are articulated but she does come with the very cheap feeling hollow body note that she is meant for standing on her own and perhaps striking some poses with her articulated arms she doesnt redress as easily since the shoes have a special design to keep her stable when standing  and are on her feet permanently also you cant separate the pink undertop from the jacket  its attachedi think this is the fourth or fifth barbie for president doll and there are four versions of this doll with different skin tones and hair colors which is nice she was professionally done by an up and coming designer but is surprisingly bland for barbie  lacking the sparkle and interest we usually see in a barbiethis barbie does stand firmly but it only takes a little shake to knock her over as well i think she is made more for the shelf than for little girls to play with though

the holiday barbie dolls always come beautifully presented in a picturesque box and beautiful styling but please note that they are not intended for young kids or for playing  they are one of the few collector barbies that do not come with a stand or any other means of displaying them  as well the hair is usually geled and heavily styled the skirt fluffed out with cardboard and details on the front are not on the back of the dress  when removed her dress hem wont be as full and she doesnt have  dimensional detailsalso note that unlike a lot of barbies she isnt poseable and her legsarms dont bend  also her legs and torso are hollow plastic and break easily along the seams  this really isnt the doll for deboxingthat said the box is so beautiful that this is a lovely display item when never opened and thats what most collectors buy this doll for  to complete collections of boxed barbie holiday dolls  she is a lovely doll inside her box

there have been a lot of dolls made that dont look enough like the reallife famous person for you to tell its them if their identifying clothes are off this doll made me say wow out loud when i opened the amazon box and saw the doll for the first time  it really does look like jennifer lawrences katniss from the movie and the doll captures her beauty and intrepid hardinessi love the textures and the detail in her clothing the barbie folks did a fantastic job with this doll this is truly a heroine that i am proud to put into the hands of my daughter

i just got portal  earlier this week and lucked out when i got one of these for free just a few days later i knew as soon as i saw it my daughter would have a hay day since she loves robots and has the tendency to like all the games i play no surprise she loved it if you didnt manage to get one of those cool motion sensing turrets this one will still make a nice fun display piece in your homethe inflatable turret stands at about  inches tall you blow it up just like you would any other inflatable toy through the nozzle on the bottom and it fills out surprisingly fast everything looks great and i have zero issues with the design for it this is as good as you can make a portal turret look in inflatable form place this outside of someones bathroom door before they come out and its bound to freak them out heck you may as well get a couple and have them all facing an entrance for even more fun the quality of plastic is better than expected its thick and doesnt feel like a cheap carnival prize or anythinghowever theres a little problem i have and it might just be the one i got the back leg seems to give in a little bit causing the turret to lean over i checked everywhere for holes and couldnt find anything its not that big of a problem since i can place the turret against a wall for extra support and at the same time its an inflatable toy not a high end replica by any meansthis inflatable turret would be a great present for portal fans young and old alike well definitely be keeping it around for years to come maybe it can guard the kitchen and protect the potatoes

this vanity is cute  comes with a large sticker mirror lots of small accessories a picture frame with pictures of all the boyfriends so you can interchange whose face is in there a chair and a robein all a very cute set that can be used by all the winx girls  i give it  instead of  stars because the little pieces earrings bracelet extra pictures fall out of the back of the drawer if you store the vanity on its side or tip it

definitely recommend investing in the talking line of takenplay for your little one  talking salty says in his thick seafaring accent im salty har har toot toot ahoy there me hearties i have an important delivery mateys and i have lots of tales to tell  known for his seafaring tall tales salty is crimson red with silver detailing black cab roof and yellow  black wasp stripes on his front and rear hes got the brim of a skippers hat on the top of his forehead and  black wheels  hes also got the number  and salty printed in black on both sides  hes a friendly practical diesel and one of our favorites  talking salty first appeared on the  takenplay collector checklist and we were shocked to win him on a  bid  update  fisherprices summer  msrp for their small talking trains is   our grandson really enjoys lining up all of his talkies dimming the lights and enjoying the special effects as his trains chug around  someone recently commented that the talking engines theyd purchased didnt make the chugging sounds anymore in addition to talking  apparently fisherprice discontinued the chugging sounds with salty as well as new productions of the older talking trains  we assume this was done as a cost cutting measure  and this is truly a shame since not only did the chugging sound add to their charm but fp also raised the msrps a double whammieupdate  if youre interested in starting a talkies collection of your own there are  of them as of summer  and they are in order of introduction  thomas percy james gordon spencer rosie henry edward diesel toby sir topham hatts musical caboose emily flynn troublesome trucks only  talks percy at the dieselworks thomas  percy hard at work salty diesel  charlie paxton belle flynn to the rescue james with castle crest and hirowe were first time grandparents of a   year old when my husband and i began a tnp collection for our grandson hoping hed pass it along to his own kids one day  weve all had a great time interacting with this overall quality line of trains vehicles and playsets  he turned  at the end of april and still enjoys spending a couple of hours of each day he spends with us in the sodor land of make believe that spans a large portion of our basement  although disneys cars characters are beginning to occupy a different portion its nice to see our investment continuing to hold his interest engaging and encouraging that active imagination  grandson  came along in march so we plan to continue collecting tnp for several years to come

hondo is something new for star wars  a lovable scoundrel who really is both lovable and a scoundrel and not just a scoundrel with a heart of gold a la han talon karrde etc hasbro did a pretty good job capturing the characters likeness theres a great amount of detail especially on the upper half of the body and the trench coat the legs and knees could have used a bit more articulation  it would have been nice to pose him in ways other than fully erect  but at least his pose is erect i should note that hondo does not stand with his legs as abnormally wide apart as in the photo on the amazon product page  he has a much more relaxed and realistic pose overall nice to see this infamous character done so well as a figure

at last years san diego comic con neca showed off tons of the gremlins figures that were going to be released over the course of  one of the figures that caught my attention was the lightning gremlin he really stood out thanks to his design and i couldnt wait to get him well here we are a year later and hes finally been released unfortunately the lightning gremlin is a single figure release and not part of a two pack this is easily the worst figure thats come out so far for several reasons that being said im still glad i picked it up but its still a big waste on necas part surprise surprisethe lightning gremlin looks exactly as he does in the stock picture he has no articulation at all and the only feature is the explosive base he can be removed from there arent any accessories either the clear blue plastic does look good as does the sculpt of the gremlin but good lord is this a shoddy release why not include him with the upcoming brown gremlin who doesnt really have anything that makes him stand out from the others the lightning gremlin could be his accessory and itd be a cool deal instead youre spending the same amount for what the other regular gremlins figures costand all of them have articulation more difficult sculpts accessories and are actual toys this is just a display piece that shouldnt cost more than a few bucksand you know what the kicker is the stand doesnt even work only a tiny bit of lightning gremlins lower body goes into it so the rest of the weight is in the top causing him to fall forward or back i have mine leaned against another figure because the plastic on this guy is so thin to make the electric appearance work well theres a good chance that itd break with one little fall be very careful when handling this figurei dont know if this is really a sdcc exclusive though it is exclusive to a certain big toy store here in the us that usually shoots the value up a little bit and yet i doubt this exclusive will net big bucks everstill if you plan on collecting all the gremlins youll need this guy and he does look cool with the others pay the retail price or less no more its not worth it

every time i go for these random microscopicversion of popular toys on the market today i always lose richard hell this is your cue we always end up with dreadful ones yeah i know i only paid  for this thing at the wplace but even that is too mucha buck would have made me not so bitter anyway we got the ugly all pink owl incarnation fig and yes it is winking included sticker pays homage to the fig so double drats included poster is a microfig checklist for obsessive souls and a propaganda tool aimed at anyone under six fig is  i am now going to look for a hammer

as a teenager back in the s i was a huge fan of the flash tv show all of my shirts were red and the ones that were not i dyed them red with some of the shirts i was able to sew in shoulder pads and other padded material that my grandma had laying about my grandma would get pretty angry at me ruining the washing machine i made kid flash outfits for her  shih tzu dog as well apparently the one that she had set asside for the martin luther king day parade was ruined since she had a complimentary outfit as rosa parks to this day she has not let me live it down its something that i simply do not understand since grandma is whiter than typical white folkfast forward a few years i am still living with my grandma her dog big rapa remains alive for some naturedefying reason and i am still a diehard flash fani have been looking forward to this new flash figure ever since i became aware of him in the rebooted relaunch restart or  whatever it is they try to reinvent but never last in the  comics i sometimes get frustrated with change but i try to be loyal to what or wherever the flash goes even though i long for the prime days of flash from the tv show to returnevery other wednesday my grandma will take me to the comic book store because it is next door to the state office where she picks up her social security checks that she cashes at the local native american casino so she can play bingolast wednesday she had to stop at the liquor store and just dropped me off instead of waiting in her car for two hours like she normally does big rapa and her will usually listen to sean hannity on the radio im not really a fan of him because he is a conservative and i think the government should be responsible for uswhen i got inside the comic book store i asked the store owner if the new flash figure arrived he said that it did not but he knew a guy who knew a guy who might have the figure but he couldnt make any promises i told him i needed to at least find outso the store owner told me to wait by the counter and then he went into the back room thirty minutes later he came out with a small piece of paper with a time and addressafter spending an hour trying to wake my half drunk grandma up at two in the morning i was able to get her to drive me to the written location in hopes of getting the flash figure as it turns out the guy was selling figures from a station wagon behind an abandoned kmartthis figure really looked promising in the pictures  but failed to deliver on that promisei do not expect the flash to have a bunch of accessories but a stand would of been nice this figure will not stand unless you bend a knee and both legs in such an akward position that it looks like he is constipated a feeling and position that i am not unfamiliar with after eating my grandmas fried spam graham cracker and pineapple meatloaf

hell hounds are pretty common beasts as sculpts but the definition seems their physiognomy varies from sculptor to sculptor are they actual hounds made of fire or big scarylooking dogs  sculptor ben siens opts for the more realistic approachthis hell hound is large which by dd terms means it will be a more dangerous foe than your typical hell hound it looks like a combination of a cat and a dog with a catlike tail and forepaws that seem catlike but doglike features  its entire back and cheeks are studded with bony protrusions and all along its spine is either actual flames or furi applied a metallic red color to the hell hounds skin and used reds and yellows for the fur  not quite flames but certainly not natural eitherthis hell hound has a muscular heavy feel to it that makes it look solidand yet its not particularly intimidating either  this is more a function of the monster than the sculpt  large hell hounds should be terrifying because of the size of this critter and the spikes on its back it looks like more like a dire wolf than a hell houndas a miniature in the reaper bones set its a nice complement to the other critters as a standalone figure that retails for seven bucks you can do better for cheaper

first lets start with the bad newsit seems the packing from this seller was not done properly for delivery it came with a big cutter hole and it seemed like the box was under a pile of something  fortunately the ship inside was not damaged  so it gets one less star because of it  for me it is not really a problem as i wanted the ship but for a collector it is a turn off a friend of mine bought this toy in my behalf in december   i would have liked that the box was intact as i keep the boxes too  it is not just a problem of the packing at sellers delivery  y wing has a similar sized box and it uses cardboard box inside that makes the box quite sturdy  so blame hasbro toonow lets go for the reviewthis ship is about  cm long about  inches  it has some basic features cockpit always stays leveled as it rotates when you move the ship  it seems that it uses some sort of weight to make it turn  it is not perfect but still a cool feature wings can be extended and retracted by rotating one of the four engines it has it has a small handle to extend and retract landing gear wing cannons come in two versions one set that is movie accurate and one set that can fire small plastic projectiles  they can be exchanged easily cockpit canopy to fit a pilot insidei had some problems to fit a pilot inside  the room for pilot is so tight that i had to push the pilot a bit hard to make him fit inside or i would not be able to close the canopy  for such a big ship it was quite a tight room for a pilot  this is why it has another less star so it gets  starsif you see the movie prototype in the bluray edition you may notice that the paint scheme of the ship and a few details of the exterior of the ship are not  movie accurate like the japanese zero red circles it has in the toy however in the movie itself it is hard to see the details as they move fast or they are showed in the distance in motionif you see return of the jedi and you want to buy a pilot that has the helmet of bwing pilots you may need to either go for a pilot pack that has a b wing with white outfit or you may want to buy the awing pilot that comes with a bwing helmet but a green outfit  it seems very odd that they advertise b wing pilot as a pilot with a wing helmet and a red outfit while in the movie it should have white outfit and the helmet that comes with the a wing action figurebe advised that it may be hard to fit the pilot inside the fighter  this is not particular to bwing as also y wing has a tight cockpit that makes it hard to fit a pilot insidethe cockpit controls are very detailed very nicely detailed an applause to the sculptor but the panel behind the pilot isnt a minor drawback  and in general terms the ship has a very nice proportion that makes the overall look of the ship very movie accuratethe material of this ship is somehow sturdy for a collector but may not be sturdy enough for a kid  the ship looks far better flying than landed  so if you are going to have a display for it you better hang it instead of having it on a shelf

bubble guppies is a fun cute wonderfully educational tv show on nickelodeon that all of us love this set comes from the episode we totally rock in which the bubble guppies perform on a stage theyre wearing the same costumes as in the episode its definitely not my favorite episode the whole family loves call a clambulance but its still funi wish toys with ramps had been available when i was a kid i remember being obsessed with them and all i had was my matchbox garage with one tiny ramp for the cars my kids have other ramp toys such asfisherprice little people wheelies stand n play rampway but instantly loved this since both my  year old and  year old adore bubble guppies and love ramps slam dunkof the bubble guppies this set comes with molly the pinkhaired bubble guppy and my daughters favorite molly looks like she is on a frozen splash and has a rolling ball built into the bottom so that she rolls smoothly down the ramp  of the time she doesnt make the curve successfully once she hits the bottom of the ramp she rolls over the large recessed button that flashes with bright lights and starts one of the songstalking sets for example mr grouper will do his famous excuse me what time is it its time for but hell say molly and gil instead of lunch since the kids love the show they dig hearing molly gil and mr grouper and hearing molly singing things like we totally rockthough we be small another example molly says hey gil what is the loudest pet you hear music and then gil says a trumpet  as the little fishies in bubble guppies would say thats sillythe sound stage was easy to snap together just by looking at the picture on the box  pieces if you count the little doors on the arch and you have to put on  stickers the stickers are cute they feature the little fishies mr grouper with headphones and the rest of the bubble guppiesin my video you also can see bubble puppy and deema because we also gotfisherprice nickelodeon bubble guppies deema and bubble puppy note that deema the funky funny one gil oona gobie nonny the brainy one bubble puppy and mr grouper dont come with this set however you can also getfisherprice nickelodeon bubble guppies gil and nonny and i am guessing you can get others in futuremy little bubble guppies fanatics are very happy with this though there were lots of tears from my toddler when i told her she couldnt take it into the bathtub with her bubble guppies squirters fisherprice nickelodeon bubble guppies molly oona starfish bath squirters it does look a lot like herdisney princess ariels bath time playset so i know why she couldnt understand not in the bathtubupdate we went away for the weekend with our trusted babysitter watching the kids and when i asked what they played with most over the weekend she said they played with this all weekend

this little toy is really pretty amazing especially for the price it is very thin and light which is just perfect for this age as most of the toys are bigger and bulky its actually a touch screen and the kids get that concept right away it sings and talks of course but what struck me most of all was that it is smartmy yearold was playing with it and it was asking her to touch a particular picture  blueberries or similar instead of touching the picture it was asking for she kept touching another picture the toy caught up with her after she did this  or  times and instead asked her to touch the picture she was already pressing over and over now it was clear she didnt understand what the toy was asking her to do so this change in tactics may have helped her to understand my yearold of course got the idea of the toy right away and was able to do the games hes out of the age range of this toy but it still kept him entertained for a few minutesi dont think weve even found everything that this little toy can do yet my yearold doesnt play with it for long periods of time but i think it might make a good travel toy because it is so light and easy to transport it doesnt seem flimsy but my kids are gentle with their toys for the most part so i cant speak to its durability yet especially with kids who are more physical

quick note before i begin the reviews for all  of the turtles combat gear packs seem to appear on all  pages here im reviewing michelangelos and ill mention the other  at the endmy daughter is on a big ninja turtles kick at the moment which i think is funny because it officially completes her liking all the things i liked at that age and i didnt force her to like any of them and believe it or not her favorite ninja turtle is the same i liked at the same age michelangelo seriously what are the odds  whenever wed pass the tmnt toys at the store this weapon set was something shed always point out and now that she has it she loves it it kind of surprised me too since she was enjoying the heck out of the foamcovered nunchaku i gave her a few years agoin this set you get two throwing star discs an orange bandana and one pair of nunchaku the nunchaku are made of a soft plastic and area hollow so theres practically no chance of anyone getting hurt if they get smacked by them the plastic chain lets them move surprisingly fast when swung as for the throwing star discs theyre made of plastic as well and can be thrown like little frisbees for maximum distance they soar with no problems at all the bandana is long enough to be tied around in the back just like the turtles do this could be a pain for your kids if they dont know how to tie things but hey it makes for good practice i like that they shaped it a little bit instead of having the bandana be one straight piece of fabric overall this set is an absolute steal at the price its going for im really surprised they arent charging double for itwith the other sets donatellos is the bo with two stars and the bandana leonardos one katana with the stars and bandana and raphs is two sai with the bandana while i could say the same thing with mikeys set for not including another pair of nunchaku i feel like they should have included the other katana with leos set you can always buy an extra to get the second katana as well as some extra stars the bo included with dons is pretty short and could have been put together with three pieces instead of two to make it a bit longer raphs set is awesome though and the sai look great im glad he got a good both weapons in his it just wouldnt be the same with one sai even without the throwing stars raphs set is greatthese ninja combat gear sets are an excellent toy for kids to have if they love the turtles wellmade pretty safe and most importantly fun hopefully a shredder set will be released some time so your little turtles can have a bad guy to go up against

when i saw that playmates was releasing th anniversary collectors edition teenage mutant ninja turtles figures and immediately went on a nostalgia trip as a child of the s tmnt figures was the most important toy line of my youth some of my fondest memories as a kid are of playing with the zany tmnt characterswell playmates hit it out of the park with these figures the articulation on these guys is amazing with over  different joints including fingers and toes the fingers are particularly neat and hold the weapons very well even more important the articulation is decently well hidden although here i think playmates could have tried a bit harder to hide the ball jointsthe paint job is generally good if simple the turtles are painted to look like a mix between the original action figures and the cartoon the turtles are each a different shade of green with vibrant color bandanas however the turtles do have eye pupils unlike the original figuresleonardo is one of the best figures in this set he comes with two katanas and sheaths on his back the paint application is absolutely gorgeous the facial expression is appropriately stoic

when i saw that playmates was releasing th anniversary collectors edition teenage mutant ninja turtles figures and immediately went on a nostalgia trip as a child of the s tmnt figures was the most important toy line of my youth some of my fondest memories as a kid are of playing with the zany tmnt characterswell playmates hit it out of the park with these figures the articulation on these guys is amazing with over  different joints including fingers and toes the fingers are particularly neat and hold the weapons very well even more important the articulation is decently well hidden although here i think playmates could have tried a bit harder to hide the ball jointsthe paint job is generally good if simple the turtles are painted to look like a mix between the original action figures and the cartoon the turtles are each a different shade of green with vibrant color bandanas however the turtles do have eye pupils unlike the original figuresdonatello works pretty well some reviewers have complained that the eyes are off center but on mine the eyes look ok the white paint on the bo bleeds a bit onto the brown but its pretty small even with all the articulation its tough to get donatello to hold the bo vertically these are pretty small complaints though overall this is a great figure

when i saw that playmates was releasing th anniversary collectors edition teenage mutant ninja turtles figures and immediately went on a nostalgia trip as a child of the s tmnt figures was the most important toy line of my youth some of my fondest memories as a kid are of playing with the zany tmnt characterswell playmates hit it out of the park with these figures the articulation on these guys is amazing with over  different joints including fingers and toes the fingers are particularly neat and hold the weapons very well even more important the articulation is decently well hidden although here i think playmates could have tried a bit harder to hide the ball jointsthe paint job is generally good if simple the turtles are painted to look like a mix between the original action figures and the cartoon the turtles are each a different shade of green with vibrant color bandanas however the turtles do have eye pupils unlike the original figuresraphael was never my favorite character but he was my first tmnt figure as a kid i was pleased to see that this figure really captures the spirit of the original figure hes easily my favorite of the bunch the facial expression is vintage raphael grouchiness raphael can hold his tsai very well even with the blade in between his fingers he looks like a punk with two tsai pointed towards his enemy the only thing that would have made this a star figure would have been a trench coat and hat like raphael in the original comics

when i saw that playmates was releasing th anniversary collectors edition teenage mutant ninja turtles figures and immediately went on a nostalgia trip as a child of the s tmnt figures was the most important toy line of my youth some of my fondest memories as a kid are of playing with the zany tmnt characterswell playmates hit it out of the park with these figures the articulation on these guys is amazing with over  different joints including fingers and toes the fingers are particularly neat and hold the weapons very well even more important the articulation is decently well hidden although here i think playmates could have tried a bit harder to hide the ball jointsthe paint job is generally good if simple the turtles are painted to look like a mix between the original action figures and the cartoon the turtles are each a different shade of green with vibrant color bandanas however the turtles do have eye pupils unlike the original figuresmichelangelo is a fan favorite and this figure delivers the nunchuck chains are real metal and you can actually have mikey swing them around hes got holders on his back so you can have mikey hold one nunchuck in both hands and store another one in back i would have preferred mikey with a goofier expression on his face but thats a small complaint overall mikey is ready to party

vladimir trunkov is  in the cars  line of singles and hes the head of the trunkov family  hes designed as a zaz zaporozhets and his color scheme light blue with a yellow stripe is the same as the ukranian state flag which is where the car is made  he meets with the other families gremlins pacers  hugos and professor z in a plot to discredit a new fuel allinol and make sure that cars continue to use traditional gasoline  our grandson became a cars fanatic shortly before his th birthday and weve been collecting them ever since  theyre super durable and we know hell be able to pass them along to his own kids one day  although hes definitely one of the plainest looking of the collection we got a great price of just  with  shipping so we were obviously happy with that

victor h is  in the cars  line of singles and is the head of the hugo crime family in the movie  hes designed as a light brown yugo zastaval koral and as with so many of the yugo cars that were notoriously unreliable hes inoperable as he awaits replacement parts  grandpa  i thought the hugo twist on yugo was pretty clever  mr h or boss as hes referred to in the movie has to rely on a tow truck named ivan to tow him to a meeting with the three lemons families the gremlins pacers  trunkovs and he also has a transporter named karl  our oldest grandson became a cars fanatic shortly before his th birthday and weve been collecting them ever since  theyre super durable enough so that we know theyll be around for him to pass onto his own kids one day  we also got a great price of  including shipping so we were very pleased with the purchase

remember those cute little dogfaced scaly kobolds from the monster manual  ben siens does and hes created three different little dogheaded critters to complete your collection  you get three sculpts each kobold with sword and shield kobold with spear and kobold with sword and spear  if you participated in the bones kickstarter you get  in total theres just one problem these look nothing like modern dd koboldsmodern kobolds you see have morphed into something much more dragonlike  its understandable  kobolds didnt make much sense in the dd ecosystem and by tying them formally to dragons kobolds became a lowlevel minion that could challenge a newbie party of adventurers  ever since kobolds have taken on a distinctly crocodilian lookthats not to say that these sculpts couldnt act as other little monsters but i have more goblins and kobolds than i can handle already so no thanks

the schleich smurfs toys are great for kids and adults alike there are tons out there to collect and it seems like new ones get made on a regular basis still having a ton of little smurfs on your shelf to display looks great but how about you spruce things up a bit and give them a house well here you go the schleich smurfs house is a fantastic little home to store a couple of smurfs in or to just keep out as scenery its  inches tall when assembled and can store several figures inside yes a tiny bit of assembly is needed to put the house together though its not going to take you more than a few minutes to put the pieces in place the mushroom house is made of two main pieces and the rest are for the door windows and chimney everything stays together fairly well though a few pieces might fall off with regular use during playtime dont worry though as everything goes back together without any problems this is a pretty durable toythe included figures are papa smurf smurfette brainy smurf and  gargamel its no big deal but papa smurf is packaged by his own while the others are bundled together maybe he really is that much of a boss each figure looks like they should and i really dig papa smurfs sculpt and pose the inclusion of gargamel is a little puzzling though given his tiny size hes only slightly taller than the smurf figures and you know that isnt the case in the show maybe you can pretend he accidentally zapped himself with a shrinking spell or something either way kids with imagination shouldnt have any trouble coming up with some fun scenarios with him running around the smurf house none of the figures have any articulation since theyre onepiece pvc figures but theyre still fun the paint on everything is pretty good and looks a lot better than similar toys ive seen latelyteen titans figures im looking at youtheres nothing bad i can say about this house or the figures its durable fun and very much worth the price its selling for i just saw that they have a few other houses by schleich for your little smurf village so why not pick up a few others too my daughter loves the toys and im sure well have our own smurf village here very soon

i dont know when it happened exactly but over the last year or so the bratz dolls seem to have been taken in a new direction trying to get back the top spot in the dolls market after monster high just obliterated the competition granted i never paid that much attention to dolls at all before my daughter was born though id see commercials of new ones here and there but a few months ago i thought i saw a new monster high doll with new packaging in the store and it ended up being a bratz doll a bratzillaz doll to be exact my daughter loves her mh dolls before any others though she thinks a few of these bratzillaz are cool too and cloetta spelletta here is one that she was interested in after putting it side by site with a mh doll i have to say that these new bratz are pretty much on par with mh in terms of quality and fun there are clear differences in the two that youll notice immediately too aside from the general design i know that this is not a monster high doll and im sorry to compare the two so much its just that there are such obvious similarities and i cant help itms cloetta stands at about  inches tall nearly perfectly inscale with the monster high dolls oddly enough she features a nicely articulated body and you can move her head shoulders elbows wrists waist hips and knees the hip articulation is slightly limited due to her outfit but not a big deal personally i think this body is better than the standard mh doll body because the limbs have a little more weight to them and arent as flimsy i notice a lot of loose joints with the mh doll shoulders and wrists drooping out of poses after a second i dont think thatll be as much of a problem with the bratzillaz cloetta also has glass eyes that look beautiful you cant see them too well in the stock images and if you havent seen one of these dolls in person yet youll be pleasantly surprised upon seeing her out of the box the hair is rooted perfectly too and feels the same as your average mh dollsas for her outfit cloetta has a plastic hat that fits on her head with a clear plastic band her dress has a weird feeling to it almost like a combination of leather and vinyl it looks good and has a plastic pearl necklace and chest piece over it her belt is white with pearls on it and has a medallion for the magic academy her silver and pink cape ties around at the neck with laces giving her a cape was a nice touch but i think it looks a bit cheap especially compared to the rest of the doll finally are her boots and earrings the boots slide on and off her feet easily and the earrings are secure enough to not worry about falling out if they do come out though you simply pop them back in again like a monster high dolls overall cloetta looks pretty dang cool with the outfit hair and pink skin and dont forget the witch mark symbol on the left part of her chestfinally are the accessories of which are a bit disappointing all cloetta comes with are her broom hair brush a stand and the spell scroll the stand does its job like it should the brush works like it should too and looks ok and the scroll will likely be forgotten after a day what bothers me the most about this isnt that she barely comes with anything but that they actually took the time to put in an image of cloettas pet barkthalameow in the packaging right next to her clearly in view why would you include an image of her pet why not just include the actual toy i cant say that this is the reason im not giving this toy a full  stars though it does hurt the score a little for being such a stupid greedy choicethat gripe aside bratzillaz are a nice addition to the spooky dolls category for young girls theyre pretty welldesigned and can be put into any monster high collection without looking off cloetta was my daughters first and weve gotten a few more since then im looking forward to seeing where this line goes

oxymoronish glowinthedark feature has a lengthy but limited lifespan and confusing the longer the exposure to light the more and longer the stand will glow ha did i mention the back tips of my boots
