incredible the possibilities are endless you get a enough variety of tapes  to make females swoon my fiveyearold has been rippin it up pun intended with this tape pop art abstract art useful artwithapurpose bizarre art doll outfits and container jazzinup have all been created within my abode and i now know that i should have built an altar for this tape before xmas day tape sticks well yet is removed easily as well if tapes are in holders backwards the elves were very busy it is easy to reversepop out the tapes themselves can get it at toys r us for  when i was there on  this set was all sold out so keep that in mind if you were planning on making a special trip for this stuff tape of the goddesses and rugrats and hassled momsps if you keep the enclosed cardboard bench that is used for packaging purposes you will have a neat seat for dolls or a merchandise shelf for doll shopkeepers

i bought space checkers on a whim because i found myself in a toy store with a fiveyearold  these are the compromises parents make if i was going to have to buy a toy i was determined that it would be a game we could both play fortunately space checkers turned out to be a surprisingly engaging game for adults and kids alikespace checkers features four alien races the ixithan empire little green men the kanaloan alliance yellow disembodied heads like tmnts kraang the mechanoid armada likewell palladiums mechanoids only blue and the formic commune like red dd formians  they are all theoretically battling for control of earththe board consists of  spaces divided into four quarters each aligned with a colorrace  there are starting spots for  colorcoded flying saucers as well as  spaces off the main board that act as prison cells for captured saucers  earth sits in the center taking up sixteen spaces it has no bearing on game play other than as an obstacle that must be avoided so much for battling for the supremacy of earththeres no kinging in space checkers so we invented that rule that whoever makes it to the opposite side becomes a supreme commander and can move in any direction from that point on  the official rules mitigate this somewhat by dictating that once youre on the opposite side of the board you can move wild and move in any direction without regard for the tyrannous color die see belowplayers roll two dice one that determines direction by color or wild and one that determines the number of moves  you can also warp across the board by simply moving off one side and starting across on the other side  in essence treating the board like a sphere rules otherwise progress as normal checkers  which is to say that theres almost no rules that apply from checkers because the board colors and number of players changes the game significantlyif space checkers has a flaw its the colorcoded die  the definition of moving towards a color is so vague that it causes quite a bit of confusion  do you have to move in a straight line does moving backwards and warping count as moving toward a color  can you just immediately attack another player on the opposite side by warping backwards a primer on how checkers works might help i thought i knew how to play checkers but reviewing the rules reminded me that the devil is in the detailsthis is my problem of course  my children were not bothered in the least by the lack of clarification on how space checkers work because they only just learned checkers the game has so far entertained my boy and my twoyearold girl for several days in a row high praise indeed for games that often dont last more than a few hours

my daughters been on a superhero kick for the last year or so and when i got a chance to get the spiderman stuntacular city playset i knew shed love it as soon as this thing arrived she was all over it any young fan of spiderman should have a blast playing with it though it would be a good idea to get some additional little marvel figures to go along with it since it only comes with spidermanfirst off this playset is huge when it was delivered the size of the shipping box had me wondering if something else was sent to me by mistake unpacking the toy is a little annoying so make sure you have scissors ready everything in here is tied down right down to spideys motorcycle even when i got the motorcycle out of the box there was still a tie around it that needed to be removed once free everythings ready to go batteries are included and work perfectly though its worth mentioning that these are regular demo batteries and will need to be replaced within a few weeks if the toys played with regularly the stuntacular city features a small rampslide for spideys bike to go down a lizard hand that when pulled down causes the window to break and reveal the lizards head some webs on the side for spiderman to hang around on a cool adjustable ledge that lets spiderman hang by his feet or stand up normally and finally a fancy climbing feature press a button on the front of the playset and as long as spidermans in the right spot hell climb up the building thanks to the magnets in him the stuntacular city has loud sound effects and music when you use this feature and the lizard window one something for parents who get easily annoyed by their kids toys for some reason to keep in mindthe first time we saw spiderman climb the wall both my daughter and i started laughing he makes this weird turn towards the top and moves in a bizarre way fun fact you can use similar toys with magnets in them and have them climb up as well like select littlest pet shop figures that adds a bit of life to this toy if you ask me watching a little skunk climb up a wall using its caboose the next big superhero possibly spidermans motorcycle is a nice addition though it can only go forward and back you cant steer it but kids probably wont mind when i had a chance to examine everything myself i couldnt find any features that might cause harm or any sharp pieces on the structure so its pretty safe the only thing to watch out for would be carefully cleaning it when it needs a little scrubbing and for what its worth a short story book is included that centers around doing the right thing its a cute additionthe things keeping it from being  stars arent too big yes the structure is a bit on the flimsy side and can easily break if youre not careful the opening window the webs on the side and even the switch couldve been made better my other gripe is the price when amazon finally showed how much this thing runs for i did a double take it doesnt seem like youre getting your moneys worth here and i swear ive seen similar playsets for half the cost then again this is a toy featuring one of the biggest names in comics ever so it makes sense that it costs moretwo weeks since getting it my daughter still regularly plays with the stuntacular city spiderman rides his motorcycle down the hall and around the living room doing his thing and ive read her the book that came with it several times its a good toy for the little superhero fan in your life

try to watch return of the jedi and you will notice that b wing pilots have a different helmet and have a white outfit  this action figure is a nice action figure but not movie accurate  you will not see any pilot with such outfit in the movie  helmet looks more like a wing pilot but a wing pilots use a green outfit

this klingon bird of prey is almost flawless diamond select did a great job painting the bird of prey with detail and weathering i love the feature that allows you to change the wings the sound features are pretty cool i usually dont like like it when the sound features are just quotes from the movies but this one has general chang quoting shakespeare  how cool is thatthat said theres one small flaw with the ship the red band cloaking device on the front of the ship is only partly painted the top and front side are painted in red but the bottom side isnt fully painted from certain angles the band looks too small its certainly not enough to kill the product but i just wish diamond select took better care to catch these sorts of problems

update  peter sam is one  narrow gauge engines in the takenplay line as of summer   peter sam is a dark green with red and yellow lining the number  and his name imprinted on both sides with a red base and  black wheels  he first appeared in tv season   and on the  collector checklist  popular due to his kind and well mannered nature even the troublesome trucks on sodor dont play tricks on him he joins victor the only narrow gauge engine on sir topham hatts railway skarloey  rheneas  sir handel  rusty  fearless freddie  luke  duke aka granpuff and mighty mac a double ended fairlie engine who is  characters  mighty and mac  in one engine  we added peter sam to our grandsons collection when we saw him for   update  fisherprices summer  msrp for their small engines is we were first time grandparents of a   year old when my husband and i began a tnp collection for our grandson hoping hed pass it along to his own kids one day  weve all had a great time interacting with this overall quality line of trains vehicles and playsets  he turned  at the end of april and still enjoys spending a couple of hours of each day he spends with us in the sodor land of make believe that spans a large portion of our basement  although disneys cars characters are beginning to occupy a different portion its nice to see our investment continuing to hold his interest engaging and encouraging that active imagination  grandson  came along in march so we plan to continue collecting tnp for several years to come

this action figure depicts a bounty hunter from the old republicthis character is like a female boba fettthe body is very well sculpted and paintedto put the helmet you need to remove her headit is a shame that this action figure was so well sculpted and yet she has one of the most ugly faces of all star wars action figuresshe cant sit downto put the helmet you must remove the head  be careful try not to break it when doing thatif you are a hardcore fan of the old republic you may ignore the facebut if you buy it because you like a good sculpt with a nice face look elsewhere

hasbro has made over  galen marek figures so far probably the most for any expanded universe character but this version is by far the best its galen from force unleashed ii and unlike the other versions of galen this one is extremely versatile he comes with enough accessories for at least three changes of costume as well as two lightsabers both lit and unlit the sculpt is very solid and the likeness of galen is spot on its nice to see galen marek getting the royal treatment

its great to finally see an updated version of tarkin hasbro made a lot of improvements but it isnt perfect  and thats a shame first the cloth skirt actually looks pretty decent in person i would have preferred a plastic skirt but thats no reason not to get this figure what does bring the figure down is the paint on the skin tarkins skin is way too pale and looks lifeless the sideburns arent painted either the figure is definitely worth getting and ranks at  stars but i really hope hasbro takes one more shot at this figure to make it a star figure

this thomas  the summer festival themed  pack is darling and was a nice little treat for our grandson on july th  this was one of the first two packs in the takenplay line to feature cargo that lights up  when you start accumulating multiples of the engines and vehicles via themed packs and playsets weve always so appreciated when the designing somehow differentiates them from those sold individually  in this case thomas is decorated with yellow banners on both sides depicting fireworks and stars and is festooned with red and yellow ribbons  he pulls a red plastic rail car with a yellow base and  black wheels and its cargo is a removable brown plastic wood case labeled fireworks inside a long yellow firework with two holes blasted out of one side  when you press the button on top of the case the holes are illuminated with a bright red light making it seem as if fireworks are exploding inside of the case  we were able to find our grandsons for just  with free shipping  update  fisherprices summer  msrps for their  packs are     he really got a kick out of his little box of fireworksits also fun to collect the themed  packs  update  there are  of them as of summer  and they are in order of introduction  thomas  the treasure pop goes thomas kevins helping hook scruffs dirty job thomas  the raft kmart exclusive thomas at the winter festival thomas at the spring fair thomas at the summer festival thomas at the halloween celebration the last four have lightup cargo victor  oil cargo thomas to the rescue iron arrys oily mess and scruffs dirty mess the last two are color changers  there were also several buddy packs annie  clarabel toby  flora bill  ben thomas  rosie percy  maviswe were first time grandparents of a   year old when my husband and i began a tnp collection for our grandson hoping hed pass it on to his own kids one day  weve all had a great time interacting with this overall quality line of trains vehicles and playsets  he turned  at the end of april and still enjoys spending a couple of hours of each day he spends with us in the sodor land of make believe that spans a large portion of our basement  although disneys cars characters are beginning to occupy a different portion its nice to see our investment continuing to hold his interest engaging and encouraging that active imagination  grandson  came along in march so we plan to continue collecting tnp for several years to come

based on the review at jedi temple archive i was worried about this figure however i actually like it a lot the biggest problem is the neck joint  hasbro made a big hole at the base of jar jars neck so you can move it around but if the neck is pushed back you can see the hold fortunately ive found that if you push the neck forward it actually looks pretty good i love the detail on jar jars head and arms it would be great if hasbro produced a version without the hole in the neck but in the meantime this is the best version of that crazy gungan out there

in terms of aesthetics this is the best sandtrooper ever this figure looks dirty as if hes been stuck in a sandstorm which is precisely how he should look too many past sandtrooper figures have been too clean so this figure is a huge step forward unfortunately the dirty paint seems like it chips off a bit not too much but in a few spots on the armor look clean white and stick out under bright light its not a huge problem but id recommend carefully inspecting the figure before buying him to make sure youre happy with the paint job

its hilarious that hasbro made a vader figure specific to the final scene in rotj generally hasbro did a good job the larger piece of electricity fits vader like a glove and looks really effective on him the smaller piece is harder to attach and falls off the vader figure itself is a repack of the rotj vintage vader however his skirt wraps around the front a bit too much covering his legs id recommend pushing it back to the sidesoverall a great figure for dioramas of the emperors throne room

this character needed an update bespin leia has one of the most beautiful wardrobes of the entire star wars saga and hasbro did it justice with the silken clothes hasbro also got leias face right making her sufficiently feminine some of the earlier leia figures looked pretty masculine now we need to get an updated lando to flirt with her

don crumlin is  in the cars  singles line and is the bright purple member of the lemons gremlin family  grandpa  i think its neat that each of these cars is based on a real life person this ones named after a pixar animator don crum  this guy definitely adds a pop of color  our oldest grandson became a cars fanatic shortly before his th birthday and weve been collecting them ever since  theyre super durable  hell definitely be able to pass them along to his own kids one day  and for a total of  including shipping we couldnt beat the price

becky wheelin is  in the cars  singles line and though shes just a minor character appearing in the airport scene shes a really neat looking navy blue mini cooper with a blackwhite checkerboard roof  an interesting detail is that her sideview mirrors are also checkerboard  she appears to be a big francesco bernoulli fan  our oldest grandson became a cars fanatic shortly before his th birthday and weve been collecting them ever since  theyre super durable so hell definitely be able to pass them along to his own kids one day  we were able to get a great price  including shipping which was probably less than what she was selling for at retail level so that made it all the better

officer murakarmi is  in the cars  singles line  though he has a minor role in the movie watching cars go through the booth at the tokyo airport our grandson pronounced him very cool and grandpa  i agree  hes white with a blue roof and trim around the bottom with a red light on top and very official looking insignias on his front doors and back theres also a big  on the back  our oldest grandson became a cars fanatic shortly before his th birthday and weve been collecting them ever since  theyre super durable and hell be able to pass them right along to his own kids one day  we paid more for him    shipping than we probably would at retail but officer murkarmi is one that he uses during playtime to help the spies go after all of the bad guys so that was okay

please be aware despite the description that mighty mac is one train  not a  pack he is  characters in one engine  update  mighty mac is one of the  narrow gauge engines available in the takenplay line as of summer  along with victor the only narrow gauge engine on sir topham hatts railway skarloey  rheneas  sir handel  peter sam  rusty  fearless freddie  luke  and duke aka granpuff  mighty mac is a doubleended fairlie locomotive and is  characters in one engine  mighty is the older one with a small speck of hair on his forehead while mac is the younger frecklefaced end  they have opposing personalities which makes it interesting  mighty mac first appeared in tv season   and on tnps original spring  collector checklist  hes dark blue with gold and red lining a black cab roof and  black wheels  we paid  for our grandsons  he really enjoys his  in  guy  fisherprices summer  msrp is we were first time grandparents of a   year old when my husband and i began a tnp collection for our grandson hoping hed pass it along to his own kids one day  weve all had a great time interacting with this overall quality line of trains vehicles and playsets  he turned  at the end of april and still enjoys spending a couple of hours of each day he spends with us in the sodor land of make believe that spans a large portion of our basement  although disneys cars characters are beginning to occupy a different portion its nice to see our investment continuing to hold his interest engaging and encouraging that active imagination  grandson  came along in march so we plan to continue collecting tnp for several years to come

a few weeks ago i made the comment to my daughter that abbey bominable seems to get all the most beautiful outfits seriously every single abbey that comes out is gorgeous and its becoming apparent that a lot of the other dolls arent getting much attention im not seeing very many cleo dolls any more or lagoona robecca operetta ghoulia or clawdeen clawdeen has always been one of my daughters favorites and while i think shes a cool character i havent been wowed by the different ones that have been releasedup until this onefor her birthday my daughter only wanted two monster high dolls the new festival abbey see and little dead riding wolf we missed out on her when she first came out last year and yet it seems a second wave of scarily ever after dolls has hit stores over the last couple of months as soon as i saw that she was available i ordered clawdeen and when i opened the shipping box i couldnt believe how beautiful she was she looked so plain in pictures of the three scarily ever after girls little dead riding wolf is definitely the winner in my book the bold red on her dress and cape make her a standout and they did excellent on her hair too if you havent seen this clawdeen in person yet and were on the fence about getting her rest assured that stock images dont do her justicelittle dead riding hood is on your standard monster high doll body articulation at the head shoulders elbows wrists upper legs knees and bootsfeet her boots are attached to the leg so you cant remove them from her feet clawdeen has a beautiful look with her makeup featuring a couple shades of purple glitter and red lipstick simply put this is a pretty basic yet gorgeous clawdeen that could pull off some other outfits very well her dress here is nothing short of striking the red hood has a velvety feel to it with a a nice spot pattern on the inside of the cape theres a small clasp at the neck that secures simply and holds together like it should my daughter hasnt said anything about it not staying closed and i have the doll right here as im reviewing it just be careful with this piece and it should be ok it is a small plastic clasp and could wear down over time if its opened and closed repeatedly ldrhs dress has a corset design on top with black and purple laces going down and little golden crossbones at the waist there are even little gold buckles at the bottom of each purple ribbon all around the dress this is a very nice touch and im surprised they didnt just use two for the front and ignore the rest the dress can be taken off easily thanks to the usual velcro back under the red dress skit portion is a black tulle helping it stick out and give it some more shape i also really dig the purple boots although she has trouble standing up because of the weight of the dress and youll probably have to use the stand if you want to display her her only extra accessories for clothing include her earrings and a single purple and black arm warmerfinally shes a little light when it comes to accessories but she still comes with a few things ldrh has the usual monster high brush stand a story book and a little black coffin purse the story is great just like the others in this line with some nice illustrations the purse again is black and not purple like it is in the stock image above if you ask me the black goes with her outfit betterif clawdeen an often overlooked doll as of late can look this great when given the storybook treatment i can only imagine how abbey skelita and venus can be if scarily ever after continues little dead riding wolf is a keeper buy her now before shes discontinued

this guy is  tall and boy is he ready to create snow chaos in general listen we are not collectors of these toys like the above chap we play with them so has this dude had a few mishaps already yes and i am pleased to report that he is lookin fine ours came with no paint defects thank higherbeing the seam does not bother usi actually thought that the seam was a demarcation between the ice kings moustache and beard i did check out pics of the ice king after reading the previous reviewers complaint and he does indeed have one continous flow of hair from head to toe in cartoon land i am not an adventure time purist i still love him can be found at target for five bucks if you are lucky he is already a fave in our joint

neca did an incredible job with these figures the detailing is extremely realistic if you rub your finger along the body it feels like rough wrinkled skin neca also managed to get quite a bit of articulation including wrist leg elbow shoulder and two neck joints one at the base and one near the head et is around  inches tall but hes a pretty bulky figure and looks quite largethe beer buddy figure wears with a moulded plaid shirt it doesnt come off it generally looks pretty good on him but looks a bit thin around the shoulders he comes with two accessories a game pad and gerties daises this figure also comes with a neck extension so you can make the neck longer it looks great although admittedly is a bit tough to get on you have to position the ball in the ball socket straight so you can push it in my advice is to just switch to the longer neck and leave itthe thing i love most about this figure is the face rather than simply using the same head as the night flight figure this et is clearly drunk and dazed just like in the movie the mouth is slightly open and you can even see his teeth as opposed to the other et figures smile its awesome that neca took the time and effort to add that amount of detailthe night flight figure comes with a wraparound towel the towel is moulded not cloth so you can really only dress et up in it one way however it looks great on him it can be removed to get a naked version of et sadly the figure doesnt come with the neck extension only with the short neck you could always take the neck extension from the other figure but its still odd that neca didnt give this figure any other accessoriesit took  years but finally we have an et figure worthy of the film well worth the price

this is a cute little doll for the pricelagoona comes with loose styled hair my doll shed a lot for some reason with aqua colored highlights her outfit is black with a coral reef on it on it she has a black and aqua colored sheer tutu on top with an octopus tentacle design  as with all the dolls in their series the make up is twocolored and very cute  lagoona has starfish shoes and a pearl braceletshe doesnt come with a stand none of the dance class dolls do but shes a pretty doll at a great price

operetta rocks a rockabilitty s swing type outfit including a little patterned bow over red hair  as with all the dolls the hair isnt styled her leotard has dice on it and her skirt has a cute spider web theme she has her usual piano keyed heeled s shoesshe doesnt come with a stand none of the dance class dolls do and none of the dolls have earrings  but shes a good doll at a great price

if you can find her for  at big lots rejoice there were a lot of howleens there right before xmashair very soft bands hold pigtails in place tightlyearring yes just one and it is nonremovable it is a yellow plastic safety pinmakeup very soft pink and brown not garishshoes easy to get on and off heels show a bit at back but stay within shoeoutfit one total outfit legs connected to top closes with velcro at back legs have paw prints and torso has paw prints with dance move diagram symbols and arrows its pretty atrociousbelt held on with small peg soft plastic safety pins with dangling headphonesboom box purse open design with a little room for cassetteshands in clenched mode likeshe is shorter than the standard mh crowd  tall with shoes on simple yet spunky just wish she ditched the s onesie

this is a great howleen for those who wanted to get the original version with clawdine but couldnt find itshe has pink hair the original howleen had orangish hair and i think its a lot prettier than the original howleen her shirt has a cute dance class pattern on it showing the steps of her hip hop moves  note that the top is sewn onto the pawprint pants so they are one piece  she has a plastic zipper type belt with pawprint headphonesthe quality of the clothing is great and i like that her hair is soft and not gelled  note that this line does not comes with  standsone big difference between this and the first version howleen is that her arms are softer vinyl and therefore have a bit of flexibility  this also makes her a much better version than the first  shes more posable

this is a very cute very detailed and well made vanity set for frankie stein  it is in her signature colores of black and blue and includes several accessories like perfume bottle and make up  there are little stickers of her friends to put on the backdrop  including boyfriend holtjackson draculaura howleen etcthe chair is really cute and made out of a large bolt as is  of the legs  theres a little open cupboards area on the front to store the little thingsits the perfect size for frankie and she sits on it well  the vanity makes a great display for frankie when shes not in use  just put it on a shelf and put in the chair and she can enjoy time off from playin all just as detailed and lovely as cleos and a great addition to a monster high set  the price is also right for what you get

my daughter must just be great at picking out the coolest dolls because it seems like any time she gets a new one i have a hard time giving it anything less than  stars on here spectra abbey venus jinafirethe list goes on and the ones that she doesnt like im usually right there with her agreeing that theyre either boring or dont have a whole lot going on for them however recently with the scaris dolls the one that stood out the most to me was skelita calaveras this probably has to do with me loving the art that dia de los muertos brings and when i saw skelita on the back of jinafires box i immediately asked my daughter you want to get her too right amazingly she didnt a few weeks ago i got a surprise when i woke up and there she was skelita now look i dont collect these dolls and ive basically stopped collecting toys to focus on other things but man was i happy when i got her seeing the doll inperson is great and its awesome to see a truly new monster high doll spectra may have the cool semitransparent limbs going on but skelita features something none of the others have a completely new bodyfirst things first skelitas unique skeleton body if you were ever wondering about the skeletal structure of the mh girls nows your chance to see how it looks the arms legs and torso are all completely new if theres a previous skeleton doll please correct me and all of the bones look great i especially love the hands and work on her back lift skelitas hair and youll see her spinal cord as well as the rib cage it may be a little gross as my daughter puts it but i love how unique it makes her the torso is contained within a clear plastic shell in the shape of your standard mh girl to help keep the clothing on as for the arms and legs they were very stiff at first and i was worried that they might break easier than usual given the new structure just be careful and dont move things too fast or hard and she should be fine as much as i would have liked to see them go all out and give her a skull with features painted on im glad they kept her head normalwith skin this is one of the head types that doesnt have ears thoughnow for her beautiful outfit skelita has a an orange necklace brown bracelet on her left wrist brown belt with skulls and flowers on it green summer shoes and the stunning black dress with colorful removable skirt the black dress is basic and stops right about where her skirt ends it has a grey flower and vine design on it and an open back showing off her bones her skirt is three layers with multiple colors and more flowers on them she may be as dead as it gets but skelitas outfit is full of life since her head type doesnt have ears there are no earrings my absolute favorite aspect of the doll aside from the skeleton body is how they painted her face just zoom in on the pictures above and see how beautifully everything comes together the dots the eyebrows the stitches this is one fantastic looking doll toys like this make me wonder why i was paying so much more for the living dead dolls years ago when they usually lacked this much creativity and fun as the line went on finally theres the hair ive yet to see a skelita with hair as straight as the stock pictures is and i havent seen one that looks as messy as the boxed picture above mines straight for the most part though the sides are curled at the ends it looks good and im happy with everything about my dollthe lack of accessories irks me a little as im used to seeing these dolls come with a pet when they make their debut it looks like the scaris collection skimps out on this as even the other new doll jinafire didnt come with a pet either im curious to see what they could have come up with for skelitas pet since jinafires potential pet is kind of obvious skelita does get a suitcase with wheels though it looks nice like the others and has a nice skeleton handle and a skull on the case she also comes with the usual brush stand and journalwhat more can i say to convince you that this is one of the best monster high dolls yet just a few months ago i said i was eagerly waiting to see what new characters they could come up with and they sure as heck didnt disappoint me while i dont collect toys any more i might make an exception and collect whatever variations of skelita that may come out if the basic doll looks this good who knows what the sweet  and others will look

the ice bed does look a little different in person than it does in the promo images  its much whiter in person made of an irridescent but transluscent plastic  the bed comes with a tv showing an ice boarding game drink lava lamp and alarm clock it also comes with her pet shivers little ice bed and a diary  a pink snowflake pillow and flimsy sheet complete the setin all its a cute little set and great for displaying abbey when she isnt being played with or moved around  she mostly sits in it  can be kind of tight if you lay her down the fabric sheet is kind of flimsy  doesnt have any sewn edges and looks like someone grabbed a scrap of fabric the other bed sets had better qualitythe shimmery plastic of the bed is nice and the two stalks of trees on either side of her bed have sparkles on them rather than being the colorful plastic  at the top of her bed is a mh skull wearing ear muffs  i knock it down  start due to the cheapness of the fabric but this is a good buy at the  price

so gorgeous dress with lace fronting is delicate so just keep that in mind wings are removable stay in place when in on mode four bangles two black two teal will stay on unless hand is removed no earrings beret is held on with almostinvisible plastic taggies and has an opening at the top for one ear dress has velcro at the back stockings are not attached to dress shoes are snug suitcase is a dud and trip journal could be longer as i always say despite this the stars remain the same oohlala

the most gorgeous clawdeen paws downarc de triomphe howlshair is thick down to tush wavy layered and has purple highlights at sides and crown held back a bit on one side with a coileyeshadow is subtle purples lipstick is magentaish pink bottom fangs presentbracelet is a soft plastic coil with faux bucklesearrings are gold a mini eiffel tower and two gold hoops with studsdress is easy to get on and off has velcro at back satin shoulder straps crisscross at front satin belt at waist dress has an overall black lace print on soft purple but from the waist down the dress is covered with sheer black material with gold leopard print real lace at hemgold tiered belt is soft plastic sports holes buckles hooks crescent moons and studs peg is tough but i found it a bit hard to insert peg in holeshoes are easy to remove and replace fanglike studs at toe and on back heel clawmarks on base and idontknowwhat on edges fur plantlife or rich tapestry i say furrish tapestry if you force meslight whimpers with a french accentsuitcase can roll via your hand but not the dolls arms are not long enough case will not stay closed mattel it is not hard to make a latching case and re see my other scaris doll reviewsincluded tiny replica diary opens to the mh skull in plastic hard to open has a portrait of claw on back cover and her name and a family pic on front would have been better in paper with actual pagesas usual the travel diary needs more pagesmore je ne sais quoialthough this doll is breathtaking this time i am going to minus one star because the darn suitase should not pop open only to scatter doll toiletries all over the darn place heck even littlest pet shop suitcases snap shut i cannot be cest la vie about that matter hey maybe clawden will meet a werewolffrench bulldog mix in scaris who will steal her heart and repair her case au revoir

found this fella after weeks of stalking our local walmart ugh in midmarch  for  how i do not know just keep on trying is my point ok this dude is tough use him as a weapon and he will remain unscathed picky ones hoodie is just for show full velcro at back of snakeskin print top bit at back of argyle shorts easy on and off clothing as usual shoes are the same plus they stay on they sport a lime green hissing viper coiling the mh skull logo sans bow of course doll is articulated one small black hoop earring at top of ear to avoid the  look one shoulder and arm top are adorned with green and a bit of yellow snake scales i choose to not think of this as a tattoo but as a birthmark snakehawk present cleft chin too sunglasses stay on bag actually closes well and can hold feeding mice and drakkar noir cologne sorry emo types but a journal is not included love him so lets hope that there is not a perseus doll out there somewhere

this doll is allaround great dress and shoes are easy to get on and off dress has velcro at the back hood at back of dress is just for show not functional earrings will not get lost our dolls hair was not gelled surprisingly her glasses stay on her face case is better than most of mh dolls purses roomier and closes nicely great price herepay no more than that though we got her for  at walmart hey i get what i need and then get out of there my favorite ghoulia five groans

my daughter has wanted draculauras car for over a year now yet she always ends up getting a new monster high doll instead for one reason or another we hadnt seen the scaris convertible in stores but when i showed her a picture of it on here she quickly decided that she wanted this one too luckily for us i managed to get one and shes been very happy with it any monster high fan out there who wants something for their dolls to look even cooler with the scaris car definitely gets the job donethe convertible is surprisingly big made of a pretty durable plastic and can seat up to  monster high dolls two in the front and two in the back seat pop open the trunk and you can store a couple of accessories in there everything works like it should like the seat belts easily being pulled out to get dolls in the seats as well as the steering wheel and stick shift the cars design is pretty dang sweet with cobweblike patterns all over it and dog heads on the back lights theres even a scaris license plate while there isnt much variety in the colors they did make sure to add some little mh details like the steering wheel and stick shift fitting the theme check out the rims too i can just see my daughter wanting those for her car in  years when she starts drivingno accessories of any kind are included with this car and there arent any special light up or sound features either on the plus side this means no having to replace batteries when the features stop working though it would have been nice for them to include something even if its just the headlights or a horn sound feature you push the car forward and back to make it go with no pullback action of any sort its a pretty basic carthere are a few reasons why i give the car four stars the price the very limited trunk space a slight safety concern in theory nothing hazardous to kids and the lack of doors the price even when buying directly from amazon is a few bucks more than i think its worth youre getting a basic car with nothing extra no stickers not even a single solitary accessory like a booklet that most of the dolls come with a little photo album with the mh girls touring scaris would have been a pretty cool extra to throw in regarding the trunkif you notice the gaps in the sides of the car youll see that theres quite a bit of extra room that could have been used by the trunk this thing isnt even a half inch deep and can only hold the smallest of mh accessories not that id suggest putting pets in a trunk but even fitting say chewlian isnt going to happen very lame the lack of doors isnt that big of a deal since the dolls can be placed into the car easily but why not include doors that open and close as for that safety concern thats why i have the educational value rating at  stars you know how i said you can get two other dolls into the back seat well said seat is actually on the trunk imagine flattening the back of a vw beetle into a seat and slapping two seat belts on it so the passengers are sitting on the outside exposed to traffic yeah not really a good idea is it im not going to write a letter to congress about getting this toy pulled from stores because of this or anything but it makes me wonder what the heck they were thinking with this aspect of the design i wonder if the car will ever make an appearance in the mh show or movies exactly as it appears in toyformif you can get the car for a few bucks off during a sale or something more power to you my daughter loves playing with it which is priceless in my book so im happy with it too hopefully with the next vehicles that come out therell be a little more to make it worth your money

as a selfprofessed professional gamer easily i put in anywhere up to eighteen hours a day video games it is something that i enjoy and feel it is my way of helping out the gaming industry and community by investing so much time playing the games by myself or online with many strangers who often have become some of my best efriendswithout going into too much detail my marriage ended a few years ago she seemed pretty upset that i had invested so much time into gaming while not providing for the home somehow she never understood the big picture as to why i do what i doalthough i may never understand the timing of how it was possible but we did have a child together she is a few years old now and i try to be a good father for her birthday last week i thought that it would be a great idea to introduce her to the wonderful world of video games through action figures with the bright enticing colors of orange it would be something that she could be drawn to moresoall the ex inlaws and cousins were present for her birthday party bbq being italian i brought lassagna and red bull for the kids as an appetizer my ex brotherinlaw was pretty upset that the hyper kids were not hungry for the grilled food he had prepared i had to explain to him that kids metabolisms are different and will settle down to eat when they are readyhaving an online tournament i had to be at it was expedient that the gift opening take place and that my little girl open my present to her first so i could cut out early the packaging on the figure was pretty difficult open so i helped her with the box cutter knife i got for her back at eastereveryone was pretty upset that i got her that figure given that i did not stay for the entire party one or two others might of gotten her the same gift but i never include a gift receipt so people have to keep the gifts i give them my little angel was thrilled with the figure moreso the head crab that it came with since she kept putting it in her mouth

neca did an amazing job recreating the likeness of the engineer and space jockey both figures have  points of articulation including the chest also the figures are quite durable and the joints are easy to movefor the engineer i was a bit worried about the color of the suit but the bony white looks perfect in person the eyes of the actual engineer are darker than the figure but otherwise the facial expression really captures that eerie mix of sentience and disdainfor the space jockey the wires and pipes are flexible but not fragile the hip joints are a bit difficult to position but its still pretty easy to stand the figure updefinitely recommended for fans of the movie

im loving these new nickelodeon ninja turtles figures these figures combine a fair amount of articulation with solid sculpts they dont look exactly like they do in the tv show but thats ok the ones in the show look a bit too blocky too cgi these figures do a better job keeping the shape and style of the tv show characters with the stylistic choices of the  turtles figure linemy only concern is that the paint applications around the bandanas really vary in some cases the orange paint is sloppy and spills over onto the head in other cases it doesnt cover the entire bandana because of this id recommend not buying online if you can find it in stores collectors will definitely want to inspect their sample before buying also im disappointed that the chains on mikeys nunchucks arent at least painted silver although you can do that yourself if you wantthat aside these figures definitely blow my  turtles out of the water

celine dephare is  in the cars  singles line and is the only car whose eyes are her headlights  this apparently was an inside joke since john lasseter thought is was better for the cars to all have their eyes on their windshields as the rest of them do  knowing this its so appropriate that her license plate reads cur  sit think curiosity  designed as a hard top alfa romeo spider the bright red die cast version has her covered in dirt  in the movie she scares mater when she tries to sell him headlights  our oldest grandson became a cars fanatic shortly before his th birthday and weve been collecting them ever since  though theyre super durable and we know hell be able to pass them along to his own kids one day this was one of our more expensive purchases    shipping wish wed picked her up when kmart had her in stock

acer with torch is  in the cars  singles line and since i learned to drive in a pacer does that date me or what i got a real kick out of his license plate  fsh bwl  because thats exactly what you felt like you were driving in a fish bowl  though on this model the license plate is hidden by a basket  this acer is the same beaten up ugly greenishyellow car that the others are but this one has a plastic blow torch coming from underneath on the passenger side and is attached to his right front wheel  hes also got a couple of plastic cylinders attached to his trunk which can actually be removed from their basket container so you know hes up to no good  hes one of the bad guys who tries to track down the american  british spies who stole info on professor zs devious plot  our oldest grandson became a cars fanatic shortly before his th birthday and weve been collecting them ever since  theyre super durable and were sure theyll be around to pass along to his own kids one day  we got a great deal too won him on a  bid with  shipping so it probably wasnt far from what kmart was selling him for back in june of  when he came out

good to see ol villains iron bert and iron arry finally make it into the takenplay line  they first appeared in tv season   and now on the  collector checklist so its a long time coming  theyre a couple of gruff diesel shunter twins well bert does have a bit more stubble than arry a greyishgreen with yellow hazard stripes on their fronts and backs with yellow cabs though in this picture iron berts looks orangeish red bases and  black wheels  they work at sodor ironworks the name printed in white on both sides  it goes without saying that none of the engines are very fond of these grim messengers of doom they work at the ironworks smelters where old engines are melted down  we were able to find our grandsons for  plus  shipping  update  fisherprices summer  msrp for their small engines is   our grandson may not be too fond of them either considering how devious they are they may end up sitting next to his regular and talking versions of diesel   on a shelf away from all of his other trains in a state of permanent time out  then again the regular and talking versions of diesel are allowed to be part of his fleet of diesels including mavis salty den dart norman sidney paxton dennis and d  despite being devious  so maybe theres hope  especially since one of his christmas gifts will be s twist  tumble cargo drop which features the smelters shedwe were first time grandparents of a   year old when my husband and i began a tnp collection for our grandson hoping hed pass it along to his own kids one day  weve all had a great time interacting with this overall quality line of trains vehicles and playsets  he turned  at the end of april and still enjoys spending a couple of hours of each day he spends with us in the sodor land of make believe that spans a large portion of our basement  although disneys cars characters are beginning to occupy a different portion its nice to see our investment continuing to hold his interest engaging and encouraging that active imagination  grandson  came along in march so we plan to continue collecting tnp for several years to come

i usually make my own play clay and give the kids kitchen implements to play with so this is not a typical toy for our house when i got it out of the box my daughter went nuts for it i could barely get it to the table and put it togetherit took me a few minutes to realize how to use it so reading the directions is helpful the set is a castle and all  sides are used to interact with the playdoh three of the sides contain princesses you can use the bottoms of the princess dolls to mold little items that they can hold or you can put the princess in the big mold and create a playdoh dress for them bonus the princesses can just be played with without the rest of the kit or the playdohthe th side of the castle is used to mold a prince out of playdoh now this is full of all sorts of symbolism really making a man but that is probably lost on the children my daughter just kept taking his head off and then requesting that i make another onethe top of the castle is used to make hair for rapunzel or anyone really this works much the same as all the other sets that make spaghetti or bacon or hair yes that means that dried bits stay in there and need to get pushed out the next time you use the seti have one quibble well two quibbles actually the first is the placement of the prince mold it blocks some of the other little molds on the castle in fact i took it apart and tried to put it together in a different way because i thought id done it wrong the first time are little fingers able to use those molds maybe but even my yearold has trouble using the little molds so they usually ask me to make those smaller more delicate pieces the castle sides also fall off easily they should come off fairly easily in order to use the castle but you cant really pick up the kit and move it without one of them falling off a big rubber band around it should solve the problemthe second quibble is that while this set and anything like it is good for creativity and smallmuscle development its not what i would consider educational kids will love any playdoh set like i said play clay and forks work just fine too so the princess theme is a bit of a turnoff for me my daughter does not have any other princess items so there wasnt a recognition factor for her  she just loves to play with it because its fun

the color  detail is firstrate it comes with a toy version of the spray painted nwo championship belt which also has pretty good color  detail sadlythis is a bad reminder of the january  episode of monday nitro when nash laid down for hulk hogan so he can win the wcwspray painted nwochampionship belt i give this toy a  out of

riding my scooter to the drivein movie theather and setting up a picnic blanket here in wisconson has always been a delightful ritual of mine over the years however with the cold weather this winter i have backed off a bit last weekend i was able to enjoy seeing the movie wreckit ralph at the drivein one of the things that most impressed me was his heros duty suit that ralph wore at one point in the movie it was a nice tribute to video game classics likes of galaga and metroidas it started to snow that night i decided to leave the movie early pack my picnic back onto the scooter and head over to target in hopes of finding a heros duty ralph figure gratefully the drivein theather management was kind enough to give me a partial refund for my ticket due to the snowwhen i got to target i headed straight over to the toy aisle i know my way around the store pretty good since i visit it at least twice a day looking for hot wheel treasure huntsright as i turned the corner to go down the aisle i immediately saw the heros duty ralph figure unfortunately there was this kid in a motorized wheelchair with basket in what appeared to be his grandparents blocking the aisle preventing me to get the figure so i had to walk around the aisle and reenter from the other side slightly irritated by that i made haste to get me figure as soon as i went for it the kid pointed at it for his grandpa grab it just before i was able to get to it i fell seconds to inches short of obtaining my prizei became more angry at this further inconvienencethe kid seemed pretty excited about the figure but didnt know exactly why ralph was wearing that suit instead of the familiar overalls obviously he had not seen the movie yet and thus should not own the figure the grandpa showed the figure to the grandma as they tried to determine its price unable to see the price the grandpa left figure in the basket with the kid in search of assistance from a target employee the grandma stood by impatiently until she followed after the grandpaas if it was divine providence the kid and the figure were left unattendedi seized the opportunity and took the figure from the kids basket and ran out towards the check out aisle of the storerunning past a store employee i heard security called on the employees radionot willing to risk spending the next six hours in the lossprevention office again at target i threw the figure into the garden center now decked out with holiday junk and left the storewhen i got home and still empty handed i decided to pay a bit extra and order the figure online

im loving these new nickelodeon ninja turtles figures these figures combine a fair amount of articulation with solid sculpts they dont look exactly like they do in the tv show but thats ok the ones in the show look a bit too blocky too cgi these figures do a better job keeping the shape and style of the tv show characters with the stylistic choices of the  turtles figure linemy only concern is that the paint applications around the bandanas really vary in some cases the red paint is sloppy and spills over onto the head in other cases it doesnt cover the entire bandana because of this id recommend not buying online if you can find it in stores collectors will definitely want to inspect their sample before buyingthat aside these figures definitely blow my  turtles out of the water

im loving these new nickelodeon ninja turtles figures these figures combine a fair amount of articulation with solid sculpts they dont look exactly like they do in the tv show but thats ok the ones in the show look a bit too blocky too cgi these figures do a better job keeping the shape and style of the tv show characters with the stylistic choices of the  turtles figure linemy only concern is that the paint applications around the bandanas really vary in some cases the blue paint is sloppy and spills over onto the head in other cases it doesnt cover the entire bandana because of this id recommend not buying online if you can find it in stores collectors will definitely want to inspect their sample before buyingthat aside these figures definitely blow my  turtles out of the water

the ninja turtles were one of my two favorite kinds of toys when i was little the other being ghostbusters and my daughter has taken after me and is a huge fan of the new show too its funny how that works out  years later something big when i was a kid coming back and being big when shes a kid not too long ago she lucked out and got most of the toys in the first wave with the four turtles being part of the haul the guys always came with cool extras when the first tmnt line of toys came out and that trend continues two decades later im reviewing donatello first because come on hes probably the most neglected of the four turtles what kid wants to be the guy with a stick while the others have all the cooler weaponsdonatello is the tallest turtle even in toyform being slightly taller than raph and leo i think its cool that they went the extra mile on height differences here as most companies would just use the same bodies when theyre so similar in design the articulation on this figure is excellent and you can move his head shoulders elbows wrists upper legs and knees this is a lot more than we got when i was little thats for sure the articulation is second only to the great comicbased tmnt figures that neca put out a few years ago all the work on don is great the colors are perfect details like bumps on his legs and dents in his shell are there and they even painted the little ring on the strap of his bo holster for a toy at this price they didnt skimp out on the figures in any way they only thing that might throw fans off is the lack of pupilsdon can hold his weapons with both hands which are sculpted in a holding position and when it comes to weapons he comes with quite a few extras the main ones worth mentioning are a chinese sectional staff sanjiegun and a bladed staff naginata he comes with a few smaller weapons as well just like the other turtles the bo and naginata can fit in his holster easily and not slip out it looks pretty cool to have him holding one and keeping the other aside as backup as usual the weapons are all painted brown but feature as much detail as his standard bo again these are a big step up from the old toys while still keeping with the style of the original releasesthese toys have been out for a while now and if you havent gotten them yet or were on the fence about getting them for your kids or even yourself i mean it when i say that these are some of the best action figures out today theyre fun to collect and play with and my daughter always has the turtles going on adventures in the sewer playset where shredder has mousers take littlest pet shop pets hostage i cant wait to start getting her more bad guys and some of the weird creatures like michelangelos squirrel

im loving these new nickelodeon ninja turtles figures these figures combine a fair amount of articulation with solid sculpts they dont look exactly like they do in the tv show but thats ok the ones in the show look a bit too blocky too cgi these figures do a better job keeping the shape and style of the tv show characters with the stylistic choices of the  turtles figure linemy only concern is that the paint applications around the bandanas really vary in some cases the purple paint is sloppy and spills over onto the head in other cases it doesnt cover the entire bandana because of this id recommend not buying online if you can find it in stores collectors will definitely want to inspect their sample before buyingthat aside these figures definitely blow my  turtles out of the water

i have a feeling that april is that figure from the first wave of the new tmnt toys you know the one you get after youve gotten all the cool characters and your favorites unless april is your favorite anyway poor april got the short end of the stick as a figure compared to everyone else but being a key character in the show its cool that they included her with the first wave instead of throwing her in somewhere down the road plus its always great to have a girl in a mostlydude show face it even in the old tmnt cartoon there werent a lot of ladies especially ones that got the action figure treatment apparently april was also packed just one per case making her a bit rare when the figures first came out nearly two years later i see her in stores now and then about as much as i see splinteras far as the sculpt goes this looks just like ms april shes got the big boots the long sleeve shirt black leggings the spunky hair style everything i also love the  on her shirt which is a little tribute to the news station she worked for in the old cartoon she fits in perfectly with the turtles scalewise and sports a decent paint job i think they couldve done a little better on the mouth and eyes but its to be expected when i think back to the first april figure that came out for the first cartoon i remember all she really had was a camera this one she comes with a whole arsenal of weapons yep she comes with a large set of brown extra weapons just like the turtles do giving her a decent assortment of things to hold and join in on the action the most notable and probably everyones goto weapon for this toy is the training sword it fits in her hand perfectly though her hands do have pretty loose holding positionswhat hurts aprils score is the articulation all she can move is her arms legs and head giving her a whopping  points of articulation granted she doesnt need as much as the turtles or some of the villains but anything extra helps especially if youre going to be using her with any of the vehicles shes really reduced to a basic figure for the linei had a hard time deciding on if this is a  or  star figure shes definitely not a  some extra articulation wouldve bumped her up without question the reason im giving her an above average rating is because she does come with some weapons look at a few other figures in this line who even if they are more detailed and bigger dont come with anything at all and feature similar articulation they couldve not included anything at all as it is aprils a welcome addition to the line and my daughter has a blast having april bring the pain on leonardo and raphael on a regular basis for disturbing her littlest pet shop picnicswhat you didnt know theyre in the same universe

of all the presents my daughter got for her birthday last month it was the furby that got the most attention i was surprised at first because it was one of those toys that shed mention now and then not expressing a whole lot of interest in well here we are almost a month and a half later and shes playing with her furby regularly and always brings him along for trips i have to admit this is a pretty cool toy its leaps and bounds ahead of the original model and does so much more if this were around when i was a kid itd easily be one of my favorite toysfor starters the new furby has a better body model than the original instead of just moving its ears up and down this new one can move its head to give it more personality in its actions furby can dance along to music changing how it dances to different genres the most notable difference however is the led eyes all sorts of expressions are visible in the eyes now including some wacky icons like cows and dogs that show up depending on what the furby is doing the more you talk to furby the more english hell pick up after about two weeks we noticed a big difference in how he was talking and singing the big surprise though was seeing that there are different personalities it can have from crazy to evil to valley girl or is that just evil  the new furby is full of surprises different personality types come and go and if you dont like one you can always just reset it to go back to normal if youve owned a furby before you can expect everything that made that toy fun and much more this time around all the furbish the singing interacting with other furbies going to sleep when its not being played withhasbro took what was worked with the original and kept those features only making improvements another big selling point is the furby app download the app and you can feed the furby all kinds of things getting different reactions out of itim keeping the details about what we like about the new furby brief because theres still so much thats undiscovered just when you think youve seen everything a new personality comes out or it will sing along with a song that i wouldnt have expected it to this is definitely a five star toy in the fun category but there are just a few small things holding it back from getting  stars overall first it takes  aa batteries just like how the old furbies sucked the life out of theirs you can expect the new furby to go through batteries in no time if its played with regularly get rechargeables when you buy one and youll be set the other problem is a minor gripe of mine and its that the motor sound when it opens its mouth sounds almost as loud as the original furbys im no toy designer but arent we past noises like this it kind of distracts from the cute and cuddly nature of the little creature hearing mechanical sounds from inside every time it moves the only other problem is a temporary one it keeps selling out just be patient and youll find one on here or in stores honestly im surprised the new furby has managed to become nearly as popular as the first modelany child thats interested in the furby based on what theyve seen in commercials is going to absolutely love playing with it furby is still cute fun to play with and will likely be one of those toys that your kids remember when theyve grown up

this oil tanker joins sodor circus monkey as s two additions to takenplays line of rolling stock rail cars trucks etc that  in the real world  cant move unassisted by another vehicle making its first appearance on the  collector checklist not to be confused with the diesel fuel tanker that first appeared on the original spring  collector checklist  its a cute little clear tanker but unlike the fuel tanker that has liquid inside that you can see sloshing around it just has a half of a cylinder that moves back and forth to appear oil is moving around inside as its pulled along the tracks  trimmed in silver it has oil along with two circular emblems of oil rigs on the side sodor fuel co is written on its red base and it has  black wheels  we paid    shipping for our grandsons  update  fisherprices summer  msrp for most of their rolling stock pieces is update  if youre interested in starting a rolling stock collection of your own there are  items in the tnp line as of summer  and they are in order of introduction  quarry car annie  clarabel  pack sodor supply co rocky troublesome truck diesel fuel tanker storybook car sodor zoo snake car bubble tanker farm animal car sodor mining co spider exhibit car sodor cement mixer sir topham hatts musical caboose crocodile special talking troublesome trucks  pack sodor circus monkey oil tanker hector and separate reintroductions of annie and clarabelwe were first time grandparents of a   year old when my husband and i began a tnp collection for our grandson hoping hed pass it along to his own kids one day  weve all had a great time interacting with this overall quality line of trains vehicles and playsets  he turned  at the end of april and still enjoys spending a couple of hours of each day he spends with us in the sodor land of make believe that spans a large portion of our basement  although disneys cars characters are beginning to occupy a different portion its nice to see our investment continuing to hold his interest engaging and encouraging that active imagination  grandson  came along in march so we plan to continue collecting tnp for several years to come

neca did an amazing job recreating the likeness of the engineer the figure has  points of articulation including the chest also the figure seems quite durable and the joints are easy to move i was a bit worried about the color of the suit but the bony white looks perfect in person the eyes of the actual engineer are darker than the figure but otherwise the facial expression really captures that eerie mix of sentience and disdain definitely recommended for fans of the movie

rusty is one of  narrow gauge engines in the takenplay line as of summer   rusty is an orange diesel shunter who works maintenance on the skarloey railway he has yellow lining and white lettering with the number  and his name imprinted on both sides a red base and  black wheels  he first appeared in tv season  and on the  collector checklist  adventurous rusty is a dedicated worker and although sometimes he procrastinates a bit and can be a little careless and impatient hes also usually helpful and kind  he joins victor the only narrow gauge engine on sir topham hatts railway skarloey  rheneas  sir handel  peter sam  fearless freddie  luke  duke aka granpuff and mighty mac a doubleended fairlie engine who is  characters  mighty  mac  in one engine  we cant believe we just picked rusty up for  at toysrus  update  fisherprices summer  msrp for their small engines is we were first time grandparents of a   year old when my husband and i began a tnp collecion for our grandson hoping hed pass it along to his own kids one day  weve all had a great time interacting with this overall quality line of trains vehicles and playsets  he turned  at the end of april and still enjoys spending a couple of hours of each day he spends with us in the sodor land of make believe that spans a large portion of our basement  although disneys cars characters are beginning to occupy a different portion its nice to see our investment continuing to hold his interest engaging and encouraging that active imagination  grandson  came along in march so we plan to continue collecting tnp for several years to come

my  year old daughter loves bubble guppies and so do i  the characters are cute and spunky the songs are fun to sing to and the show is very educational i still hear my  year old singing the bones song underneath the skin were inmy daughter loves molly so i got this set for her and the gil set for my son fisherprice nickelodeon bubble guppies gil mr grouper lobster bath squirters  she instantly wanted to take a bath and we couldnt get her and molly and oona in there fast enough  since then molly and oona go everywhere with her  she demands they sit on her high chair table with her and that she has them in bed  she gets upset if she doesnt have them and shes had them for at least a month now  note that we gave her the starfish too but its like she doesnt even know it ever existedits still in a frying pan on her play cookset shelfmolly and oonas likenesses are extremely good and they are medium soft rubberplastic material both kids have a bit of a challenge filling them to squirt them but then again they have a challenge with all the squirters ive ever gotten  after all this time clutched in her little hands and traveling all over she snuck them into the car to go to day care even they dont show any wear mollys pink hair does not have rubspotsvery happy that we finally have toys to play with from the show we all love

my  year old went off bubble guppies for a while but when his little sister fell in love with the show he got pulled right back in  since they love taking baths together i got them each one of the squirter sets so they could play togethermy son likes filling them up with water and squirting me though its only play as he closes the glass shower door before squirting and i dont actually get wet   they are mediumhard i was surprised they were as hard as they are my  year old has problems squirting but is that a bad thing and super cute  mr grouper got hijacked by my toddler so my son just plays with gil and the lobsterlots of fun for the bathtub

amazon originally listed this right at fisherprices summer   msrp but in our original  review we stated it looked really flimsy and that grandpa  i would wait to see if it came down in price before adding it to the takenplay collection we started for our grandson the year it came out   when it went down to  we went ahead and purchased it hoping to be pleasantly surprised  suffice it to say  we werentweve noticed fp taking shortcuts and cheapening various aspects of this product line especially over the past year or so but in our opinion this is positively the worst product theyve put out  first of all they create an item for two trains to race down but only include one train luring the customer to purchase another train separately  while this wasnt an issue for us personally weve collected every train theyve manufactured for our grandson let us assure you that not only is it as flimsy as it looked it doesnt even operate as stated  youre supposed to be able to put  trains in the starting tray adjust the yellow switch gates to the desired lane track lift the starting tray and see who reaches the finish line designated by two blue flags first  flags are attached to a piece of track that can be connected to additional takenplay track or playsets you purchase separately  we attempted this with percy and thomas fifty times and not once did both of them even make it past the switch gates  one or both always got stuck on one of the switch gates  it makes you wonder whether the designers at fp have been given carte blanche control over what the company puts out without any oversight or review committee  by the way we ordered it on  here it is just  days later and amazon must be getting a slew of complaints and returns because theyve already dropped the price down to  less than fps msrp for their simple track packs  that was a smart decision because you cant claim somethings a playset when you cant play with it as describedyes it does close up to takenplay with percy snaps into the support piece underneath the rd section of track but we are quite certain that our grandson will have no interest in taking this anywhere  when youve really believed in a product line and invested so much money into it its a sad day when you see proof of its decline in such an extraordinary way  wed felt that wed be collecting this line for many years to come the grandson we started it for is now  but he has a  year old brother wholl be growing into the products soon and wed planned to continue purchasing as long as interest was maintained but it looks like the four years it took for them to go from a quality product line to this point will be the extent of our collection  shame on fisherprice for letting what started out as a great line go downhill so quickly and dramaticallyupdate  there are  playsets in the tnp line as of summer  that have msrps of under   they are in order of introduction  the original version of the toteatrain playbox colin at the wharf thomas at the farm percys mail delivery tidmouth tunnel toby at trotters farm sir handel at great waterton sodor engine wash talking diesels fuel  freight delivery sodor paint shop around the rails with thomas muddy adventure go go speedy railway skip it sodor lumber company treasure tracks a new version of the toteatrain playbox skip this too and brendam docks  the beauty of these tnp playsets is that he can choose one to easily disconnect from the others fold up and take with us on excursions  theyre definitely the simplest to take n play with

winston is sir topham hatts track inspection vehicle and first appeared in s blue mountain mystery dvd  winston may not be the brightest bulb in the pack but hes smart enough not to let on about what over the past two years sideshow has been releasing bounty hunters from the classic empire strikes back scene now we get bossk the most visually interesting of the hunters aside from fett himself and sideshow made a real winner with bossk the amount of tiny accessories and details on his outfit is incredible the flightsuit looks really functional some of the little tools even come off the scales on the legs arms and especially head look amazingly realisticdefinitely recommended for fans of bossk this might be the best bossk collectible to date to quote robot chicken you just got bossked

this special action figure set is one of the last hasbro will make under the vintage banner unlike the others which recycled old versions of the main characters this one actually has characters we havent seen in a while there have been other versions of rd and the death star droid but these ones are by far the best versions the rd is not the buildadroid version but rather a repaint of the  version it looks great the paint has slightly less weathering and dirt but that makes this version useful for any number of dioramas the dearth star droid is the buildadroid one of the figures in this set its the weakest as it sometimes has trouble standing up however its the power droid that is really the star of this pack we havent received a power droid figure in years and this one is phenomenal the dirt and weathering make this droid look old and used moreover the top comes off revealing the droids innards  a very cool feat overall this set is definitely required if you have any diorama with jawas
